Session Probabilistic_Timed_Automata

This is an unofficial reimagining of the Archive of Formal Proofs

Theory MDP_Aux

theory MDP_Aux
  imports "Markov_Models.Markov_Decision_Process"
begin

lemma sets_stream_space_cylinder: 
  "sets (stream_space M) = sigma_sets (streams (space M)) (scylinder (space M) ` lists (sets M))"
proof (rule antisym)
  have closed[simp]: "scylinder (space M) ` lists (sets M) âŠ† Pow (streams (space M))"
    using scylinder_streams[of "space M" _] by auto
  have [simp]: "(Î»s. s !! i) âˆˆ streams (space M) â†’ space M" for i
    by (auto simp: snth_in)

  interpret sigma_algebra "streams (space M)" "sigma_sets (streams (space M)) (scylinder (space M) ` lists (sets M))"
    by (intro sigma_algebra_sigma_sets) fact

  have *: "(Î»s. s !! i) -` A âˆ© streams (space M) = scylinder (space M) (replicate i (space M) @ [A])"
    if "A âˆˆ sets M" for i A
  proof (induction i)
    case (Suc n) show ?case
      apply (intro set_eqI)
      subgoal for Ï‰ by (cases Ï‰) (auto simp: streams_Stream Suc[symmetric])
      done
  qed (auto simp: streams_stl)

  have "sets (stream_space M) â‰¤ sets (sigma (streams (space M)) (scylinder (space M) ` lists (sets M)))"
    unfolding sets_stream_space_eq
    by (rule sets_Sup_in_sets)
       (auto simp: sets_vimage_algebra2 PiE_UNIV_domain space_PiM * intro!: sigma_sets.Basic imageI)
  also have "â€¦ = sigma_sets (streams (space M)) (scylinder (space M) ` lists (sets M))"
    by (rule sets_measure_of) fact
  finally show "sets (stream_space M) â‰¤ sigma_sets (streams (space M)) (scylinder (space M) ` lists (sets M))" .
next
  show "sigma_sets (streams (space M)) (scylinder (space M) ` lists (sets M)) âŠ† sets (stream_space M)"
    unfolding space_stream_space[symmetric]
    by (rule sets.sigma_sets_subset) (auto intro!: sets_scylinder)
qed

end

Theory Finiteness

theory Finiteness
  imports Main "HOL-Eisbach.Eisbach_Tools"
begin

section â€¹Two Eisbach proof methods for finiteness of setsâ€º
text â€¹
  The first method is intended to act more conservatively (think â€¹safeâ€º), leaving subgoals
  for the user where it couldn't proceed any further.
  The second method is more powerful, acting more in a succeed-or-die manner,
  similarly to â€¹forceâ€º and friends.
  The examples in the second section should give a good impression of where these methods
  can help.
â€º

text â€¹This slot is intended to provide more â€¹introâ€º theorems for finite sets.â€º
named_theorems finite

(* Trick from Dan Matichuk on isabelle-users *)
method add_finite_Collect_simproc methods m =
  match termI in H[simproc add: finite_Collect]:_ â‡’ m

(* Trick from Dan Matichuk on isabelle-users.
   Turns a structured method into a simple one.
*)
method_setup simple_method =
 â€¹Method.text_closure >> (fn m => fn ctxt =>
   let
     val facts = Method.get_facts ctxt
     val insert' = Method.Basic (K (Method.insert facts))
     val m' = Method.Combinator (Method.no_combinator_info, Method.Then, [insert', m])
   in Method.evaluate m' ctxt end)â€º

method finite_tup =
  match conclusion in
    "finite (_ Ã— _)" â‡’ â€¹rule finite_cartesian_product; finite_tupâ€º Â¦
    "finite S" for S :: "(_ * _) set" â‡’
      â€¹print_term S, (rule finite_subset[where A = S and B = "fst ` S Ã— snd ` S"]; finite_tup?
        | (rule finite_subset; assumption?; fastforce))â€º Â¦
    "finite X" for X â‡’
      â€¹print_term X, (simp add: image_def, finite_tup?)?,
                (solves â€¹(rule finite_subset; assumption?; fastforce)â€º)?â€º Â¦
    _ â‡’ â€¹fastforce simp: image_defâ€º

method finite_search =
  match conclusion in
    "finite (_ Ã— _)" â‡’ â€¹rule finite_cartesian_product; finite_searchâ€º Â¦
    "finite (_ ` _)" â‡’ â€¹simp; finite_search | rule finite_imageI; finite_searchâ€º Â¦
    "finite S" for S :: "(_ * _) set" â‡’
      â€¹print_term S, (solves â€¹rule finite_subset; autoâ€º
        | rule finite_subset[where A = S and B = "fst ` S Ã— snd ` S"]; finite_tup?)â€º Â¦
    "finite (Collect f)" for f â‡’
      â€¹print_term f, (add_finite_Collect_simproc simp)?;
        (solves â€¹auto intro: finiteâ€º
       | print_term v, simp?, rule finite; (assumption | finite_search)
       | rule finite_imageI; finite_search
       | rule finite_vimageI; finite_search
       | print_term x, rule finite_subset; assumption?; fastforce)â€º Â¦
    "finite X" for X â‡’
      â€¹print_term X,
        (rule finite; (assumption | finite_search) 
       |(simp add: image_def, finite_search?)?,
          (solves â€¹(rule finite_subset; assumption?; fastforce)â€º)?)â€º Â¦
    _ â‡’ â€¹fastforce simp: image_defâ€º

method finite = simple_method finite_search

section â€¹Testsâ€º

subsection â€¹Counterexamplesâ€º

lemma inj_finite_single:
  assumes "inj f"
  shows "finite {y. x = f y}"
using assms Collect_mem_eq Collect_mono_iff infinite_iff_countable_subset inj_eq not_finite_existsD
      rangeI
by fastforce

lemmas inj_finite_single[finite]

text â€¹It's hard to guess the right setâ€º
lemma inj_finite_single':
  assumes "inj f"
  shows "finite {z. f z = x}"
apply (rule finite_subset[of _ "{z. x = f z}"])
apply blast
using assms by finite

(* Due to Lars Hupel *)
definition select :: "('a â‡€ 'b) â‡’ 'a set â‡’ 'b set" where
  "select f S = {z | z. âˆƒx âˆˆ S. f x = Some z}"

lemma select_finite:
  assumes "finite S"
  shows "finite (select f S)"
using assms unfolding select_def by finite

lemmas inj_finite_single'[finite]

subsection â€¹Working Examplesâ€º

lemma
  assumes "finite A"
  shows "finite {x. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ P x}"
using assms by finite_search

lemma collect_pair_finite[finite]:
  assumes "finite {x. P x}" "finite {x. Q x}"
  shows "finite {(x, y) . P x âˆ§ Q y âˆ§ R x y}"
using assms by - finite

lemma collect_pair_finite'[finite]:
  assumes "finite {(x, y). P x y}"
  shows "finite {(x, y) . P x y âˆ§ R x y}"
using assms by - finite

text â€¹This is what we actually need in this theoryâ€º
lemma collect_pair_finite''[finite]:
  assumes "finite {(x, y). P x âˆ§ Q y}"
  shows "finite {(x, y) . P x âˆ§ Q y âˆ§ R x y}"
using assms by - finite

lemma finite_imageI':
  assumes "finite {(x, y). P x y}"
  shows "finite {f x y | x y. P x y}"
using assms by finite

lemma
  assumes "finite (A Ã— B)"
  shows "finite {(x, y) | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B âˆ§ R x y}"
using assms by - finite

lemma finite_imageI'':
  assumes "finite (A Ã— B)"
  shows "finite {f x y | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B âˆ§ R x y}"
using assms by - finite

text â€¹â€¹finite_Collectâ€º can also rewrite to â€¹vimageâ€ºâ€º
lemma
  assumes "inj f" "finite S"
  shows "finite {y. âˆƒ x âˆˆ S. x = f y}"
using assms by - finite

lemma
  assumes "inj f" "finite S"
  shows "finite {y. âˆƒ x âˆˆ S. f y = x}"
using assms by - finite

text â€¹Another counter-exampleâ€º
lemma
  assumes "finite (A Ã— B)"
  shows "finite {f x y | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B âˆ§ R x y âˆ§ Q x y âˆ§ T x âˆ§ TT y}" (is "finite ?S")
proof -
  have "?S = (Î» (x, y). f x y) ` {(x, y). x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B âˆ§ R x y âˆ§ Q x y âˆ§ T x âˆ§ TT y}"
  by auto
  also have "finite â€¦" using assms by - finite
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

text â€¹
  Easier proof. The problem for our method is that the simproc fails to turn ?S into the form used
  in the proof above.
  Note that the declaration of the â€¹finiteâ€º attribute below is the only one that is âˆ—â€¹necessaryâ€º in
  this theory.
â€º
lemma
  notes finite_imageI''[finite]
  assumes "finite (A Ã— B)"
  shows "finite {f x y | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B âˆ§ R x y âˆ§ Q x y âˆ§ T x âˆ§ TT y}" (is "finite ?S")
using assms by finite

lemma
  assumes "finite A" "finite B"
  shows "finite {(x, y) | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B âˆ§ R y âˆ§ S x}"
using assms by - finite

lemma
  fixes P Q R :: "'a â‡’ bool"
  assumes "finite {x. P x âˆ§ R x}"
  shows "finite {x. P x âˆ§ Q x âˆ§ R x}"
using assms by - finite

lemma R:
  assumes "finite A" "A = B"
  shows "finite B"
using assms by finite

lemma pairwise_finiteI:
  assumes "finite {b. âˆƒa. P a b}" (is "finite ?B")
  assumes "finite {a. âˆƒb. P a b}"
  shows "finite {(a,b). P a b}" (is "finite ?C")
using assms by - finite

lemma pairwise_finiteI3:
  assumes "finite {b. âˆƒa c. P a b c}"
  assumes "finite {a. âˆƒb c. P a b c}"
  assumes "finite {c. âˆƒa b. P a b c}"
  shows "finite {(a,b,c). P a b c}" (is "finite ?C")
using assms by - finite

lemma pairwise_finiteI4:
  assumes "finite {b. âˆƒa c d. P a b c d}"
  assumes "finite {a. âˆƒb c d. P a b c d}"
  assumes "finite {c. âˆƒa b d. P a b c d}"
  assumes "finite {d. âˆƒa b c. P a b c d}"
  shows "finite {(a,b,c,d). P a b c d}" (is "finite ?C")
using assms by - finite

lemma finite_ex_and1:
  assumes "finite {b. âˆƒa. P a b}" (is "finite ?A")
  shows "finite {b. âˆƒa. P a b âˆ§ Q a b}" (is "finite ?B")
using assms by - finite

lemma finite_ex_and2:
  assumes "finite {b. âˆƒa. Q a b}" (is "finite ?A")
  shows "finite {b. âˆƒa. P a b âˆ§ Q a b}" (is "finite ?B")
using assms by - finite

text â€¹
  This is the only lemma where our methods cannot help us so far due to the fairly
  complex argument that is used in the interactive proof.
â€º
lemma finite_set_of_finite_funs2:
  fixes A :: "'a set" 
    and B :: "'b set"
    and C :: "'c set"
    and d :: "'c" 
  assumes "finite A"
    and "finite B"
    and "finite C"
  shows "finite {f. âˆ€x. âˆ€y. (x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B âŸ¶ f x y âˆˆ C) âˆ§ (x âˆ‰ A âŸ¶ f x y = d) âˆ§ (y âˆ‰ B âŸ¶ f x y = d)}"
        (is "finite ?S")
proof -
  let ?R = "{g. âˆ€x. (x âˆˆ B âŸ¶ g x âˆˆ C) âˆ§ (x âˆ‰ B âŸ¶ g x = d)}"
  let ?Q = "{f. âˆ€x. (x âˆˆ A âŸ¶ f x âˆˆ ?R) âˆ§ (x âˆ‰ A âŸ¶ f x = (Î»y. d))}"
  from finite_set_of_finite_funs[OF assms(2,3)] have "finite ?R" .
  from finite_set_of_finite_funs[OF assms(1) this, of "Î» y. d"] have "finite ?Q" .
  moreover have "?S = ?Q" by auto (case_tac "xa âˆˆ A", auto)
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

end

Theory Basic

(* Author: Julian Brunner *)
(* This is originally a part of the CAVA model checker *)
theory Basic
imports
  Main
begin

  abbreviation (input) "const x â‰¡ Î» _. x"

  lemma infinite_subset[trans]: "infinite A âŸ¹ A âŠ† B âŸ¹ infinite B" using infinite_super by this
  lemma finite_subset[trans]: "A âŠ† B âŸ¹ finite B âŸ¹ finite A" using finite_subset by this

  declare infinite_coinduct[case_names infinite, coinduct pred: infinite]
  lemma infinite_psubset_coinduct[case_names infinite, consumes 1]:
    assumes "R A"
    assumes "â‹€ A. R A âŸ¹ âˆƒ B âŠ‚ A. R B"
    shows "infinite A"
  proof
    assume "finite A"
    then show "False" using assms by (induct rule: finite_psubset_induct) (auto)
  qed

  lemma GreatestI:
    fixes k :: nat
    assumes "P k" "â‹€ k. P k âŸ¹ k â‰¤ l"
    shows "P (GREATEST k. P k)"
  proof (rule GreatestI_nat)
    show "P k" using assms(1) by this
    show "k â‰¤ l" if "P k" for k using assms(2) that by force
  qed
  lemma Greatest_le:
    fixes k :: nat
    assumes "P k" "â‹€ k. P k âŸ¹ k â‰¤ l"
    shows "k â‰¤ (GREATEST k. P k)"
  proof (rule Greatest_le_nat)
    show "P k" using assms(1) by this
    show "k â‰¤ l" if "P k" for k using assms(2) that by force
  qed
  lemma Greatest_not_less:
    fixes k :: nat
    assumes "k > (GREATEST k. P k)" "â‹€ k. P k âŸ¹ k â‰¤ l"
    shows "Â¬ P k"
  proof
    assume 1: "P k"
    have 2: "k â‰¤ (GREATEST k. P k)" using Greatest_le 1 assms(2) by this
    show "False" using assms(1) 2 by auto
  qed

  lemma finite_set_of_finite_maps':
    assumes "finite A" "finite B"
    shows "finite {m. dom m âŠ† A âˆ§ ran m âŠ† B}"
  proof -
    have "{m. dom m âŠ† A âˆ§ ran m âŠ† B} = (â‹ƒ ğ’œ âˆˆ Pow A. {m. dom m = ğ’œ âˆ§ ran m âŠ† B})" by auto
    also have "finite â€¦" using finite_subset assms by (auto intro: finite_set_of_finite_maps)
    finally show ?thesis by this
  qed

  primrec alternate :: "('a â‡’ 'a) â‡’ ('a â‡’ 'a) â‡’ nat â‡’ ('a â‡’ 'a)" where
    "alternate f g 0 = id" | "alternate f g (Suc k) = alternate g f k âˆ˜ f"

  lemma alternate_Suc[simp]: "alternate f g (Suc k) = (if even k then f else g) âˆ˜ alternate f g k"
  proof (induct k arbitrary: f g)
    case (0)
    show ?case by simp
  next
    case (Suc k)
    have "alternate f g (Suc (Suc k)) = alternate g f (Suc k) âˆ˜ f" by auto
    also have "â€¦ = (if even k then g else f) âˆ˜ (alternate g f k âˆ˜ f)" unfolding Suc by auto
    also have "â€¦ = (if even (Suc k) then f else g) âˆ˜ alternate f g (Suc k)" by auto
    finally show ?case by this
  qed

  declare alternate.simps(2)[simp del]

  lemma alternate_antimono:
    assumes "â‹€ x. f x â‰¤ x" "â‹€ x. g x â‰¤ x"
    shows "antimono (alternate f g)"
  proof
    fix k l :: nat
    assume 1: "k â‰¤ l"
    obtain n where 2: "l = k + n" using le_Suc_ex 1 by auto
    have 3: "alternate f g (k + n) â‰¤ alternate f g k"
    proof (induct n)
      case (0)
      show ?case by simp
    next
      case (Suc n)
      have "alternate f g (k + Suc n) â‰¤ alternate f g (k + n)" using assms by (auto intro: le_funI)
      also have "â€¦ â‰¤ alternate f g k" using Suc by this
      finally show ?case by this
    qed
    show "alternate f g l â‰¤ alternate f g k" using 3 unfolding 2 by this
  qed

end

Theory Sequence

(* Author: Julian Brunner *)
(* This is originally a part of the CAVA model checker *)
theory Sequence
imports
  Basic
  "HOL-Library.Stream"
begin

  (* list basics *)

  declare upt_Suc[simp del]
  declare last.simps[simp del]
  declare butlast.simps[simp del]
  declare Cons_nth_drop_Suc[simp]

  lemma list_pred_cases:
    assumes "list_all P xs"
    obtains (nil) "xs = []" | (cons) y ys where "xs = y # ys" "P y" "list_all P ys"
    using assms by (cases xs) (auto)

  lemma fold_const: "fold const xs a = last (a # xs)"
    by (induct xs arbitrary: a) (auto simp: last.simps)

  lemma take_Suc: "take (Suc n) xs = (if xs = [] then [] else hd xs # take n (tl xs))"
    by (simp add: take_Suc)

  (* stream basics *)

  declare stream.map_id[simp]
  declare stream.set_map[simp]
  declare stream.set_sel(1)[intro!, simp]
  declare stream.pred_map[iff]
  declare stream.rel_map[iff]
  declare shift_simps[simp del]
  declare stake_sdrop[simp]
  declare stake_siterate[simp del]
  declare sdrop_snth[simp]

  lemma stream_pred_cases:
    assumes "pred_stream P xs"
    obtains (scons) y ys where "xs = y ## ys" "P y" "pred_stream P ys"
    using assms by (cases xs) (auto)

  lemma stream_rel_coinduct[case_names stream_rel, coinduct pred: stream_all2]:
    assumes "R u v"
    assumes "â‹€ a u b v. R (a ## u) (b ## v) âŸ¹ P a b âˆ§ R u v"
    shows "stream_all2 P u v"
    using assms by (coinduct) (metis stream.collapse)
  lemma stream_rel_coinduct_shift[case_names stream_rel, consumes 1]:
    assumes "R u v"
    assumes "â‹€ u v. R u v âŸ¹
      âˆƒ uâ‡©1 uâ‡©2 vâ‡©1 vâ‡©2. u = uâ‡©1 @- uâ‡©2 âˆ§ v = vâ‡©1 @- vâ‡©2 âˆ§ uâ‡©1 â‰  [] âˆ§ vâ‡©1 â‰  [] âˆ§ list_all2 P uâ‡©1 vâ‡©1 âˆ§ R uâ‡©2 vâ‡©2"
    shows "stream_all2 P u v"
  proof -
    have "âˆƒ uâ‡©1 uâ‡©2 vâ‡©1 vâ‡©2. u = uâ‡©1 @- uâ‡©2 âˆ§ v = vâ‡©1 @- vâ‡©2 âˆ§ list_all2 P uâ‡©1 vâ‡©1 âˆ§ R uâ‡©2 vâ‡©2"
      using assms(1) by force
    then show ?thesis using assms(2) by (coinduct) (force elim: list.rel_cases)
  qed

  lemma stream_pred_coinduct[case_names stream_pred, coinduct pred: pred_stream]:
    assumes "R w"
    assumes "â‹€ a w. R (a ## w) âŸ¹ P a âˆ§ R w"
    shows "pred_stream P w"
    using assms unfolding stream.pred_rel eq_onp_def by (coinduction arbitrary: w) (auto)
  lemma stream_pred_coinduct_shift[case_names stream_pred, consumes 1]:
    assumes "R w"
    assumes "â‹€ w. R w âŸ¹ âˆƒ u v. w = u @- v âˆ§ u â‰  [] âˆ§ list_all P u âˆ§ R v"
    shows "pred_stream P w"
  proof -
    have "âˆƒ u v. w = u @- v âˆ§ list_all P u âˆ§ R v"
      using assms(1) by (metis list_all_simps(2) shift.simps(1))
    then show ?thesis using assms(2) by (coinduct) (force elim: list_pred_cases)
  qed
  lemma stream_pred_flat_coinduct[case_names stream_pred, consumes 1]:
    assumes "R ws"
    assumes "â‹€ w ws. R (w ## ws) âŸ¹ w â‰  [] âˆ§ list_all P w âˆ§ R ws"
    shows "pred_stream P (flat ws)"
    using assms
    by (coinduction arbitrary: ws rule: stream_pred_coinduct_shift) (metis stream.exhaust flat_Stream)

  lemmas stream_eq_coinduct[case_names stream_eq, coinduct pred: HOL.eq] =
    stream_rel_coinduct[where ?P = HOL.eq, unfolded stream.rel_eq]
  lemmas stream_eq_coinduct_shift[case_names stream_eq, consumes 1] =
    stream_rel_coinduct_shift[where ?P = HOL.eq, unfolded stream.rel_eq list.rel_eq]

  lemma sset_subset_stream_pred: "sset w âŠ† A âŸ· pred_stream (Î» a. a âˆˆ A) w"
    unfolding stream.pred_set by auto
  lemma stream_pred_snth: "pred_stream P w âŸ· (âˆ€ i. P (w !! i))"
    unfolding stream.pred_set sset_range by simp

  lemma stream_pred_shift[iff]: "pred_stream P (u @- v) âŸ· list_all P u âˆ§ pred_stream P v"
    by (induct u) (auto)
  lemma stream_rel_shift[iff]:
    assumes "length uâ‡©1 = length vâ‡©1"
    shows "stream_all2 P (uâ‡©1 @- uâ‡©2) (vâ‡©1 @- vâ‡©2) âŸ· list_all2 P uâ‡©1 vâ‡©1 âˆ§ stream_all2 P uâ‡©2 vâ‡©2"
    using assms by (induct rule: list_induct2) (auto)

  lemma eq_scons: "w = a ## v âŸ· a = shd w âˆ§ v = stl w" by auto
  lemma scons_eq: "a ## v = w âŸ· shd w = a âˆ§ stl w = v" by auto
  lemma eq_shift: "w = u @- v âŸ· stake (length u) w = u âˆ§ sdrop (length u) w = v"
    by (induct u arbitrary: w) (force+)
  lemma shift_eq: "u @- v = w âŸ· u = stake (length u) w âˆ§ v = sdrop (length u) w"
    by (induct u arbitrary: w) (force+)
  lemma scons_eq_shift: "a ## w = u @- v âŸ· ([] = u âˆ§ a ## w = v) âˆ¨ (âˆƒ u'. a # u' = u âˆ§ w = u' @- v)"
    by (cases u) (auto)
  lemma shift_eq_scons: "u @- v = a ## w âŸ· (u = [] âˆ§ v = a ## w) âˆ¨ (âˆƒ u'. u = a # u' âˆ§ u' @- v = w)"
    by (cases u) (auto)

  lemma stream_all2_sset1:
    assumes "stream_all2 P xs ys"
    shows "âˆ€ x âˆˆ sset xs. âˆƒ y âˆˆ sset ys. P x y"
  proof -
    have "pred_stream (Î» x. âˆƒ y âˆˆ S. P x y) xs" if "sset ys âŠ† S" for S
      using assms that by (coinduction arbitrary: xs ys) (force elim: stream.rel_cases)
    then show ?thesis unfolding stream.pred_set by auto
  qed
  lemma stream_all2_sset2:
    assumes "stream_all2 P xs ys"
    shows "âˆ€ y âˆˆ sset ys. âˆƒ x âˆˆ sset xs. P x y"
  proof -
    have "pred_stream (Î» y. âˆƒ x âˆˆ S. P x y) ys" if "sset xs âŠ† S" for S
      using assms that by (coinduction arbitrary: xs ys) (force elim: stream.rel_cases)
    then show ?thesis unfolding stream.pred_set by auto
  qed

  lemma smap_eq_scons[iff]: "smap f xs = y ## ys âŸ· f (shd xs) = y âˆ§ smap f (stl xs) = ys"
    using smap_ctr by metis
  lemma scons_eq_smap[iff]: "y ## ys = smap f xs âŸ· y = f (shd xs) âˆ§ ys = smap f (stl xs)"
    using smap_ctr by metis
  lemma smap_eq_shift[iff]:
    "smap f w = u @- v âŸ· (âˆƒ wâ‡©1 wâ‡©2. w = wâ‡©1 @- wâ‡©2 âˆ§ map f wâ‡©1 = u âˆ§ smap f wâ‡©2 = v)"
    using sdrop_smap eq_shift stake_sdrop stake_smap by metis
  lemma shift_eq_smap[iff]:
    "u @- v = smap f w âŸ· (âˆƒ wâ‡©1 wâ‡©2. w = wâ‡©1 @- wâ‡©2 âˆ§ u = map f wâ‡©1 âˆ§ v = smap f wâ‡©2)"
    using sdrop_smap eq_shift stake_sdrop stake_smap by metis

  lemma siterate_eq_scons[iff]: "siterate f s = a ## w âŸ· s = a âˆ§ siterate f (f s) = w"
    using siterate.ctr stream.inject by metis
  lemma scons_eq_siterate[iff]: "a ## w = siterate f s âŸ· a = s âˆ§ w = siterate f (f s)"
    using siterate.ctr stream.inject by metis

  lemma eqI_snth:
    assumes "â‹€ i. u !! i = v !! i"
    shows "u = v"
    using assms by (coinduction arbitrary: u v) (metis stream.sel snth.simps)

  lemma set_sset_stake[intro!, simp]: "set (stake n xs) âŠ† sset xs"
    by (metis sset_shift stake_sdrop sup_ge1)
  lemma sset_sdrop[intro!, simp]: "sset (sdrop n xs) âŠ† sset xs"
    by (metis sset_shift stake_sdrop sup_ge2)

  lemma set_stake_snth: "x âˆˆ set (stake n xs) âŸ· (âˆƒ i < n. xs !! i = x)"
    unfolding in_set_conv_nth by auto

  lemma split_stream_first:
    assumes "x âˆˆ sset xs"
    obtains ys zs
    where "xs = ys @- x ## zs" "x âˆ‰ set ys"
  proof
    let ?n = "LEAST n. xs !! n = x"
    have 1: "xs !! ?n = x" using assms unfolding sset_range by (auto intro: LeastI)
    have 2: "xs !! n â‰  x" if "n < ?n" for n using that by (metis (full_types) not_less_Least)
    show "xs = stake ?n xs @- x ## sdrop (Suc ?n) xs" using 1 by (metis id_stake_snth_sdrop)
    show "x âˆ‰ set (stake ?n xs)" using 2 by (meson set_stake_snth)
  qed

  (* scans *)

  fun scan :: "('a â‡’ 'b â‡’ 'b) â‡’ 'a list â‡’ 'b â‡’ 'b list" where
    "scan f [] a = []" | "scan f (x # xs) a = f x a # scan f xs (f x a)"

  lemma scan_append[simp]: "scan f (xs @ ys) a = scan f xs a @ scan f ys (fold f xs a)"
    by (induct xs arbitrary: a) (auto)

  lemma scan_eq_nil[iff]: "scan f xs a = [] âŸ· xs = []" by (cases xs) (auto)
  lemma scan_eq_cons[iff]:
    "scan f xs a = b # w âŸ· (âˆƒ y ys. xs = y # ys âˆ§ f y a = b âˆ§ scan f ys (f y a) = w)"
    by (cases xs) (auto)
  lemma scan_eq_append[iff]:
    "scan f xs a = u @ v âŸ· (âˆƒ ys zs. xs = ys @ zs âˆ§ scan f ys a = u âˆ§ scan f zs (fold f ys a) = v)"
    by (induct u arbitrary: xs a) (auto, metis append_Cons fold_simps(2), blast)

  lemma scan_length[simp]: "length (scan f xs a) = length xs"
    by (induct xs arbitrary: a) (auto)
  lemma scan_last: "last (a # scan f xs a) = fold f xs a"
    by (induct xs arbitrary: a) (auto simp: last.simps)

  lemma scan_const[simp]: "scan const xs a = xs"
    by (induct xs arbitrary: a) (auto)
  lemma scan_nth[simp]:
    assumes "i < length (scan f xs a)"
    shows "scan f xs a ! i = fold f (take (Suc i) xs) a"
    using assms by (cases xs, simp, induct i arbitrary: xs a, auto simp: take_Suc neq_Nil_conv)
  lemma scan_map[simp]: "scan f (map g xs) a = scan (f âˆ˜ g) xs a"
    by (induct xs arbitrary: a) (auto)
  lemma scan_take[simp]: "take k (scan f xs a) = scan f (take k xs) a"
    by (induct k arbitrary: xs a) (auto simp: take_Suc neq_Nil_conv)
  lemma scan_drop[simp]: "drop k (scan f xs a) = scan f (drop k xs) (fold f (take k xs) a)"
    by (induct k arbitrary: xs a) (auto simp: take_Suc neq_Nil_conv)

  primcorec sscan :: "('a â‡’ 'b â‡’ 'b) â‡’ 'a stream â‡’ 'b â‡’ 'b stream" where
    "sscan f xs a = f (shd xs) a ## sscan f (stl xs) (f (shd xs) a)"

  lemma sscan_scons[simp]: "sscan f (x ## xs) a = f x a ## sscan f xs (f x a)"
    by (simp add: stream.expand)
  lemma sscan_shift[simp]: "sscan f (xs @- ys) a = scan f xs a @- sscan f ys (fold f xs a)"
    by (induct xs arbitrary: a) (auto)

  lemma sscan_eq_scons[iff]:
    "sscan f xs a = b ## w âŸ· f (shd xs) a = b âˆ§ sscan f (stl xs) (f (shd xs) a) = w"
    using sscan.ctr stream.inject by metis
  lemma scons_eq_sscan[iff]:
    "b ## w = sscan f xs a âŸ· b = f (shd xs) a âˆ§ w = sscan f (stl xs) (f (shd xs) a)"
    using sscan.ctr stream.inject by metis

  lemma sscan_const[simp]: "sscan const xs a = xs"
    by (coinduction arbitrary: xs a) (auto)
  lemma sscan_snth[simp]: "sscan f xs a !! i = fold f (stake (Suc i) xs) a"
    by (induct i arbitrary: xs a) (auto)
  lemma sscan_scons_snth[simp]: "(a ## sscan f xs a) !! i = fold f (stake i xs) a"
    by (induct i arbitrary: xs a) (auto)
  lemma sscan_smap[simp]: "sscan f (smap g xs) a = sscan (f âˆ˜ g) xs a"
    by (coinduction arbitrary: xs a) (auto)
  lemma sscan_stake[simp]: "stake k (sscan f xs a) = scan f (stake k xs) a"
    by (induct k arbitrary: a xs) (auto)
  lemma sscan_sdrop[simp]: "sdrop k (sscan f xs a) = sscan f (sdrop k xs) (fold f (stake k xs) a)"
    by (induct k arbitrary: a xs) (auto)

  (* sdistinct *)

  coinductive sdistinct :: "'a stream â‡’ bool" where
    scons[intro!]: "x âˆ‰ sset xs âŸ¹ sdistinct xs âŸ¹ sdistinct (x ## xs)"

  lemma sdistinct_scons_elim[elim!]:
    assumes "sdistinct (x ## xs)"
    obtains "x âˆ‰ sset xs" "sdistinct xs"
    using assms by (auto elim: sdistinct.cases)

  lemma sdistinct_coinduct[case_names sdistinct, coinduct pred: sdistinct]:
    assumes "P xs"
    assumes "â‹€ x xs. P (x ## xs) âŸ¹ x âˆ‰ sset xs âˆ§ P xs"
    shows "sdistinct xs"
    using stream.collapse sdistinct.coinduct assms by metis

  lemma sdistinct_shift[intro!]:
    assumes "distinct xs" "sdistinct ys" "set xs âˆ© sset ys = {}"
    shows "sdistinct (xs @- ys)"
    using assms by (induct xs) (auto)
  lemma sdistinct_shift_elim[elim!]:
    assumes "sdistinct (xs @- ys)"
    obtains "distinct xs" "sdistinct ys" "set xs âˆ© sset ys = {}"
    using assms by (induct xs) (auto)

  lemma sdistinct_infinite_sset:
    assumes "sdistinct w"
    shows "infinite (sset w)"
    using assms by (coinduction arbitrary: w) (force elim: sdistinct.cases)

  lemma not_sdistinct_decomp:
    assumes "Â¬ sdistinct w"
    obtains u v a w'
    where "w = u @- a ## v @- a ## w'"
  proof (rule ccontr)
    assume 1: "Â¬ thesis"
    assume 2: "w = u @- a ## v @- a ## w' âŸ¹ thesis" for u a v w'
    have 3: "âˆ€ u v a w'. w â‰  u @- a ## v @- a ## w'" using 1 2 by auto
    have 4: "sdistinct w" using 3 by (coinduct) (metis id_stake_snth_sdrop imageE shift.simps sset_range)
    show False using assms 4 by auto
  qed

  (* sorted streams *)

  coinductive (in order) sascending :: "'a stream â‡’ bool" where
    "a â‰¤ b âŸ¹ sascending (b ## w) âŸ¹ sascending (a ## b ## w)"

  coinductive (in order) sdescending :: "'a stream â‡’ bool" where
    "a â‰¥ b âŸ¹ sdescending (b ## w) âŸ¹ sdescending (a ## b ## w)"

  lemma sdescending_coinduct[case_names sdescending, coinduct pred: sdescending]:
    assumes "P w"
    assumes "â‹€ a b w. P (a ## b ## w) âŸ¹ a â‰¥ b âˆ§ P (b ## w)"
    shows "sdescending w"
    using stream.collapse sdescending.coinduct assms by (metis (no_types))

  lemma sdescending_sdrop:
    assumes "sdescending w"
    shows "sdescending (sdrop k w)"
    using assms by (induct k) (auto, metis sdescending.cases sdrop_stl stream.sel(2))

  lemma sdescending_snth_antimono:
    assumes "sdescending w"
    shows "antimono (snth w)"
  unfolding antimono_iff_le_Suc
  proof
    fix k
    have "sdescending (sdrop k w)" using sdescending_sdrop assms by this
    then obtain a b v where 2: "sdrop k w = a ## b ## v" "a â‰¥ b" by rule
    then show "w !! k â‰¥ w !! Suc k" by (metis sdrop_simps stream.sel)
  qed

  lemma sdescending_stuck:
    fixes w :: "'a :: wellorder stream"
    assumes "sdescending w"
    obtains k
    where "sdrop k w = sconst (w !! k)"
  using assms
  proof (induct "w !! 0" arbitrary: w thesis rule: less_induct)
    case less
    show ?case
    proof (cases "w = sconst (w !! 0)")
      case True
      show ?thesis using less(2)[of 0] True by simp
    next
      case False
      obtain k where 1: "w !! k â‰  w !! 0"
        using False by (metis empty_iff eqI_snth insert_iff snth_sset sset_sconst)
      have 2: "antimono (snth w)" using sdescending_snth_antimono less(3) by this
      have 3: "w !! k â‰¤ w !! 0" using 1 2 by (blast dest: antimonoD)
      have 4: "sdrop k w !! 0 < w !! 0" using 1 3 by auto
      have 5: "sdescending (sdrop k w)" using sdescending_sdrop less(3) by this
      obtain l where 5: "sdrop l (sdrop k w) = sconst (sdrop k w !! l)"
        using less(1)[OF 4 _ 5] by this
      show ?thesis using less(2) 5 by simp
    qed
  qed

end

Theory Sequence_LTL

(* Author: Julian Brunner *)
(* This is originally a part of the CAVA model checker *)
theory Sequence_LTL
imports
  Sequence
  "HOL-Library.Linear_Temporal_Logic_on_Streams"
begin

  (* basics *)

  lemmas [iff] = ev_sconst alw_sconst ev_smap alw_smap hld_smap'

  lemmas [iff] = alw_ev_stl
  lemma alw_ev_sdrop[iff]: "alw (ev P) (sdrop n w) âŸ· alw (ev P) w"
    using alw_ev_sdrop alw_sdrop by blast
  lemma alw_ev_scons[iff]: "alw (ev P) (a ## w) âŸ· alw (ev P) w" by (metis alw_ev_stl stream.sel(2))
  lemma alw_ev_shift[iff]: "alw (ev P) (u @- v) âŸ· alw (ev P) v" by (induct u) (auto)

  lemmas [simp del, iff] = ev_alw_stl
  lemma ev_alw_sdrop[iff]: "ev (alw P) (sdrop n w) âŸ· ev (alw P) w"
    using alwD alw_alw alw_sdrop ev_alw_imp_alw_ev not_ev_iff by metis
  lemma ev_alw_scons[iff]: "ev (alw P) (a ## w) âŸ· ev (alw P) w" by (metis ev_alw_stl stream.sel(2))
  lemma ev_alw_shift[iff]: "ev (alw P) (u @- v) âŸ· ev (alw P) v" by (induct u) (auto)

  lemma HLD_sconst[iff]: "HLD A (sconst a) âŸ· a âˆˆ A" unfolding HLD_def by simp

  lemma ev_stl: "ev Ï† (stl w) âŸ· (âˆƒ u v. w = u @- v âˆ§ u â‰  [] âˆ§ Ï† v)"
    by (metis ev.base ev_shift list.distinct(1) rotate1.simps(2) rotate1_is_Nil_conv
        sdrop.simps(2) sdrop_wait shift_simps(2) stake_Suc stake_sdrop
      )

  lemma ev_HLD_sset: "ev (HLD A) w âŸ· sset w âˆ© A â‰  {}" unfolding HLD_def ev_holds_sset by auto

  lemma alw_ev_coinduct[case_names alw_ev, consumes 1]:
    assumes "R w"
    assumes "â‹€ w. R w âŸ¹ ev Ï† w âˆ§ ev R (stl w)"
    shows "alw (ev Ï†) w"
  proof -
    have "ev R w" using assms(1) by rule
    then show ?thesis using assms(2) by (coinduct) (metis alw_sdrop not_ev_iff sdrop_stl sdrop_wait)
  qed

  (* acceptance conditions *)

  abbreviation "infs A w â‰¡ alw (ev (HLD A)) w"

  lemma infs_suffix: "infs A w âŸ· (âˆ€ u v. w = u @- v âŸ¶ sset v âˆ© A â‰  {})"
    using alwD alw_iff_sdrop alw_shift ev_HLD_sset stake_sdrop by metis
  lemma infs_snth: "infs A w âŸ· (âˆ€ n. âˆƒ k â‰¥ n. w !! k âˆˆ A)"
    by (auto simp: alw_iff_sdrop ev_iff_sdrop HLD_iff intro: le_add1 dest: le_Suc_ex)
  lemma infs_infm: "infs A w âŸ· (âˆƒâ‡©âˆ i. w !! i âˆˆ A)"
    unfolding infs_snth INFM_nat_le by rule

  lemma infs_coinduct[case_names infs, coinduct pred: infs]:
    assumes "R w"
    assumes "â‹€ w. R w âŸ¹ âˆƒ u v. w = u @- v âˆ§ set u âˆ© A â‰  {} âˆ§ R v"
    shows "infs A w"
    using assms by (coinduct rule: alw_ev_coinduct) (force simp: ev_HLD_sset ev_stl)
  lemma infs_flat_coinduct[case_names infs_flat, consumes 1]:
    assumes "R xss"
    assumes "â‹€ xs xss. R (xs ## xss) âŸ¹ set xs âˆ© A â‰  {} âˆ§ R xss"
    shows "infs A (flat xss)"
    using assms by (coinduction arbitrary: xss) (metis empty_set inf_bot_left flat_Stream stream.exhaust)

  lemma infs_supset[trans]: "infs A w âŸ¹ sset w âˆ© A âŠ† B âŸ¹ infs B w" unfolding infs_snth by force

  lemma infsI_sset: "sset w âŠ† A âŸ¹ infs A w" unfolding infs_snth by force
  lemma infsD_sset: "infs A w âŸ¹ sset w âˆ© A â‰  {}" unfolding ev_HLD_sset by auto

  lemma infs_sset[intro!, simp]: "infs (sset w) w" by (auto intro: infsI_sset)
  lemma infs_UNIV[intro!, simp]: "infs UNIV w" by (auto intro: infsI_sset)

  lemma infs_union[iff]: "infs (A âˆª B) w âŸ· infs A w âˆ¨ infs B w"
    unfolding infs_snth by (auto) (meson le_trans nat_le_linear)

  lemma infs_cycle[iff]:
    assumes "w â‰  []"
    shows "infs A (cycle w) âŸ· set w âˆ© A â‰  {}"
  proof
    show "infs A (cycle w) âŸ¹ set w âˆ© A â‰  {}"
      using assms by (auto simp: ev_HLD_sset dest: alwD)
    show "set w âˆ© A â‰  {} âŸ¹ infs A (cycle w)"
      using assms by (coinduction rule: infs_coinduct) (blast dest: cycle_decomp)
  qed

end

Theory Instantiate_Existentials

(* Author: Manuel Eberl *)
theory Instantiate_Existentials
  imports Main
begin

ML â€¹
fun inst_existentials_tac ctxt [] = TRY o REPEAT_ALL_NEW (resolve_tac ctxt @{thms conjI})
  | inst_existentials_tac ctxt (t :: ts) =
      (TRY o REPEAT_ALL_NEW (resolve_tac ctxt @{thms conjI}))
      THEN_ALL_NEW (TRY o (
        let
          val inst = Drule.infer_instantiate' ctxt [NONE, SOME (Thm.cterm_of ctxt t)]
          val thms = map inst @{thms exI bexI}
        in
          resolve_tac ctxt thms THEN' inst_existentials_tac ctxt ts
        end))
â€º

method_setup inst_existentials =
  â€¹
  Scan.lift (Scan.repeat Parse.term) >>
      (fn ts => fn ctxt => SIMPLE_METHOD' (inst_existentials_tac ctxt
         (map (Syntax.read_term ctxt) ts)))
  â€º

text â€¹Testâ€º
lemma
  "âˆƒ x. âˆƒ y âˆˆ UNIV. (âˆƒ z âˆˆ UNIV. x + y = (z::nat)) âˆ§ (âˆƒ z. x + y = (z::nat))"
  by (inst_existentials "1 :: nat" "2 :: nat" "3 :: nat"; simp)

end

Theory More_List

(* Author: Simon Wimmer *)
theory More_List
  imports
    Main
    Instantiate_Existentials
begin

section â€¹First and Last Elements of Listsâ€º

lemma (in -) hd_butlast_last_id:
  "hd xs # tl (butlast xs) @ [last xs] = xs" if "length xs > 1"
  using that by (cases xs) auto

section â€¹@{term list_all}â€º

lemma (in -) list_all_map:
  assumes inv: "â‹€ x. P x âŸ¹ âˆƒ y. f y = x"
    and all: "list_all P as"
  shows "âˆƒ as'. map f as' = as"
  using all
    apply (induction as)
   apply (auto dest!: inv)
  subgoal for as' a
    by (inst_existentials "a # as'") simp
  done

section â€¹@{term list_all2}â€º

lemma list_all2_op_map_iff:
  "list_all2 (Î» a b. b = f a) xs ys âŸ· map f xs = ys"
  unfolding list_all2_iff
  proof (induction xs arbitrary: ys)
    case Nil
    then show ?case by auto
  next
    case (Cons a xs ys)
    then show ?case by (cases ys) auto
  qed

lemma list_all2_last:
  "R (last xs) (last ys)" if "list_all2 R xs ys" "xs â‰  []"
  using that
  unfolding list_all2_iff
  proof (induction xs arbitrary: ys)
    case Nil
    then show ?case by simp
  next
    case (Cons a xs ys)
    then show ?case by (cases ys) auto
  qed

lemma list_all2_set1:
  "âˆ€xâˆˆset xs. âˆƒxaâˆˆset as. P x xa" if "list_all2 P xs as"
  using that
proof (induction xs arbitrary: as)
  case Nil
  then show ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons a xs as)
  then show ?case by (cases as) auto
qed

lemma list_all2_swap:
  "list_all2 P xs ys âŸ· list_all2 (Î» x y. P y x) ys xs"
  unfolding list_all2_iff by (fastforce simp: in_set_zip)+

lemma list_all2_set2:
  "âˆ€xâˆˆset as. âˆƒxaâˆˆset xs. P xa x" if "list_all2 P xs as"
  using that by - (rule list_all2_set1, subst (asm) list_all2_swap)

section â€¹Distinct listsâ€º

(* XXX Duplication with Floyd_Warshall.thy *)
lemma distinct_length_le:"finite s âŸ¹ set xs âŠ† s âŸ¹ distinct xs âŸ¹ length xs â‰¤ card s"
  by (metis card_mono distinct_card)

section â€¹@{term filter}â€º

lemma filter_eq_appendD:
  "âˆƒ xs' ys'. filter P xs' = xs âˆ§ filter P ys' = ys âˆ§ as = xs' @ ys'" if "filter P as = xs @ ys"
  using that
proof (induction xs arbitrary: as)
  case Nil
  then show ?case
    by (inst_existentials "[] :: 'a list" as) auto
next
  case (Cons a xs)
  from filter_eq_ConsD[OF Cons.prems[simplified]] obtain us vs where
    "as = us @ a # vs" "âˆ€uâˆˆset us. Â¬ P u" "P a" "filter P vs = xs @ ys"
    by auto
  moreover from Cons.IH[OF â€¹_ = xs @ ysâ€º] obtain xs' ys where
    "filter P xs' = xs" "vs = xs' @ ys"
    by auto
  ultimately show ?case
    by (inst_existentials "us @ [a] @ xs'" ys) auto
qed

lemma list_all2_elem_filter:
  assumes "list_all2 P xs us" "x âˆˆ set xs"
  shows "length (filter (P x) us) â‰¥ 1"
  using assms by (induction xs arbitrary: us) (auto simp: list_all2_Cons1)

lemma list_all2_replicate_elem_filter:
  assumes "list_all2 P (concat (replicate n xs)) ys" "x âˆˆ set xs"
  shows "length (filter (P x) ys) â‰¥ n"
  using assms
  by (induction n arbitrary: ys; fastforce dest: list_all2_elem_filter simp: list_all2_append1)

section â€¹Sublistsâ€º

lemma nths_split:
  "nths xs (A âˆª B) = nths xs A @ nths xs B" if "âˆ€ i âˆˆ A. âˆ€ j âˆˆ B. i < j"
  using that
  proof (induction xs arbitrary: A B)
    case Nil
    then show ?case by simp
  next
    case (Cons a xs)
    let ?A = "{j. Suc j âˆˆ A}" and ?B = "{j. Suc j âˆˆ B}"
    from Cons.prems have *: "âˆ€iâˆˆ?A. âˆ€aâˆˆ?B. i < a"
      by auto
    have [simp]: "{j. Suc j âˆˆ A âˆ¨ Suc j âˆˆ B} = ?A âˆª ?B"
      by auto
    show ?case
      unfolding nths_Cons
    proof (clarsimp, safe, goal_cases)
      case 2
      with Cons.prems have "A = {}"
        by auto
      with Cons.IH[OF *] show ?case by auto
    qed (use Cons.prems Cons.IH[OF *] in auto)
  qed

lemma nths_nth:
  "nths xs {i} = [xs ! i]" if "i < length xs"
  using that
  proof (induction xs arbitrary: i)
    case Nil
    then show ?case by simp
  next
    case (Cons a xs)
    then show ?case
      by (cases i) (auto simp: nths_Cons)
  qed

lemma nths_shift:
  "nths (xs @ ys) S = nths ys {x - length xs | x. x âˆˆ S}" if
  "âˆ€ i âˆˆ S. length xs â‰¤ i"
  using that
proof (induction xs arbitrary: S)
  case Nil
  then show ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons a xs)
  have [simp]: "{x - length xs |x. Suc x âˆˆ S} = {x - Suc (length xs) |x. x âˆˆ S}" if "0 âˆ‰ S"
    using that apply safe
     apply force
    subgoal for x x'
      by (cases x') auto
    done
  from Cons.prems show ?case
    by (simp, subst nths_Cons, subst Cons.IH; auto)
qed

lemma nths_eq_ConsD:
  assumes "nths xs I = x # as"
  shows
    "âˆƒ ys zs.
      xs = ys @ x # zs âˆ§ length ys âˆˆ I âˆ§ (âˆ€ i âˆˆ I. i â‰¥ length ys)
      âˆ§ nths zs ({i - length ys - 1 | i. i âˆˆ I âˆ§ i > length ys}) = as"
  using assms
proof (induction xs arbitrary: I x as)
  case Nil
  then show ?case by simp
next
  case (Cons a xs)
  from Cons.prems show ?case
    unfolding nths_Cons
    apply (auto split: if_split_asm)
    subgoal
      by (inst_existentials "[] :: 'a list" xs; force intro: arg_cong2[of xs xs _ _ nths])
    subgoal
      apply (drule Cons.IH)
      apply safe
      subgoal for ys zs
        apply (inst_existentials "a # ys" zs)
           apply simp+
         apply standard
        subgoal for i
          by (cases i; auto)
        apply (rule arg_cong2[of zs zs _ _ nths])
         apply simp
        apply safe
        subgoal for _ i
          by (cases i; auto)
        by force
      done
    done
qed

lemma nths_out_of_bounds:
  "nths xs I = []" if "âˆ€i âˆˆ I. i â‰¥ length xs"
  using that
  (* Found by sledgehammer *)
proof -
  have
    "âˆ€N as.
      (âˆƒn. n âˆˆ N âˆ§ Â¬ length (as::'a list) â‰¤ n)
      âˆ¨ (âˆ€asa. nths (as @ asa) N = nths asa {n - length as |n. n âˆˆ N})"
    using nths_shift by blast
  then obtain nn :: "nat set â‡’ 'a list â‡’ nat" where
    "âˆ€N as.
      nn N as âˆˆ N âˆ§ Â¬ length as â‰¤ nn N as
    âˆ¨ (âˆ€asa. nths (as @ asa) N = nths asa {n - length as |n. n âˆˆ N})"
    by moura
  then have
    "â‹€as. nths as {n - length xs |n. n âˆˆ I} = nths (xs @ as) I
      âˆ¨ nths (xs @ []) I = []"
    using that by fastforce
  then have "nths (xs @ []) I = []"
    by (metis (no_types) nths_nil)
  then show ?thesis
    by simp
qed

lemma nths_eq_appendD:
  assumes "nths xs I = as @ bs"
  shows
    "âˆƒ ys zs.
        xs = ys @ zs âˆ§ nths ys I = as
        âˆ§ nths zs {i - length ys | i. i âˆˆ I âˆ§ i â‰¥ length ys} = bs"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: xs I)
  case Nil
  then show ?case
    by (inst_existentials "[] :: 'a list" "nths bs") auto
next
  case (Cons a ys xs)
  from nths_eq_ConsD[of xs I a "ys @ bs"] Cons.prems obtain ys' zs' where
    "xs = ys' @ a # zs'" "length ys' âˆˆ I" "âˆ€i âˆˆ I. i â‰¥ length ys'"
    "nths zs' {i - length ys' - 1 |i. i âˆˆ I âˆ§ i > length ys'} = ys @ bs"
    by auto
  moreover from Cons.IH[OF â€¹nths zs' _ = _â€º] guess ys'' zs'' by clarify
  ultimately show ?case
    apply (inst_existentials "ys' @ a # ys''" zs'')
      apply (simp; fail)
    subgoal
      by (simp add: nths_out_of_bounds nths_append nths_Cons)
        (rule arg_cong2[of ys'' ys'' _ _ nths]; force)
    subgoal
      by safe (rule arg_cong2[of zs'' zs'' _ _ nths]; force) (* Slow *)
    done
qed

lemma filter_nths_length:
  "length (filter P (nths xs I)) â‰¤ length (filter P xs)"
proof (induction xs arbitrary: I)
  case Nil
  then show ?case
    by simp
next
  case Cons
  then show ?case
  (* Found by sledgehammer *)
  proof -
    fix a :: 'a and xsa :: "'a list" and Ia :: "nat set"
    assume a1: "â‹€I. length (filter P (nths xsa I)) â‰¤ length (filter P xsa)"
    have f2:
      "âˆ€b bs N. if 0 âˆˆ N then nths ((b::'a) # bs) N =
        [b] @ nths bs {n. Suc n âˆˆ N} else nths (b # bs) N = [] @ nths bs {n. Suc n âˆˆ N}"
      by (simp add: nths_Cons)
    have f3:
      "nths (a # xsa) Ia = [] @ nths xsa {n. Suc n âˆˆ Ia}
        âŸ¶ length (filter P (nths (a # xsa) Ia)) â‰¤ length (filter P xsa)"
      using a1 by (metis append_Nil)
    have f4: "length (filter P (nths xsa {n. Suc n âˆˆ Ia})) + 0 â‰¤ length (filter P xsa) + 0"
      using a1 by simp
    have f5:
      "Suc (length (filter P (nths xsa {n. Suc n âˆˆ Ia})) + 0)
      = length (a # filter P (nths xsa {n. Suc n âˆˆ Ia}))"
      by force
    have f6: "Suc (length (filter P xsa) + 0) = length (a # filter P xsa)"
      by simp
    { assume "Â¬ length (filter P (nths (a # xsa) Ia)) â‰¤ length (filter P (a # xsa))"
      { assume "nths (a # xsa) Ia â‰  [a] @ nths xsa {n. Suc n âˆˆ Ia}"
        moreover
        { assume
            "nths (a # xsa) Ia = [] @ nths xsa {n. Suc n âˆˆ Ia}
            âˆ§ length (filter P (a # xsa)) â‰¤ length (filter P xsa)"
          then have "length (filter P (nths (a # xsa) Ia)) â‰¤ length (filter P (a # xsa))"
            using a1 by (metis (no_types) append_Nil filter.simps(2) impossible_Cons) }
        ultimately have "length (filter P (nths (a # xsa) Ia)) â‰¤ length (filter P (a # xsa))"
          using f3 f2 by (meson dual_order.trans le_cases) }
      then have "length (filter P (nths (a # xsa) Ia)) â‰¤ length (filter P (a # xsa))"
        using f6 f5 f4 a1 by (metis Suc_le_mono append_Cons append_Nil filter.simps(2)) }
    then show "length (filter P (nths (a # xsa) Ia)) â‰¤ length (filter P (a # xsa))"
      by meson
  qed
qed

end (* Theory *)

Theory Stream_More

theory Stream_More
imports
  Sequence_LTL
  Instantiate_Existentials
  "HOL-Library.Rewrite"
begin

(*

(* TODO: can be replaced by stream.rel_cases *)
lemma stream_all2_Cons1:
  "stream_all2 P (y ## ys) xs âŸ· (âˆƒ x xs'. xs = x ## xs' âˆ§ P y x âˆ§ stream_all2 P ys xs')"
  by (cases xs) auto
lemma stream_all2_Cons2:
  "stream_all2 P xs (y ## ys) âŸ· (âˆƒ x xs'. xs = x ## xs' âˆ§ P x y âˆ§ stream_all2 P xs' ys)"
  by (cases xs) auto

(* TODO: inline? *)
lemma filter_list_all_iff: "filter P xs = [] âŸ· list_all (Not âˆ˜ P) xs"
  unfolding filter_empty_conv list.pred_set by simp

(* TODO: inline? *)
lemma append_single_shift: "(xs @ [x]) @- ys = xs @- x ## ys" by simp

(* TODO: inline? *)
lemma sset_finite_decomp:
  assumes "finite (sset w)"
  obtains u v a w'
  where "w = u @- a ## v @- a ## w'"
  using sdistinct_infinite_sset not_sdistinct_decomp assms by metis

*)

lemma list_all_stake_least:
  "list_all (Not âˆ˜ P) (stake (LEAST n. P (xs !! n)) xs)" (is "?G") if "âˆƒ n. P (xs !! n)"
proof (rule ccontr)
  let ?n = "LEAST n. P (xs !! n)"
  assume "Â¬ ?G"
  then have "âˆƒ x âˆˆ set (stake ?n xs). P x" unfolding list_all_iff by auto
  then obtain n' where "n' < ?n" "P (xs !! n')" using set_stake_snth by metis
  with Least_le[of "Î» n. P (xs !! n)" n'] show False by auto
qed

lemma alw_stream_all2_mono:
  assumes "stream_all2 P xs ys" "alw Q xs" "â‹€ xs ys. stream_all2 P xs ys âŸ¹ Q xs âŸ¹ R ys"
  shows "alw R ys"
  using assms stream.rel_sel by (coinduction arbitrary: xs ys) (blast)

lemma alw_ev_HLD_cycle:
  assumes "stream_all2 (âˆˆ) xs (cycle as)" "a âˆˆ set as"
  shows "infs a xs"
using assms(1)
proof coinduct
  case (infs xs)
  have 1: "as â‰  []" using assms(2) by auto
  have 2:
    "list_all2 (âˆˆ) (stake (length as) xs) (stake (length as) (cycle as))"
    "stream_all2 (âˆˆ) (sdrop (length as) xs) (sdrop (length as) (cycle as))"
    using infs stream_rel_shift stake_sdrop length_stake by metis+
  have 3: "stake (length as) (cycle as) = as" using 1 by simp
  have 4: "sdrop (length as) (cycle as) = cycle as" using sdrop_cycle_eq 1 by this
  have 5: "set (stake (length as) xs) âˆ© a â‰  {}"
    using assms(2) 2(1) unfolding list.in_rel 3
    by (auto) (metis IntI empty_iff mem_Collect_eq set_zip_leftD split_conv subsetCE zip_map_fst_snd)
  show ?case using 2 5 unfolding 4 by force
qed

lemma alw_ev_mono:
  assumes "alw (ev Ï†) xs" and "â‹€ xs. Ï† xs âŸ¹ Ïˆ xs"
  shows "alw (ev Ïˆ) xs"
  by (rule alw_mp[OF assms(1)]) (auto intro: ev_mono assms(2) simp: alw_iff_sdrop)

lemma alw_ev_lockstep:
  assumes
    "alw (ev (holds P)) xs" "stream_all2 Q xs as"
    "â‹€ x a. P x âŸ¹ Q x a âŸ¹ R a"
  shows
    "alw (ev (holds R)) as"
  using assms(1,2)
  apply (coinduction arbitrary: xs as)
  apply auto
  subgoal
    by (metis alw.cases assms(3) ev_holds_sset stream_all2_sset1)
  subgoal
    by (meson alw.cases stream.rel_sel)
  done

subsection â€¹sfilter, wait, nxtâ€º

text â€¹Useful?â€º
lemma nxt_holds_iff_snth: "(nxt ^^ y) (holds P) xs âŸ· P (xs !! y)"
  by (induction y arbitrary: xs; simp)

text â€¹Useful?â€º
lemma wait_LEAST:
  "wait (holds P) xs = (LEAST n. P (xs !! n))" unfolding wait_def nxt_holds_iff_snth ..

lemma sfilter_SCons_decomp:
  assumes "sfilter P xs = x ## zs" "ev (holds P) xs"
  shows "âˆƒ ys' zs'. xs = ys' @- x ## zs' âˆ§ list_all (Not o P) ys' âˆ§ P x âˆ§ sfilter P zs' = zs"
proof -
  from ev_imp_shift[OF assms(2)] obtain as bs where "xs = as @- bs" "holds P bs"
    by auto
  then have "P (shd bs)" by auto
  with â€¹xs = _â€º have "âˆƒ n. P (xs !! n)" using assms(2) sdrop_wait by fastforce
  from sdrop_while_sdrop_LEAST[OF this] have *:
    "sdrop_while (Not âˆ˜ P) xs = sdrop (LEAST n. P (xs !! n)) xs" .
  let ?xs = "sdrop_while (Not âˆ˜ P) xs" let ?n = "LEAST n. P (xs !! n)"
  from assms(1) have "x = shd ?xs" "zs = sfilter P (stl ?xs)"
    by (subst (asm) sfilter.ctr; simp)+
  have "xs = stake ?n xs @- sdrop ?n xs" by simp
  moreover have "P x" using assms(1) unfolding sfilter_eq[OF assms(2)] ..
  moreover from â€¹âˆƒ n. P _â€º have "list_all (Not o P) (stake ?n xs)" by (rule list_all_stake_least)
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using â€¹x = _â€º â€¹zs = _â€º *[symmetric] by (inst_existentials "stake ?n xs" "stl ?xs") auto
qed

lemma sfilter_SCons_decomp':
  assumes "sfilter P xs = x ## zs" "ev (holds P) xs"
  shows
    "list_all (Not o P) (stake (wait (holds P) xs) xs)" (is "?G1")
    "P x"
    "âˆƒ zs'. xs = stake (wait (holds P) xs) xs @- x ## zs' âˆ§ sfilter P zs' = zs" (is "?G2")
proof -
  from ev_imp_shift[OF assms(2)] obtain as bs where "xs = as @- bs" "holds P bs"
    by auto
  then have "P (shd bs)" by auto
  with â€¹xs = _â€º have "âˆƒ n. P (xs !! n)" using assms(2) sdrop_wait by fastforce thm sdrop_wait
  from sdrop_while_sdrop_LEAST[OF this] have *:
    "sdrop_while (Not âˆ˜ P) xs = sdrop (LEAST n. P (xs !! n)) xs" .
  let ?xs = "sdrop_while (Not âˆ˜ P) xs" let ?n = "wait (holds P) xs"
  from assms(1) have "x = shd ?xs" "zs = sfilter P (stl ?xs)"
    by (subst (asm) sfilter.ctr; simp)+
  have "xs = stake ?n xs @- sdrop ?n xs" by simp
  moreover show "P x" using assms(1) unfolding sfilter_eq[OF assms(2)] ..
  moreover from â€¹âˆƒ n. P _â€º show "list_all (Not o P) (stake ?n xs)"
    by (auto intro: list_all_stake_least simp: wait_LEAST)
  ultimately show ?G2
    using â€¹x = _â€º â€¹zs = _â€º *[symmetric] by (inst_existentials "stl ?xs") (auto simp: wait_LEAST)
qed

lemma sfilter_shift_decomp:
  assumes "sfilter P xs = ys @- zs" "alw (ev (holds P)) xs"
  shows "âˆƒ ys' zs'. xs = ys' @- zs' âˆ§ filter P ys' = ys âˆ§ sfilter P zs' = zs"
  using assms(1,2)
proof (induction ys arbitrary: xs)
  case Nil
  then show ?case by (inst_existentials "[] :: 'a list" xs; simp)
next
  case (Cons y ys)
  from alw_ev_imp_ev_alw[OF â€¹alw (ev _) xsâ€º] have "ev (holds P) xs"
    by (auto elim: ev_mono)
  with Cons.prems(1) sfilter_SCons_decomp[of P xs y "ys @- zs"] guess ys' zs' by clarsimp
  note guessed = this
  then have "sfilter P zs' = ys @- zs" by auto
  from â€¹alw (ev _) xsâ€º â€¹xs = _â€º have "alw (ev (holds P)) zs'"
    by (metis ev.intros(2) ev_shift not_alw_iff stream.sel(2))
  from Cons.IH[OF â€¹sfilter P zs' = _â€º this] guess zs1 zs2 by clarsimp
  with guessed show ?case
    by (inst_existentials "ys' @ y # zs1" zs2; simp add: list.pred_set)
qed

lemma finite_sset_sfilter_decomp:
  assumes "finite (sset (sfilter P xs))" "alw (ev (holds P)) xs"
  obtains x ws ys zs where "xs = ws @- x ## ys @- x ## zs" "P x"
proof atomize_elim
  let ?xs = "sfilter P xs"
  have 1: "Â¬ sdistinct (sfilter P xs)" using sdistinct_infinite_sset assms(1) by auto
  from not_sdistinct_decomp[OF 1] guess ws ys x zs .
  note guessed1 = this
  from sfilter_shift_decomp[OF this assms(2)] guess ys' zs' by clarsimp
  note guessed2 = this
  then have "ev (holds P) zs'" using alw_shift assms(2) by blast
  from sfilter_SCons_decomp[OF guessed2(2) this] guess zs1 zs2 by clarsimp
  note guessed3 = this
  have "alw (ev (holds P)) zs2"
    by (metis alw_ev_stl alw_shift assms(2) guessed2(1) guessed3(1) stream.sel(2))
  from sfilter_shift_decomp[OF guessed3(4) this] guess zs3 zs4 by clarsimp
  note guessed4 = this
  have "ev (holds P) zs4"
    using â€¹alw (ev (holds P)) zs2â€º alw_shift guessed4(1) by blast
  from sfilter_SCons_decomp[OF guessed4(2) this] guess zs5 zs6 by clarsimp
  with guessed1 guessed2 guessed3 guessed4 show "âˆƒws x ys zs. xs = ws @- x ## ys @- x ## zs âˆ§ P x"
    by (inst_existentials "ys' @ zs1" x "zs3 @ zs5" zs6; force)
qed

text â€¹Useful?â€º
lemma sfilter_shd_LEAST:
  "shd (sfilter P xs) = xs !! (LEAST n. P (xs !! n))" if "ev (holds P) xs"
proof -
  from sdrop_wait[OF â€¹ev _ xsâ€º] have "âˆƒ n. P (xs !! n)" by auto
  from sdrop_while_sdrop_LEAST[OF this] show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma alw_nxt_holds_cong:
  "(nxt ^^ n) (holds (Î»x. P x âˆ§ Q x)) xs = (nxt ^^ n) (holds Q) xs" if "alw (holds P) xs"
  using that unfolding nxt_holds_iff_snth alw_iff_sdrop by simp

lemma alw_wait_holds_cong:
  "wait (holds (Î»x. P x âˆ§ Q x)) xs = wait (holds Q) xs" if "alw (holds P) xs"
  unfolding wait_def alw_nxt_holds_cong[OF that] ..

lemma alw_sfilter:
  "sfilter (Î» x. P x âˆ§ Q x) xs = sfilter Q xs" if "alw (holds P) xs" "alw (ev (holds Q)) xs"
  using that
proof (coinduction arbitrary: xs)
  case prems: stream_eq
  from prems(3,4) have ev_one: "ev (holds (Î»x. P x âˆ§ Q x)) xs"
    by (subst ev_cong[of _ _ _ "holds Q"]) (assumption | auto)+
  from prems have "a = shd (sfilter (Î»x. P x âˆ§ Q x) xs)" "b = shd (sfilter Q xs)"
    by (metis stream.sel(1))+
  with prems(3,4) have
    "a = xs !! (LEAST n. P (xs !! n) âˆ§ Q (xs !! n))" "b = xs !! (LEAST n. Q (xs !! n))"
    using ev_one by (auto 4 3 dest: sfilter_shd_LEAST)
  with alw_wait_holds_cong[unfolded wait_LEAST, OF â€¹alw (holds P) xsâ€º] have "a = b" by simp
  from sfilter_SCons_decomp'[OF prems(1)[symmetric], OF ev_one] guess u2 by clarsimp
  note guessed_a = this
  have "ev (holds Q) xs" using prems(4) by blast
  from sfilter_SCons_decomp'[OF prems(2)[symmetric], OF this] guess v2 by clarsimp
  with guessed_a â€¹a = bâ€º show ?case
    apply (intro conjI exI)
        apply assumption+
      apply (simp add: alw_wait_holds_cong[OF prems(3)], metis shift_left_inj stream.inject)
    by (metis alw.cases alw_shift prems(3,4) stream.sel(2))+
qed

lemma alw_ev_holds_mp:
  "alw (holds P) xs âŸ¹ ev (holds Q) xs âŸ¹ ev (holds (Î»x. P x âˆ§ Q x)) xs"
  by (subst ev_cong, assumption) auto

lemma alw_ev_conjI:
  "alw (ev (holds (Î» x. P x âˆ§ Q x))) xs" if "alw (holds P) xs" "alw (ev (holds Q)) xs"
  using that(2,1) by - (erule alw_mp, coinduction arbitrary: xs, auto intro: alw_ev_holds_mp)

subsection â€¹Useful?â€º

lemma alw_holds_pred_stream_iff:
  "alw (holds P) xs âŸ· pred_stream P xs"
  by (simp add: alw_iff_sdrop stream_pred_snth)

lemma alw_holds_sset:
  "alw (holds P) xs = (âˆ€ x âˆˆ sset xs. P x)"
  by (simp add: alw_holds_pred_stream_iff stream.pred_set)

lemma pred_stream_sfilter:
  assumes alw_ev: "alw (ev (holds P)) xs"
  shows "pred_stream P (sfilter P xs)"
  using alw_ev
proof (coinduction arbitrary: xs)
  case (stream_pred xs)
  then have "ev (holds P) xs" by auto
  have "sfilter P xs = shd (sfilter P xs) ## stl (sfilter P xs)"
    by (cases "sfilter P xs") auto
  from sfilter_SCons_decomp[OF this â€¹ev (holds P) xsâ€º] guess ys' zs' by clarsimp
  then show ?case
    apply (inst_existentials zs')
    apply (metis sfilter.simps(1) stream.sel(1) stream_pred(1))
    apply (metis scons_eq sfilter.simps(2) stream_pred(1))
    apply (metis alw_ev_stl alw_shift stream.sel(2) stream_pred(2))
    done
qed

lemma alw_ev_sfilter_mono:
  assumes alw_ev: "alw (ev (holds P)) xs"
    and mono: "â‹€ x. P x âŸ¹ Q x"
  shows "pred_stream Q (sfilter P xs)"
  using stream.pred_mono[of P Q] assms pred_stream_sfilter by blast

lemma sset_sfilter:
  "sset (sfilter P xs) âŠ† sset xs" if "alw (ev (holds P)) xs"
proof -
  have "alw (holds (Î» x. x âˆˆ sset xs)) xs" by (simp add: alw_iff_sdrop)
  with â€¹alw (ev _) _â€º alw_sfilter[OF this â€¹alw (ev _) _â€º, symmetric]
    have "pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ sset xs) (sfilter P xs)"
    by (simp) (rule alw_ev_sfilter_mono; auto intro: alw_ev_conjI)
  then have "âˆ€ x âˆˆ sset (sfilter P xs). x âˆˆ sset xs" unfolding stream.pred_set by this
  then show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma stream_all2_weaken:
  "stream_all2 Q xs ys" if "stream_all2 P xs ys" "â‹€ x y. P x y âŸ¹ Q x y"
  using that by (coinduction arbitrary: xs ys) auto

lemma stream_all2_SCons1:
  "stream_all2 P (x ## xs) ys = (âˆƒz zs. ys = z ## zs âˆ§ P x z âˆ§ stream_all2 P xs zs)"
  by (subst (3) stream.collapse[symmetric], simp del: stream.collapse, force)

lemma stream_all2_SCons2:
  "stream_all2 P xs (y ## ys) = (âˆƒz zs. xs = z ## zs âˆ§ P z y âˆ§ stream_all2 P zs ys)"
  by (subst stream.collapse[symmetric], simp del: stream.collapse, force)

lemma stream_all2_combine:
  "stream_all2 R xs zs" if
  "stream_all2 P xs ys" "stream_all2 Q ys zs" "â‹€ x y z. P x y âˆ§ Q y z âŸ¹ R x z"
  using that(1,2)
  by (coinduction arbitrary: xs ys zs)
     (auto intro: that(3) simp: stream_all2_SCons1 stream_all2_SCons2)

lemma stream_all2_shift1:
  "stream_all2 P (xs1 @- xs2) ys =
  (âˆƒ ys1 ys2. ys = ys1 @- ys2 âˆ§ list_all2 P xs1 ys1 âˆ§ stream_all2 P xs2 ys2)"
  apply (induction xs1 arbitrary: ys)
   apply (simp; fail)
  apply (simp add: stream_all2_SCons1 list_all2_Cons1)
  apply safe
  subgoal for a xs1 ys z zs ys1 ys2
    by (inst_existentials "z # ys1" ys2; simp)
  subgoal for a xs1 ys ys1 ys2 z zs
    by (inst_existentials z "zs @- ys2" zs "ys2"; simp)
  done

lemma stream_all2_shift2:
  "stream_all2 P ys (xs1 @- xs2) =
  (âˆƒ ys1 ys2. ys = ys1 @- ys2 âˆ§ list_all2 P ys1 xs1 âˆ§ stream_all2 P ys2 xs2)"
  by (meson list.rel_flip stream.rel_flip stream_all2_shift1)

lemma stream_all2_bisim:
  assumes "stream_all2 (âˆˆ) xs as" "stream_all2 (âˆˆ) ys as" "sset as âŠ† S"
  shows "stream_all2 (Î» x y. âˆƒ a. x âˆˆ a âˆ§ y âˆˆ a âˆ§ a âˆˆ S) xs ys"
  using assms
  apply (coinduction arbitrary: as xs ys)
  subgoal for a u b v as xs ys
    apply (rule conjI)
     apply (inst_existentials "shd as", auto simp: stream_all2_SCons1; fail)
    apply (inst_existentials "stl as", auto 4 3 simp: stream_all2_SCons1; fail)
    done
  done



end

Theory Graphs

(* Author: Simon Wimmer *)
theory Graphs
  imports
    More_List Stream_More
    "HOL-Library.Rewrite"
    Instantiate_Existentials
begin

section â€¹Graphsâ€º

subsection â€¹Basic Definitions and Theoremsâ€º

locale Graph_Defs =
  fixes E :: "'a â‡’ 'a â‡’ bool"
begin

inductive steps where
  Single: "steps [x]" |
  Cons: "steps (x # y # xs)" if "E x y" "steps (y # xs)"

lemmas [intro] = steps.intros

lemma steps_append:
  "steps (xs @ tl ys)" if "steps xs" "steps ys" "last xs = hd ys"
  using that by induction (auto 4 4 elim: steps.cases)

lemma steps_append':
  "steps xs" if "steps as" "steps bs" "last as = hd bs" "as @ tl bs = xs"
  using steps_append that by blast

coinductive run where
  "run (x ## y ## xs)" if "E x y" "run (y ## xs)"

lemmas [intro] = run.intros

lemma steps_appendD1:
  "steps xs" if "steps (xs @ ys)" "xs â‰  []"
  using that proof (induction xs)
  case Nil
  then show ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons a xs)
  then show ?case
    by - (cases xs; auto elim: steps.cases)
qed

lemma steps_appendD2:
  "steps ys" if "steps (xs @ ys)" "ys â‰  []"
  using that by (induction xs) (auto elim: steps.cases)

lemma steps_appendD3:
  "steps (xs @ [x]) âˆ§ E x y" if "steps (xs @ [x, y])"
  using that proof (induction xs)
  case Nil
  then show ?case by (auto elim!: steps.cases)
next
  case prems: (Cons a xs)
  then show ?case by (cases xs) (auto elim: steps.cases)
qed

lemma steps_ConsD:
  "steps xs" if "steps (x # xs)" "xs â‰  []"
  using that by (auto elim: steps.cases)

lemmas stepsD = steps_ConsD steps_appendD1 steps_appendD2

lemma steps_alt_induct[consumes 1, case_names Single Snoc]:
  assumes
    "steps x" "(â‹€x. P [x])"
    "â‹€y x xs. E y x âŸ¹ steps (xs @ [y]) âŸ¹ P (xs @ [y]) âŸ¹ P (xs @ [y,x])"
  shows "P x"
  using assms(1)
  proof (induction rule: rev_induct)
    case Nil
    then show ?case by (auto elim: steps.cases)
  next
    case prems: (snoc x xs)
    then show ?case by (cases xs rule: rev_cases) (auto intro: assms(2,3) dest!: steps_appendD3)
  qed

lemma steps_appendI:
  "steps (xs @ [x, y])" if "steps (xs @ [x])" "E x y"
  using that
proof (induction xs)
  case Nil
  then show ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons a xs)
  then show ?case by (cases xs; auto elim: steps.cases)
qed

lemma steps_append_single:
  assumes
    "steps xs" "E (last xs) x" "xs â‰  []"
  shows "steps (xs @ [x])"
  using assms(3,1,2) by (induction xs rule: list_nonempty_induct) (auto 4 4 elim: steps.cases)

lemma extend_run:
  assumes
    "steps xs" "E (last xs) x" "run (x ## ys)" "xs â‰  []"
  shows "run (xs @- x ## ys)"
  using assms(4,1-3) by (induction xs rule: list_nonempty_induct) (auto 4 3 elim: steps.cases)

lemma run_cycle:
  assumes "steps xs" "E (last xs) (hd xs)" "xs â‰  []"
  shows "run (cycle xs)"
  using assms proof (coinduction arbitrary: xs)
  case run
  then show ?case
    apply (rewrite at â€¹cycle xsâ€º stream.collapse[symmetric])
    apply (rewrite at â€¹stl (cycle xs)â€º stream.collapse[symmetric])
    apply clarsimp
    apply (erule steps.cases)
    subgoal for x
      apply (rule conjI)
       apply (simp; fail)
      apply (rule disjI1)
      apply (inst_existentials xs)
         apply (simp, metis cycle_Cons[of x "[]", simplified])
      by auto
    subgoal for x y xs'
      apply (rule conjI)
       apply (simp; fail)
      apply (rule disjI1)
      apply (inst_existentials "y # xs' @ [x]")
      using steps_append_single[of "y # xs'" x]
         apply (auto elim: steps.cases split: if_split_asm)
       apply (subst (2) cycle_Cons, simp) (* XXX Automate forward reasoning *)
      apply (subst cycle_Cons, simp)
      done
    done
qed

lemma run_stl:
  "run (stl xs)" if "run xs"
  using that by (auto elim: run.cases)

lemma run_sdrop:
  "run (sdrop n xs)" if "run xs"
  using that by (induction n arbitrary: xs) (auto intro: run_stl)

lemma run_reachable':
  assumes "run (x ## xs)" "Eâ‡§*â‡§* xâ‡©0 x"
  shows "pred_stream (Î» x. Eâ‡§*â‡§* xâ‡©0 x) xs"
  using assms by (coinduction arbitrary: x xs) (auto 4 3 elim: run.cases)

lemma run_reachable:
  assumes "run (xâ‡©0 ## xs)"
  shows "pred_stream (Î» x. Eâ‡§*â‡§* xâ‡©0 x) xs"
  by (rule run_reachable'[OF assms]) blast

lemma run_decomp:
  assumes "run (xs @- ys)" "xs â‰  []"
  shows "steps xs âˆ§ run ys âˆ§ E (last xs) (shd ys)"
using assms(2,1) proof (induction xs rule: list_nonempty_induct)
  case (single x)
  then show ?case by (auto elim: run.cases)
next
  case (cons x xs)
  then show ?case by (cases xs; auto 4 4 elim: run.cases)
qed

lemma steps_decomp:
  assumes "steps (xs @ ys)" "xs â‰  []" "ys â‰  []"
  shows "steps xs âˆ§ steps ys âˆ§ E (last xs) (hd ys)"
using assms(2,1,3) proof (induction xs rule: list_nonempty_induct)
  case (single x)
  then show ?case by (auto elim: steps.cases)
next
  case (cons x xs)
  then show ?case by (cases xs; auto 4 4 elim: steps.cases)
qed

lemma steps_rotate:
  assumes "steps (x # xs @ y # ys @ [x])"
  shows "steps (y # ys @ x # xs @ [y])"
proof -
  from steps_decomp[of "x # xs" "y # ys @ [x]"] assms have
    "steps (x # xs)" "steps (y # ys @ [x])" "E (last (x # xs)) y"
    by auto
  then have "steps ((x # xs) @ [y])" by (blast intro: steps_append_single)
  from steps_append[OF â€¹steps (y # ys @ [x])â€º this] show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma run_shift_coinduct[case_names run_shift, consumes 1]:
  assumes "R w"
      and "â‹€ w. R w âŸ¹ âˆƒ u v x y. w = u @- x ## y ## v âˆ§ steps (u @ [x]) âˆ§ E x y âˆ§ R (y ## v)"
  shows "run w"
  using assms(2)[OF â€¹R wâ€º] proof (coinduction arbitrary: w)
  case (run w)
  then obtain u v x y where "w = u @- x ## y ## v" "steps (u @ [x])" "E x y" "R (y ## v)"
    by auto
  then show ?case
    apply -
    apply (drule assms(2))
    apply (cases u)
     apply force
    subgoal for z zs
      apply (cases zs)
      subgoal
        apply simp
        apply safe
         apply (force elim: steps.cases)
        subgoal for u' v' x' y'
          by (inst_existentials "x # u'") (cases u'; auto)
        done
      subgoal for a as
        apply simp
        apply safe
         apply (force elim: steps.cases)
        subgoal for u' v' x' y'
          apply (inst_existentials "a # as @ x # u'")
          using steps_append[of "a # as @ [x, y]" "u' @ [x']"]
          apply simp
          apply (drule steps_appendI[of "a # as" x, rotated])
          by (cases u'; force elim: steps.cases)+
        done
      done
    done
qed

lemma run_flat_coinduct[case_names run_shift, consumes 1]:
  assumes "R xss"
    and
    "â‹€ xs ys xss.
    R (xs ## ys ## xss) âŸ¹ xs â‰  [] âˆ§ steps xs âˆ§ E (last xs) (hd ys) âˆ§ R (ys ## xss)"
  shows "run (flat xss)"
proof -
  obtain xs ys xss' where "xss = xs ## ys ## xss'" by (metis stream.collapse)
  with assms(2)[OF assms(1)[unfolded this]] show ?thesis
  proof (coinduction arbitrary: xs ys xss' xss rule: run_shift_coinduct)
    case (run_shift xs ys xss' xss)
    from run_shift show ?case
      apply (cases xss')
      apply clarify
      apply (drule assms(2))
      apply (inst_existentials "butlast xs" "tl ys @- flat xss'" "last xs" "hd ys")
         apply (cases ys)
          apply (simp; fail)
      subgoal premises prems for x1 x2 z zs
      proof (cases "xs = []")
        case True
        with prems show ?thesis
          by auto
      next
        case False
        then have "xs = butlast xs @ [last xs]" by auto
        then have "butlast xs @- last xs ## tail = xs @- tail" for tail
          by (metis shift.simps(1,2) shift_append)
        with prems show ?thesis by simp
      qed
        apply (simp; fail)
       apply assumption
      subgoal for ws wss
        by (inst_existentials ys ws wss) (cases ys, auto)
      done
  qed
qed

lemma steps_non_empty[simp]:
  "Â¬ steps []"
  by (auto elim: steps.cases)

lemma steps_non_empty'[simp]:
  "xs â‰  []" if "steps xs"
  using that by auto

(* XXX Generalize *)
lemma steps_replicate:
  "steps (hd xs # concat (replicate n (tl xs)))" if "last xs = hd xs" "steps xs" "n > 0"
  using that
proof (induction n)
  case 0
  then show ?case by simp
next
  case (Suc n)
  show ?case
  proof (cases n)
    case 0
    with Suc.prems show ?thesis by (cases xs; auto)
  next
    case prems: (Suc nat)
    from Suc.prems have [simp]: "hd xs # tl xs @ ys = xs @ ys" for ys
      by (cases xs; auto)
    from Suc.prems have **: "tl xs @ ys = tl (xs @ ys)" for ys
      by (cases xs; auto)
    from prems Suc show ?thesis
      by (fastforce intro: steps_append')
  qed
qed

notation E ("_ â†’ _" [100, 100] 40)

abbreviation reaches ("_ â†’* _" [100, 100] 40) where "reaches x y â‰¡ Eâ‡§*â‡§* x y"

abbreviation reaches1 ("_ â†’â‡§+ _" [100, 100] 40) where "reaches1 x y â‰¡ Eâ‡§+â‡§+ x y"

lemma steps_reaches:
  "hd xs â†’* last xs" if "steps xs"
  using that by (induction xs) auto

lemma steps_reaches':
  "x â†’* y" if "steps xs" "hd xs = x" "last xs = y"
  using that steps_reaches by auto

lemma reaches_steps:
  "âˆƒ xs. hd xs = x âˆ§ last xs = y âˆ§ steps xs" if "x â†’* y"
  using that
  apply (induction)
   apply force
  apply clarsimp
  subgoal for z xs
    by (inst_existentials "xs @ [z]", (cases xs; simp), auto intro: steps_append_single)
  done

lemma reaches_steps_iff:
  "x â†’* y âŸ· (âˆƒ xs. hd xs = x âˆ§ last xs = y âˆ§ steps xs)"
  using steps_reaches reaches_steps by fast

lemma steps_reaches1:
  "x â†’â‡§+ y" if "steps (x # xs @ [y])"
  by (metis list.sel(1,3) rtranclp_into_tranclp2 snoc_eq_iff_butlast steps.cases steps_reaches that)

lemma stepsI:
  "steps (x # xs)" if "x â†’ hd xs" "steps xs"
  using that by (cases xs) auto

lemma reaches1_steps:
  "âˆƒ xs. steps (x # xs @ [y])" if "x â†’â‡§+ y"
proof -
  from that obtain z where "x â†’ z" "z â†’* y"
    by atomize_elim (simp add: tranclpD)
  from reaches_steps[OF this(2)] obtain xs where *: "hd xs = z" "last xs = y" "steps xs"
    by auto
  then obtain xs' where [simp]: "xs = xs' @ [y]"
    by atomize_elim (auto 4 3 intro: append_butlast_last_id[symmetric])
  with â€¹x â†’ zâ€º * show ?thesis
    by (auto intro: stepsI)
qed

lemma reaches1_steps_iff:
  "x â†’â‡§+ y âŸ· (âˆƒ xs. steps (x # xs @ [y]))"
  using steps_reaches1 reaches1_steps by fast

lemma reaches1_reaches_iff1:
  "x â†’â‡§+ y âŸ· (âˆƒ z. x â†’ z âˆ§ z â†’* y)"
  by (auto dest: tranclpD)

lemma reaches1_reaches_iff2:
  "x â†’â‡§+ y âŸ· (âˆƒ z. x â†’* z âˆ§ z â†’ y)"
  apply safe
   apply (metis Nitpick.rtranclp_unfold tranclp.cases)
  by auto

lemma
  "x â†’â‡§+ z" if "x â†’* y" "y â†’â‡§+ z"
  using that by auto

lemma
  "x â†’â‡§+ z" if "x â†’â‡§+ y" "y â†’* z"
  using that by auto

lemma steps_append2:
  "steps (xs @ x # ys)" if "steps (xs @ [x])" "steps (x # ys)"
  using that by (auto dest: steps_append)

lemma reaches1_steps_append:
  assumes "a â†’â‡§+ b" "steps xs" "hd xs = b"
  shows "âˆƒ ys. steps (a # ys @ xs)"
  using assms by (fastforce intro: steps_append' dest: reaches1_steps)

lemma steps_last_step:
  "âˆƒ a. a â†’ last xs" if "steps xs" "length xs > 1"
  using that by induction auto

lemmas graphI =
  steps.intros
  steps_append_single
  steps_reaches'
  stepsI

end (* Graph Defs *)


subsection â€¹Graphs with a Start Nodeâ€º

locale Graph_Start_Defs = Graph_Defs +
  fixes sâ‡©0 :: 'a
begin

definition reachable where
  "reachable = Eâ‡§*â‡§* sâ‡©0"

lemma start_reachable[intro!, simp]:
  "reachable sâ‡©0"
  unfolding reachable_def by auto

lemma reachable_step:
  "reachable b" if "reachable a" "E a b"
  using that unfolding reachable_def by auto

lemma reachable_reaches:
  "reachable b" if "reachable a" "a â†’* b"
  using that(2,1) by induction (auto intro: reachable_step)

lemma reachable_steps_append:
  assumes "reachable a" "steps xs" "hd xs = a" "last xs = b"
  shows "reachable b"
  using assms by (auto intro: graphI reachable_reaches)

lemmas steps_reachable = reachable_steps_append[of sâ‡©0, simplified]

lemma reachable_steps_elem:
  "reachable y" if "reachable x" "steps xs" "y âˆˆ set xs" "hd xs = x"
proof -
  from â€¹y âˆˆ set xsâ€º obtain as bs where [simp]: "xs = as @ y # bs"
    by (auto simp: in_set_conv_decomp)
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "as = []")
    case True
    with that show ?thesis
      by simp
  next
    case False
    (* XXX *)
    from â€¹steps xsâ€º have "steps (as @ [y])"
      by (auto intro: stepsD)
    with â€¹as â‰  []â€º â€¹hd xs = xâ€º â€¹reachable xâ€º show ?thesis
      by (auto 4 3 intro: reachable_reaches graphI)
  qed
qed

lemma reachable_steps:
  "âˆƒ xs. steps xs âˆ§ hd xs = sâ‡©0 âˆ§ last xs = x" if "reachable x"
  using that unfolding reachable_def
proof induction
  case base
  then show ?case by (inst_existentials "[sâ‡©0]"; force)
next
  case (step y z)
  from step.IH guess xs by clarify
  with step.hyps show ?case
    apply (inst_existentials "xs @ [z]")
    apply (force intro: graphI)
    by (cases xs; auto)+
qed

lemma reachable_cycle_iff:
  "reachable x âˆ§ x â†’â‡§+ x âŸ· (âˆƒ ws xs. steps (sâ‡©0 # ws @ [x] @ xs @ [x]))"
proof (safe, goal_cases)
  case (2 ws)
  then show ?case
    by (auto intro: steps_reachable stepsD)
next
  case (3 ws xs)
  then show ?case
    by (auto intro: stepsD steps_reaches1)
next
  case prems: 1
  from â€¹reachable xâ€º prems(2) have "sâ‡©0 â†’â‡§+ x"
    unfolding reachable_def by auto
  with â€¹x â†’â‡§+ xâ€º show ?case
    by (fastforce intro: steps_append' dest: reaches1_steps)
qed

lemma reachable_induct[consumes 1, case_names start step, induct pred: reachable]:
  assumes "reachable x"
    and "P sâ‡©0"
    and "â‹€ a b. reachable a âŸ¹ P a âŸ¹ a â†’ b âŸ¹ P b"
  shows "P x"
  using assms(1) unfolding reachable_def
  by induction (auto intro: assms(2-)[unfolded reachable_def])

lemmas graphI_aggressive =
  tranclp_into_rtranclp
  rtranclp.rtrancl_into_rtrancl
  tranclp.trancl_into_trancl
  rtranclp_into_tranclp2

lemmas graphI_aggressive1 =
  graphI_aggressive
  steps_append'

lemmas graphI_aggressive2 =
  graphI_aggressive
  stepsD
  steps_reaches1
  steps_reachable

lemmas graphD =
  reaches1_steps

lemmas graphD_aggressive =
  tranclpD

lemmas graph_startI =
  reachable_reaches
  start_reachable

end (* Graph Start Defs *)


subsection â€¹Subgraphsâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Edge-induced Subgraphsâ€º

locale Subgraph_Defs = G: Graph_Defs +
  fixes E' :: "'a â‡’ 'a â‡’ bool"
begin

sublocale G': Graph_Defs E' .

end (* Subgraph Defs *)

locale Subgraph_Start_Defs = G: Graph_Start_Defs +
  fixes E' :: "'a â‡’ 'a â‡’ bool"
begin

sublocale G': Graph_Start_Defs E' sâ‡©0 .

end (* Subgraph Start Defs *)

locale Subgraph = Subgraph_Defs +
  assumes subgraph[intro]: "E' a b âŸ¹ E a b"
begin

lemma non_subgraph_cycle_decomp:
  "âˆƒ c d. G.reaches a c âˆ§ E c d âˆ§ Â¬ E' c d âˆ§ G.reaches d b" if
  "G.reaches1 a b" "Â¬ G'.reaches1 a b" for a b
    using that
  proof induction
    case (base y)
    then show ?case
      by auto
  next
    case (step y z)
    show ?case
    proof (cases "E' y z")
      case True
      with step have "Â¬ G'.reaches1 a y"
        by (auto intro: tranclp.trancl_into_trancl) (* XXX *)
      with step obtain c d where
        "G.reaches a c" "E c d" "Â¬ E' c d" "G.reaches d y"
        by auto
      with â€¹E' y zâ€º show ?thesis
        by (blast intro: rtranclp.rtrancl_into_rtrancl) (* XXX *)
    next
      case False
      with step show ?thesis
        by (intro exI conjI) auto
    qed
  qed

lemma reaches:
  "G.reaches a b" if "G'.reaches a b"
  using that by induction (auto intro: rtranclp.intros(2))

lemma reaches1:
  "G.reaches1 a b" if "G'.reaches1 a b"
  using that by induction (auto intro: tranclp.intros(2))

end (* Subgraph *)

locale Subgraph_Start = Subgraph_Start_Defs + Subgraph
begin

lemma reachable_subgraph[intro]: "G.reachable b" if â€¹G.reachable aâ€º â€¹G'.reaches a bâ€º for a b
  using that by (auto intro: G.graph_startI mono_rtranclp[rule_format, of E'])

lemma reachable:
  "G.reachable x" if "G'.reachable x"
  using that by (fastforce simp: G.reachable_def G'.reachable_def)

end (* Subgraph Start *)

subsubsection â€¹Node-induced Subgraphsâ€º

locale Subgraph_Node_Defs = Graph_Defs +
  fixes V :: "'a â‡’ bool"
begin

definition E' where "E' x y â‰¡ E x y âˆ§ V x âˆ§ V y"

sublocale Subgraph E E' by standard (auto simp: E'_def)

lemma subgraph':
  "E' x y" if "E x y" "V x" "V y"
  using that unfolding E'_def by auto

lemma E'_V1:
  "V x" if "E' x y"
  using that unfolding E'_def by auto

lemma E'_V2:
  "V y" if "E' x y"
  using that unfolding E'_def by auto

lemma G'_reaches_V:
  "V y" if "G'.reaches x y" "V x"
  using that by (cases) (auto intro: E'_V2)

lemma G'_steps_V_all:
  "list_all V xs" if "G'.steps xs" "V (hd xs)"
  using that by induction (auto intro: E'_V2)

lemma G'_steps_V_last:
  "V (last xs)" if "G'.steps xs" "V (hd xs)"
  using that by induction (auto dest: E'_V2)

lemmas subgraphI = E'_V1 E'_V2 G'_reaches_V

lemmas subgraphD = E'_V1 E'_V2 G'_reaches_V

end (* Subgraph Node *)


locale Subgraph_Node_Defs_Notation = Subgraph_Node_Defs
begin

no_notation E ("_ â†’ _" [100, 100] 40)
notation E' ("_ â†’ _" [100, 100] 40)
no_notation reaches ("_ â†’* _" [100, 100] 40)
notation G'.reaches ("_ â†’* _" [100, 100] 40)
no_notation reaches1 ("_ â†’â‡§+ _" [100, 100] 40)
notation G'.reaches1 ("_ â†’â‡§+ _" [100, 100] 40)

end (* Subgraph_Node_Defs_Notation *)


subsubsection â€¹The Reachable Subgraphâ€º

context Graph_Start_Defs
begin

interpretation Subgraph_Node_Defs_Notation E reachable .

sublocale reachable_subgraph: Subgraph_Node_Defs E reachable .

lemma reachable_supgraph:
  "x â†’ y" if "E x y" "reachable x"
  using that unfolding E'_def by (auto intro: graph_startI)

lemma reachable_reaches_equiv: "reaches x y âŸ· x â†’* y" if "reachable x" for x y
  apply standard
  subgoal premises prems
    using prems â€¹reachable xâ€º
    by induction (auto dest: reachable_supgraph intro: graph_startI graphI_aggressive)
  subgoal premises prems
    using prems â€¹reachable xâ€º
    by induction (auto dest: subgraph)
  done

lemma reachable_reaches1_equiv: "reaches1 x y âŸ· x â†’â‡§+ y" if "reachable x" for x y
  apply standard
  subgoal premises prems
    using prems â€¹reachable xâ€º
    by induction (auto dest: reachable_supgraph intro: graph_startI graphI_aggressive)
  subgoal premises prems
    using prems â€¹reachable xâ€º
    by induction (auto dest: subgraph)
  done

lemma reachable_steps_equiv:
  "steps (x # xs) âŸ· G'.steps (x # xs)" if "reachable x"
  apply standard
  subgoal premises prems
    using prems â€¹reachable xâ€º
    by (induction "x # xs" arbitrary: x xs) (auto dest: reachable_supgraph intro: graph_startI)
  subgoal premises prems
    using prems by induction auto
  done

end (* Graph Start Defs *)


subsection â€¹Bundlesâ€º

bundle graph_automation
begin

lemmas [intro] = Graph_Defs.graphI Graph_Start_Defs.graph_startI
lemmas [dest]  = Graph_Start_Defs.graphD

end (* Bundle *)

bundle reaches_steps_iff =
  Graph_Defs.reaches1_steps_iff [iff]
  Graph_Defs.reaches_steps_iff  [iff]

bundle graph_automation_aggressive
begin

unbundle graph_automation

lemmas [intro] = Graph_Start_Defs.graphI_aggressive
lemmas [dest]  = Graph_Start_Defs.graphD_aggressive

end (* Bundle *)

bundle subgraph_automation
begin

unbundle graph_automation

lemmas [intro] = Subgraph_Node_Defs.subgraphI
lemmas [dest]  = Subgraph_Node_Defs.subgraphD

end (* Bundle *)


subsection â€¹Simulations and Bisimulationsâ€º

locale Graph_Invariant = Graph_Defs +
  fixes P :: "'a â‡’ bool"
  assumes invariant: "P a âŸ¹ a â†’ b âŸ¹ P b"
begin

lemma invariant_steps:
  "list_all P as" if "steps (a # as)" "P a"
  using that by (induction "a # as" arbitrary: as a) (auto intro: invariant)

lemma invariant_reaches:
  "P b" if "a â†’* b" "P a"
  using that by (induction; blast intro: invariant)

lemma invariant_run:
  assumes run: "run (x ## xs)" and P: "P x"
  shows "pred_stream P (x ## xs)"
  using run P by (coinduction arbitrary: x xs) (auto 4 3 elim: invariant run.cases)

end (* Graph Invariant *)

locale Graph_Invariants = Graph_Defs +
  fixes P Q :: "'a â‡’ bool"
  assumes invariant: "P a âŸ¹ a â†’ b âŸ¹ Q b" and Q_P: "Q a âŸ¹ P a"
begin

sublocale Pre: Graph_Invariant E P
  by standard (blast intro: invariant Q_P)

sublocale Post: Graph_Invariant E Q
  by standard (blast intro: invariant Q_P)

lemma invariant_steps:
  "list_all Q as" if "steps (a # as)" "P a"
  using that by (induction "a # as" arbitrary: as a) (auto intro: invariant Q_P)

lemma invariant_run:
  assumes run: "run (x ## xs)" and P: "P x"
  shows "pred_stream Q xs"
  using run P by (coinduction arbitrary: x xs) (auto 4 4 elim: invariant run.cases intro: Q_P)

lemma invariant_reaches1:
  "Q b" if "a â†’â‡§+ b" "P a"
  using that by (induction; blast intro: invariant Q_P)

end (* Graph Invariants *)

locale Graph_Invariant_Start = Graph_Start_Defs + Graph_Invariant +
  assumes P_sâ‡©0: "P sâ‡©0"
begin

lemma invariant_steps:
  "list_all P as" if "steps (sâ‡©0 # as)"
  using that P_sâ‡©0 by (rule invariant_steps)

lemma invariant_reaches:
  "P b" if "sâ‡©0 â†’* b"
  using invariant_reaches[OF that P_sâ‡©0] .

lemmas invariant_run = invariant_run[OF _ P_sâ‡©0]

end (* Graph Invariant Start *)

locale Graph_Invariant_Strong = Graph_Defs +
  fixes P :: "'a â‡’ bool"
  assumes invariant: "a â†’ b âŸ¹ P b"
begin

sublocale inv: Graph_Invariant by standard (rule invariant)

lemma P_invariant_steps:
  "list_all P as" if "steps (a # as)"
  using that by (induction "a # as" arbitrary: as a) (auto intro: invariant)

lemma steps_last_invariant:
  "P (last xs)" if "steps (x # xs)" "xs â‰  []"
  using steps_last_step[of "x # xs"] that by (auto intro: invariant)

lemmas invariant_reaches = inv.invariant_reaches

lemma invariant_reaches1:
  "P b" if "a â†’â‡§+ b"
  using that by (induction; blast intro: invariant)

end (* Graph Invariant *)

locale Simulation_Defs =
  fixes A :: "'a â‡’ 'a â‡’ bool" and B :: "'b â‡’ 'b â‡’ bool"
    and sim :: "'a â‡’ 'b â‡’ bool" (infixr "âˆ¼" 60)
begin

sublocale A: Graph_Defs A .

sublocale B: Graph_Defs B .

end (* Simulation Defs *)

locale Simulation = Simulation_Defs +
  assumes A_B_step: "â‹€ a b a'. A a b âŸ¹ a âˆ¼ a' âŸ¹ (âˆƒ b'. B a' b' âˆ§ b âˆ¼ b')"
begin

lemma simulation_reaches:
  "âˆƒ b'. Bâ‡§*â‡§* b b' âˆ§ a' âˆ¼ b'" if "Aâ‡§*â‡§* a a'" "a âˆ¼ b"
  using that by (induction rule: rtranclp_induct) (auto intro: rtranclp.intros(2) dest: A_B_step)

lemma simulation_reaches1:
  "âˆƒ b'. Bâ‡§+â‡§+ b b' âˆ§ a' âˆ¼ b'" if "Aâ‡§+â‡§+ a a'" "a âˆ¼ b"
  using that by (induction rule: tranclp_induct) (auto 4 3 intro: tranclp.intros(2) dest: A_B_step)

lemma simulation_steps:
  "âˆƒ bs. B.steps (b # bs) âˆ§ list_all2 (Î» a b. a âˆ¼ b) as bs" if "A.steps (a # as)" "a âˆ¼ b"
  using that
  apply (induction "a # as" arbitrary: a b as)
   apply force
  apply (frule A_B_step, auto)
  done

lemma simulation_run:
  "âˆƒ ys. B.run (y ## ys) âˆ§ stream_all2 (âˆ¼) xs ys" if "A.run (x ## xs)" "x âˆ¼ y"
proof -
  let ?ys = "sscan (Î» a' b. SOME b'. B b b' âˆ§ a' âˆ¼ b') xs y"
  have "B.run (y ## ?ys)"
    using that by (coinduction arbitrary: x y xs) (force dest!: someI_ex A_B_step elim: A.run.cases)
  moreover have "stream_all2 (âˆ¼) xs ?ys"
    using that by (coinduction arbitrary: x y xs) (force dest!: someI_ex A_B_step elim: A.run.cases)
  ultimately show ?thesis by blast
qed

end (* Simulation *)

lemma (in Subgraph) Subgraph_Simulation:
  "Simulation E' E (=)"
  by standard auto

locale Simulation_Invariant = Simulation_Defs +
  fixes PA :: "'a â‡’ bool" and PB :: "'b â‡’ bool"
  assumes A_B_step: "â‹€ a b a'. A a b âŸ¹ PA a âŸ¹ PB a' âŸ¹ a âˆ¼ a' âŸ¹ (âˆƒ b'. B a' b' âˆ§ b âˆ¼ b')"
  assumes A_invariant[intro]: "â‹€ a b. PA a âŸ¹ A a b âŸ¹ PA b"
  assumes B_invariant[intro]: "â‹€ a b. PB a âŸ¹ B a b âŸ¹ PB b"
begin

definition "equiv' â‰¡ Î» a b. a âˆ¼ b âˆ§ PA a âˆ§ PB b"

sublocale Simulation A B equiv' by standard (auto dest: A_B_step simp: equiv'_def)

sublocale PA_invariant: Graph_Invariant A PA by standard blast

lemma simulation_reaches:
  "âˆƒ b'. Bâ‡§*â‡§* b b' âˆ§ a' âˆ¼ b' âˆ§ PA a' âˆ§ PB b'" if "Aâ‡§*â‡§* a a'" "a âˆ¼ b" "PA a" "PB b"
  using simulation_reaches[of a a' b] that unfolding equiv'_def by simp

lemma simulation_steps:
  "âˆƒ bs. B.steps (b # bs) âˆ§ list_all2 (Î» a b. a âˆ¼ b âˆ§ PA a âˆ§ PB b) as bs"
  if "A.steps (a # as)" "a âˆ¼ b" "PA a" "PB b"
  using simulation_steps[of a as b] that unfolding equiv'_def by simp

lemma simulation_steps':
  "âˆƒ bs. B.steps (b # bs) âˆ§ list_all2 (Î» a b. a âˆ¼ b) as bs âˆ§ list_all PA as âˆ§ list_all PB bs"
  if "A.steps (a # as)" "a âˆ¼ b" "PA a" "PB b"
  using simulation_steps[OF that]
  by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) list_all2_conv_all_nth list_all_length)

context
  fixes f
  assumes eq: "a âˆ¼ b âŸ¹ b = f a"
begin

lemma simulation_steps'_map:
  "âˆƒ bs.
    B.steps (b # bs) âˆ§ bs = map f as
    âˆ§ list_all2 (Î» a b. a âˆ¼ b) as bs
    âˆ§ list_all PA as âˆ§ list_all PB bs"
  if "A.steps (a # as)" "a âˆ¼ b" "PA a" "PB b"
proof -
  from simulation_steps'[OF that] guess bs by clarify
  note guessed = this
  from this(2) have "bs = map f as"
    by (induction; simp add: eq)
  with guessed show ?thesis
    by auto
qed

end (* Context for Equality Relation *)

end (* Simulation Invariant *)

locale Simulation_Invariants = Simulation_Defs +
  fixes PA QA :: "'a â‡’ bool" and PB QB :: "'b â‡’ bool"
  assumes A_B_step: "â‹€ a b a'. A a b âŸ¹ PA a âŸ¹ PB a' âŸ¹ a âˆ¼ a' âŸ¹ (âˆƒ b'. B a' b' âˆ§ b âˆ¼ b')"
  assumes A_invariant[intro]: "â‹€ a b. PA a âŸ¹ A a b âŸ¹ QA b"
  assumes B_invariant[intro]: "â‹€ a b. PB a âŸ¹ B a b âŸ¹ QB b"
  assumes PA_QA[intro]: "â‹€ a. QA a âŸ¹ PA a" and PB_QB[intro]: "â‹€ a. QB a âŸ¹ PB a"
begin

sublocale Pre: Simulation_Invariant A B "(âˆ¼)" PA PB
  by standard (auto intro: A_B_step)

sublocale Post: Simulation_Invariant A B "(âˆ¼)" QA QB
  by standard (auto intro: A_B_step)

sublocale A_invs: Graph_Invariants A PA QA
  by standard auto

sublocale B_invs: Graph_Invariants B PB QB
