  by standard auto

lemma simulation_reaches1:
  "âˆƒ b2. B.reaches1 b1 b2 âˆ§ a2 âˆ¼ b2 âˆ§ QB b2" if "A.reaches1 a1 a2" "a1 âˆ¼ b1" "PA a1" "PB b1"
  using that
  by - (drule Pre.simulation_reaches1, auto intro: B_invs.invariant_reaches1 simp: Pre.equiv'_def)

lemma reaches1_unique:
  assumes unique: "â‹€ b2. a âˆ¼ b2 âŸ¹ QB b2 âŸ¹ b2 = b"
    and that: "A.reaches1 a a" "a âˆ¼ b" "PA a" "PB b"
  shows "B.reaches1 b b"
  using that by (auto dest: unique simulation_reaches1)

end (* Simualation Invariants *)

locale Bisimulation = Simulation_Defs +
  assumes A_B_step: "â‹€ a b a'. A a b âŸ¹ a âˆ¼ a' âŸ¹ (âˆƒ b'. B a' b' âˆ§ b âˆ¼ b')"
  assumes B_A_step: "â‹€ a a' b'. B a' b' âŸ¹ a âˆ¼ a' âŸ¹ (âˆƒ b. A a b âˆ§ b âˆ¼ b')"
begin

sublocale A_B: Simulation A B "(âˆ¼)" by standard (rule A_B_step)

sublocale B_A: Simulation B A "Î» x y. y âˆ¼ x" by standard (rule B_A_step)

lemma A_B_reaches:
  "âˆƒ b'. Bâ‡§*â‡§* b b' âˆ§ a' âˆ¼ b'" if "Aâ‡§*â‡§* a a'" "a âˆ¼ b"
  using A_B.simulation_reaches[OF that] .

lemma B_A_reaches:
  "âˆƒ b'. Aâ‡§*â‡§* b b' âˆ§ b' âˆ¼ a'" if "Bâ‡§*â‡§* a a'" "b âˆ¼ a"
  using B_A.simulation_reaches[OF that] .

end (* Bisim *)

locale Bisimulation_Invariant = Simulation_Defs +
  fixes PA :: "'a â‡’ bool" and PB :: "'b â‡’ bool"
  assumes A_B_step: "â‹€ a b a'. A a b âŸ¹ a âˆ¼ a' âŸ¹ PA a âŸ¹ PB a' âŸ¹ (âˆƒ b'. B a' b' âˆ§ b âˆ¼ b')"
  assumes B_A_step: "â‹€ a a' b'. B a' b' âŸ¹ a âˆ¼ a' âŸ¹ PA a âŸ¹ PB a' âŸ¹ (âˆƒ b. A a b âˆ§ b âˆ¼ b')"
  assumes A_invariant[intro]: "â‹€ a b. PA a âŸ¹ A a b âŸ¹ PA b"
  assumes B_invariant[intro]: "â‹€ a b. PB a âŸ¹ B a b âŸ¹ PB b"
begin

sublocale PA_invariant: Graph_Invariant A PA by standard blast

sublocale PB_invariant: Graph_Invariant B PB by standard blast

lemmas B_steps_invariant[intro] = PB_invariant.invariant_reaches

definition "equiv' â‰¡ Î» a b. a âˆ¼ b âˆ§ PA a âˆ§ PB b"

sublocale bisim: Bisimulation A B equiv'
  by standard (clarsimp simp add: equiv'_def, frule A_B_step B_A_step, assumption; auto)+

sublocale A_B: Simulation_Invariant A B "(âˆ¼)" PA PB
  by (standard; blast intro: A_B_step B_A_step)

sublocale B_A: Simulation_Invariant B A "Î» x y. y âˆ¼ x" PB PA
  by (standard; blast intro: A_B_step B_A_step)

context
  fixes f
  assumes eq: "a âˆ¼ b âŸ· b = f a"
    and inj: "âˆ€ a b. PB (f a) âˆ§ PA b âˆ§ f a = f b âŸ¶ a = b"
begin

lemma list_all2_inj_map_eq:
  "as = bs" if "list_all2 (Î»a b. a = f b) (map f as) bs" "list_all PB (map f as)" "list_all PA bs"
  using that inj
  by (induction "map f as" bs arbitrary: as rule: list_all2_induct) (auto simp: inj_on_def)

lemma steps_map_equiv:
  "A.steps (a # as) âŸ· B.steps (b # map f as)" if "a âˆ¼ b" "PA a" "PB b"
  using A_B.simulation_steps'_map[of f a as b] B_A.simulation_steps'[of b "map f as" a] that eq
  by (auto dest: list_all2_inj_map_eq)

lemma steps_map:
  "âˆƒ as. bs = map f as" if "B.steps (f a # bs)" "PA a" "PB (f a)"
proof -
  have "a âˆ¼ f a" unfolding eq ..
  from B_A.simulation_steps'[OF that(1) this â€¹PB _â€º â€¹PA _â€º] guess as by clarify
  from this(2) show ?thesis
    unfolding eq by (inst_existentials as, induction rule: list_all2_induct, auto)
qed

lemma reaches_equiv:
  "A.reaches a a' âŸ· B.reaches (f a) (f a')" if "PA a" "PB (f a)"
  apply safe
   apply (drule A_B.simulation_reaches[of a a' "f a"]; simp add: eq that)
  apply (drule B_A.simulation_reaches)
     defer
     apply (rule that | clarsimp simp: eq | metis inj)+
  done

end (* Context for Equality Relation *)

lemma equiv'_D:
  "a âˆ¼ b" if "A_B.equiv' a b"
  using that unfolding A_B.equiv'_def by auto

lemma equiv'_rotate_1:
  "B_A.equiv' b a" if "A_B.equiv' a b"
  using that by (auto simp: B_A.equiv'_def A_B.equiv'_def)

lemma equiv'_rotate_2:
  "A_B.equiv' a b" if "B_A.equiv' b a"
  using that by (auto simp: B_A.equiv'_def A_B.equiv'_def)

lemma stream_all2_equiv'_D:
  "stream_all2 (âˆ¼) xs ys" if "stream_all2 A_B.equiv' xs ys"
  using stream_all2_weaken[OF that equiv'_D] by fast

lemma stream_all2_equiv'_D2:
  "stream_all2 B_A.equiv' ys xs âŸ¹ stream_all2 (âˆ¼)Â¯Â¯ ys xs"
  by (coinduction arbitrary: xs ys) (auto simp: B_A.equiv'_def)

lemma stream_all2_rotate_1:
  "stream_all2 B_A.equiv' ys xs âŸ¹ stream_all2 A_B.equiv' xs ys"
  by (coinduction arbitrary: xs ys) (auto simp: B_A.equiv'_def A_B.equiv'_def)

lemma stream_all2_rotate_2:
  "stream_all2 A_B.equiv' xs ys âŸ¹ stream_all2 B_A.equiv' ys xs"
  by (coinduction arbitrary: xs ys) (auto simp: B_A.equiv'_def A_B.equiv'_def)

end (* Bisim Invariant *)

locale Bisimulation_Invariants = Simulation_Defs +
  fixes PA QA :: "'a â‡’ bool" and PB QB :: "'b â‡’ bool"
  assumes A_B_step: "â‹€ a b a'. A a b âŸ¹ a âˆ¼ a' âŸ¹ PA a âŸ¹ PB a' âŸ¹ (âˆƒ b'. B a' b' âˆ§ b âˆ¼ b')"
  assumes B_A_step: "â‹€ a a' b'. B a' b' âŸ¹ a âˆ¼ a' âŸ¹ PA a âŸ¹ PB a' âŸ¹ (âˆƒ b. A a b âˆ§ b âˆ¼ b')"
  assumes A_invariant[intro]: "â‹€ a b. PA a âŸ¹ A a b âŸ¹ QA b"
  assumes B_invariant[intro]: "â‹€ a b. PB a âŸ¹ B a b âŸ¹ QB b"
  assumes PA_QA[intro]: "â‹€ a. QA a âŸ¹ PA a" and PB_QB[intro]: "â‹€ a. QB a âŸ¹ PB a"
begin

sublocale PA_invariant: Graph_Invariant A PA by standard blast

sublocale PB_invariant: Graph_Invariant B PB by standard blast

sublocale QA_invariant: Graph_Invariant A QA by standard blast

sublocale QB_invariant: Graph_Invariant B QB by standard blast

sublocale Pre_Bisim: Bisimulation_Invariant A B "(âˆ¼)" PA PB
  by standard (auto intro: A_B_step B_A_step)

sublocale Post_Bisim: Bisimulation_Invariant A B "(âˆ¼)" QA QB
  by standard (auto intro: A_B_step B_A_step)

sublocale A_B: Simulation_Invariants A B "(âˆ¼)" PA QA PB QB
  by standard (blast intro: A_B_step)+

sublocale B_A: Simulation_Invariants B A "Î» x y. y âˆ¼ x" PB QB PA QA
  by standard (blast intro: B_A_step)+

context
  fixes f
  assumes eq[simp]: "a âˆ¼ b âŸ· b = f a"
    and inj: "âˆ€ a b. QB (f a) âˆ§ QA b âˆ§ f a = f b âŸ¶ a = b"
begin

lemmas list_all2_inj_map_eq = Post_Bisim.list_all2_inj_map_eq[OF eq inj]
lemmas steps_map_equiv' = Post_Bisim.steps_map_equiv[OF eq inj]

lemma list_all2_inj_map_eq':
  "as = bs" if "list_all2 (Î»a b. a = f b) (map f as) bs" "list_all QB (map f as)" "list_all QA bs"
  using that by (rule list_all2_inj_map_eq)

lemma steps_map_equiv:
  "A.steps (a # as) âŸ· B.steps (b # map f as)" if "a âˆ¼ b" "PA a" "PB b"
proof
  assume "A.steps (a # as)"
  then show "B.steps (b # map f as)"
  proof cases
    case Single
    then show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case prems: (Cons a' xs)
    from A_B_step[OF â€¹A a a'â€º â€¹a âˆ¼ bâ€º â€¹PA aâ€º â€¹PB bâ€º] obtain b' where "B b b'" "a' âˆ¼ b'"
      by auto
    with steps_map_equiv'[OF â€¹a' âˆ¼ b'â€º, of xs] prems that show ?thesis
      by auto
  qed
next
  assume "B.steps (b # map f as)"
  then show "A.steps (a # as)"
  proof cases
    case Single
    then show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case prems: (Cons b' xs)
    from B_A_step[OF â€¹B b b'â€º â€¹a âˆ¼ bâ€º â€¹PA aâ€º â€¹PB bâ€º] obtain a' where "A a a'" "a' âˆ¼ b'"
      by auto
    with that prems have "QA a'" "QB b'"
      by auto
    with â€¹A a a'â€º â€¹a' âˆ¼ b'â€º steps_map_equiv'[OF â€¹a' âˆ¼ b'â€º, of "tl as"] prems that show ?thesis
      apply clarsimp
      subgoal for z zs
        using inj[rule_format, of z a'] by auto
      done
  qed
qed

lemma steps_map:
  "âˆƒ as. bs = map f as" if "B.steps (f a # bs)" "PA a" "PB (f a)"
  using that proof cases
  case Single
  then show ?thesis by simp
next
  case prems: (Cons b' xs)
  from B_A_step[OF â€¹B _ b'â€º _ â€¹PA aâ€º â€¹PB (f a)â€º] obtain a' where "A a a'" "a' âˆ¼ b'"
    by auto
  with that prems have "QA a'" "QB b'"
    by auto
  with Post_Bisim.steps_map[OF eq inj, of a' xs] prems â€¹a' âˆ¼ b'â€º obtain ys where "xs = map f ys"
    by auto
  with â€¹bs = _â€º â€¹a' âˆ¼ b'â€º show ?thesis
    by (inst_existentials "a' # ys") auto
qed

text â€¹
  @{thm Post_Bisim.reaches_equiv} cannot be lifted directly:
  injectivity cannot be applied for the reflexive case.
â€º
lemma reaches1_equiv:
  "A.reaches1 a a' âŸ· B.reaches1 (f a) (f a')" if "PA a" "PB (f a)"
proof safe
  assume "A.reaches1 a a'"
  then obtain a'' where prems: "A a a''" "A.reaches a'' a'"
    including graph_automation_aggressive by blast
  from A_B_step[OF â€¹A a _â€º _ that] obtain b where "B (f a) b" "a'' âˆ¼ b"
    by auto
  with that prems have "QA a''" "QB b"
    by auto
  with Post_Bisim.reaches_equiv[OF eq inj, of a'' a'] prems â€¹B (f a) bâ€º â€¹a'' âˆ¼ bâ€º
  show "B.reaches1 (f a) (f a')"
    by auto
next
  assume "B.reaches1 (f a) (f a')"
  then obtain b where prems: "B (f a) b" "B.reaches b (f a')"
    including graph_automation_aggressive by blast
  from B_A_step[OF â€¹B _ bâ€º _ â€¹PA aâ€º â€¹PB (f a)â€º] obtain a'' where "A a a''" "a'' âˆ¼ b"
    by auto
  with that prems have "QA a''" "QB b"
    by auto
  with Post_Bisim.reaches_equiv[OF eq inj, of a'' a'] prems â€¹A a a''â€º â€¹a'' âˆ¼ bâ€º
  show "A.reaches1 a a'"
    by auto
qed

end (* Context for Equality Relation *)

end (* Bisim Invariant *)

lemma Bisimulation_Invariant_composition:
  assumes
    "Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim1 PA PB"
    "Bisimulation_Invariant B C sim2 PB PC"
  shows
    "Bisimulation_Invariant A C (Î» a c. âˆƒ b. PB b âˆ§ sim1 a b âˆ§ sim2 b c) PA PC"
proof -
  interpret A: Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim1 PA PB
    by (rule assms(1))
  interpret B: Bisimulation_Invariant B C sim2 PB PC
    by (rule assms(2))
  show ?thesis
    by (standard; (blast dest: A.A_B_step B.A_B_step | blast dest: A.B_A_step B.B_A_step))
qed

lemma Bisimulation_Invariant_filter:
  assumes
    "Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB"
    "â‹€ a b. sim a b âŸ¹ PA a âŸ¹ PB b âŸ¹ FA a âŸ· FB b"
    "â‹€ a b. A a b âˆ§ FA b âŸ· A' a b"
    "â‹€ a b. B a b âˆ§ FB b âŸ· B' a b"
  shows
    "Bisimulation_Invariant A' B' sim PA PB"
proof -
  interpret Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB
    by (rule assms(1))
  have unfold:
    "A' = (Î» a b. A a b âˆ§ FA b)" "B' = (Î» a b. B a b âˆ§ FB b)"
    using assms(3,4) by auto
  show ?thesis
    unfolding unfold
    apply standard
    using assms(2) apply (blast dest: A_B_step)
    using assms(2) apply (blast dest: B_A_step)
    by blast+
qed

lemma Bisimulation_Invariants_filter:
  assumes
    "Bisimulation_Invariants A B sim PA QA PB QB"
    "â‹€ a b. QA a âŸ¹ QB b âŸ¹ FA a âŸ· FB b"
    "â‹€ a b. A a b âˆ§ FA b âŸ· A' a b"
    "â‹€ a b. B a b âˆ§ FB b âŸ· B' a b"
  shows
    "Bisimulation_Invariants A' B' sim PA QA PB QB"
proof -
  interpret Bisimulation_Invariants A B sim PA QA PB QB
    by (rule assms(1))
  have unfold:
    "A' = (Î» a b. A a b âˆ§ FA b)" "B' = (Î» a b. B a b âˆ§ FB b)"
    using assms(3,4) by auto
  show ?thesis
    unfolding unfold
    apply standard
    using assms(2) apply (blast dest: A_B_step)
    using assms(2) apply (blast dest: B_A_step)
    by blast+
qed

lemma Bisimulation_Invariants_composition:
  assumes
    "Bisimulation_Invariants A B sim1 PA QA PB QB"
    "Bisimulation_Invariants B C sim2 PB QB PC QC"
  shows
    "Bisimulation_Invariants A C (Î» a c. âˆƒ b. PB b âˆ§ sim1 a b âˆ§ sim2 b c) PA QA PC QC"
proof -
  interpret A: Bisimulation_Invariants A B sim1 PA QA PB QB
    by (rule assms(1))
  interpret B: Bisimulation_Invariants B C sim2 PB QB PC QC
    by (rule assms(2))
  show ?thesis
    by (standard; (blast dest: A.A_B_step B.A_B_step | blast dest: A.B_A_step B.B_A_step))
qed

lemma Bisimulation_Invariant_Invariants_composition:
  assumes
    "Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim1 PA PB"
    "Bisimulation_Invariants B C sim2 PB QB PC QC"
  shows
    "Bisimulation_Invariants A C (Î» a c. âˆƒ b. PB b âˆ§ sim1 a b âˆ§ sim2 b c) PA PA PC QC"
proof -
  interpret Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim1 PA PB
    by (rule assms(1))
  interpret B: Bisimulation_Invariants B C sim2 PB QB PC QC
    by (rule assms(2))
  interpret A: Bisimulation_Invariants A B sim1 PA PA PB QB
    by (standard; blast intro: A_B_step B_A_step)+
  show ?thesis
    by (standard; (blast dest: A.A_B_step B.A_B_step | blast dest: A.B_A_step B.B_A_step))
qed

lemma Bisimulation_Invariant_Bisimulation_Invariants:
  assumes "Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB"
  shows "Bisimulation_Invariants A B sim PA PA PB PB"
proof -
  interpret Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB
    by (rule assms)
  show ?thesis
    by (standard; blast intro: A_B_step B_A_step)
qed

lemma Bisimulation_Invariant_strengthen_post:
  assumes
    "Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB"
    "â‹€ a b. PA' a âŸ¹ PA b âŸ¹ A a b âŸ¹ PA' b"
    "â‹€ a. PA' a âŸ¹ PA a"
  shows "Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA' PB"
proof -
  interpret Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB
    by (rule assms)
  show ?thesis
    by (standard; blast intro: A_B_step B_A_step assms)
qed

lemma Bisimulation_Invariant_strengthen_post':
  assumes
    "Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB"
    "â‹€ a b. PB' a âŸ¹ PB b âŸ¹ B a b âŸ¹ PB' b"
    "â‹€ a. PB' a âŸ¹ PB a"
  shows "Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB'"
proof -
  interpret Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB
    by (rule assms)
  show ?thesis
    by (standard; blast intro: A_B_step B_A_step assms)
qed

lemma Simulation_Invariant_strengthen_post:
  assumes
    "Simulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB"
    "â‹€ a b. PA a âŸ¹ PA b âŸ¹ A a b âŸ¹ PA' b"
    "â‹€ a. PA' a âŸ¹ PA a"
  shows "Simulation_Invariant A B sim PA' PB"
proof -
  interpret Simulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB
    by (rule assms)
  show ?thesis
    by (standard; blast intro: A_B_step assms)
qed

lemma Simulation_Invariant_strengthen_post':
  assumes
    "Simulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB"
    "â‹€ a b. PB a âŸ¹ PB b âŸ¹ B a b âŸ¹ PB' b"
    "â‹€ a. PB' a âŸ¹ PB a"
  shows "Simulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB'"
proof -
  interpret Simulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB
    by (rule assms)
  show ?thesis
    by (standard; blast intro: A_B_step assms)
qed

lemma Simulation_Invariants_strengthen_post:
  assumes
    "Simulation_Invariants A B sim PA QA PB QB"
    "â‹€ a b. PA a âŸ¹ QA b âŸ¹ A a b âŸ¹ QA' b"
    "â‹€ a. QA' a âŸ¹ QA a"
  shows "Simulation_Invariants A B sim PA QA' PB QB"
proof -
  interpret Simulation_Invariants A B sim PA QA PB QB
    by (rule assms)
  show ?thesis
    by (standard; blast intro: A_B_step assms)
qed

lemma Simulation_Invariants_strengthen_post':
  assumes
    "Simulation_Invariants A B sim PA QA PB QB"
    "â‹€ a b. PB a âŸ¹ QB b âŸ¹ B a b âŸ¹ QB' b"
    "â‹€ a. QB' a âŸ¹ QB a"
  shows "Simulation_Invariants A B sim PA QA PB QB'"
proof -
  interpret Simulation_Invariants A B sim PA QA PB QB
    by (rule assms)
  show ?thesis
    by (standard; blast intro: A_B_step assms)
qed

lemma Bisimulation_Invariant_sim_replace:
  assumes "Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB"
      and "â‹€ a b. PA a âŸ¹ PB b âŸ¹ sim a b âŸ· sim' a b"
    shows "Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim' PA PB"
proof -
  interpret Bisimulation_Invariant A B sim PA PB
    by (rule assms(1))
  show ?thesis
    apply standard
    using assms(2) apply (blast dest: A_B_step)
    using assms(2) apply (blast dest: B_A_step)
    by blast+
qed

end (* Theory *)

Theory Lib

theory Lib
  imports "Timed_Automata.Timed_Automata"
          "Timed_Automata.Approx_Beta"
          "MDP_Aux"
          "Finiteness"
          "Sequence_LTL"
          "Instantiate_Existentials"
          "Graphs"
begin

section â€¹Miscâ€º

lemma measurable_pred_stream[measurable]:
  fixes P shows "Measurable.pred (stream_space (count_space UNIV)) (pred_stream P)"
proof -
  have [measurable]: "Measurable.pred (count_space UNIV) P"
    by measurable
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding stream.pred_set sset_range by simp
qed

lemma pmf_map_pmf_cong:
  fixes f g and Î¼ :: "'a pmf"
  assumes "â‹€ x. x âˆˆ Î¼ âŸ¹ f x = y1 âŸ· g x = y2"
  shows "pmf (map_pmf f Î¼) y1 = pmf (map_pmf g Î¼) y2"
  unfolding pmf_map
  by (rule measure_pmf.finite_measure_eq_AE;
      simp add: AE_measure_pmf_iff assms split: split_indicator
     )

lemma collect_pair_finite[intro]:
  notes finite_subset[intro]
  assumes "finite {x. P x}" "finite {x. Q x}"
  shows "finite {(x, y) . P x âˆ§ Q y âˆ§ R x y}"
using assms
proof -
  from assms have "finite {(x, y) . P x âˆ§ Q y}" by auto
  moreover have "{(x, y) . P x âˆ§ (Q y âˆ§ R x y)} âŠ† {(x, y) . P x âˆ§ Q y}" by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma collect_pair_finite'[intro]:
  notes finite_subset[intro]
  assumes "finite {(x, y). P x y}"
  shows "finite {(x, y) . P x y âˆ§ R x y}"
using assms
proof -
  from assms have "finite {(x, y) . P x y}" by auto
  moreover have "{(x, y) . P x y âˆ§ R x y} âŠ† {(x, y) . P x y}" by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by blast
qed

text â€¹This is what we actually need in this theoryâ€º
lemma collect_pair_finite''[intro]:
  notes finite_subset[intro]
  assumes "finite {(x, y). P x âˆ§ Q y}"
  shows "finite {(x, y) . P x âˆ§ Q y âˆ§ R x y}"
using assms
proof -
  from assms have "finite {(x, y) . P x âˆ§ Q y}" by auto
  moreover have "{(x, y) . P x âˆ§ Q y âˆ§ R x y} âŠ† {(x, y) . P x âˆ§ Q y}" by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma finite_imageI'[intro]:
  assumes "finite {(x, y). P x y}"
  shows "finite {f x y | x y. P x y}"
proof -
  from assms have "finite ((Î» (x, y). f x y) ` {(x, y). P x y})" by auto
  moreover have "((Î» (x, y). f x y) ` {(x, y). P x y}) = {f x y | x y. P x y}" by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma finite_imageI''[intro]:
  assumes "finite (A Ã— B)"
  shows "finite {f x y | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B âˆ§ R x y}"
proof -
  from assms have "finite {f x y | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B}" by auto
  moreover have "{f x y | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B âˆ§ R x y} âŠ† {f x y | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ B}" by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by (blast intro: finite_subset)
qed

(* TODO: Move/should be somewhere already *)
lemma pred_stream_stl: "pred_stream Ï† xs âŸ¶ pred_stream Ï† (stl xs)"
  by (cases xs) auto

(* TODO: Should be somewhere already *)
lemma stream_all_pred_stream:
  "stream_all = pred_stream"
  by (intro ext) (simp add: stream.pred_set)

lemma pred_stream_iff: "pred_stream P s âŸ· Ball (sset s) P"
  using stream_all_iff[unfolded stream_all_pred_stream] .

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma measure_pmf_eq_1_iff:
  "emeasure (measure_pmf Î¼) {x} = 1 âŸ· Î¼ = return_pmf x"
  using measure_pmf.prob_eq_1[of "{x}" Î¼] set_pmf_subset_singleton[of Î¼ x]
  by (auto simp: measure_pmf.emeasure_eq_measure AE_measure_pmf_iff)

lemma HLD_mono:
  "HLD S Ï‰" if "HLD R Ï‰" "R âŠ† S"
  using that unfolding HLD_iff by auto

lemma alw_HLD_smap:
  "alw (HLD (f ` S)) (smap f Ï‰)" if "alw (HLD S) Ï‰"
  using that by (auto 4 3 elim: HLD_mono alw_mono)

lemma alw_disjoint_ccontr:
  assumes "alw (HLD S) Ï‰" "ev (alw (HLD R)) Ï‰" "R âˆ© S = {}"
  shows False
proof -
  from assms(1,2) obtain Ï‰ where "alw (HLD S) Ï‰" "alw (HLD R) Ï‰"
    by (auto intro: alw_sdrop sdrop_wait)
  with â€¹R âˆ© S = {}â€º show False
    by (auto 4 3 simp: HLD_iff dest: alwD)
qed

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma stream_all2_refl: "stream_all2 P x x = pred_stream (Î» x. P x x) x"
  by (simp add: stream.pred_rel eq_onp_def) (standard; coinduction arbitrary: x; auto)

lemma AE_all_imp_countable:
  assumes "countable {x. Q x}"
  shows "(AE x in M. âˆ€y. Q y âŸ¶ P x y) = (âˆ€y. Q y âŸ¶ (AE x in M. P x y))"
  using assms by (auto dest: AE_ball_countable)

lemma AE_conj:
  "almost_everywhere M P = almost_everywhere M (Î» x. P x âˆ§ Q x)" if "almost_everywhere M Q"
  by (auto intro: AE_mp[OF that])

(* TODO: move *)
lemma list_hd_lastD:
  assumes "length xs > 1"
  obtains x y ys where "xs = x # ys @ [y]"
  using assms by atomize_elim (cases xs; simp; metis rev_exhaust)

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma SUP_eq_and_INF_eq:
  assumes "â‹€i. i âˆˆ A âŸ¹ âˆƒjâˆˆB. f i = g j"
      and "â‹€j. j âˆˆ B âŸ¹ âˆƒiâˆˆA. g j = f i"
    shows "â¨†((f :: _ â‡’ _ :: complete_lattice) ` A) = â¨†(g ` B) âˆ§ â¨…(f ` A) = â¨…(g ` B)"
  by (auto 4 3 intro!: INF_eq SUP_eq dest: assms)

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma measurable_alw_stream[measurable]:
  fixes P assumes [measurable]: "Measurable.pred (stream_space (count_space UNIV)) P"
  shows "Measurable.pred (stream_space (count_space UNIV)) (alw P)"
  unfolding alw_iff_sdrop by measurable

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma ev_neq_start_implies_ev_neq:
  assumes "ev (Not o HLD {y}) (y ## xs)"
  shows "ev (Î» xs. shd xs â‰  shd (stl xs)) (y ## xs)"
  using assms
  apply (induction "y ## xs" arbitrary: xs rule: ev.induct)
   apply (simp; fail)
  subgoal for xs
    apply (cases "shd xs = y")
    subgoal
      apply safe
      apply (rule ev.step)
      apply simp
      using stream.collapse[of xs, symmetric]
      by blast
    subgoal
      by auto
    done
  done

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma ev_sdropD:
  assumes "ev P xs"
  obtains i where "P (sdrop i xs)"
  using assms
  apply atomize_elim
  apply (induction rule: ev.induct)
   apply (inst_existentials "0 :: nat"; simp; fail)
  apply (erule exE)
  subgoal for xs i
    by (inst_existentials "i + 1") simp
  done

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma pred_stream_sconst:
  "pred_stream ((=) x) (sconst x)"
  by coinduction simp

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma alw_Stream: "alw P (x ## s) âŸ· P (x ## s) âˆ§ alw P s"
  by (subst alw.simps) simp

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma alw_True: "alw (Î»x. True) Ï‰"
  by (auto intro: all_imp_alw)

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma alw_conjI:
  "alw (P aand Q) xs" if "alw P xs" "alw Q xs"
  using that by (simp add: alw_aand)

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma alw_ev_cong:
  "alw (ev S) xs = alw (ev R) xs" if "alw P xs" "â‹€ x. P x âŸ¹ S x âŸ· R x"
  by (rule alw_cong[where P = "alw P"]) (auto simp: HLD_iff that elim!: ev_cong)

lemma alw_ev_HLD_cong:
  "alw (ev (HLD S)) xs = alw (ev (HLD R)) xs" if "alw (HLD P) xs" "â‹€ x. x âˆˆ P âŸ¹ x âˆˆ S âŸ· x âˆˆ R"
  by (rule alw_ev_cong, rule that; simp add: HLD_iff that)

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma measurable_eq_stream_space[measurable (raw)]:
  assumes [measurable]: "f âˆˆ M â†’â‡©M stream_space (count_space UNIV)"
  shows "Measurable.pred M (Î»x. f x = c)"
proof -
  have *: "(Î»x. f x = c) = (Î»x. âˆ€i. f x !! i = c !! i)"
    by (auto intro: eqI_snth simp: fun_eq_iff)
  show ?thesis
    unfolding * by measurable
qed

(* TODO: rename, and change to LTL constants i.e. HLD, aand, nxt etc. *)
lemma prop_nth_sdrop:
  assumes "âˆ€ iâ‰¥j. P (Ï‰ !! i)"
  shows "âˆ€ i. P (sdrop j Ï‰ !! i)"
using assms by (induction j arbitrary: Ï‰) fastforce+

lemma prop_nth_sdrop_pair:
  assumes "âˆ€ i. P (Ï‰ !! i) (Ï‰' !! i)"
  shows "âˆ€ i. P (sdrop j Ï‰ !! i) (sdrop j Ï‰' !! i)"
  using assms by (induction j arbitrary: Ï‰ Ï‰') (auto, metis snth.simps(2))

lemma prop_nth_stl:
  "âˆ€ i. P (xs !! i) âŸ¹ âˆ€ i. P (stl xs !! i)"
  by (metis snth.simps(2))

context Graph_Defs
begin

lemma steps_SCons_iff:
  "steps (x # y # xs) âŸ· E x y âˆ§ steps (y # xs)"
  by (auto elim: steps.cases)

lemma steps_Single_True:
  "steps [x] = True"
  by auto

lemma add_step_iff:
  "(âˆ€ xs y. steps (x # xs @ [y]) âˆ§ length xs = Suc n âŸ¶ P xs y)
  âŸ· (âˆ€ z xs y. steps (x # z # xs @ [y]) âˆ§ length xs = n âŸ¶ P (z # xs) y)"
  apply safe
   apply fastforce
  subgoal for xs y
    by (cases xs) auto
  done

lemma compower_stepsD:
  assumes "(E ^^ n) s s'"
  obtains xs where "steps xs" "hd xs = s" "last xs = s'" "length xs = n + 1"
  using assms
  apply atomize_elim
proof (induction n arbitrary: s')
  case 0
  then show ?case
    by auto
next
  case (Suc n)
  from Suc.prems show ?case
    by (auto 4 4 intro: steps_append_single dest: Suc.IH)
qed

lemma compower_stepsD':
  assumes "(E ^^ n) s s'" "n > 0"
  obtains xs where "steps (s # xs @ [s'])" "length xs + 1 = n"
  apply (rule compower_stepsD[OF assms(1)])
  subgoal for xs
    by (auto simp: â€¹n > 0â€º intro: list_hd_lastD[of xs])
  done

end

context MC_syntax
begin

theorem AE_T_iff_n:
  fixes P :: "'s stream â‡’ bool" 
    and x :: "'s" 
  assumes "Measurable.pred (stream_space (count_space UNIV)) P" "n > 0"
  shows "almost_everywhere (T x) P =
    (âˆ€xs y. Graph_Defs.steps (Î» a b. b âˆˆ K a) (x # xs @ [y]) âˆ§ length xs + 1 = n
      âŸ¶ (AE Ï‰ in T y. P (xs @- y ## Ï‰)))"
  using assms
  apply (induction n arbitrary: x P)
   apply (simp; fail)
  subgoal for n x P
    apply (cases n)
    subgoal
      by (subst AE_T_iff) (auto simp: Graph_Defs.steps_SCons_iff Graph_Defs.steps_Single_True)
    subgoal premises prems for n'
    proof -
      have *: "Measurable.pred (stream_space (count_space UNIV)) (Î» Ï‰. P (y ## Ï‰))" for y
        using prems(2) by measurable
      with prems(1)[OF *] prems(3-) show ?thesis
        by (auto simp: AE_T_iff[OF prems(2)] Graph_Defs.steps_SCons_iff Graph_Defs.add_step_iff)
    qed
    done
  done

lemma AE_alw_accD:
  fixes P assumes P: "Measurable.pred (stream_space (count_space UNIV)) P"
  assumes *: "almost_everywhere (T s) (alw P)" "(s, s') âˆˆ acc"
  shows "almost_everywhere (T s') (alw P)"
  using *(2,1)
proof induction
  case (step y z)
  then have "almost_everywhere (T y) (alw P)" "z âˆˆ K y" by auto
  then have "AE Ï‰ in T z. alw P (z ## Ï‰)"
    unfolding AE_T_iff[OF measurable_alw_stream[OF P], of y] by auto
  then show ?case
    by eventually_elim auto
qed 

lemma acc_relfunD:
  assumes "(s, s') âˆˆ acc"
  obtains n where "((Î» a b. b âˆˆ K a) ^^ n) s s'"
  using assms
  apply atomize_elim
  apply (drule rtrancl_imp_relpow)
  apply (erule exE)
  subgoal for n
    by (inst_existentials n) (induction n arbitrary: s'; auto)
  done

(* TODO: If we can show measurable_alw_stream, then this subsumed by the lemma above *)
lemma AE_all_accD:
  assumes "almost_everywhere (T s) (pred_stream P)" "(s, s') âˆˆ acc"
  shows "almost_everywhere (T s') (pred_stream P)"
proof -
  from acc_relfunD[OF â€¹_ âˆˆ accâ€º] obtain n where *: "((Î» a b. b âˆˆ K a) ^^ n) s s'" .
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "n = 0")
    case True
    with * assms(1) show ?thesis
      by auto
  next
    case False
    then have "n > 0"
      by simp
    with * obtain xs where
      "Graph_Defs.steps (Î»a b. b âˆˆ set_pmf (K a)) (s # xs @ [s'])" "Suc (length xs) = n"
      by (auto elim: Graph_Defs.compower_stepsD')
    with assms(1)[unfolded AE_T_iff_n[OF measurable_pred_stream â€¹n > 0â€º, of P s]] show ?thesis
      by auto
  qed
qed

lemma AE_T_ev_HLD_infinite_strong':
  assumes "0 â‰¤ r" "r < 1"
    and r: "â‹€x. x âˆˆ X âˆ© Y âŸ¹ measure_pmf.prob (K x) Y â‰¤ r"
    and ae: "AE Ï‰ in T x. alw (Î» Ï‰. HLD Y Ï‰ âŸ¶ ev (HLD X) Ï‰) Ï‰"
  shows "AE Ï‰ in T x. ev (HLD (- Y)) Ï‰"
proof -
  define run where "run F = (HLD (Y - X)) suntil ((X âˆ© Y) â‹… Y â‹… F)" for F

  have le_gfp: "alw (HLD Y) aand alw (Î» Ï‰. HLD Y Ï‰ âŸ¶ ev (HLD X) Ï‰) â‰¤ gfp run"
  proof (rule gfp_upperbound; clarsimp)
    fix Ï‰ assume "alw (HLD Y) Ï‰" "alw (Î»Ï‰. HLD Y Ï‰ âŸ¶ ev (HLD X) Ï‰) Ï‰"
    then have "ev (HLD X) Ï‰" "alw (HLD Y) Ï‰" "alw (Î»Ï‰. HLD Y Ï‰ âŸ¶ ev (HLD X) Ï‰) Ï‰"
      by auto
    then show "run (Î»xs. alw (HLD Y) xs âˆ§ alw (Î»Ï‰. HLD Y Ï‰ âŸ¶ ev (HLD X) Ï‰) xs) Ï‰"
    proof (induction Ï‰ rule: ev_induct_strong)
      case (base Ï‰) then show ?case by (cases Ï‰) (auto intro!: suntil.base simp: alw_Stream run_def)
    next
      case (step Ï‰)
      show ?case
        unfolding run_def
        using â€¹Â¬ HLD X Ï‰â€º â€¹alw (HLD Y) Ï‰â€º step(3)[unfolded run_def] step(4,5)
        by (auto 0 4 simp: HLD_def intro: suntil.step)
    qed
  qed

  have cont_run: "inf_continuous run"
    apply (auto simp: inf_continuous_def fun_eq_iff run_def)
    subgoal premises that for M x f
      by (rule suntil_mono[OF _ _ that(2) alw_True]) auto
    subgoal premises that for M x
      using that(2)[THEN spec, of 0] that(2)
      proof (induction rule: suntil_induct_strong)
        case (base Ï‰) then show ?case 
          by (cases Ï‰) (simp add: suntil_Stream)
      next
        case (step Ï‰) then show ?case
          by (cases Ï‰) (simp add: suntil_Stream)
      qed
      done
  have [measurable]: "Measurable.pred (stream_space (count_space UNIV)) (gfp run)"
    apply measurable
    apply (rule measurable_gfp[OF cont_run])
    apply (auto simp: run_def)
    done

  have "emeasure (T x) {Ï‰ âˆˆ space (T x). alw (HLD Y) Ï‰} â‰¤
    emeasure (T x) {Ï‰ âˆˆ space (T x). ((alw (HLD Y)) aand (alw (Î» Ï‰. HLD Y Ï‰ âŸ¶ ev (HLD X) Ï‰))) Ï‰}"
    apply (rule emeasure_mono_AE)
    subgoal using ae by eventually_elim auto
    by measurable
  also have "â€¦ â‰¤ emeasure (T x) {Ï‰ âˆˆ space (T x). gfp run Ï‰}"
    apply (rule emeasure_mono)
    subgoal using le_gfp by auto
    by measurable
  also have "â€¦ â‰¤ r ^ n" for n
  proof (induction n arbitrary: x)
    case 0 then show ?case by (simp add: T.emeasure_le_1)
  next
    case (Suc n)
    { fix x 
      have "(âˆ«â‡§+ t. âˆ«â‡§+ t'. emeasure (T t') {xâˆˆspace S. tâˆˆX âˆ§ tâˆˆY âˆ§ t'âˆˆY âˆ§ gfp run x} âˆ‚K t âˆ‚K x) â‰¤
        (âˆ«â‡§+ t. indicator (X âˆ© Y) t * âˆ«â‡§+ t'. indicator Y t' * ennreal (r ^ n) âˆ‚K t âˆ‚K x)"
        using Suc by (auto intro!: nn_integral_mono split: split_indicator)
      also have "â€¦ â‰¤ (âˆ«â‡§+ t. indicator (X âˆ© Y) t * r âˆ‚K x) * ennreal (r^n)"
        by (auto intro!: nn_integral_mono mult_right_mono r ennreal_leI split: split_indicator
                 simp: nn_integral_multc mult.assoc[symmetric] measure_pmf.emeasure_eq_measure)
      also have "â€¦ = emeasure (K x) (X âˆ© Y) * r^(Suc n)"
        by (simp add: ennreal_mult â€¹0 â‰¤ râ€º nn_integral_multc ennreal_indicator mult.assoc)
      finally have *: "(âˆ«â‡§+ t. âˆ«â‡§+ t'. emeasure (T t') {xâˆˆspace S. t âˆˆ X âˆ§ t âˆˆ Y âˆ§ t' âˆˆ Y âˆ§ gfp run x} âˆ‚K t âˆ‚K x) â‰¤
        emeasure (K x) (X âˆ© Y) * r^Suc n" .
  
      have "(âˆ«â‡§+ t. âˆ«â‡§+ t'. emeasure (T t') {x âˆˆ space S. t âˆˆ X âˆ§ t âˆˆ Y âˆ§ t' âˆˆ Y âˆ§ gfp run x} âˆ‚K t âˆ‚K x) +
           ennreal (r^Suc n) * emeasure (measure_pmf (K x)) (Y - X) â‰¤
        emeasure (K x) (X âˆ© Y) * ennreal (r^Suc n) + ennreal (r^Suc n) * emeasure (measure_pmf (K x)) (Y - X)"
        by (intro add_mono_left *)
      also have "â€¦ = emeasure (K x) ((X âˆ© Y) âˆª (Y - X)) * ennreal (r^Suc n)"
        by (subst plus_emeasure[symmetric]) (auto simp: field_simps)
      also have "â€¦ â‰¤ 1 * ennreal (r^Suc n)"
        by (intro mult_right_mono measure_pmf.emeasure_le_1) simp
      finally have "(âˆ«â‡§+ t. âˆ«â‡§+ t'. emeasure (T t') {x âˆˆ space MC_syntax.S. t âˆˆ X âˆ§ t âˆˆ Y âˆ§ t' âˆˆ Y âˆ§ gfp run x} âˆ‚K t âˆ‚K x) +
           ennreal (r^Suc n) * emeasure (measure_pmf (K x)) (Y - X) â‰¤ 1 * ennreal (r^Suc n)" by simp }
    note * = this
    
    show ?case
      apply (subst gfp_unfold[OF inf_continuous_mono[OF cont_run]])
      apply (subst run_def)
      apply (subst emeasure_suntil_disj)
        apply measurable []
      subgoal for s
        by (rule AE_I2) (auto simp: HLD_iff)
      apply (rule le_funD[of _ _ x])
      apply (rule lfp_lowerbound)
      apply (rule le_funI)
      apply (subst emeasure_Collect_T)
       apply measurable []
      apply (subst emeasure_Collect_T)
      apply simp
      apply (simp add: nn_integral_cmult)
      using * by simp
  qed
  finally have "emeasure (T x) {Ï‰ âˆˆ space (T x). alw (HLD Y) Ï‰} â‰¤ r^n" for n .
  then have "emeasure (T x) {Ï‰ âˆˆ space (T x). alw (HLD Y) Ï‰} â‰¤ ennreal 0"
    using â€¹0 â‰¤ râ€º â€¹r < 1â€º
    by (intro LIMSEQ_le_const[OF tendsto_ennrealI[OF LIMSEQ_power_zero[of r]]]) auto
  then have *: "emeasure (T x) {Ï‰ âˆˆ space (T x). alw (HLD Y) Ï‰} = 0"
    by simp
  show ?thesis
    by (rule AE_I[OF _ *]) (auto simp: not_ev_iff not_HLD[symmetric])
qed

end

context Markov_Decision_Process
begin

lemma cfg_on_inv:
  "pred_stream (Î» cfg. cfg âˆˆ cfg_on (state cfg)) Ï‰" if
  "MC.enabled cfg Ï‰" "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on s"
  using that proof (coinduction arbitrary: Ï‰ cfg s)
  case prems: stream_pred
  note [simp] = â€¹_ = Ï‰â€º[symmetric]
  from prems(2) have "a âˆˆ set_pmf (K_cfg cfg)" "MC.enabled a w"
    by (auto simp: MC.enabled_Stream)
  moreover from â€¹a âˆˆ _â€º have "a âˆˆ cont cfg ` set_pmf (action cfg)"
    by (simp add: set_K_cfg)
  ultimately show ?case
    using â€¹cfg âˆˆ _â€º by auto
qed

lemma MC_T_not_sconst_strong:
  assumes
    "âˆ€ l. âˆ€ cfg âˆˆ (â‹ƒ x âˆˆ f -` {u}. cfg_on x) âˆ© Y âˆ© X. measure_pmf (action cfg) (f -` {u}) â‰¤ r"
    "r < 1" "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on x"
    "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ X) Ï‰"
    "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. alw (Î» Ï‰. HLD (f -` {u}) (smap state Ï‰) âŸ¶ ev (HLD Y) Ï‰) Ï‰"
  shows "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. smap (f o state) Ï‰ â‰  sconst u"
proof -
  let ?U = "f -` {u}"
  let ?S = "(â‹ƒ x âˆˆ f -` {u}. cfg_on x) âˆ© X"
  let ?T = "Y âˆ© ((â‹ƒ x âˆˆ f -` {u}. cfg_on x) âˆ© X)"
  have *: "emeasure (K_cfg cfg) ?S â‰¤ r" if "cfg âˆˆ ?T" for cfg
  proof -
    have "emeasure (K_cfg cfg) ?S â‰¤ emeasure (measure_pmf (action cfg)) ?U"
      unfolding K_cfg_def by (auto dest: cfg_onD_state intro!: emeasure_mono)
    also from assms(1) â€¹cfg âˆˆ ?Tâ€º have "â€¦ â‰¤ r"
      by auto
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed
  have "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. ev (HLD (- ?S)) Ï‰"
    apply (rule MC.AE_T_ev_HLD_infinite_strong'[where r = "enn2real r" and ?X = Y])
    apply (simp; fail)
    subgoal
      using â€¹r < 1â€º
      by (metis ennreal_enn2real_if ennreal_less_one_iff zero_less_one)
    subgoal for x
     by (drule *)
        (metis Sigma_Algebra.measure_def assms(2) enn2real_mono ennreal_one_less_top less_trans)
    subgoal
      using assms(5)
      by (rule AE_mp) (rule AE_I2, intro impI, auto simp: HLD_iff elim: alw_mono)
    done
  then show ?thesis
    apply (rule AE_mp)
  proof (rule AE_mp[OF assms(4)], rule AE_mp[OF MC.AE_T_enabled], rule AE_I2, safe)
    fix Ï‰ assume
      "Ï‰ âˆˆ space (MC.T cfg)" "pred_stream (Î»Ï‰. Ï‰ âˆˆ X) Ï‰"
      "MC.enabled cfg Ï‰" "ev (HLD (- ?S)) Ï‰" "smap (f âˆ˜ state) Ï‰ = sconst u"
    from this(2,3) â€¹cfg âˆˆ _â€º
    have "pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ cfg_on (state x)) Ï‰"
      by (auto dest: cfg_onD_state intro!: cfg_on_inv)
    from â€¹smap _ Ï‰ = _â€º have "pred_stream (Î» y. y âˆˆ (â‹ƒ x âˆˆ ?U. cfg_on x)) Ï‰"
    proof -
      have "(f o state) cfg = u" if "cfg âˆˆ sset Ï‰" for cfg
        using stream.set_map[of "f o state" Ï‰] that â€¹smap _ Ï‰ = _â€º by fastforce
      with â€¹pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ cfg_on (state x)) Ï‰â€º show ?thesis
        by (auto elim!: stream.pred_mono_strong)
    qed
    with â€¹pred_stream (Î»Ï‰. Ï‰ âˆˆ X) Ï‰â€º have "pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ ?S) Ï‰"
      by (coinduction arbitrary: Ï‰) auto
    then have "alw (HLD ?S) Ï‰"
      by (simp add: alw_holds_pred_stream_iff HLD_def)
    with â€¹ev (HLD (- ?S)) Ï‰â€º show False
      unfolding not_ev_not[symmetric] not_HLD by simp
  qed
qed

lemma MC_T_not_sconst:
  assumes
    "âˆ€ l. âˆ€ cfg âˆˆ (â‹ƒ x âˆˆ f -` {u}. cfg_on x) âˆ© X. measure_pmf (action cfg) (f -` {u}) â‰¤ r"
    "r < 1" "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on x"
    "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ X) Ï‰"
  shows "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. smap (f o state) Ï‰ â‰  sconst u"
proof -
  let ?U = "f -` {u}"
  let ?S = "(â‹ƒ x âˆˆ f -` {u}. cfg_on x) âˆ© X"
  have *: "emeasure (K_cfg cfg) ?S â‰¤ r" if "cfg âˆˆ ?S" for cfg
  proof -
    have "emeasure (K_cfg cfg) ?S â‰¤ emeasure (measure_pmf (action cfg)) ?U"
      unfolding K_cfg_def by (auto dest: cfg_onD_state intro!: emeasure_mono)
    also from assms(1) â€¹cfg âˆˆ ?Sâ€º have "â€¦ â‰¤ r"
      by auto
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed
  have "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. ev (HLD (- ?S)) Ï‰"
    apply (rule MC.AE_T_ev_HLD_infinite[where r = "enn2real r"])
    subgoal
      using â€¹r < 1â€º
      by (metis ennreal_enn2real_if ennreal_less_one_iff zero_less_one)
    apply (drule *)
    by (metis Sigma_Algebra.measure_def assms(2) enn2real_mono ennreal_one_less_top less_trans)
  then show ?thesis
    apply (rule AE_mp)
  proof (rule AE_mp[OF assms(4)], rule AE_mp[OF MC.AE_T_enabled], rule AE_I2, safe)
    fix Ï‰ assume
      "Ï‰ âˆˆ space (MC.T cfg)" "pred_stream (Î»Ï‰. Ï‰ âˆˆ X) Ï‰"
      "MC.enabled cfg Ï‰" "ev (HLD (- ?S)) Ï‰" "smap (f âˆ˜ state) Ï‰ = sconst u"
    from this(2,3) â€¹cfg âˆˆ _â€º
    have "pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ cfg_on (state x)) Ï‰"
      by (auto dest: cfg_onD_state intro!: cfg_on_inv)
    from â€¹smap _ Ï‰ = _â€º have "pred_stream (Î» y. y âˆˆ (â‹ƒ x âˆˆ ?U. cfg_on x)) Ï‰"
    proof -
      have "(f o state) cfg = u" if "cfg âˆˆ sset Ï‰" for cfg
        using stream.set_map[of "f o state" Ï‰] that â€¹smap _ Ï‰ = _â€º by fastforce
      with â€¹pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ cfg_on (state x)) Ï‰â€º show ?thesis
        by (auto elim!: stream.pred_mono_strong)
    qed
    with â€¹pred_stream (Î»Ï‰. Ï‰ âˆˆ X) Ï‰â€º have "pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ ?S) Ï‰"
      by (coinduction arbitrary: Ï‰) auto
    then have "alw (HLD ?S) Ï‰"
      by (simp add: alw_holds_pred_stream_iff HLD_def)
    with â€¹ev (HLD (- ?S)) Ï‰â€º show False
      unfolding not_ev_not[symmetric] not_HLD by simp
  qed
qed

lemma MC_T_not_sconst':
  assumes
    "âˆ€ cfg âˆˆ cfg_on x âˆ© X. measure_pmf (action cfg) {x} â‰¤ r" "r < 1" "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on x'"
    "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ X) Ï‰"
  shows "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. smap state Ï‰ â‰  sconst x"
  using assms by (rule MC_T_not_sconst[where f = id, simplified])

lemma K_cfg_cfg_onI:
  "cfg' âˆˆ cfg_on (state cfg')" if "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on x" "cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg"
  using that by (force simp: set_K_cfg)

lemma MC_acc_cfg_onI:
  "cfg' âˆˆ cfg_on (state cfg')" if "(cfg, cfg') âˆˆ MC.acc" "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on x"
proof -
  from that(1) obtain n where "((Î» a b. b âˆˆ K_cfg a) ^^ n) cfg cfg'"
    by (erule MC.acc_relfunD)
  with â€¹cfg âˆˆ cfg_on xâ€º show ?thesis
    by (induction n arbitrary: cfg') (auto intro: K_cfg_cfg_onI)
qed

lemma non_loop_tail_strong:
  assumes
    "âˆ€ l. âˆ€ cfg âˆˆ (â‹ƒ x âˆˆ f -` {u}. cfg_on x) âˆ© Y âˆ© X. measure_pmf (action cfg) (f -` {u}) â‰¤ r"
    "r < 1" "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on x"
    "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ X) Ï‰"
    "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. alw (Î» Ï‰. HLD (f -` {u}) (smap state Ï‰) âŸ¶ ev (HLD Y) Ï‰) Ï‰"
  shows "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. Â¬ (ev (alw (Î» xs. shd xs = u))) (smap (f o state) Ï‰)"
    (is "AE Ï‰ in ?M. ?P Ï‰")
proof -
  have *: "?P Ï‰ âŸ· alw (Î» xs. smap (f o state) xs â‰  sconst u) Ï‰" for Ï‰
    apply (simp add: not_ev_iff)
    apply (rule arg_cong2[where f = alw])
     apply (rule ext)
    subgoal for xs
      using MC.alw_HLD_iff_sconst[of u "smap (f o state) xs"] by (simp add: HLD_iff)
    by (rule HOL.refl)
  have "AE Ï‰ in ?M. alw (Î» xs. smap (f o state) xs â‰  sconst u) Ï‰"
    apply (rule MC.AE_T_alw)
    subgoal by (intro pred_intros_logic measurable_eq_stream_space) measurable
    using assms
    by - (erule MC_T_not_sconst_strong,
        auto intro: MC.AE_all_accD MC.AE_alw_accD elim: MC_acc_cfg_onI
        )
  with * show ?thesis
    by simp
qed

lemma non_loop_tail:
  assumes
    "âˆ€ l. âˆ€ cfg âˆˆ (â‹ƒ x âˆˆ f -` {u}. cfg_on x) âˆ© X. measure_pmf (action cfg) (f -` {u}) â‰¤ r"
    "r < 1" "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on x"
    "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ X) Ï‰"
  shows "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. Â¬ (ev (alw (Î» xs. shd xs = u))) (smap (f o state) Ï‰)"
    (is "AE Ï‰ in ?M. ?P Ï‰")
proof -
  have *: "?P Ï‰ âŸ· alw (Î» xs. smap (f o state) xs â‰  sconst u) Ï‰" for Ï‰
    apply (simp add: not_ev_iff)
    apply (rule arg_cong2[where f = alw])
     apply (rule ext)
    subgoal for xs
      using MC.alw_HLD_iff_sconst[of u "smap (f o state) xs"] by (simp add: HLD_iff)
    by (rule HOL.refl)
  have "AE Ï‰ in ?M. alw (Î» xs. smap (f o state) xs â‰  sconst u) Ï‰"
    apply (rule MC.AE_T_alw)
    subgoal by (intro pred_intros_logic measurable_eq_stream_space) measurable
    using assms by - (erule MC_T_not_sconst, auto intro: MC.AE_all_accD elim: MC_acc_cfg_onI)
  with * show ?thesis
    by simp
qed

lemma non_loop_tail':
  assumes
    "âˆ€ cfg âˆˆ cfg_on x âˆ© X. measure_pmf (action cfg) {x} â‰¤ r" "r < 1"
    "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on y"
    "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ X) Ï‰"
  shows "AE Ï‰ in MC.T cfg. Â¬ (ev (alw (Î» xs. shd xs = x))) (smap state Ï‰)"
  using assms by simp (erule non_loop_tail[where f = id, simplified])

end

lemma (in Regions) intv_const_mono:
  assumes "u âˆˆ region X I r" "c1 âˆˆ X" "c2 âˆˆ X" "u c1 â‰¤ u c2" "Â¬ isGreater (I c2)"
  shows "intv_const (I c1) â‰¤ intv_const (I c2)"
proof -
  from assms have "intv_elem c1 u (I c1)" "intv_elem c2 u (I c2)" by auto
  with â€¹u c1 â‰¤ u c2â€º â€¹Â¬ _â€º show ?thesis by (cases "I c1"; cases "I c2"; auto)
qed

lemma sset_sdrop:
  assumes "x âˆˆ sset (sdrop i xs)"
  shows "x âˆˆ sset xs"
using assms by (auto simp: sset_range)

lemma holds_untilD:
  assumes "(holds P until holds Q) xs" "âˆ€ i â‰¤ j. Â¬ Q (xs !! i)"
  shows "P (xs !! j)"
using assms
proof (induction j arbitrary: xs)
  case 0
  then show ?case by cases auto
next
  case (Suc j)
  from Suc.prems show ?case by cases (auto dest!: Suc.IH)
qed

(* TODO: Move *)
lemma frac_le_self:
  assumes "x â‰¥ 0"
  shows "frac x â‰¤ x"
  using assms less_trans [of "frac x" 1 x]
  by (auto simp add: le_less frac_eq not_less frac_lt_1)

lemma frac_le_1I:
  assumes "0 â‰¤ x" "x â‰¤ 1" "x â‰¤ y"
  shows "frac x â‰¤ y"
  using assms dual_order.trans frac_le_self by auto

lemma frac_le_1I':
  assumes "0 â‰¤ x" "x â‰¤ y" "y < 1"
  shows "frac x â‰¤ frac y"
proof -
  from assms have "frac y = y" by (simp add: frac_eq)
  moreover from assms have "frac x â‰¤ y" by (auto intro: frac_le_1I)
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

(* XXX Move *)
lemmas [intro] = order.strict_implies_order[OF frac_lt_1]

lemma nat_eventually_critical:
  assumes "P i" "Â¬ P j" "i < j"
  shows "âˆƒ k â‰¥ i. P k âˆ§ Â¬ P (Suc k)"
using assms by (metis dec_induct less_le)

lemma nat_eventually_critical_path:
  fixes i :: nat
  assumes "P i" "Â¬ P j" "i < j"
  shows "âˆƒ k > i. k â‰¤ j âˆ§ Â¬ P k âˆ§ (âˆ€ m â‰¥ i. m < k âŸ¶ P m)"
proof -
  let ?S = "{k. i < k âˆ§ k â‰¤ j âˆ§ Â¬ P k}"
  let ?k = "Min ?S"
  from assms have "j âˆˆ ?S" by auto
  moreover have "finite ?S" by auto
  ultimately have "i < ?k" "?k â‰¤ j" "Â¬ P ?k" using Min_in[of ?S] by blast+
  moreover have "P m" if "i â‰¤ m" "m < ?k" for m
  proof (cases "i = m")
    case True with â€¹P iâ€º show ?thesis by simp
  next
    case False
    with â€¹i â‰¤ mâ€º have "i < m" by simp
    with Min_le[OF â€¹finite _â€º] â€¹m < ?kâ€º â€¹?k â‰¤ jâ€º show ?thesis by fastforce
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis using â€¹P iâ€º by - (rule exI[where x = ?k]; blast)
qed

subsection â€¹MDP Invariantâ€º

locale Markov_Decision_Process_Invariant =
  Markov_Decision_Process K for K :: "'s â‡’ 's pmf set"+
fixes S :: "'s set"
assumes invariant: "â‹€ s D. s âˆˆ S âŸ¹ D âˆˆ K s âŸ¹ (âˆ€s' âˆˆ D. s' âˆˆ S)"
begin

lemma E_invariant:
  "{s'. (s, s') âˆˆ E} âŠ† S" if "s âˆˆ S"
  using that by (auto dest: invariant simp: E_def)

definition "valid_cfg = (â‹ƒsâˆˆS. cfg_on s)"

lemma valid_cfgI: "s âˆˆ S âŸ¹ cfg âˆˆ cfg_on s âŸ¹ cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  by (auto simp: valid_cfg_def)

lemma valid_cfgD: "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg âŸ¹ cfg âˆˆ cfg_on (state cfg)"
  by (auto simp: valid_cfg_def)

lemma action_closed: "s âˆˆ S âŸ¹ cfg âˆˆ cfg_on s âŸ¹ t âˆˆ action cfg âŸ¹ t âˆˆ S"
  using cfg_onD_action[of cfg s] invariant[of s] by auto

lemma
  shows valid_cfg_state_in_S: "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg âŸ¹ state cfg âˆˆ S"
    and valid_cfg_action: "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg âŸ¹ s âˆˆ action cfg âŸ¹ s âˆˆ S"
    and valid_cfg_cont: "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg âŸ¹ s âˆˆ action cfg âŸ¹ cont cfg s âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  by (auto simp: valid_cfg_def intro!: bexI[of _ s] intro: action_closed)

lemma valid_K_cfg[intro]: "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg âŸ¹ cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg âŸ¹ cfg' âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  by (auto simp add: K_cfg_def valid_cfg_cont)

lemma pred_stream_valid_cfg:
  assumes valid: "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  assumes enabled: "MC.enabled cfg xs"
  shows "pred_stream (Î» cfg. cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg) xs"
  using assms by (coinduction arbitrary: cfg xs) (subst (asm) MC.enabled_iff; auto)

lemma pred_stream_cfg_on:
  assumes valid: "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  assumes enabled: "MC.enabled cfg xs"
  shows "pred_stream (Î» cfg. state cfg âˆˆ S âˆ§ cfg âˆˆ cfg_on (state cfg)) xs"
  using valid pred_stream_valid_cfg[OF _ enabled] unfolding stream.pred_set
  by (auto intro: valid_cfgI dest: valid_cfgD valid_cfg_state_in_S)

lemma alw_S: "almost_everywhere (T cfg) (pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S))" if "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  unfolding T_def using pred_stream_cfg_on â€¹cfg âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º
  by (subst AE_distr_iff) (measurable, auto simp: stream.pred_set intro: AE_mp[OF MC.AE_T_enabled])

end

context Finite_Markov_Decision_Process
begin

sublocale Invariant: Markov_Decision_Process_Invariant
  rewrites "Invariant.valid_cfg = valid_cfg"
proof -
  show "Markov_Decision_Process_Invariant K S"
    by standard (auto dest: set_pmf_closed)
  then show "Markov_Decision_Process_Invariant.valid_cfg K S = valid_cfg"
    by (subst Markov_Decision_Process_Invariant.valid_cfg_def; simp add: valid_cfg_def)
qed

lemmas pred_stream_cfg_on = Invariant.pred_stream_cfg_on
   and pred_stream_valid_cfg = Invariant.pred_stream_valid_cfg
   and alw_S = Invariant.alw_S
   and valid_cfg_state_in_S = Invariant.valid_cfg_state_in_S

end

end

Theory PTA

theory PTA
  imports "library/Lib"
begin

section â€¹Bisimulation on a Relationâ€º text_raw â€¹\label{thm:bisim}â€º

definition rel_set_strong :: "('a â‡’ 'b â‡’ bool) â‡’ 'a set â‡’ 'b set â‡’ bool"
  where "rel_set_strong R A B âŸ· (âˆ€x y. R x y âŸ¶ (x âˆˆ A âŸ· y âˆˆ B))"

lemma T_eq_rel_half[consumes 4, case_names prob sets cont]:
  fixes R :: "'s â‡’ 't â‡’ bool" and f :: "'s â‡’ 't" and S :: "'s set"
  assumes R_def: "â‹€s t. R s t âŸ· (s âˆˆ S âˆ§ f s = t)"
  assumes A[measurable]: "A âˆˆ sets (stream_space (count_space UNIV))"
    and B[measurable]: "B âˆˆ sets (stream_space (count_space UNIV))"
    and AB: "rel_set_strong (stream_all2 R) A B" and KL: "rel_fun R (rel_pmf R) K L" and xy: "R x y"
  shows "MC_syntax.T K x A = MC_syntax.T L y B"
proof -
  interpret K: MC_syntax K by unfold_locales
  interpret L: MC_syntax L by unfold_locales

  have "x âˆˆ S" using â€¹R x yâ€º by (auto simp: R_def)

  define g where "g t = (SOME s. R s t)" for t
  have measurable_g: "g âˆˆ count_space UNIV â†’â‡©M count_space UNIV" by auto
  have g: "R i j âŸ¹ R (g j) j" for i j
    unfolding g_def by (rule someI)
  
  have K_subset: "x âˆˆ S âŸ¹ K x âŠ† S" for x
    using KL[THEN rel_funD, of x "f x", THEN rel_pmf_imp_rel_set] by (auto simp: rel_set_def R_def)

  have in_S: "AE Ï‰ in K.T x. Ï‰ âˆˆ streams S"
    using K.AE_T_enabled
  proof eventually_elim 
    case (elim Ï‰) with â€¹x âˆˆ Sâ€º show ?case
      apply (coinduction arbitrary: x Ï‰)
      subgoal for x Ï‰ using K_subset by (cases Ï‰) (auto simp: K.enabled_Stream)
      done
  qed

  have L_eq: "L y = map_pmf f (K x)" if xy: "R x y" for x y
  proof -
    have "rel_pmf (Î»x y. x = y) (map_pmf f (K x)) (L y)"
      using KL[THEN rel_funD, OF xy] by (auto intro: pmf.rel_mono_strong simp: R_def pmf.rel_map)
    then show ?thesis unfolding pmf.rel_eq by simp
  qed

  let ?D = "Î»x. distr (K.T x) K.S (smap f)"
  have prob_space_D: "?D x âˆˆ space (prob_algebra K.S)" for x 
    by (auto simp: space_prob_algebra K.T.prob_space_distr)

  have D_eq_D: "?D x = ?D x'" if "R x y" "R x' y" for x x' y
  proof (rule stream_space_eq_sstart)
    define A where "A = K.acc `` {x, x'}"
    have x_A: "x âˆˆ A" "x' âˆˆ A" by (auto simp: A_def)
    let ?Î© = "f ` A"
    show "countable ?Î©"
      unfolding A_def by (intro countable_image K.countable_acc) auto
    show "prob_space (?D x)" "prob_space (?D x')" by (auto intro!: K.T.prob_space_distr)
    show "sets (?D x) = sets L.S" "sets (?D x') = sets L.S" by auto
    have AE_streams: "AE x in ?D x''. x âˆˆ streams ?Î©" if "x'' âˆˆ A" for x''
      apply (simp add: space_stream_space streams_sets AE_distr_iff)
      using K.AE_T_reachable[of x''] unfolding alw_HLD_iff_streams
    proof eventually_elim
      fix s assume "s âˆˆ streams (K.acc `` {x''})"
      moreover have "K.acc `` {x''} âŠ† A"
        using â€¹x'' âˆˆ Aâ€º by (auto simp: A_def Image_def intro: rtrancl_trans)
      ultimately show "smap f s âˆˆ streams (f ` A)"
        by (auto intro: smap_streams)
    qed
    with x_A show "AE x in ?D x'. x âˆˆ streams ?Î©" "AE x in ?D x. x âˆˆ streams ?Î©"
      by auto
    from â€¹x âˆˆ Aâ€º â€¹x' âˆˆ Aâ€º that show "?D x (sstart (f ` A) xs) = ?D x' (sstart (f ` A) xs)" for xs
    proof (induction xs arbitrary: x x' y)
      case Nil
      moreover have "?D x (streams (f ` A)) = 1" if "x âˆˆ A" for x
        using AE_streams[of x] that
        by (intro prob_space.emeasure_eq_1_AE[OF K.T.prob_space_distr]) (auto simp: streams_sets)
      ultimately show ?case by simp
    next
      case (Cons z zs x x' y)
      have "rel_pmf (R OO RÂ¯Â¯) (K x) (K x')"
        using KL[THEN rel_funD, OF Cons(4)] KL[THEN rel_funD, OF Cons(5)]
        unfolding pmf.rel_compp pmf.rel_flip by auto
      then obtain p :: "('s Ã— 's) pmf" where p: "â‹€a b. (a, b) âˆˆ p âŸ¹ (R OO RÂ¯Â¯) a b" and
        eq: "map_pmf fst p = K x" "map_pmf snd p = K x'"
        by (auto simp: pmf.in_rel)
      let ?S = "stream_space (count_space UNIV)"
      have *: "(##) y -` smap f -` sstart (f ` A) (z # zs) = (if f y = z then smap f -` sstart (f ` A) zs else {})" for y z zs
        by auto
      have **: "?D x (sstart (f ` A) (z # zs)) = (âˆ«â‡§+ y'. (if f y' = z then ?D y' (sstart (f ` A) zs) else 0) âˆ‚K x)" for x
        apply (simp add: emeasure_distr)
        apply (subst K.T_eq_bind)
        apply (subst emeasure_bind[where N="?S"])
           apply simp
          apply (rule measurable_distr2[where M="?S"])
           apply measurable
        apply (intro nn_integral_cong_AE AE_pmfI)
        apply (auto simp add: emeasure_distr)
        apply (simp_all add: * space_stream_space)
        done
      have fst_A: "fst ab âˆˆ A" if "ab âˆˆ p" for ab
      proof -
        have "fst ab âˆˆ K x" using â€¹ab âˆˆ pâ€º set_map_pmf [of fst p] by (auto simp: eq)
        with â€¹x âˆˆ Aâ€º show "fst ab âˆˆ A"
          by (auto simp: A_def intro: rtrancl.rtrancl_into_rtrancl)
      qed
      have snd_A: "snd ab âˆˆ A" if "ab âˆˆ p" for ab
      proof -
        have "snd ab âˆˆ K x'" using â€¹ab âˆˆ pâ€º set_map_pmf [of snd p] by (auto simp: eq)
        with â€¹x' âˆˆ Aâ€º show "snd ab âˆˆ A"
          by (auto simp: A_def intro: rtrancl.rtrancl_into_rtrancl)
      qed
      show ?case
        unfolding ** eq[symmetric] nn_integral_map_pmf
        apply (intro nn_integral_cong_AE AE_pmfI)
        subgoal for ab using p[of "fst ab" "snd ab"] by (auto simp: R_def intro!: Cons(1) fst_A snd_A)
        done
    qed
  qed

  have L_eq_D: "L.T y = ?D x"
    using â€¹R x yâ€º
  proof (coinduction arbitrary: x y rule: L.T_coinduct)
    case (cont x y)
    then have Kx_Ly: "rel_pmf R (K x) (L y)"
      by (rule KL[THEN rel_funD])
    then have *: "y' âˆˆ L y âŸ¹ âˆƒx'âˆˆK x. R x' y'" for y'
      by (auto dest!: rel_pmf_imp_rel_set simp: rel_set_def)
    have **: "y' âˆˆ L y âŸ¹ R (g y') y'" for y'
      using *[of y'] unfolding g_def by (auto intro: someI)

    have D_SCons_eq_D_D: "distr (K.T i) K.S (Î»x. z ## smap f x) = distr (?D i) K.S (Î»x. z ## x)" for i z
      by (subst distr_distr) (auto simp: comp_def)
    have D_eq_D_gi: "?D i = ?D (g (f i))" if i: "i âˆˆ K x" for i
    proof -
      obtain j where "j âˆˆ L y" "R i j" "f i = j"
        using Kx_Ly i by (force dest!: rel_pmf_imp_rel_set simp: rel_set_def R_def)
      then show ?thesis
        by (auto intro!: D_eq_D[OF â€¹R i jâ€º] g)
    qed

    have ***: "?D x = measure_pmf (L y) â¤œ (Î»y. distr (?D (g y)) K.S ((##) y))"
      apply (subst K.T_eq_bind)
      apply (subst distr_bind[of _ _ K.S])
         apply (rule measurable_distr2[of _  _ "K.S"])
          apply (simp_all add: Pi_iff)
      apply (simp add: distr_distr comp_def L_eq[OF cont] map_pmf_rep_eq)
      apply (subst bind_distr[where K=K.S])
         apply measurable []
        apply (rule measurable_distr2[of _  _ "K.S"])
        apply measurable []
        apply (rule measurable_compose[OF measurable_g])
        apply measurable []
       apply simp
      apply (rule bind_measure_pmf_cong[where N="K.S"])
        apply (auto simp: space_subprob_algebra space_stream_space intro!: K.T.subprob_space_distr)
        unfolding D_SCons_eq_D_D D_eq_D_gi ..
    show ?case
      by (intro exI[of _ "Î»t. distr (K.T (g t)) (stream_space (count_space UNIV)) (smap f)"])
         (auto simp add: K.T.prob_space_distr *** dest: **)
  qed (auto intro: K.T.prob_space_distr)

  have "stream_all2 R s t âŸ· (s âˆˆ streams S âˆ§ smap f s = t)" for s t 
  proof safe
    show "stream_all2 R s t âŸ¹ s âˆˆ streams S"
      apply (coinduction arbitrary: s t)
      subgoal for s t by (cases s; cases t) (auto simp: R_def)
      done
    show "stream_all2 R s t âŸ¹ smap f s = t"
      apply (coinduction arbitrary: s t rule: stream.coinduct)
      subgoal for s t by (cases s; cases t) (auto simp: R_def)
      done
  qed (auto intro!: stream.rel_refl_strong simp: stream.rel_map R_def streams_iff_sset)
  then have "Ï‰ âˆˆ streams S âŸ¹ Ï‰ âˆˆ A âŸ· smap f Ï‰ âˆˆ B" for Ï‰
    using AB by (auto simp: rel_set_strong_def)
  with in_S have "K.T x A = K.T x (smap f -` B âˆ© space (K.T x))"
    by (auto intro!: emeasure_eq_AE streams_sets)
  also have "â€¦ = (distr (K.T x) K.S (smap f)) B"
    by (intro emeasure_distr[symmetric]) auto
  also have "â€¦ = (L.T y) B" unfolding L_eq_D ..
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

no_notation ccval ("â¦ƒ_â¦„" [100])

hide_const succ


section â€¹Additional Facts on Regionsâ€º

(* XXX Move this to a theory on Timed Automata *)
declare reset_set11[simp] reset_set1[simp]

text â€¹
  Defining the closest successor of a region. Only exists if at least one interval is upper-bounded.
â€º

abbreviation is_upper_right where
  "is_upper_right R â‰¡ (âˆ€ t â‰¥ 0. âˆ€ u âˆˆ R. u âŠ• t âˆˆ R)"

(* XXX Remove old successor definition *)
definition
  "succ â„› R â‰¡
  if is_upper_right R then R else
  (THE R'. R' â‰  R âˆ§ R' âˆˆ Succ â„› R âˆ§ (âˆ€ u âˆˆ R. âˆ€ t â‰¥ 0. (u âŠ• t) âˆ‰ R âŸ¶ (âˆƒ t' â‰¤ t. (u âŠ• t') âˆˆ R' âˆ§ 0 â‰¤ t')))"

lemma region_continuous:
  assumes "valid_region X k I r"
  defines R: "R â‰¡ region X I r"
  assumes between: "0 â‰¤ t1" "t1 â‰¤ t2"
  assumes elem: "u âˆˆ R" "u âŠ• t2 âˆˆ R"
  shows "u âŠ• t1 âˆˆ R"
unfolding R
proof
  from â€¹0 â‰¤ t1â€º â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º show "âˆ€xâˆˆX. 0 â‰¤ (u âŠ• t1) x" by (auto simp: R cval_add_def)

  have "intv_elem x (u âŠ• t1) (I x)" if "x âˆˆ X" for x
  proof -
    from elem that have "intv_elem x u (I x)" "intv_elem x (u âŠ• t2) (I x)" by (auto simp: R)
    with between show ?thesis by (cases "I x", auto simp: cval_add_def)
  qed
  then show "âˆ€ x âˆˆ X. intv_elem x (u âŠ• t1) (I x)" by blast

  let ?Xâ‡©0 = "{x âˆˆ X. âˆƒd. I x = Intv d}"
  show "?Xâ‡©0 = ?Xâ‡©0" ..

  from elem have "âˆ€ x âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0. âˆ€ y âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0. (x, y) âˆˆ r âŸ· frac (u x) â‰¤ frac (u y)" by (auto simp: R)
  moreover
  { fix x y c d assume A: "x âˆˆ X" "y âˆˆ X" "I x = Intv c" "I y = Intv d"
    from A elem between have *:
      "c < u x" "u x < c + 1" "c < u x + t1" "u x + t1 < c + 1"
    by (fastforce simp: cval_add_def R)+
    moreover from A(2,4) elem between have **:
      "d < u y" "u y < d + 1" "d < u y + t1" "u y + t1 < d + 1"
    by (fastforce simp: cval_add_def R)+
    ultimately have "u x = c + frac (u x)" "u y = d + frac (u y)" using nat_intv_frac_decomp by auto
    then have
      "frac (u x + t1) = frac (u x) + t1" "frac (u y + t1) = frac (u y) + t1"
    using *(3,4) **(3,4) nat_intv_frac_decomp by force+
    then have
      "frac (u x) â‰¤ frac (u y) âŸ· frac ((u âŠ• t1) x) â‰¤ frac ((u âŠ• t1) y)"
    by (auto simp: cval_add_def)
  }
  ultimately show
    "âˆ€ x âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0. âˆ€ y âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0. (x, y) âˆˆ r âŸ· frac ((u âŠ• t1) x) â‰¤ frac ((u âŠ• t1) y)"
  by (auto simp: cval_add_def)
qed

lemma upper_right_eq:
  assumes "finite X" "valid_region X k I r"
  shows "(âˆ€ x âˆˆ X. isGreater (I x)) âŸ· is_upper_right (region X I r)"
using assms
proof (safe, goal_cases)
  case (1 t u)
  then show ?case
    by - (standard, force simp: cval_add_def)+
next
  case (2 x)
  (* XXX Does this lemma actually need the finiteness assumption? *)
  from region_not_empty[OF assms] obtain u where u: "u âˆˆ region X I r" ..
  moreover have "(1 :: real) â‰¥ 0" by auto
  ultimately have "(u âŠ• 1) âˆˆ region X I r" using 2 by auto
  with â€¹x âˆˆ Xâ€º u have "intv_elem x u (I x)" "intv_elem x (u âŠ• 1) (I x)" by auto
  then show ?case by (cases "I x", auto simp: cval_add_def)
qed

lemma bounded_region:
  assumes "finite X" "valid_region X k I r"
  defines R: "R â‰¡ region X I r"
  assumes "Â¬ is_upper_right R" "u âˆˆ R"
  shows "u âŠ• 1 âˆ‰ R"
proof -
  from upper_right_eq[OF assms(1,2)] assms(4) obtain x where x:
    "x âˆˆ X" "Â¬ isGreater (I x)"
  by (auto simp: R)
  with assms have "intv_elem x u (I x)" by auto
  with x(2) have "Â¬ intv_elem x (u âŠ• 1) (I x)" by (cases "I x", auto simp: cval_add_def)
  with x(1) assms show ?thesis by auto
qed

(* XXX Remove Caml case *)
context AlphaClosure
begin

(* XXX Clean *)
no_notation Regions_Beta.part ("[_]â‡©_" [61,61] 61)

lemma succ_ex:
  assumes "R âˆˆ â„›"
  shows "succ â„› R âˆˆ â„›" (is "?G1") and "succ â„› R âˆˆ Succ â„› R" (is "?G2")
  and "âˆ€ u âˆˆ R. âˆ€ t â‰¥ 0. (u âŠ• t) âˆ‰ R âŸ¶ (âˆƒ t' â‰¤ t. (u âŠ• t') âˆˆ succ â„› R âˆ§ 0 â‰¤ t')" (is "?G3")
proof -
  from â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º obtain I r where R: "R = region X I r" "valid_region X k I r"
    unfolding â„›_def by auto
  from region_not_empty[OF finite] R obtain u where u: "u âˆˆ R"
    by blast
  let ?Z = "{x âˆˆ X . âˆƒ c. I x = Const c}"
  let ?succ =
    "Î» R'. R' â‰  R âˆ§ R' âˆˆ Succ â„› R
     âˆ§ (âˆ€ u âˆˆ R. âˆ€ t â‰¥ 0. (u âŠ• t) âˆ‰ R âŸ¶ (âˆƒ t' â‰¤ t. (u âŠ• t') âˆˆ R' âˆ§ 0 â‰¤ t'))"
  consider (upper_right) "âˆ€ x âˆˆ X. isGreater (I x)" | (intv) "âˆƒ x âˆˆ X. âˆƒ d. I x = Intv d âˆ§ ?Z = {}"
         | (const) "?Z â‰  {}"
  apply (cases "âˆ€ x âˆˆ X. isGreater (I x)")
   apply fast
  apply (cases "?Z = {}")
   apply safe
   apply (rename_tac x)
   apply (case_tac "I x")
  by auto
  then have "?G1 âˆ§ ?G2 âˆ§ ?G3"
  proof cases
    case const
    with upper_right_eq[OF finite R(2)] have "Â¬ is_upper_right R" by (auto simp: R(1))
    from closest_prestable_1(1,2)[OF const finite R(2)] closest_valid_1[OF const finite R(2)] R(1)
    obtain R' where R':
      "âˆ€ u âˆˆ R. âˆ€ t>0. âˆƒt'â‰¤t. (u âŠ• t') âˆˆ R' âˆ§ t' â‰¥ 0" "R' âˆˆ â„›" "âˆ€ u âˆˆ R'. âˆ€ tâ‰¥0. (u âŠ• t) âˆ‰ R"
    unfolding â„›_def by auto
    with region_not_empty[OF finite] obtain u' where "u' âˆˆ R'" unfolding â„›_def by blast
    with R'(3) have neq: "R' â‰  R" by (fastforce simp: cval_add_def)
    obtain t:: real where "t > 0" by (auto intro: that[of 1])
    with R'(1,2) â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º obtain t where "t â‰¥ 0" "u âŠ• t âˆˆ R'" by auto
    with â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º â€¹R' âˆˆ â„›â€º â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º have "R' âˆˆ Succ â„› R" by (intro SuccI3)
    moreover have "(âˆ€ u âˆˆ R. âˆ€ t â‰¥ 0. (u âŠ• t) âˆ‰ R âŸ¶ (âˆƒ t' â‰¤ t. (u âŠ• t') âˆˆ R' âˆ§ 0 â‰¤ t'))"
      using R'(1) unfolding cval_add_def
      apply clarsimp
      subgoal for u t
        by (cases "t = 0") auto
      done
    ultimately have *: "?succ R'" using neq by auto
    have "succ â„› R = R'" unfolding succ_def
    proof (simp add: â€¹Â¬ is_upper_right Râ€º, intro the_equality, rule *, goal_cases)
      case prems: (1 R'')
      from prems obtain t' u' where R'':
        "R'' âˆˆ â„›" "R'' â‰  R" "t' â‰¥ 0" "R'' = [u' âŠ• t']â‡©â„›" "u' âˆˆ R"
      using R'(1) by fastforce
      from this(1) obtain I r where R''2:
        "R'' = region X I r" "valid_region X k I r"
        by (auto simp: â„›_def)
      from R'' have "u' âŠ• t' âˆ‰ R" using assms region_unique_spec by blast
      with * â€¹t' â‰¥ 0â€º â€¹u' âˆˆ Râ€º obtain t'' where t'': "t'' â‰¤ t'" "u' âŠ• t'' âˆˆ R'" "t'' â‰¥ 0" by auto
      from this(2) neq have "u' âŠ• t'' âˆ‰ R" using R'(2) assms region_unique_spec by auto
      with t'' prems â€¹u' âˆˆ Râ€º obtain t''' where t''':
        "t''' â‰¤ t''" "u' âŠ• t''' âˆˆ R''" "t''' â‰¥ 0"
      by auto
      with region_continuous[OF R''2(2) _ _ t'''(2)[unfolded R''2(1)], of "t'' - t'''" "t' - t'''"]
           t'' R'' regions_closed'_spec[OF â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º R''(5,3)]
      have "u' âŠ• t'' âˆˆ R''" by (auto simp: R''2 cval_add_def)
      with t''(2) show ?case using R''(1) R'(2) region_unique_spec by blast
    qed
    with R' * show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case intv
    then have *: "âˆ€xâˆˆX. Â¬ Regions.isConst (I x)" by auto
    let ?Xâ‡©0 = "{x âˆˆ X. isIntv (I x)}"
    let ?M = "{x âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0. âˆ€yâˆˆ?Xâ‡©0. (x, y) âˆˆ r âŸ¶ (y, x) âˆˆ r}"
    from intv obtain x c where x: "x âˆˆ X" "Â¬ isGreater (I x)" and c: "I x = Intv c" by auto
    with â€¹x âˆˆ Xâ€º have "?Xâ‡©0 â‰  {}" by auto
    have "?Xâ‡©0 = {x âˆˆ X. âˆƒd. I x = Intv d}" by auto
    with R(2) have r: "total_on ?Xâ‡©0 r" "trans r" by auto
    from total_finite_trans_max[OF â€¹?Xâ‡©0 â‰  {}â€º _ this] finite
    obtain x' where x': "x' âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0" "âˆ€ y âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0. x' â‰  y âŸ¶ (y, x') âˆˆ r" by fastforce
    from this(2) have "âˆ€yâˆˆ?Xâ‡©0. (x', y) âˆˆ r âŸ¶ (y, x') âˆˆ r" by auto
    with x'(1) have **: "?M â‰  {}" by fastforce
    with upper_right_eq[OF finite R(2)] have "Â¬ is_upper_right R" by (auto simp: R(1))
    from closest_prestable_2(1,2)[OF * finite R(2) **] closest_valid_2[OF * finite R(2) **] R(1)
    obtain R' where R':
      "(âˆ€ u âˆˆ R. âˆ€ t â‰¥ 0. (u âŠ• t) âˆ‰ R âŸ¶ (âˆƒ t' â‰¤ t. (u âŠ• t') âˆˆ R' âˆ§ 0 â‰¤ t'))" "R' âˆˆ â„›"
      "âˆ€ u âˆˆ R'. âˆ€ tâ‰¥0. (u âŠ• t) âˆ‰ R"
    unfolding â„›_def by auto
    with region_not_empty[OF finite] obtain u' where "u' âˆˆ R'" unfolding â„›_def by blast
    with R'(3) have neq: "R' â‰  R" by (fastforce simp: cval_add_def)
    from bounded_region[OF finite R(2), folded R(1), OF â€¹Â¬ is_upper_right Râ€º u] have
      "u âŠ• (1 :: t) âˆ‰ R" "(1 :: t) â‰¥ 0"
    by auto
    with R'(1) u obtain t' where "t' â‰¤ (1 :: t)" "(u âŠ• t') âˆˆ R'" "0 â‰¤ t'" by fastforce
    with â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º â€¹R' âˆˆ â„›â€º â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º have "R' âˆˆ Succ â„› R" by (intro SuccI3)
    with R'(1) neq have *: "?succ R'" by auto
    have "succ â„› R = R'" unfolding succ_def
    proof (simp add: â€¹Â¬ is_upper_right Râ€º, intro the_equality, rule *, goal_cases)
      case prems: (1 R'')
      from prems obtain t' u' where R'':
        "R'' âˆˆ â„›" "R'' â‰  R" "t' â‰¥ 0" "R'' = [u' âŠ• t']â‡©â„›" "u' âˆˆ R"
      using R'(1) by fastforce
      from this(1) obtain I r where R''2:
        "R'' = region X I r" "valid_region X k I r"
      by (auto simp: â„›_def)
      from R'' have "u' âŠ• t' âˆ‰ R" using assms region_unique_spec by blast
      with * â€¹t' â‰¥ 0â€º â€¹u' âˆˆ Râ€º obtain t'' where t'': "t'' â‰¤ t'" "u' âŠ• t'' âˆˆ R'" "t'' â‰¥ 0" by auto
      from this(2) neq have "u' âŠ• t'' âˆ‰ R" using R'(2) assms region_unique_spec by auto
      with t'' prems â€¹u' âˆˆ Râ€º obtain t''' where t''':
        "t''' â‰¤ t''" "u' âŠ• t''' âˆˆ R''" "t''' â‰¥ 0"
      by auto
      with region_continuous[OF R''2(2) _ _ t'''(2)[unfolded R''2(1)], of "t'' - t'''" "t' - t'''"]
           t'' R'' regions_closed'_spec[OF â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º R''(5,3)]
      have "u' âŠ• t'' âˆˆ R''" by (auto simp: cval_add_def R''2)
      with t''(2) show ?case using R''(1) R'(2) region_unique_spec by blast
    qed
    with R' * show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case upper_right
    with upper_right_eq[OF finite R(2)] have "succ â„› R = R" by (auto simp: R succ_def)
    with â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º u show ?thesis by (fastforce simp: cval_add_def intro: SuccI3)
  qed
  then show ?G1 ?G2 ?G3 by auto
qed
      
lemma region_set'_closed:
  fixes d :: nat
  assumes "R âˆˆ â„›" "d â‰¥ 0" "âˆ€xâˆˆset r. d â‰¤ k x" "set r âŠ† X"
  shows "region_set' R r d âˆˆ â„›"
proof -
  from region_not_empty[OF finite] assms(1) obtain u where "u âˆˆ R" using â„›_def by blast
  from region_set'_id[OF _ _  finite, of _ k, folded â„›_def] assms this show ?thesis by fastforce
qed

(* XXX Move *)
lemma clock_set_cong[simp]:
  assumes "âˆ€ c âˆˆ set r. u c = d"
  shows "[r â†’ d]u = u"
proof standard
  fix c
  from assms show "([r â†’ d]u) c = u c" by (cases "c âˆˆ set r"; auto)
qed

lemma region_reset_not_Succ:
  (* XXX Declare globally? *)
  notes regions_closed'_spec[intro]
  assumes "R âˆˆ â„›" "set r âŠ† X"
  shows "region_set' R r 0 = R âˆ¨ region_set' R r 0 âˆ‰ Succ â„› R" (is "?R = R âˆ¨ _")
proof -
  from assms finite obtain u where "u âˆˆ R" by (meson Succ.cases succ_ex(2))
  with â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º have "u âˆˆ V" "[u]â‡©â„› = R" by (auto simp: region_unique_spec dest: region_V) 
  with region_set'_id[OF â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º[unfolded â„›_def] â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º finite] assms(2) have
    "?R = [[râ†’0]u]â‡©â„›"
  by (force simp: â„›_def)
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "âˆ€ x âˆˆ set r. u x = 0")
    case True
    then have "[râ†’0]u = u" by simp
    with â€¹?R = _â€º â€¹_ = Râ€º have "?R = R" by (force simp: â„›_def)
    then show ?thesis ..
  next
    case False
    then obtain x where x: "x âˆˆ set r" "u x â‰  0" by auto
    { assume "?R âˆˆ Succ â„› R"
      with â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º obtain t where
        "t â‰¥ 0" "[u âŠ• t]â‡©â„› = ?R" "?R âˆˆ â„›"
      by (meson Succ.cases set_of_regions_spec)
      with â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º assms(1) have "u âŠ• t âˆˆ ?R" by blast
      moreover from â€¹?R = _â€º â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º have "[râ†’0]u âˆˆ ?R" by (fastforce simp: region_set'_def)
      moreover from x â€¹t â‰¥ 0â€º â€¹u âˆˆ Vâ€º assms have "(u âŠ• t) x > 0" by (force simp: cval_add_def V_def)
      moreover from x have "([râ†’0]u) x = 0" by auto
      ultimately have False using â€¹?R âˆˆ â„›â€º x(1) by (fastforce simp: region_set'_def)
    }
    then show ?thesis by auto
  qed
qed

end (* Alpha Closure global *)

subsection â€¹Justifying Timed Until vs âˆ—â€¹suntilâ€ºâ€º

(* XXX Move *)
lemma guard_continuous:
  assumes "u âŠ¢ g" "u âŠ• t âŠ¢ g" "0 â‰¤ (t'::'t::time)" "t' â‰¤ t"
  shows "u âŠ• t' âŠ¢ g"
  using assms
  by (induction g;
      auto 4 3
        simp: cval_add_def order_le_less_subst2 order_subst2 add_increasing2
        intro: less_le_trans
     )

(* XXX Move *)
(*
lemma guard_continuous:
  assumes "u âŠ¢ g" "u âŠ• t âŠ¢ g" "0 â‰¤ t'" "t' â‰¤ t"
  shows "u âŠ• t' âŠ¢ g"
  using assms by (auto 4 4 intro: atomic_guard_continuous simp: list_all_iff)
*)

section â€¹Definition and Semanticsâ€º

subsection â€¹Syntactic Definitionâ€º

text â€¹
  We do not include:
  â–ª a labelling function, as we will assume that atomic propositions are simply sets of states
  â–ª a fixed set of locations or clocks, as we will implicitly derive it from the set of transitions
  â–ª start or end locations, as we will primarily study reachability
â€º

type_synonym
  ('c, 't, 's) transition = "'s * ('c, 't) cconstraint * ('c set * 's) pmf"

type_synonym
  ('c, 't, 's) pta = "('c, 't, 's) transition set * ('c, 't, 's) invassn"

definition
  edges :: "('c, 't, 's) transition â‡’ ('s * ('c, 't) cconstraint * ('c set * 's) pmf * 'c set * 's) set"
where
  "edges â‰¡ Î» (l, g, p). {(l, g, p, X, l') | X l'. (X, l') âˆˆ set_pmf p}"

definition
  "Edges A â‰¡ â‹ƒ {edges t | t. t âˆˆ fst A}"

definition
  trans_of :: "('c, 't, 's) pta â‡’ ('c, 't, 's) transition set"
where
  "trans_of â‰¡ fst"

definition
  inv_of  :: "('c, 'time, 's) pta â‡’ ('c, 'time, 's) invassn"
where
  "inv_of â‰¡ snd"

no_notation transition ("_ âŠ¢ _ âŸ¶â‡—_,_,_â‡– _" [61,61,61,61,61,61] 61)

abbreviation transition ::
  "('c, 'time, 's) pta â‡’ 's â‡’ ('c, 'time) cconstraint â‡’ ('c set * 's) pmf â‡’ 'c set â‡’ 's â‡’ bool"
("_ âŠ¢ _ âŸ¶â‡—_,_,_â‡– _" [61,61,61,61,61,61] 61) where
  "(A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,p,Xâ‡– l') â‰¡ (l, g, p, X, l') âˆˆ Edges A"

definition
  locations  :: "('c, 't, 's) pta â‡’ 's set"
where
  "locations A â‰¡ (fst ` Edges A) âˆª ((snd o snd o snd o snd) ` Edges A)"


subsubsection â€¹Collecting Information About Clocksâ€º

(* XXX Remove sort constraints *)

definition collect_clkt :: "('c, 't::time, 's) transition set â‡’ ('c *'t) set"
where
  "collect_clkt S = â‹ƒ {collect_clock_pairs (fst (snd t)) | t . t âˆˆ S}"

definition collect_clki :: "('c, 't :: time, 's) invassn â‡’ ('c *'t) set"
where
  "collect_clki I = â‹ƒ {collect_clock_pairs (I x) | x. True}"

definition clkp_set :: "('c, 't :: time, 's) pta â‡’ ('c * 't) set"
where
  "clkp_set A = collect_clki (inv_of A) âˆª collect_clkt (trans_of A)"

definition collect_clkvt :: "('c, 't :: time, 's) pta â‡’ 'c set"
where
  "collect_clkvt A = â‹ƒ ((fst o snd o snd o snd) ` Edges A)"

abbreviation clocks where "clocks A â‰¡ fst ` clkp_set A âˆª collect_clkvt A"

definition valid_abstraction
where
  "valid_abstraction A X k â‰¡
  (âˆ€(x,m) âˆˆ clkp_set A. m â‰¤ k x âˆ§ x âˆˆ X âˆ§ m âˆˆ â„•) âˆ§ collect_clkvt A âŠ† X âˆ§ finite X"

lemma valid_abstractionD[dest]:
  assumes "valid_abstraction A X k"
  shows "(âˆ€(x,m) âˆˆ clkp_set A. m â‰¤ k x âˆ§ x âˆˆ X âˆ§ m âˆˆ â„•)" "collect_clkvt A âŠ† X" "finite X"
using assms unfolding valid_abstraction_def by auto

lemma valid_abstractionI[intro]:
  assumes "(âˆ€(x,m) âˆˆ clkp_set A. m â‰¤ k x âˆ§ x âˆˆ X âˆ§ m âˆˆ â„•)" "collect_clkvt A âŠ† X" "finite X"
  shows "valid_abstraction A X k"
using assms unfolding valid_abstraction_def by auto

subsection â€¹Operational Semantics as an MDPâ€º

abbreviation (input) clock_set_set :: "'c set â‡’ 't::time â‡’ ('c,'t) cval â‡’ ('c,'t) cval"
("[_:=_]_" [65,65,65] 65)
where
  "[X:=t]u â‰¡ clock_set (SOME r. set r = X) t u"

term region_set'

abbreviation region_set_set :: "'c set â‡’ 't::time â‡’ ('c,'t) zone â‡’ ('c,'t) zone"
("[_::=_]_" [65,65,65] 65)
where
  "[X::=t]R â‰¡ region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) t"

no_notation zone_set ("_â‡˜_ â†’ 0â‡™" [71] 71)

abbreviation zone_set_set :: "('c, 't::time) zone â‡’ 'c set â‡’ ('c, 't) zone"
("_â‡˜_ â†’ 0â‡™" [71] 71)
where
  "Zâ‡˜X â†’ 0â‡™ â‰¡ zone_set Z (SOME r. set r = X)"

abbreviation (input) ccval ("â¦ƒ_â¦„" [100]) where "ccval cc â‰¡ {v. v âŠ¢ cc}"

locale Probabilistic_Timed_Automaton =
  fixes A :: "('c, 't :: time, 's) pta"
  assumes admissible_targets:
    "(l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A âŸ¹ (X, l') âˆˆ Î¼ âŸ¹ â¦ƒgâ¦„â‡˜X â†’ 0â‡™ âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A l'â¦„"
    "(l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A âŸ¹ (X, l') âˆˆ Î¼ âŸ¹ X âŠ† clocks A"
  â€• â€¹Not necessarily what we want to haveâ€º
begin

subsection â€¹Syntactic Definitionâ€º text_raw â€¹ \label{sem:mdp} â€º

definition "L = locations A"

definition "ğ’³ = clocks A"

definition "S â‰¡ {(l, u) . l âˆˆ L âˆ§ (âˆ€ x âˆˆ ğ’³. u x â‰¥ 0) âˆ§ u âŠ¢ inv_of A l}"

inductive_set
  K :: "('s * ('c, 't) cval) â‡’ ('s * ('c, 't) cval) pmf set" for st :: "('s * ('c, 't) cval)"
where
  â€• â€¹Passage of timeâ€º delay:
  "st âˆˆ S âŸ¹ st = (l, u) âŸ¹ t â‰¥ 0 âŸ¹ u âŠ• t âŠ¢ inv_of A l âŸ¹ return_pmf (l, u âŠ• t) âˆˆ K st" |
  â€• â€¹Discrete transitionsâ€º action:
  "st âˆˆ S âŸ¹ st = (l, u) âŸ¹ (l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A âŸ¹ u âŠ¢ g
  âŸ¹ map_pmf (Î» (X, l). (l, ([X := 0]u))) Î¼ âˆˆ K st" |
  â€• â€¹Self loops -- Note that this does not assume â€¹st âˆˆ Sâ€ºâ€º loop:
  "return_pmf st âˆˆ K st"

declare K.intros[intro]

sublocale MDP: Markov_Decision_Process K by (standard, auto)

end (* Probabilistic Timed Automaton *)

section â€¹Constructing the Corresponding Finite MDP on Regionsâ€º

locale Probabilistic_Timed_Automaton_Regions =
  Probabilistic_Timed_Automaton A + Regions ğ’³
  for A :: "('c, t, 's) pta" +
  â€• â€¹The following are necessary to obtain a â€¹finiteâ€º MDPâ€º
  assumes finite: "finite ğ’³" "finite L" "finite (trans_of A)"
  assumes not_trivial: "âˆƒ l âˆˆ L. âˆƒ u âˆˆ V. u âŠ¢ inv_of A l"
  assumes valid: "valid_abstraction A ğ’³ k"
begin

lemmas finite_â„› = finite_â„›[OF finite(1), of k, folded â„›_def]


subsection â€¹Syntactic Definitionâ€º text_raw â€¹ \label{sem:mdprg} â€º

definition "ğ’® â‰¡ {(l, R) . l âˆˆ L âˆ§ R âˆˆ â„› âˆ§ R âŠ† {u. u âŠ¢ inv_of A l}}"

(* XXX Move definition of V somewhere else *)
lemma S_alt_def: "S = {(l, u) . l âˆˆ L âˆ§ u âˆˆ V âˆ§ u âŠ¢ inv_of A l}" unfolding V_def S_def by auto

text â€¹
  Note how we relax the definition to allow more transitions in the first case.
  To obtain a more compact MDP the commented out version can be used an proved equivalent.
â€º

inductive_set
 ğ’¦ :: "('s * ('c, t) cval set) â‡’ ('s * ('c, t) cval set) pmf set" for st :: "('s * ('c, t) cval set)"
where
  (* 
  -- "Passage of time" delay:
  "st âˆˆ ğ’® âŸ¹ st = (l,R) âŸ¹ succ â„› R âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A lâ¦„ âŸ¹ return_pmf (l, succ â„› R) âˆˆ ğ’¦ st" |
  *)
   â€• â€¹Passage of timeâ€º delay:
  "st âˆˆ ğ’® âŸ¹ st = (l,R) âŸ¹ R' âˆˆ Succ â„› R âŸ¹ R' âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A lâ¦„ âŸ¹ return_pmf (l, R') âˆˆ ğ’¦ st" |
  â€• â€¹Discrete transitionsâ€º action:
  "st âˆˆ ğ’® âŸ¹ st = (l, R ) âŸ¹ (l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A âŸ¹ R âŠ† â¦ƒgâ¦„
  âŸ¹ map_pmf (Î» (X, l). (l, region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0)) Î¼ âˆˆ ğ’¦ st" |
  â€• â€¹Self loops -- Note that this does not assume â€¹st âˆˆ ğ’®â€ºâ€º loop:
  "return_pmf st âˆˆ ğ’¦ st"

lemmas [intro] = ğ’¦.intros


subsection â€¹Many Closure Propertiesâ€º

lemma transition_def:
  "(A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,Î¼,Xâ‡– l') = ((l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A âˆ§ (X, l') âˆˆ Î¼)"
  unfolding Edges_def edges_def trans_of_def by auto

lemma transitionI[intro]:
  "A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,Î¼,Xâ‡– l'" if "(l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A" "(X, l') âˆˆ Î¼"
  using that unfolding transition_def ..

lemma transitionD[dest]:
  "(l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A" "(X, l') âˆˆ Î¼" if "A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,Î¼,Xâ‡– l'"
  using that unfolding transition_def by auto

lemma bex_Edges:
  "(âˆƒ x âˆˆ Edges A. P x) = (âˆƒ l g Î¼ X l'. A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,Î¼,Xâ‡– l' âˆ§ P (l, g, Î¼, X, l'))"
  by fastforce

(* XXX Move *)
lemma L_trans[intro]:
  assumes "(l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A" "(X, l') âˆˆ Î¼"
  shows "l âˆˆ L" "l' âˆˆ L"
  using assms unfolding L_def locations_def by (auto simp: image_iff bex_Edges transition_def)

lemma transition_ğ’³:
  "X âŠ† ğ’³" if "A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,Î¼,Xâ‡– l'"
  using that unfolding ğ’³_def collect_clkvt_def clkp_set_def by auto

lemma admissible_targets_alt:
  "A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,Î¼,Xâ‡– l' âŸ¹ â¦ƒgâ¦„â‡˜X â†’ 0â‡™ âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A l'â¦„"
  "A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,Î¼,Xâ‡– l' âŸ¹ X âŠ† clocks A"
  by (intro admissible_targets; blast)+

lemma V_reset_closed[intro]:
  assumes "u âˆˆ V"
  shows "[r â†’ (d::nat)]u âˆˆ V"
using assms unfolding V_def
  apply safe
  subgoal for x
    by (cases "x âˆˆ set r"; auto)
  done

lemmas V_reset_closed'[intro] = V_reset_closed[of _ _ 0, simplified]

lemma regions_part_ex[intro]:
  assumes "u âˆˆ V"
  shows "u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›"
proof -
  from assms regions_partition[OF meta_eq_to_obj_eq[OF â„›_def]] have
    "âˆƒ!R. R âˆˆ â„› âˆ§ u âˆˆ R"
    unfolding V_def by auto
  then show "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" "u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›"
    using alpha_interp.region_unique_spec by auto
qed

lemma rep_â„›_ex[intro]:
  assumes "R âˆˆ â„›"
  shows "(SOME u. u âˆˆ R) âˆˆ R"
proof -
  from assms region_not_empty[OF finite(1)] have "âˆƒ u. u âˆˆ R" unfolding â„›_def by auto
  then show ?thesis ..
qed

lemma V_nn_closed[intro]:
  "u âˆˆ V âŸ¹ t â‰¥ 0 âŸ¹ u âŠ• t âˆˆ V"
unfolding V_def cval_add_def by auto

lemma K_S_closed[intro]:
  assumes "Î¼ âˆˆ K s" "s' âˆˆ Î¼" "s âˆˆ S"
  shows "s' âˆˆ S"
  using assms
  by (cases rule: K.cases, auto simp: S_alt_def dest: admissible_targets[unfolded zone_set_def])

lemma S_V[intro]:
  "(l, u) âˆˆ S âŸ¹ u âˆˆ V"
unfolding S_alt_def by auto

lemma L_V[intro]:
  "(l, u) âˆˆ S âŸ¹ l âˆˆ L"
unfolding S_def by auto

lemma ğ’®_V[intro]:
  "(l, R) âˆˆ ğ’® âŸ¹ R âˆˆ â„›"
unfolding ğ’®_def by auto

lemma admissible_targets':
  assumes "(l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A" "(X, l') âˆˆ Î¼" "R âŠ† â¦ƒgâ¦„"
  shows "region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0 âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A l'â¦„"
using admissible_targets(1)[OF assms(1,2)] assms(3) unfolding region_set'_def zone_set_def by auto


subsection â€¹The Region Graph is a Finite MDPâ€º

lemma ğ’®_finite:
  "finite ğ’®"
using finite finite_â„› unfolding ğ’®_def by auto

lemma ğ’¦_finite:
  "finite (ğ’¦ st)"
proof -
  let ?B1 = "{(R', l, R). st âˆˆ ğ’® âˆ§ st = (l, R) âˆ§ R' âˆˆ Succ â„› R âˆ§ R' âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A lâ¦„}"
  let ?S1 = "(Î»(R', l, R). return_pmf (l, R')) ` ?B1"
  let ?S1 = "{return_pmf (l, R') | R' l R. st âˆˆ ğ’® âˆ§ st = (l, R) âˆ§ R' âˆˆ Succ â„› R âˆ§ R' âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A lâ¦„}"
  let ?S2 = "{map_pmf (Î» (X, l). (l, region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0)) Î¼
             | R Î¼. âˆƒ l g. st âˆˆ ğ’® âˆ§ st = (l, R ) âˆ§ (l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A âˆ§ R âŠ† â¦ƒgâ¦„}"
  have "?B1 âŠ† {(R', l, R). R' âˆˆ â„› âˆ§ (l, R) âˆˆ ğ’® }" unfolding ğ’®_def by auto
  with ğ’®_finite finite_â„› have "finite ?B1" by - (rule finite_subset, auto)
  moreover have "?S1 = (Î»(R', l, R). return_pmf (l, R')) ` ?B1" by (auto simp: image_def)
  ultimately have *: "finite ?S1" by auto
  have "{Î¼. âˆƒl g. (l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ PTA.trans_of A} = ((Î» (l, g, Î¼). Î¼) ` PTA.trans_of A)" by force
  with finite(3) finite_â„› have "finite {(R, Î¼). âˆƒ l g. R âˆˆ â„› âˆ§ (l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A}" by auto
  moreover have
    "{(R, Î¼). âˆƒ l g. st âˆˆ ğ’® âˆ§ st = (l, R ) âˆ§ (l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A âˆ§ R âŠ† â¦ƒgâ¦„} âŠ† â€¦"
  unfolding ğ’®_def by fastforce
  ultimately have **:
    "finite {(R, Î¼). âˆƒ l g. st âˆˆ ğ’® âˆ§ st = (l, R ) âˆ§ (l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A âˆ§ R âŠ† â¦ƒgâ¦„}"
  unfolding ğ’®_def by (blast intro: finite_subset)
  then have "finite ?S2" unfolding ğ’®_def by auto
  have "ğ’¦ st = ?S1 âˆª ?S2 âˆª {return_pmf st}" by (safe, cases rule: ğ’¦.cases, auto)
  with * ** show ?thesis by auto
qed

(* XXX Obsolete in here, move to Regions *)
lemma â„›_not_empty:
  "â„› â‰  {}"
proof -
  let ?r = "{}"
  let ?I = "Î» c. Const 0"
  let ?R = "region ğ’³ ?I ?r"
  have "valid_region ğ’³ k ?I ?r"
  proof
    show "{} = {x âˆˆ ğ’³. âˆƒd. Const 0 = Intv d}" by auto
    show "refl_on {} {}" and "trans {}" and "total_on {} {}" unfolding trans_def by auto
    show "âˆ€x âˆˆ ğ’³. Regions.valid_intv (k x) (Const 0)" by auto
  qed
  then have "?R âˆˆ â„›" unfolding â„›_def by auto
  then show "â„› â‰  {}" by blast
qed

lemma ğ’®_not_empty:
  "ğ’® â‰  {}"
proof -
  from not_trivial obtain l u where st: "l âˆˆ L" "u âˆˆ V" "u âŠ¢ inv_of A l" by blast
  then obtain R where R: "R âˆˆ â„›" "u âˆˆ R" using â„›_V by auto
  from valid have
    "âˆ€(x, m)âˆˆcollect_clock_pairs (inv_of A l). m â‰¤ real (k x) âˆ§ x âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ m âˆˆ â„•"
  by (fastforce simp: clkp_set_def collect_clki_def)
  from ccompatible[OF this, folded â„›_def] R st(3) have
    "R âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A lâ¦„"
  unfolding ccompatible_def ccval_def by auto
  with st(1) R(1) show ?thesis unfolding ğ’®_def by auto
qed

lemma ğ’¦_ğ’®_closed:
  assumes "s âˆˆ ğ’®"
  shows "(â‹ƒDâˆˆğ’¦ s. set_pmf D) âŠ† ğ’®"
proof (safe, cases rule: ğ’¦.cases, blast, goal_cases)
  case (1 x a b l R)
  then show ?case unfolding ğ’®_def by (auto intro: alpha_interp.succ_ex(1))
next
  case (3 a b x)
  with â€¹s âˆˆ ğ’®â€º show ?case by auto
next
  case prems: (2 l' R' p l R g Î¼)
  then obtain X where *: "(X, l') âˆˆ set_pmf Î¼" "R' = region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0" by auto
  
  show ?case unfolding ğ’®_def
  proof safe
    from *(1) have "(l, g, Î¼, X, l') âˆˆ edges (l,g, Î¼)" unfolding edges_def by auto
    with prems(6) have "(l, g, Î¼, X, l') âˆˆ Edges A" unfolding Edges_def trans_of_def by auto
    then show "l' âˆˆ L" unfolding L_def locations_def by force

    show "u âŠ¢ inv_of A l'" if "u âˆˆ R'" for u
    using admissible_targets'[OF prems(6) *(1) prems(7)] *(2) that by auto    
    
    from admissible_targets(2)[OF prems(6) *(1)] have "X âŠ† ğ’³" unfolding ğ’³_def by auto
    with finite(1) have "finite X" by (blast intro: finite_subset)
    then obtain r where "set r = X" using finite_list by auto
    then have "set (SOME r. set r = X) = X" by (rule someI)
    with â€¹X âŠ† ğ’³â€º have "set (SOME r. set r = X) âŠ† ğ’³" by auto
    with alpha_interp.region_set'_closed[of R 0 "SOME r. set r = X"] prems(4,5) *(2)
    show "R' âˆˆ â„›" unfolding ğ’®_def ğ’³_def by auto
  qed
qed

sublocale R_G: Finite_Markov_Decision_Process ğ’¦ ğ’®
by (standard, auto simp: ğ’®_finite ğ’®_not_empty ğ’¦_finite ğ’¦_ğ’®_closed)

lemmas ğ’¦_ğ’®_closed'[intro] = R_G.set_pmf_closed


section â€¹Relating the MDPsâ€º

subsection â€¹Translating From K to â€¹ğ’¦â€ºâ€º

(* XXX Clean this for regular automata too *)
(* Assumption of valid too strong? i.e. do not need l âˆˆ L here *)
lemma ccompatible_inv:
  shows "ccompatible â„› (inv_of A l)"
proof -
  from valid have
    "âˆ€(x, m)âˆˆcollect_clock_pairs (inv_of A l). m â‰¤ real (k x) âˆ§ x âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ m âˆˆ â„•"
  unfolding valid_abstraction_def clkp_set_def collect_clki_def by auto
  with ccompatible[of _ k ğ’³, folded â„›_def] show ?thesis by auto
