qed

lemma ccompatible_guard:
  assumes "(l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A"
  shows "ccompatible â„› g"
proof -
  from assms valid have
    "âˆ€(x, m)âˆˆcollect_clock_pairs g. m â‰¤ real (k x) âˆ§ x âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ m âˆˆ â„•"
  unfolding valid_abstraction_def clkp_set_def collect_clkt_def trans_of_def by fastforce
  with assms ccompatible[of _ k ğ’³, folded â„›_def] show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemmas ccompatible_def = ccompatible_def[unfolded ccval_def]

lemma region_set'_eq:
  fixes X :: "'c set"
  assumes "R âˆˆ â„›" "u âˆˆ R"
      and "A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,Î¼,Xâ‡– l'"
  shows
    "[[X:=0]u]â‡©â„› = region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0" "[[X:=0]u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" "[X:=0]u âˆˆ [[X:=0]u]â‡©â„›"
proof -
  let ?r = "(SOME r. set r = X)"
  from admissible_targets_alt[OF assms(3)] ğ’³_def finite have "finite X"
    by (auto intro: finite_subset)
  then obtain r where "set r = X" using finite_list by blast
  then have "set ?r = X" by (intro someI)
  with valid assms(3) have "set ?r âŠ† ğ’³"
    by (simp add: transition_ğ’³)
  from region_set'_id[of _ ğ’³ k, folded â„›_def, OF assms(1,2) finite(1) _ _ this]
  show
    "[[X:=0]u]â‡©â„› = region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0" "[[X:=0]u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" "[X:=0]u âˆˆ [[X:=0]u]â‡©â„›"
  by force+
qed

lemma regions_part_ex_reset:
  assumes "u âˆˆ V"
  shows  "[r â†’ (d::nat)]u âˆˆ [[r â†’ d]u]â‡©â„›" "[[r â†’ d]u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›"
using assms by auto

lemma reset_sets_all_equiv:
  assumes "u âˆˆ V" "u' âˆˆ [[r â†’ (d :: nat)]u]â‡©â„›" "x âˆˆ set r" "set r âŠ† ğ’³" "d â‰¤ k x"
  shows "u' x = d"
proof -
  from assms(1) have u: "[r â†’ d]u âˆˆ [[r â†’ d]u]â‡©â„›" "[[r â†’ d]u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" by auto
  then obtain I Ï where I: "[[r â†’ d]u]â‡©â„› = region ğ’³ I Ï" "valid_region ğ’³ k I Ï"
    by (auto simp: â„›_def)
  with u(1) assms(3-) have "intv_elem x ([r â†’ d]u) (I x)" "valid_intv (k x) (I x)" by fastforce+
  moreover from assms have "([r â†’ d]u) x = d" by simp
  ultimately have "I x = Const d" using assms(5) by (cases "I x") auto
  moreover from I assms(2-) have "intv_elem x u' (I x)" by fastforce
  ultimately show "u' x = d" by auto
qed

lemma reset_eq:
  assumes "u âˆˆ V" "([[r â†’ 0]u]â‡©â„›) = ([[r' â†’ 0]u]â‡©â„›)" "set r âŠ† ğ’³" "set r' âŠ† ğ’³"
  shows "[r â†’ 0]u = [r' â†’ 0]u" using assms 
proof -
  have *: "u' x = 0" if "u' âˆˆ [[r â†’ 0]u]â‡©â„›" "x âˆˆ set r" for u' x
  using reset_sets_all_equiv[of u u' r 0 x] that assms by auto
  have "u' x = 0" if "u' âˆˆ [[r' â†’ 0]u]â‡©â„›" "x âˆˆ set r'" for u' x 
  using reset_sets_all_equiv[of u u' r' 0 x] that assms by auto
  from regions_part_ex_reset[OF assms(1), of _ 0] assms(2) have **:
    "([r' â†’ 0]u) âˆˆ [[r â†’ 0]u]â‡©â„›" "([r â†’ 0]u) âˆˆ [[r â†’ 0]u]â‡©â„›" "[[r â†’ 0]u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›"
  by auto
  have "(([r â†’ 0]u) x) = (([r' â†’ 0]u) x)" for x
  proof (cases "x âˆˆ set r")
    case True
    then have "([r â†’ 0]u) x = 0" by simp
    moreover from * ** True have "([r' â†’ 0]u) x = 0" by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis ..
  next
    case False
    then have id: "([râ†’0]u) x = u x" by simp
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "x âˆˆ set r'")
      case True
      then have reset: "([r' â†’ 0]u) x = 0" by simp
      show ?thesis
      proof (cases "x âˆˆ ğ’³")
        case True
        from **(3) obtain I Ï where
          "([([r â†’ 0]u)]â‡©â„›) = Regions.region ğ’³ I Ï" "Regions.valid_region ğ’³ k I Ï"
        by (auto simp: â„›_def)
        with ** â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have ***:
          "intv_elem x ([r' â†’ 0]u) (I x)" "intv_elem x ([r â†’ 0]u) (I x)"
        by auto
        with reset have "I x = Const 0" by (cases "I x", auto)
        with ***(2) have "([r â†’ 0]u) x = 0" by auto
        with reset show ?thesis by auto
      next
        case False
        with assms(3-) have "x âˆ‰ set r" "x âˆ‰ set r'" by auto
        then show ?thesis by simp
      qed
    next
      case False
      then have reset: "([r' â†’ 0]u) x = u x" by simp
      with id show ?thesis by simp
    qed
  qed
  then show ?thesis ..
qed

lemma admissible_targets_clocks:
  assumes "(l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A" "(X, l') âˆˆ Î¼"
  shows "X âŠ† ğ’³" "set (SOME r. set r = X) âŠ† ğ’³"
proof -
  from admissible_targets(2)[OF assms] finite have
    "finite X" "X âŠ† ğ’³"
  by (auto intro: finite_subset simp: ğ’³_def)
  then obtain r where "set r = X" using finite_list by blast
  with â€¹X âŠ† ğ’³â€º show "X âŠ† ğ’³" "set (SOME r. set r = X) âŠ† ğ’³"
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) someI_ex)+
qed

lemma
  "rel_pmf (Î» a b. f a = b) Î¼ (map_pmf f Î¼)"
by (subst pmf.rel_map(2)) (rule rel_pmf_reflI, auto)

lemma K_pmf_rel:
  defines "f â‰¡ Î» (l, u). (l, [u]â‡©â„›)"
  shows "rel_pmf (Î» (l, u) st. (l, [u]â‡©â„›) = st) Î¼ (map_pmf f Î¼)" unfolding f_def
by (subst pmf.rel_map(2)) (rule rel_pmf_reflI, auto)

lemma ğ’¦_pmf_rel:
  assumes A: "Î¼ âˆˆ ğ’¦ (l, R)"
  defines "f â‰¡ Î» (l, u). (l, SOME u. u âˆˆ R)"
  shows "rel_pmf (Î» (l, u) st. (l, SOME u. u âˆˆ R) = st) Î¼ (map_pmf f Î¼)" unfolding f_def
by (subst pmf.rel_map(2)) (rule rel_pmf_reflI, auto)

lemma K_elem_abs_inj:
  assumes A: "Î¼ âˆˆ K (l, u)"
  defines "f â‰¡ Î» (l, u). (l, [u]â‡©â„›)"
  shows "inj_on f Î¼"
proof -
  have "(l1, u1) = (l2, u2)"
    if id: "(l1, [u1]â‡©â„›) = (l2, [u2]â‡©â„›)" and elem: "(l1, u1) âˆˆ Î¼" "(l2, u2) âˆˆ Î¼" for l1 l2 u1 u2
  proof -
    from id have [simp]: "l2 = l1" by auto
    from A
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases, safe, goal_cases)
      case (4 _ _ Ï„ Î¼')
      from â€¹Î¼ = _â€º elem obtain X1 X2 where
        "u1 = [(SOME r. set r = X1)â†’0]u" "(X1, l1) âˆˆ Î¼'"
        "u2 = [(SOME r. set r = X2)â†’0]u" "(X2, l1) âˆˆ Î¼'"
      by auto
      with â€¹_ âˆˆ trans_of _â€º admissible_targets_clocks have
        "set (SOME r. set r = X1) âŠ† ğ’³" "set (SOME r. set r = X2) âŠ† ğ’³"
      by auto
      with id â€¹u1 = _â€º â€¹u2 = _â€º reset_eq[of u] â€¹_ âˆˆ Sâ€º show ?case by (auto simp: S_def V_def)
    qed (-, insert elem, simp)+
  qed
  then show ?thesis unfolding f_def inj_on_def by auto
qed

lemma K_elem_repr_inj:
  notes alpha_interp.valid_regions_distinct_spec[intro] (* XXX Declare somewhere else *)
  assumes A: "Î¼ âˆˆ ğ’¦ (l, R)"
  defines "f â‰¡ Î» (l, R). (l, SOME u. u âˆˆ R)"
  shows "inj_on f Î¼"
proof -
  have "(l1, R1) = (l2, R2)"
    if id: "(l1, SOME u. u âˆˆ R1) = (l2, SOME u. u âˆˆ R2)" and elem: "(l1, R1) âˆˆ Î¼" "(l2, R2) âˆˆ Î¼"
    for l1 l2 R1 R2
  proof -
    let ?r1 = "SOME u. u âˆˆ R1" and ?r2 = "SOME u. u âˆˆ R2"
    from id have [simp]: "l2 = l1" "?r2 = ?r1" by auto
    { fix g Î¼' x
      assume "(l, R) âˆˆ ğ’®" "(l, g, Î¼') âˆˆ PTA.trans_of A" "R âŠ† {v. v âŠ¢ g}"
         and "Î¼ = map_pmf (Î»(X, l). (l, region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0)) Î¼'"
      from â€¹Î¼ = _â€º elem obtain X1 X2 where
        "R1 = region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X1) 0" "(X1, l1) âˆˆ Î¼'"
        "R2 = region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X2) 0" "(X2, l1) âˆˆ Î¼'"
      by auto
      with â€¹_ âˆˆ trans_of _â€º admissible_targets_clocks have
        "set (SOME r. set r = X1) âŠ† ğ’³" "set (SOME r. set r = X2) âŠ† ğ’³"
      by auto
      with alpha_interp.region_set'_closed[of _ 0] â€¹R1 = _â€º â€¹R2 = _â€º â€¹_ âˆˆ ğ’®â€º have
        "R1 âˆˆ â„›" "R2 âˆˆ â„›"
      unfolding ğ’®_def by auto
      with region_not_empty[OF finite(1)] have
        "R1 â‰  {}" "R2 â‰  {}" "âˆƒu. u âˆˆ R1" "âˆƒu. u âˆˆ R2"
      by (auto simp: â„›_def)
      from someI_ex[OF this(3)] someI_ex[OF this(4)] have "?r1 âˆˆ R1" "?r1 âˆˆ R2" by simp+
      with â€¹R1 âˆˆ â„›â€º â€¹R2 âˆˆ â„›â€º have "R1 = R2" ..
    }
    from A elem this show ?thesis by (cases, auto)
  qed
  then show ?thesis unfolding f_def inj_on_def by auto
qed

lemma K_elem_pmf_map_abs:
  assumes A: "Î¼ âˆˆ K (l, u)" "(l', u') âˆˆ Î¼"
  defines "f â‰¡ Î» (l, u). (l, [u]â‡©â„›)"
  shows "pmf (map_pmf f Î¼) (f (l', u')) = pmf Î¼ (l', u')"
using A unfolding f_def by (blast intro: pmf_map_inj K_elem_abs_inj)

lemma K_elem_pmf_map_repr:
  assumes A: "Î¼ âˆˆ ğ’¦ (l, R)" "(l', R') âˆˆ Î¼"
  defines "f â‰¡ Î» (l, R). (l, SOME u. u âˆˆ R)"
  shows "pmf (map_pmf f Î¼) (f (l', R')) = pmf Î¼ (l', R')"
using A unfolding f_def by (blast intro: pmf_map_inj K_elem_repr_inj)



definition transp :: "('s * ('c, t) cval â‡’ bool) â‡’ 's * ('c, t) cval set â‡’ bool" where
  "transp Ï† â‰¡ Î» (l, R). âˆ€ u âˆˆ R. Ï† (l, u)"

subsection â€¹Translating Configurationsâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Statesâ€º

definition
  abss :: "'s * ('c, t) cval â‡’ 's * ('c, t) cval set"
where
  "abss â‰¡ Î» (l, u). if u âˆˆ V then (l, [u]â‡©â„›) else (l, -V)"

definition
  reps :: "'s * ('c, t) cval set â‡’ 's * ('c, t) cval"
where
  "reps â‰¡ Î» (l, R). if R âˆˆ â„› then (l, SOME u. u âˆˆ R) else (l, Î»_. -1)"

lemma ğ’®_reps_S[intro]:
  assumes "s âˆˆ ğ’®"
  shows "reps s âˆˆ S"
using assms â„›_V unfolding S_def ğ’®_def reps_def V_def by force

lemma S_abss_ğ’®[intro]:
  assumes "s âˆˆ S"
  shows "abss s âˆˆ ğ’®"
using assms ccompatible_inv unfolding ğ’®_def S_alt_def abss_def ccompatible_def by force

lemma ğ’®_abss_reps[simp]:
  "s âˆˆ ğ’® âŸ¹ abss (reps s) = s"
using â„›_V alpha_interp.region_unique_spec by (auto simp: S_def ğ’®_def reps_def abss_def; blast)

lemma map_pmf_abs_reps:
  assumes "s âˆˆ ğ’®" "Î¼ âˆˆ ğ’¦ s"
  shows "map_pmf abss (map_pmf reps Î¼) = Î¼"
proof -
  have "map_pmf abss (map_pmf reps Î¼) = map_pmf (abss o reps) Î¼" by (simp add: pmf.map_comp)
  also have "â€¦ = Î¼"
  proof (rule map_pmf_idI, safe, goal_cases)
    case prems: (1 l' R')
    with assms have "(l', R') âˆˆ ğ’®" "reps (l', R') âˆˆ S" by auto
    then show ?case by auto
  qed
  finally show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma abss_reps_id:
  notes R_G.cfg_onD_state[simp del]
  assumes "s' âˆˆ ğ’®" "s âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg)" "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on s'"
  shows "abss (reps s) = s"
proof -
  from assms have "s âˆˆ ğ’®" by auto
  then show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma abss_S[intro]:
  assumes "(l, u) âˆˆ S"
  shows "abss (l, u) = (l, [u]â‡©â„›)"
using assms unfolding abss_def by auto

lemma reps_ğ’®[intro]:
  assumes "(l, R) âˆˆ ğ’®"
  shows "reps (l, R) = (l, SOME u. u âˆˆ R)"
using assms unfolding reps_def by auto

lemma fst_abss:
  "fst (abss st) = fst st" for st
  by (cases st) (auto simp: abss_def)

lemma K_elem_abss_inj:
  assumes A: "Î¼ âˆˆ K (l, u)" "(l, u) âˆˆ S"
  shows "inj_on abss Î¼"
proof -
  from assms have "abss s' = (Î» (l, u). (l, [u]â‡©â„›)) s'" if "s' âˆˆ Î¼" for s'
  using that by (auto split: prod.split)
  from inj_on_cong[OF this] K_elem_abs_inj[OF A(1)] show ?thesis by force
qed

lemma ğ’¦_elem_reps_inj:
  assumes A: "Î¼ âˆˆ ğ’¦ (l, R)" "(l, R) âˆˆ ğ’®"
  shows "inj_on reps Î¼"
proof -
  from assms have "reps s' = (Î» (l, R). (l, SOME u. u âˆˆ R)) s'" if "s' âˆˆ Î¼" for s'
  using that by (auto split: prod.split)
  from inj_on_cong[OF this] K_elem_repr_inj[OF A(1)] show ?thesis by force
qed

lemma P_elem_pmf_map_abss:
  assumes A: "Î¼ âˆˆ K (l, u)" "(l, u) âˆˆ S" "s' âˆˆ Î¼"
  shows "pmf (map_pmf abss Î¼) (abss s') = pmf Î¼ s'"
using A by (blast intro: pmf_map_inj K_elem_abss_inj)

lemma ğ’¦_elem_pmf_map_reps:
  assumes A: "Î¼ âˆˆ ğ’¦ (l, R)" "(l, R) âˆˆ ğ’®" "(l', R') âˆˆ Î¼"
  shows "pmf (map_pmf reps Î¼) (reps (l', R')) = pmf Î¼ (l', R')"
using A by (blast intro: pmf_map_inj ğ’¦_elem_reps_inj)

text â€¹We need that â€¹ğ’³â€º is non-trivial hereâ€º
lemma not_ğ’®_reps:
  "(l, R) âˆ‰ ğ’® âŸ¹ reps (l, R) âˆ‰ S"
proof -
  assume "(l, R) âˆ‰ ğ’®"
  let ?u = "SOME u. u âˆˆ R"
  have "Â¬ ?u âŠ¢ inv_of A l" if "R âˆˆ â„›" "l âˆˆ L"
  proof -
    (* XXX Refactor -- doing that kind of proof at other places too *)
    from region_not_empty[OF finite(1)] â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º have "âˆƒu. u âˆˆ R" by (auto simp: â„›_def)
    from someI_ex[OF this] have "?u âˆˆ R" .
    moreover from â€¹(l, R) âˆ‰ ğ’®â€º that have "Â¬ R âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A lâ¦„" by (auto simp: ğ’®_def)
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using ccompatible_inv[of l] â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º unfolding ccompatible_def by fastforce
  qed
  with non_empty â€¹(l, R) âˆ‰ ğ’®â€º show ?thesis unfolding ğ’®_def S_def reps_def by auto
qed

(* XXX Move up *)
lemma neq_V_not_region:
  "-V âˆ‰ â„›"
using â„›_V rep_â„›_ex by auto

lemma ğ’®_abss_S:
  "abss s âˆˆ ğ’® âŸ¹ s âˆˆ S"
  unfolding abss_def ğ’®_def S_def
  apply safe
  subgoal for _ _ _ u
    by (cases "u âˆˆ V") auto
  subgoal for _ _ _ u
    using neq_V_not_region by (cases "u âˆˆ V", (auto simp: V_def; fail), auto)
  subgoal for l' y l u
    using neq_V_not_region by (cases "u âˆˆ V"; auto dest: regions_part_ex)
  done

lemma S_pred_stream_abss_ğ’®:
  "pred_stream (Î» s. s âˆˆ S) xs âŸ· pred_stream (Î» s. s âˆˆ ğ’®) (smap abss xs)"
using S_abss_ğ’® ğ’®_abss_S by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)


sublocale MDP: Markov_Decision_Process_Invariant K S by (standard, auto)

abbreviation (input) "valid_cfg â‰¡ MDP.valid_cfg"

lemma K_closed:
  "s âˆˆ S âŸ¹ (â‹ƒDâˆˆK s. set_pmf D) âŠ† S" 
  by auto


subsubsection â€¹Intermezzoâ€º

(* XXX Correct binding strength *)
abbreviation timed_bisim (infixr "~" 60) where
  "s ~ s' â‰¡ abss s = abss s'"

lemma bisim_loc_id[intro]:
  "(l, u) ~ (l', u') âŸ¹ l = l'"
unfolding abss_def by (cases "u âˆˆ V"; cases "u' âˆˆ V"; simp)

lemma bisim_val_id[intro]:
  "[u]â‡©â„› = [u']â‡©â„›" if "u âˆˆ V" "(l, u) ~ (l', u')"
proof -
  have "(l', - V) â‰  (l, [u]â‡©â„›)"
    using that by blast
  with that have "u' âˆˆ V"
    by (force simp: abss_def)
  with that show ?thesis
    by (simp add: abss_def)
qed

lemma bisim_symmetric:
  "(l, u) ~ (l', u') = (l', u') ~ (l, u)"
by (rule eq_commute)

lemma bisim_val_id2[intro]:
  "u' âˆˆ V âŸ¹ (l, u) ~ (l', u') âŸ¹ [u]â‡©â„› = [u']â‡©â„›"
 apply (subst (asm) eq_commute)
 apply (subst eq_commute)
 apply (rule bisim_val_id)
by auto

lemma K_bisim_unique:
  assumes "s âˆˆ S" "Î¼ âˆˆ K s" "x âˆˆ Î¼" "x' âˆˆ Î¼" "x ~ x'"
  shows "x = x'"
using assms(2,1,3-)
proof (cases rule: K.cases)
  case prems: (action l u Ï„ Î¼')
  with assms obtain l1 l2 X1 X2 where A:
    "(X1, l1) âˆˆ set_pmf Î¼'" "(X2, l2) âˆˆ set_pmf Î¼'"
    "x = (l1, [X1:=0]u)" "x' = (l2, [X2:=0]u)"
  by auto
  from â€¹x ~ x'â€º A â€¹s âˆˆ Sâ€º â€¹s = (l, u)â€º have "[[X1:=0]u]â‡©â„› = [[X2:=0]u]â‡©â„›"
    using bisim_val_id[OF S_V] K_S_closed assms(2-4) by (auto intro!: bisim_val_id[OF S_V])
  then have "[X1:=0]u = [X2:=0]u"
    using A admissible_targets_clocks(2)[OF prems(4)] prems(2,3) by - (rule reset_eq, force)
  with A â€¹x ~ x'â€º show ?thesis by auto
next
  case delay
  with assms(3-) show ?thesis by auto
next
  case loop
  with assms(3-) show ?thesis by auto
qed

subsubsection â€¹Predicatesâ€º

definition absp where
  "absp Ï† â‰¡ Ï† o reps"

definition repp where
  "repp Ï† â‰¡ Ï† o absp"


subsubsection â€¹Distributionsâ€º

definition
  abst :: "('s * ('c, t) cval) pmf â‡’ ('s * ('c, t) cval set) pmf"
where
  "abst = map_pmf abss"

lemma abss_ğ’®D:
  assumes "abss s âˆˆ ğ’®"
  obtains l u where "s = (l, u)" "u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›"
proof -
  obtain l u where "s = (l, u)" by force
  moreover from ğ’®_abss_S[OF assms] have "s âˆˆ S" .
  ultimately have "abss s = (l, [u]â‡©â„›)" "u âˆˆ V" "u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" by auto
  with â€¹s = _â€º show ?thesis by (auto intro: that)
qed

lemma abss_ğ’®D':
  assumes "abss s âˆˆ ğ’®" "abss s = (l, R)"
  obtains u where "s = (l, u)" "u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" "R = [u]â‡©â„›"
proof -
  from abss_ğ’®D[OF assms(1)] obtain l' u where u:
    "s = (l', u)" "u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›"
  by blast+
  with â„›_V have "u âˆˆ V" by auto
  with â€¹s = _â€º assms(2) have "l' = l" "R = [u]â‡©â„›" unfolding abss_def by auto
  with u show ?thesis by (auto intro: that)
qed

(*
definition
  rept :: "'s * ('c, t) cval â‡’ ('s * ('c, t) cval set) pmf â‡’ ('s * ('c, t) cval) pmf"
where
  "rept s Î¼_abs â‰¡ let (l, u) = s in
    if Î¼_abs = return_pmf (abss s)
    then if (âˆƒ c âˆˆ ğ’³. âˆƒ d. u c = real d)
         then return_pmf s
         else return_pmf (l, u âŠ• 0.5)
    else SOME Î¼. Î¼ âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst Î¼ = Î¼_abs"
*)

definition "infR R â‰¡ Î» c. of_int âŒŠ(SOME u. u âˆˆ R) câŒ‹"

term "let a = 3 in b"

(* definition "shiftedR R â‰¡ let u = (SOME u. u âˆˆ R) in (u âŠ• max 0 (0.1 - Max {frac (u c) | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³}))" *)
(*
definition "delayedR R u â‰¡
  u âŠ• (
    let (I, r) = (SOME x. âˆƒ I r. x = (I, r) âˆ§ valid_region ğ’³ k I r âˆ§ R = region ğ’³ I r);
        m = Min {of_nat (intv_const (I c)) + 1 - u c | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ isConst (I c)}
    in if m â‰¥ 1 then SOME t. u âŠ• t âˆˆ R else m / 2
  )"
*)

(*
definition "delayedR R u â‰¡
  u âŠ• (
    let (I, r) = (SOME x. âˆƒ I r. x = (I, r) âˆ§ valid_region ğ’³ k I r âˆ§ R = region ğ’³ I r);
        m = 1 - Max ({frac (u c) | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ isIntv (I c) âˆ§ intv_const (I c) = 0} âˆª {0})
    in if m â‰¥ 1 then SOME t. u âŠ• t âˆˆ R else m / 2
  )"
*)

definition "delayedR R u â‰¡
  u âŠ• (
    let I = (SOME I. âˆƒ r. valid_region ğ’³ k I r âˆ§ R = region ğ’³ I r);
        m = 1 - Max ({frac (u c) | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ isIntv (I c)} âˆª {0})
    in SOME t. u âŠ• t âˆˆ R âˆ§ t â‰¥ m / 2
  )"


(* XXX Move, generated by sledgehammer *)
lemma delayedR_correct_aux_aux:
  fixes c :: nat
  fixes a b :: real
  assumes "c < a" "a < Suc c" "b â‰¥ 0" "a + b < Suc c"
  shows "frac (a + b) = frac a + b"
(* Working alternative:
by (smt One_nat_def add.right_neutral add_Suc_right assms nat_intv_frac_decomp)
*)
proof -
  have f1: "a + b < real (c + 1)"
    using assms(4) by auto
  have f2: "â‹€r ra. (r::real) + (- r + ra) = ra"
    by linarith
  have f3: "â‹€r. (r::real) = - (- r)"
    by linarith
  have f4: "â‹€r ra. - (r::real) + (ra + r) = ra"
    by linarith
  then have f5: "â‹€r n. r + - frac r = real n âˆ¨ Â¬ r < real (n + 1) âˆ¨ Â¬ real n < r"
    using f2 by (metis nat_intv_frac_decomp)
  then have "frac a + real c = a"
    using f4 f3 by (metis One_nat_def add.right_neutral add_Suc_right assms(1) assms(2))
  then show ?thesis
    using f5 f1 assms(1) assms(3) by fastforce
qed

lemma delayedR_correct_aux:
  fixes I r
  defines "R â‰¡ region ğ’³ I r"
  assumes "u âˆˆ R" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r" "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. Â¬ isConst (I c)"
          "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. isIntv (I c) âŸ¶ (u âŠ• t) c < intv_const (I c) + 1"
          "t â‰¥ 0"
  shows "u âŠ• t âˆˆ R" unfolding R_def
proof
  from assms have "R âˆˆ â„›" unfolding â„›_def by auto
  with â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º â„›_V have "u âˆˆ V" by auto
  with â€¹t â‰¥ 0â€º show "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’³. 0 â‰¤ (u âŠ• t) x" unfolding V_def by (auto simp: cval_add_def)
  have "intv_elem x (u âŠ• t) (I x)" if "x âˆˆ ğ’³" for x
  proof (cases "I x")
    case Const
    with assms â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case (Intv c)
    with assms â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º show ?thesis by (simp add: cval_add_def) (rule; force)
  next
    case (Greater c)
    with assms â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º show ?thesis by (fastforce simp add: cval_add_def)
  qed
  then show "âˆ€xâˆˆğ’³. intv_elem x (u âŠ• t) (I x)" ..

  let ?Xâ‡©0 = "{x âˆˆ ğ’³. âˆƒd. I x = Intv d}"
  show "?Xâ‡©0 = ?Xâ‡©0" by auto

  have "frac (u x + t) = frac (u x) + t" if "x âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0" for x
  proof -
    show ?thesis
      apply (rule delayedR_correct_aux_aux[where c = "intv_const (I x)"])
    using assms â€¹x âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0â€º by (force simp add: cval_add_def)+
  qed
  then have "frac (u x) â‰¤ frac (u y) âŸ· frac (u x + t) â‰¤ frac (u y + t)" if "x âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0" "y âˆˆ ?Xâ‡©0" for x y
  using that by auto
  with assms show
    "âˆ€xâˆˆ?Xâ‡©0. âˆ€yâˆˆ?Xâ‡©0. ((x, y) âˆˆ r) = (frac ((u âŠ• t) x) â‰¤ frac ((u âŠ• t) y))"
  unfolding cval_add_def by auto
qed

lemma delayedR_correct_aux':
  fixes I r
  defines "R â‰¡ region ğ’³ I r"
  assumes "u âŠ• t1 âˆˆ R" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r" "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. Â¬ isConst (I c)"
          "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. isIntv (I c) âŸ¶ (u âŠ• t2) c < intv_const (I c) + 1"
          "t1 â‰¤ t2"
  shows "u âŠ• t2 âˆˆ R"
proof -
  have "(u âŠ• t1) âŠ• (t2 - t1) âˆˆ R" unfolding R_def
    using assms by - (rule delayedR_correct_aux, auto simp: cval_add_def)
  then show "u âŠ• t2 âˆˆ R" by (simp add: cval_add_def)
qed


(* XXX Move to valid_regions_distinct *)
lemma valid_regions_intv_distinct:
  "valid_region X k I r âŸ¹ valid_region X k I' r' âŸ¹ u âˆˆ region X I r âŸ¹ u âˆˆ region X I' r'
  âŸ¹ x âˆˆ X âŸ¹ I x = I' x"
proof goal_cases
  case A: 1
  note x = â€¹x âˆˆ Xâ€º
  with A have "valid_intv (k x) (I x)" by auto
  moreover from A(2) x have "valid_intv (k x) (I' x)" by auto
  moreover from A(3) x have "intv_elem x u (I x)" by auto
  moreover from A(4) x have "intv_elem x u (I' x)" by auto
  ultimately show "I x = I' x" using valid_intv_distinct by fastforce
qed

(* XXX Move *)
lemma delayedR_correct:
  fixes I r
  defines "R' â‰¡ region ğ’³ I r"
  assumes "u âˆˆ R" "R âˆˆ â„›" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r" "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. Â¬ isConst (I c)" "R' âˆˆ Succ â„› R"
  shows
    "delayedR R' u âˆˆ R'"
    "âˆƒ t â‰¥ 0. delayedR R' u = u âŠ• t
            âˆ§ t â‰¥ (1 - Max ({frac (u c) | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ isIntv (I c)} âˆª {0})) / 2"
proof -
  let ?u = "SOME u. u âˆˆ R"
  let ?I = "SOME I. âˆƒ r. valid_region ğ’³ k I r âˆ§ R' = region ğ’³ I r"
  let ?S = "{frac (u c) | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ isIntv (I c)}"
  let ?m = "1 - Max (?S âˆª {0})"
  let ?t = "SOME t. u âŠ• t âˆˆ R' âˆ§ t â‰¥ ?m / 2"
  have "Max (?S âˆª {0}) â‰¥ 0" "?m â‰¤ 1" using finite(1) by auto
  have "Max (?S âˆª {0}) âˆˆ ?S âˆª {0}" using finite(1) by - (rule Max_in; auto)
  with frac_lt_1 have "Max (?S âˆª {0}) â‰¤ 1" "?m â‰¥ 0" by auto
  from assms(3, 6) â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º obtain t where t:
    "u âŠ• t âˆˆ R'" "t â‰¥ 0"
  by (metis alpha_interp.regions_closed'_spec alpha_interp.set_of_regions_spec)
  have I_cong: "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. I' c = I c" if "valid_region ğ’³ k I' r'" "R' = region ğ’³ I' r'" for I' r'
  using valid_regions_intv_distinct assms(4) t(1) that unfolding R'_def by auto
  have I_cong: "?I c = I c" if "c âˆˆ ğ’³" for c
  proof -
    from assms have
      "âˆƒ r. valid_region ğ’³ k ?I r âˆ§ R' = region ğ’³ ?I r"
    by - (rule someI[where P = "Î» I. âˆƒ r. valid_region ğ’³ k I r âˆ§ R' = region ğ’³ I r"]; auto)
    with I_cong that show ?thesis by auto
  qed
  then have "?S = {frac (u c) | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ isIntv (?I c)}" by auto
  have upper_bound: "(u âŠ• ?m / 2) c < intv_const (I c) + 1" if "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "isIntv (I c)" for c
  proof (cases "u c > intv_const (I c)")
    case True
    from t that assms have "u c + t < intv_const (I c) + 1" unfolding cval_add_def by fastforce
    with â€¹t â‰¥ 0â€º True have *: "intv_const (I c) < u c" "u c < intv_const (I c) + 1" by auto
    have "frac (u c) â‰¤ Max (?S âˆª {0})" using finite(1) that by - (rule Max_ge; auto)
    then have "?m â‰¤ 1 - frac (u c)" by auto
    then have "?m / 2 < 1 - frac (u c)" using * nat_intv_frac_decomp by fastforce 
    then have "(u âŠ• ?m / 2) c < u c + 1 - frac (u c)" unfolding cval_add_def by auto
    also from * have
      "â€¦ = intv_const (I c) + 1"
    using nat_intv_frac_decomp of_nat_1 of_nat_add by fastforce
    finally show ?thesis .
  next
    case False
    then have "u c â‰¤ intv_const (I c)" by auto
    moreover from â€¹0 â‰¤ ?mâ€º â€¹?m â‰¤ 1â€º have "?m / 2 < 1" by auto
    ultimately have "u c + ?m / 2 < intv_const (I c) + 1" by linarith
    then show ?thesis by (simp add: cval_add_def)
  qed
  have "?t â‰¥ 0 âˆ§ u âŠ• ?t âˆˆ R' âˆ§ ?t â‰¥ ?m / 2"
  proof (cases "t â‰¥ ?m / 2")
    case True
    from â€¹t â‰¥ ?m / 2â€º t â€¹Max (?S âˆª {0}) â‰¤ 1â€º have "u âŠ• ?t âˆˆ R' âˆ§ ?t â‰¥ ?m / 2"
      by - (rule someI; auto)
    with â€¹?m â‰¥ 0â€º show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case False
    have "u âŠ• ?m / 2 âˆˆ R'" unfolding R'_def
     apply (rule delayedR_correct_aux')
         apply (rule t[unfolded R'_def])
        apply (rule assms)+
    using upper_bound False by auto
    with â€¹?m â‰¥ 0â€º show ?thesis by - (rule someI2; fastforce)
  qed
  then show "delayedR R' u âˆˆ R'" "âˆƒtâ‰¥0. delayedR R' u = u âŠ• t âˆ§ t â‰¥ ?m / 2"
    by (auto simp: delayedR_def â€¹?S = _â€º)
qed

definition
  rept :: "'s * ('c, t) cval â‡’ ('s * ('c, t) cval set) pmf â‡’ ('s * ('c, t) cval) pmf"
where
  "rept s Î¼_abs â‰¡ let (l, u) = s in
    if (âˆƒ R'. (l, u) âˆˆ S âˆ§ Î¼_abs = return_pmf (l, R') âˆ§
        (([u]â‡©â„› = R' âˆ§ (âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u c > k c))))
    then return_pmf (l, u âŠ• 0.5)
    else if
      (âˆƒ R'. (l, u) âˆˆ S âˆ§ Î¼_abs = return_pmf (l, R') âˆ§ R' âˆˆ Succ â„› ([u]â‡©â„›) âˆ§ [u]â‡©â„› â‰  R'
           âˆ§ (âˆ€ u âˆˆ R'. âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. âˆ„ d. d â‰¤ k c âˆ§  u c = real d))
    then return_pmf (l, delayedR (SOME R'. Î¼_abs = return_pmf (l, R')) u)
    else SOME Î¼. Î¼ âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst Î¼ = Î¼_abs"

(* XXX Move *)
lemma ğ’®_L:
  "l âˆˆ L" if "(l, R) âˆˆ ğ’®"
  using that unfolding ğ’®_def by auto

lemma ğ’®_inv:
  "(l, R) âˆˆ ğ’® âŸ¹ R âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A lâ¦„"
  unfolding ğ’®_def by auto

lemma upper_right_closed:
  assumes "âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. real (k c) < u c" "u âˆˆ R" "R âˆˆ â„›" "t â‰¥ 0"
  shows "u âŠ• t âˆˆ R"
proof -
  from â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º obtain I r where R:
    "R = region ğ’³ I r" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r"
  unfolding â„›_def by auto
  from assms â„›_V have "u âˆˆ V" by auto
  from assms R have "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. I c = Greater (k c)" by safe (case_tac "I c"; fastforce)
  with R â€¹u âˆˆ Vâ€º assms show
    "u âŠ• t âˆˆ R"
  unfolding V_def by safe (rule; force simp: cval_add_def)
qed

lemma S_I[intro]:
  "(l, u) âˆˆ S" if "l âˆˆ L" "u âˆˆ V" "u âŠ¢ inv_of A l"
  using that by (auto simp: S_def V_def)

lemma rept_ex:
  assumes "Î¼ âˆˆ ğ’¦ (abss s)"
  shows "rept s Î¼ âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst (rept s Î¼) = Î¼" using assms
proof cases
  case prems: (delay l R R')
  then have "R âˆˆ â„›" by auto
  from prems(2) have "s âˆˆ S" by (auto intro: ğ’®_abss_S)
  from abss_ğ’®D[OF prems(2)] obtain l' u' where "s = (l', u')" "u' âˆˆ [u']â‡©â„›"
    by metis
  with prems(3) have *: "s = (l, u') âˆ§ u' âˆˆ R"
   apply simp
   apply (subst (asm) abss_S[OF ğ’®_abss_S])
  using prems(2) by auto
  with prems(4) alpha_interp.set_of_regions_spec[OF â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º] obtain t where R':
    "t â‰¥ 0" "R' = [u' âŠ• t]â‡©â„›"
  by auto
  with â€¹s âˆˆ Sâ€º * have "u' âŠ• t âˆˆ R'" "u' âŠ• t âˆˆ V" "l âˆˆ L" by auto
  with prems(5) have "(l, u' âŠ• t) âˆˆ S" unfolding S_def V_def by auto
  with â€¹R' = [u' âŠ• t]â‡©â„›â€º have **: "abss (l, u' âŠ• t) = (l, R')" by (auto simp: abss_S)
  let ?Î¼ = "return_pmf (l, u' âŠ• t)"
  have "?Î¼ âˆˆ K s" using * â€¹s âˆˆ Sâ€º â€¹t â‰¥ 0â€º â€¹u' âŠ• t âˆˆ R'â€º prems by blast
  moreover have "abst ?Î¼ = Î¼" by (simp add: ** abst_def prems(1))
  moreover note default = calculation
  have "R' âˆˆ â„›" using prems(4) by auto
  have R: "[u']â‡©â„› = R" by (simp add: * â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º alpha_interp.region_unique_spec) 
  from â€¹R' âˆˆ â„›â€º obtain I r where R':
    "R' = region ğ’³ I r" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r"
  unfolding â„›_def by auto
  have "u' âˆˆ V" using * prems â„›_V by force
  let ?Î¼' = "return_pmf (l, u' âŠ• 0.5)"
  have elapsed: "abst (return_pmf (l, u' âŠ• t)) = Î¼" "return_pmf (l, u' âŠ• t) âˆˆ K s"
    if "u' âŠ• t âˆˆ R'" "t â‰¥ 0" for t
  proof -
    let ?u = "u' âŠ• t" let ?Î¼' = "return_pmf (l, u' âŠ• t)"
    from â€¹?u âˆˆ R'â€º â€¹R' âˆˆ â„›â€º â„›_V have "?u âˆˆ V" by auto
    with â€¹?u âˆˆ R'â€º â€¹R' âˆˆ â„›â€º have "[?u]â‡©â„› = R'" using alpha_interp.region_unique_spec by auto
    with â€¹?u âˆˆ Vâ€º â€¹?u âˆˆ R'â€º â€¹l âˆˆ Lâ€º prems(4,5) have "abss (l, ?u) = (l, R')"
      by (subst abss_S) auto
    with prems(1) have "abst ?Î¼' = Î¼" by (auto simp: abst_def)
    moreover from * â€¹?u âˆˆ R'â€º â€¹s âˆˆ Sâ€º prems â€¹t â‰¥ 0â€º have "?Î¼' âˆˆ K s" by auto
    ultimately show "abst ?Î¼' = Î¼" "?Î¼' âˆˆ K s" by auto
  qed
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "R = R'")
    case T: True
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u' c > k c")
      case True
      with T * R prems(1,4) â€¹s âˆˆ Sâ€º have
        "rept s Î¼ = return_pmf (l, u' âŠ• 0.5)" (is "_ = ?Î¼")
      unfolding rept_def by auto
      from upper_right_closed[OF True] * â€¹R' âˆˆ â„›â€º T have "u' âŠ• 0.5 âˆˆ R'" by auto
      with elapsed â€¹rept _ _ = _â€º show ?thesis by auto
    next
      case False
      with T * R prems(1) have
        "rept s Î¼ = (SOME Î¼'. Î¼' âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst Î¼' = Î¼)"
      unfolding rept_def by auto
      with default show ?thesis by simp (rule someI; auto)
    qed
  next
    case F: False
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "âˆ€ u âˆˆ R'. âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. âˆ„ d. d â‰¤ k c âˆ§ u c = real d")
      case False
      with F * R prems(1) have
        "rept s Î¼ = (SOME Î¼'. Î¼' âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst Î¼' = Î¼)"
      unfolding rept_def by auto
      with default show ?thesis by simp (rule someI; auto)
    next
      case True
      from True F * R prems(1,4) â€¹s âˆˆ Sâ€º have
        "rept s Î¼ = return_pmf (l, delayedR (SOME R'. Î¼ = return_pmf (l, R')) u')"
        (is "_ = return_pmf (l, delayedR ?R u')")
      unfolding rept_def by auto
      let ?u = "delayedR ?R u'"
      from prems(1) have "Î¼ = return_pmf (l, ?R)" by auto
      with prems(1) have "?R = R'" by auto
      moreover from R' True â€¹_ âˆˆ R'â€º have "âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. Â¬ Regions.isConst (I c)" by fastforce
      moreover note delayedR_correct[of u' R I r] * â€¹R âˆˆ â„›â€º R' True â€¹R' âˆˆ Succ â„› Râ€º
      ultimately obtain t where **: "delayedR R' u' âˆˆ R'" "t â‰¥ 0" "delayedR R' u' = u' âŠ• t" by auto
      moreover from â€¹?R =_ â€ºâ€¹rept _ _ = _â€º have "rept s Î¼ = return_pmf (l, delayedR R' u')" by auto
      ultimately show ?thesis using elapsed by auto
    qed
  qed
next
  case prems: (action l R Ï„ Î¼')
  from abss_ğ’®D'[OF prems(2,3)] obtain u where u:
    "s = (l, u)" "u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" "R = [u]â‡©â„›"
  by auto
  with â€¹_ âˆˆ ğ’®â€º have "(l, u) âˆˆ S" by (auto intro: ğ’®_abss_S)
  let ?Î¼ = "map_pmf (Î»(X, l). (l, [X:=0]u)) Î¼'"
  from u prems have "?Î¼ âˆˆ K s" by (fastforce intro: ğ’®_abss_S)
  moreover have "abst ?Î¼ = Î¼" unfolding prems(1) abst_def
   proof (subst map_pmf_comp, rule pmf.map_cong, safe, goal_cases)
     case A: (1 X l')
     from u have "u âˆˆ V" using â„›_V by auto
     then have "[X:=0]u âˆˆ V" by auto
     from prems(1) A
     have "(l', region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0) âˆˆ Î¼" by auto
     from A prems R_G.K_closed â€¹Î¼ âˆˆ _â€º have
        "l' âˆˆ L" "region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0 âŠ† â¦ƒinv_of A l'â¦„"
     by (force dest: ğ’®_L ğ’®_inv)+
     with u have "[X:=0]u âŠ¢ inv_of A l'" unfolding region_set'_def by auto
     with â€¹l' âˆˆ Lâ€º â€¹[X:=0]u âˆˆ Vâ€º have "(l', [X:=0]u) âˆˆ S" unfolding S_def V_def by auto
     then have "abss (l', [X:=0]u) = (l', [[X:=0]u]â‡©â„›)" by auto
     also have
       "â€¦ = (l', region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0)"
     using region_set'_eq(1)[unfolded transition_def] prems A u by force
    finally show ?case .
  qed
  ultimately have default: ?thesis if "rept s Î¼ = (SOME Î¼'. Î¼' âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst Î¼' = Î¼)" using that
  by simp (rule someI; auto)
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "âˆƒ R. Î¼ = return_pmf (l, R)")
    case False
    with â€¹s = (l, u)â€º have "rept s Î¼ = (SOME Î¼'. Î¼' âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst Î¼' = Î¼)" unfolding rept_def by auto
    with default show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case True
    then obtain R' where R': "Î¼ = return_pmf (l, R')" by auto
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "R = R'")
      case False
      from R' prems(1) have
        "âˆ€ (X, l') âˆˆ Î¼'. (l', region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0) = (l, R')"
      by (auto simp: map_pmf_eq_return_pmf_iff[of _ Î¼' "(l, R')"])
      then obtain X where
        "region_set' R (SOME r. set r = X) 0 = R'" "(X, l) âˆˆ Î¼'"
      using set_pmf_not_empty by force
      with prems(4) have "X âŠ† ğ’³" by (simp add: admissible_targets_clocks(1))
      moreover then have
        "set (SOME r. set r = X) = X"
      by - (rule someI_ex, metis finite_list finite(1) finite_subset)
      ultimately have "set (SOME r. set r = X) âŠ† ğ’³" by auto
      with alpha_interp.region_reset_not_Succ False â€¹_ = R'â€º u(3,4) have "R' âˆ‰ Succ â„› R" by auto
      with â€¹s = (l, u)â€º R' u(4) False have
        "rept s Î¼ = (SOME Î¼'. Î¼' âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst Î¼' = Î¼)"
      unfolding rept_def by auto
      with default show ?thesis by auto
    next
      case T: True
      show ?thesis
      proof (cases "âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. real (k c) < u c")
        case False
        with T â€¹s = (l, u)â€º R' u(4) have
          "rept s Î¼ = (SOME Î¼'. Î¼' âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst Î¼' = Î¼)"
        unfolding rept_def by auto
        with default show ?thesis by auto
      next
        case True
        with T â€¹s = (l, u)â€º R' u(4) â€¹(l, u) âˆˆ Sâ€º have
          "rept s Î¼ = return_pmf (l, u âŠ• 0.5)"
        unfolding rept_def by auto
        from upper_right_closed[OF True] T u â„›_V have "u âŠ• 0.5 âˆˆ R'" "u âŠ• 0.5 âˆˆ V" by force+
        moreover then have "[u âŠ• 0.5]â‡©â„› = R'"
          using T alpha_interp.region_unique_spec u(3,4) by blast 
        moreover note * = â€¹rept _ _ = _â€º R' â€¹abss s âˆˆ ğ’®â€º â€¹abss s = _â€º prems(5)
        ultimately have "abst (rept s Î¼) = Î¼"
         apply (simp add: abst_def)
         apply (subst abss_S)
        by (auto simp: ğ’®_L S_def V_def T dest: ğ’®_inv)
        moreover from * â€¹s = _â€º â€¹(l, u) âˆˆ Sâ€º â€¹_ âˆˆ R'â€º have
          "rept s Î¼ âˆˆ K s"
         apply simp
         apply (rule K.delay)
        by (auto simp: T dest: ğ’®_inv)
        ultimately show ?thesis by auto
      qed
    qed
  qed
next
  case loop
  obtain l u where "s = (l, u)" by force
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "s âˆˆ S")
    case T: True
    with â€¹s = _â€º have *: "l âˆˆ L" "u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" "abss s = (l, [u]â‡©â„›)" by auto
    then have "abss s = (l, [u]â‡©â„›)" by auto
    with â€¹s âˆˆ Sâ€º S_abss_ğ’® have "(l, [u]â‡©â„›) âˆˆ ğ’®" by auto
    with ğ’®_inv have "[u]â‡©â„› âŠ† {u. u âŠ¢ inv_of A l}" by auto
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. real (k c) < u c")
      case True
      with * â€¹Î¼ = _â€º â€¹s = _â€º â€¹s âˆˆ Sâ€º have
        "rept s Î¼ = return_pmf (l, u âŠ• 0.5)"
      unfolding rept_def by auto
      from upper_right_closed[OF True] * have "u âŠ• 0.5 âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" by auto
      moreover with * â„›_V have "u âŠ• 0.5 âˆˆ V" by auto
      moreover with calculation * alpha_interp.region_unique_spec have "[u âŠ• 0.5]â‡©â„› = [u]â‡©â„›" by blast
      moreover note * â€¹rept _ _ = _â€º â€¹s = _â€º T â€¹Î¼ = _â€º â€¹(l, _) âˆˆ ğ’®â€º ğ’®_inv
      ultimately show ?thesis unfolding rept_def
       apply simp
       apply safe
        apply fastforce
       apply (simp add: abst_def)
       apply (subst abst_def abss_S)
      by fastforce+
    next
      case False
      with * â€¹s = _â€º â€¹Î¼ = _â€º have
        "rept s Î¼ = (SOME Î¼'. Î¼' âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst Î¼' = Î¼)"
      unfolding rept_def by auto
      with â€¹Î¼ = _â€º show ?thesis by simp (rule someI[where x = "return_pmf s"], auto simp: abst_def)
    qed
  next
    case False
    with â€¹s = _â€º â€¹Î¼ = _â€º have
        "rept s Î¼ = (SOME Î¼'. Î¼' âˆˆ K s âˆ§ abst Î¼' = Î¼)"
    unfolding rept_def by auto
    with â€¹Î¼ = _â€º show ?thesis by simp (rule someI[where x = "return_pmf s"], auto simp: abst_def)
  qed
qed

lemmas rept_K[intro]       = rept_ex[THEN conjunct1]
lemmas abst_rept_id[simp]  = rept_ex[THEN conjunct2]

lemma abst_rept2:
  assumes "Î¼ âˆˆ ğ’¦ s" "s âˆˆ ğ’®"
  shows "abst (rept (reps s) Î¼) = Î¼"
using assms by auto

lemma rept_K2:
  assumes "Î¼ âˆˆ ğ’¦ s" "s âˆˆ ğ’®"
  shows "rept (reps s) Î¼ âˆˆ K (reps s)"
using assms by auto

(* XXX Move this. Does this exist anywhere? More elegant pattern? *)
lemma theI':
  assumes "P a"
    and "â‹€x. P x âŸ¹ x = a"
  shows "P (THE x. P x) âˆ§ (âˆ€ y. P y âŸ¶ y = (THE x. P x))"
using theI assms by metis

lemma cont_cfg_defined:
  fixes cfg s
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" "s âˆˆ abst (action cfg)"
  defines "x â‰¡ THE x. abss x = s âˆ§ x âˆˆ action cfg"
  shows "(abss x = s âˆ§ x âˆˆ action cfg) âˆ§ (âˆ€ y. abss y = s âˆ§ y âˆˆ action cfg âŸ¶ y = x)"
proof -
  from assms(2) obtain s' where "s' âˆˆ action cfg" "s = abss s'" unfolding abst_def by auto
  with assms show ?thesis unfolding x_def
  by -(rule theI'[of _ s'],auto intro: K_bisim_unique MDP.valid_cfg_state_in_S dest: MDP.valid_cfgD)
qed

definition
  absc' :: "('s * ('c, t) cval) cfg â‡’ ('s * ('c, t) cval set) cfg"
where
  "absc' cfg = cfg_corec
    (abss (state cfg))
    (abst o action)
    (Î» cfg s. cont cfg (THE x. abss x = s âˆ§ x âˆˆ action cfg)) cfg"

subsubsection â€¹Configurationâ€º

definition
  absc :: "('s * ('c, t) cval) cfg â‡’ ('s * ('c, t) cval set) cfg"
where
  "absc cfg = cfg_corec
    (abss (state cfg))
    (abst o action)
    (Î» cfg s. cont cfg (THE x. abss x = s âˆ§ x âˆˆ action cfg)) cfg"

definition
  repcs :: "'s * ('c, t) cval â‡’ ('s * ('c, t) cval set) cfg â‡’ ('s * ('c, t) cval) cfg"
where
  "repcs s cfg = cfg_corec
    s
    (Î» (s, cfg). rept s (action cfg))
    (Î» (s, cfg) s'. (s', cont cfg (abss s'))) (s, cfg)"

definition
  "repc cfg = repcs (reps (state cfg)) cfg"

lemma ğ’®_state_absc_repc[simp]:
  "state cfg âˆˆ ğ’® âŸ¹ state (absc (repc cfg)) = state cfg"
by (simp add: absc_def repc_def repcs_def)

lemma action_repc:
  "action (repc cfg) = rept (reps (state cfg)) (action cfg)"
unfolding repc_def repcs_def by simp

(* XXX Declare simp? *)
lemma action_absc:
  "action (absc cfg) = abst (action cfg)"
unfolding absc_def by simp

lemma action_absc':
  "action (absc cfg) = map_pmf abss (action cfg)"
unfolding absc_def unfolding abst_def by simp

lemma
  notes R_G.cfg_onD_state[simp del]
  assumes "state cfg âˆˆ ğ’®" "s' âˆˆ set_pmf (action (repc cfg))" "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (state cfg)"
  shows "cont (repc cfg) s' = repcs s' (cont cfg (abss s'))"
using assms by (auto simp: repc_def repcs_def abss_reps_id)

lemma cont_repcs1:
  notes R_G.cfg_onD_state[simp del]
  assumes "abss s âˆˆ ğ’®" "s' âˆˆ set_pmf (action (repcs s cfg))" "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (abss s)"
  shows "cont (repcs s cfg) s' = repcs s' (cont cfg (abss s'))"
using assms by (auto simp: repc_def repcs_def abss_reps_id)

lemma cont_absc_1:
  notes MDP.cfg_onD_state[simp del]
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" "s' âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg)"
  shows "cont (absc cfg) (abss s') = absc (cont cfg s')"
proof -
  define x where "x â‰¡ THE x. x ~ s' âˆ§ x âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg)"
  from assms(2) have "abss s' âˆˆ set_pmf (abst (action cfg))" unfolding abst_def by auto
  from cont_cfg_defined[OF assms(1) this] have
    "(x ~ s' âˆ§ x âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg)) âˆ§ (âˆ€y. y ~ s' âˆ§ y âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg) âŸ¶ y = x)"
  unfolding x_def .
  with assms have "s' = x" by fastforce
  then show ?thesis
  unfolding absc_def abst_def repc_def x_def using assms(2) by auto
qed

lemma state_repc:
  "state (repc cfg) = reps (state cfg)"
unfolding repc_def repcs_def by simp

lemma abss_reps_id':
  notes R_G.cfg_onD_state[simp del]
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "s âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg)"
  shows "abss (reps s) = s"
using assms by (auto intro: abss_reps_id R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S R_G.valid_cfgD)

(* XXX Move to different locale *)
lemma valid_cfg_coinduct[coinduct set: valid_cfg]:
  assumes "P cfg"
  assumes "â‹€cfg. P cfg âŸ¹ state cfg âˆˆ S"
  assumes "â‹€cfg. P cfg âŸ¹ action cfg âˆˆ K (state cfg)"
  assumes "â‹€cfg t. P cfg âŸ¹ t âˆˆ action cfg âŸ¹ P (cont cfg t)"
  shows "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
proof -
  from assms have "cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on (state cfg)" by (coinduction arbitrary: cfg) auto
  moreover from assms have "state cfg âˆˆ S" by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by (intro MDP.valid_cfgI)
qed

lemma state_repcD[simp]:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on s"
  shows "state (repc cfg) = reps s"
using assms unfolding repc_def repcs_def by auto

(* XXX Move *)
lemma ccompatible_subs[intro]:
  assumes "ccompatible â„› g" "R âˆˆ â„›" "u âˆˆ R" "u âŠ¢ g"
  shows "R âŠ† {u. u âŠ¢ g}"
using assms unfolding ccompatible_def by auto

lemma action_abscD[dest]:
  "cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on s âŸ¹ action (absc cfg) âˆˆ ğ’¦ (abss s)"
unfolding absc_def abst_def
proof simp
  assume cfg: "cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on s"
  then have "action cfg âˆˆ K s" by auto
  then show "map_pmf abss (action cfg) âˆˆ ğ’¦ (abss s)"
  proof cases
    case prems: (delay l u t)
    then have "[u âŠ• t]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" by auto
    moreover with prems ccompatible_inv[of l] have
      "[u âŠ• t]â‡©â„› âŠ† {v. v âŠ¢ PTA.inv_of A l}"
    unfolding ccompatible_def by force
    moreover from prems have "abss (l, u âŠ• t) = (l, [u âŠ• t]â‡©â„›)" by (subst abss_S) auto
    ultimately show ?thesis using prems by auto
  next
    case prems: (action l u g Î¼)
    then have "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" by auto
    moreover with prems ccompatible_guard have "[u]â‡©â„› âŠ† {u. u âŠ¢ g}"
      by (intro ccompatible_subs) auto
    moreover have
      "map_pmf abss (action cfg)
      = map_pmf (Î»(X, l). (l, region_set' ([u]â‡©â„›) (SOME r. set r = X) 0)) Î¼"
    proof -
      have "abss (l', [X:=0]u) = (l', region_set' ([u]â‡©â„›) (SOME r. set r = X) 0)"
        if "(X, l') âˆˆ Î¼" for X l'
      proof -
        from that prems have "A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,Î¼,Xâ‡– l'"
          by auto
        from that prems MDP.action_closed[OF _ cfg] have "(l', [X:=0]u) âˆˆ S" by force
        then have "abss (l', [X:=0]u) = (l', [[X:=0]u]â‡©â„›)" by auto
        also have
          "â€¦ = (l', region_set' ([u]â‡©â„›) (SOME r. set r = X) 0)"
          using region_set'_eq(1)[OF _ _ â€¹A âŠ¢ l âŸ¶â‡—g,Î¼,Xâ‡– l'â€º] prems by auto
        finally show ?thesis .
      qed
      then show ?thesis
        unfolding prems(1)
        by (auto intro: pmf.map_cong simp: map_pmf_comp)
    qed
    ultimately show ?thesis using prems by auto
  next
    case prems: loop
    then show ?thesis by auto
  qed
qed

lemma repcs_valid[intro]:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss s = state cfg"
  shows "repcs s cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
using assms
proof (coinduction arbitrary: cfg s)
  case 1
  then show ?case
  by (auto simp: repcs_def ğ’®_abss_S dest: R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S)
next
  case (2 cfg' s)
  then show ?case
   by (simp add: repcs_def) (rule rept_K, auto dest: R_G.valid_cfgD)
next
  case prems: (3 s' cfg)
  let ?cfg = "cont cfg (abss s')"
  from prems have "abss s' âˆˆ abst (rept s (action cfg))" unfolding repcs_def abst_def by auto
  with prems have
    "abss s' âˆˆ action cfg"
  by (subst (asm) abst_rept_id) (auto dest: R_G.valid_cfgD)
  with prems show ?case
    by (inst_existentials ?cfg s', subst cont_repcs1)
       (auto dest: R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S intro: R_G.valid_cfgD R_G.valid_cfg_cont)
qed

lemma repc_valid[intro]:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
  shows "repc cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
using assms unfolding repc_def by (force dest: R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S)

lemma action_abst_repcs:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss s = state cfg"
  shows "abst (action (repcs s cfg)) = action cfg"
proof -
  from assms show ?thesis
  unfolding repc_def repcs_def
   apply simp
   apply (subst abst_rept_id)
  by (auto dest: R_G.cfg_onD_action R_G.valid_cfgD)
qed

lemma action_abst_repc:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
  shows "abst (action (repc cfg)) = action cfg"
proof -
  from assms have "abss (reps (state cfg)) = state cfg" by (auto dest: R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S)
  with action_abst_repcs[OF assms] show ?thesis unfolding repc_def by auto
qed

(* XXX Move *)
lemma state_absc:
  "state (absc cfg) = abss (state cfg)"
unfolding absc_def by auto

lemma state_repcs[simp]:
  "state (repcs s cfg) = s"
unfolding repcs_def by auto

lemma repcs_bisim:
  notes R_G.cfg_onD_state[simp del]
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "x âˆˆ S" "x ~ x'" "abss x = state cfg"
  shows "absc (repcs x cfg) = absc (repcs x' cfg)"
using assms
proof -
  from assms have "abss x' = state cfg" by auto
  from assms have "abss x' âˆˆ ğ’®" by auto
  then have "x' âˆˆ S" by (auto intro: ğ’®_abss_S)
  with assms show ?thesis  
  proof (coinduction arbitrary: cfg x x')
    case state
    then show ?case by (simp add: state_absc)
  next
    case action
    then show ?case unfolding absc_def repcs_def by (auto dest: R_G.valid_cfgD)
  next
    case prems: (cont s cfg x x')
    define cfg' where "cfg' = cont cfg s"
    define t    where "t â‰¡ THE y. abss y = s âˆ§ y âˆˆ action (repcs x cfg)"
    define t'   where "t' â‰¡THE y. abss y = s âˆ§ y âˆˆ action (repcs x' cfg)"
    from prems have valid: "repcs x cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" by (intro repcs_valid)
    from prems have *: "s âˆˆ abst (action (repcs x cfg))"
      unfolding cfg'_def by (simp add: action_absc)
    with prems have "s âˆˆ action cfg" by (auto dest: R_G.valid_cfgD simp: repcs_def)
    with prems have "s âˆˆ ğ’®" by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfg_action)
    from cont_cfg_defined[OF valid *] have t:
      "abss t = s" "t âˆˆ action (repcs x cfg)"
      unfolding t_def by auto
    have "cont (absc (repcs x cfg)) s = cont (absc (repcs x cfg)) (abss t)" using t by auto
    have "cont (absc (repcs x cfg)) s = absc (cont (repcs x cfg) t)"
      using t valid by (auto simp: cont_absc_1)
    also have "â€¦ = absc (repcs t (cont cfg s))"
      using prems t by (subst cont_repcs1) (auto dest: R_G.valid_cfgD)
    finally have cont_x: "cont (absc (repcs x cfg)) s = absc (repcs t (cont cfg s))" .
    from prems have valid: "repcs x' cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" by auto
    from â€¹s âˆˆ action cfgâ€º prems have "s âˆˆ abst (action (repcs x' cfg))"
      by (auto dest: R_G.valid_cfgD simp: repcs_def)
    from cont_cfg_defined[OF valid this] have t':
      "abss t' = s" "t' âˆˆ action (repcs x' cfg)"
    unfolding t'_def by auto
    have "cont (absc (repcs x' cfg)) s = cont (absc (repcs x' cfg)) (abss t')" using t' by auto
    have "cont (absc (repcs x' cfg)) s = absc (cont (repcs x' cfg) t')"
      using t' valid by (auto simp: cont_absc_1)
    also have "â€¦ = absc (repcs t' (cont cfg s))"
      using prems t' by (subst cont_repcs1) (auto dest: R_G.valid_cfgD)
    finally have "cont (absc (repcs x' cfg)) s = absc (repcs t' (cont cfg s))" .
    with cont_x â€¹s âˆˆ action cfgâ€º prems(1) t t' â€¹s âˆˆ ğ’®â€º
    show ?case
      by (inst_existentials "cont cfg s" t t')
         (auto intro: ğ’®_abss_S R_G.valid_cfg_action R_G.valid_cfg_cont)
  qed
qed

named_theorems R_G_I

lemmas R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S[R_G_I] R_G.valid_cfgD[R_G_I] R_G.valid_cfg_action

(* XXX Simplifier looping problems on cfg_on
   If R_G.cfg_onD_state is not removed from simpset, the simplifier rewrites state cfg = state cfg.
*)
lemma absc_repcs_id:
  notes R_G.cfg_onD_state[simp del]
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss s = state cfg"
  shows "absc (repcs s cfg) = cfg" using assms
proof (subst eq_commute, coinduction arbitrary: cfg s)
  case state
  then show ?case by (simp add: absc_def repc_def repcs_def)
next
  case prems: (action cfg)
  then show ?case by (auto simp: action_abst_repcs action_absc)
next
  case prems: (cont s')
  define cfg' where "cfg' â‰¡ repcs s cfg"
  define t    where "t    â‰¡ THE x. abss x = s' âˆ§ x âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg')"
  from prems have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (state cfg)" "state cfg âˆˆ ğ’®" by (auto dest: R_G_I)
  then have *: "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (abss (reps (state cfg)))" "abss (reps (state cfg)) âˆˆ ğ’®" by auto
  from prems have "s' âˆˆ ğ’®" by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfg_action)
  from prems have valid: "cfg' âˆˆ valid_cfg" unfolding cfg'_def by (intro repcs_valid)
  from prems have "s' âˆˆ abst (action cfg')" unfolding cfg'_def by (subst action_abst_repcs)
  from cont_cfg_defined[OF valid this] have t:
    "abss t = s'" "t âˆˆ action cfg'"
  unfolding t_def cfg'_def by auto
  with prems have "t ~ reps (abss t)"
   apply -
   apply (subst ğ’®_abss_reps)
  by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfg_action)
  have "cont (absc cfg') s' = cont (absc cfg') (abss t)" using t by auto
  have "cont (absc cfg') s' = absc (cont cfg' t)" using t valid by (auto simp: cont_absc_1)
  also have "â€¦ = absc (repcs t (cont cfg s'))" using prems t * â€¹t ~ _â€º valid
  by (fastforce dest: R_G_I intro: repcs_bisim simp: cont_repcs1 cfg'_def)
  finally show ?case
   apply -
   apply (rule exI[where x = "cont cfg s'"], rule exI[where x = t])
  unfolding cfg'_def using prems t by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfg_cont)
qed

(* XXX Simplifier looping problems on cfg_on
   If R_G.cfg_onD_state is not removed from simpset, the simplifier rewrites state cfg = state cfg.
*)
lemma absc_repc_id:
  notes R_G.cfg_onD_state[simp del]
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
  shows "absc (repc cfg) = cfg" using assms
unfolding repc_def using assms by (subst absc_repcs_id) (auto dest: R_G_I)

lemma K_cfg_map_absc:
  "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg âŸ¹ K_cfg (absc cfg) = map_pmf absc (K_cfg cfg)"
by (auto simp: K_cfg_def map_pmf_comp action_absc abst_def cont_absc_1 intro: map_pmf_cong)

(* XXX Move *)
lemma smap_comp:
  "(smap f o smap g) = smap (f o g)"
by (auto simp: stream.map_comp)

lemma state_abscD[simp]:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on s"
  shows "state (absc cfg) = abss s"
using assms unfolding absc_def by auto

(* XXX Move to different locale *)
lemma R_G_valid_cfg_coinduct[coinduct set: valid_cfg]:
  assumes "P cfg"
  assumes "â‹€cfg. P cfg âŸ¹ state cfg âˆˆ ğ’®"
  assumes "â‹€cfg. P cfg âŸ¹ action cfg âˆˆ ğ’¦ (state cfg)"
  assumes "â‹€cfg t. P cfg âŸ¹ t âˆˆ action cfg âŸ¹ P (cont cfg t)"
  shows "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
proof -
  from assms have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (state cfg)" by (coinduction arbitrary: cfg) auto
  moreover from assms have "state cfg âˆˆ ğ’®" by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by (intro R_G.valid_cfgI)
qed

lemma absc_valid[intro]:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  shows "absc cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
using assms
proof (coinduction arbitrary: cfg)
  case 1
  then show ?case by (auto simp: absc_def dest: MDP.valid_cfg_state_in_S)
next
  case (2 cfg')
  then show ?case by (subst state_abscD) (auto intro: MDP.valid_cfgD action_abscD)
next
  case prems: (3 s' cfg)
  define t where "t â‰¡ THE x. abss x = s' âˆ§ x âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg)"
  let ?cfg = "cont cfg t"
  from prems obtain s where "s' = abss s" "s âˆˆ action cfg" by (auto simp: action_absc')
  with cont_cfg_defined[OF prems(1), of s'] have
    "abss t = s'" "t âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg)"
    "âˆ€y. abss y = s' âˆ§ y âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg) âŸ¶ y = t"
  unfolding t_def abst_def by auto
  with prems show ?case
    by (inst_existentials ?cfg)
       (auto intro: MDP.valid_cfg_cont simp: abst_def action_absc absc_def t_def)
qed

lemma K_cfg_set_absc:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" "cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg"
  shows "absc cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg (absc cfg)"
using assms by (auto simp: K_cfg_map_absc)

lemma abst_action_repcs:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss s = state cfg"
  shows "abst (action (repcs s cfg)) = action cfg"
unfolding repc_def repcs_def using assms by (simp, subst abst_rept_id) (auto intro: R_G_I)

lemma abst_action_repc:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
  shows "abst (action (repc cfg)) = action cfg"
using assms unfolding repc_def by (auto intro: abst_action_repcs simp: R_G_I)

lemma K_elem_abss_inj':
  assumes "Î¼ âˆˆ K s"
    and "s âˆˆ S"
  shows "inj_on abss (set_pmf Î¼)"
using assms K_elem_abss_inj by (simp add: K_bisim_unique inj_onI)

lemma K_cfg_rept_aux:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss s = state cfg" "x âˆˆ rept s (action cfg)"
  defines "t â‰¡ Î» cfg'. THE s'. s' âˆˆ rept s (action cfg) âˆ§ s' ~ x"
  shows "t cfg' = x"
proof -
  from assms have "rept s (action cfg) âˆˆ K s" "s âˆˆ S" by (auto simp: R_G_I ğ’®_abss_S)
  from K_bisim_unique[OF this(2,1) _ assms(3)] assms(3) show ?thesis unfolding t_def by blast
qed

lemma K_cfg_rept_action:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss s = state cfg" "cfg' âˆˆ set_pmf (K_cfg cfg)"
  shows "abss (THE s'. s' âˆˆ rept s (action cfg) âˆ§ abss s' = state cfg') = state cfg'"
proof -
  let ?Î¼ = "rept s (action cfg)"
  from abst_rept_id assms have "action cfg = abst ?Î¼" by (auto simp: R_G_I)
  moreover from assms have "state cfg' âˆˆ action cfg" by (auto simp: set_K_cfg)
  ultimately have "state cfg' âˆˆ abst ?Î¼" by simp
  then obtain s' where "s' âˆˆ ?Î¼" "abss s' = state cfg'" by (auto simp: abst_def pmf.set_map)
  with K_cfg_rept_aux[OF assms(1,2) this(1)] show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma K_cfg_map_repcs:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss s = state cfg"
  defines "repc' â‰¡ (Î» cfg'. repcs (THE s'. s' âˆˆ rept s (action cfg) âˆ§ abss s' = state cfg') cfg')"
  shows "K_cfg (repcs s cfg) = map_pmf repc' (K_cfg cfg)"
proof -
  let ?Î¼ = "rept s (action cfg)"
  define t where "t â‰¡ Î» cfg'. THE s. s âˆˆ ?Î¼ âˆ§ abss s = state cfg'"
  have t: "t (cont cfg (abss s')) = s'" if "s' âˆˆ ?Î¼" for s'
    using K_cfg_rept_aux[OF assms(1,2) that] unfolding t_def by auto
  show ?thesis
    unfolding K_cfg_def using t
    by (subst abst_action_repcs[symmetric])
       (auto simp: repc_def repcs_def t_def map_pmf_comp abst_def assms intro: map_pmf_cong)
qed

lemma K_cfg_map_repc:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
  defines
    "repc' cfg' â‰¡ repcs (THE s. s âˆˆ rept (reps (state cfg)) (action cfg) âˆ§ abss s = state cfg') cfg'"
  shows 
    "K_cfg (repc cfg) = map_pmf repc' (K_cfg cfg)"
using assms unfolding repc'_def repc_def by (auto simp: R_G_I K_cfg_map_repcs)

lemma R_G_K_cfg_valid_cfgD:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg"
  shows "cfg' = cont cfg (state cfg')" "state cfg' âˆˆ action cfg"
proof -
  from assms(2) obtain s where "s âˆˆ action cfg" "cfg' = cont cfg s" by (auto simp: set_K_cfg)
  with assms show
    "cfg' = cont cfg (state cfg')" "state cfg' âˆˆ action cfg"
  by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S R_G.valid_cfgD)
qed

lemma K_cfg_valid_cfgD:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" "cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg"
  shows "cfg' = cont cfg (state cfg')" "state cfg' âˆˆ action cfg"
proof -
  from assms(2) obtain s where "s âˆˆ action cfg" "cfg' = cont cfg s" by (auto simp: set_K_cfg)
  with assms show
    "cfg' = cont cfg (state cfg')" "state cfg' âˆˆ action cfg"
  by auto
qed

(* XXX Move *)
lemma absc_bisim_abss:
  assumes "absc x = absc x'"
  shows "state x ~ state x'"
proof -
  from assms have "state (absc x) = state (absc x')" by simp
  then show ?thesis by (simp add: state_absc)
qed

(* XXX Move *)
lemma K_cfg_bisim_unique:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" and "x âˆˆ K_cfg cfg" "x' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg" and "state x ~ state x'"
  shows "x = x'"
proof -
  define t where "t â‰¡ THE x'. x' ~ state x âˆ§ x' âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg)"
  from K_cfg_valid_cfgD assms have *:
    "x  = cont cfg (state x)"  "state x âˆˆ action cfg"
    "x' = cont cfg (state x')" "state x' âˆˆ action cfg"
    by auto
  with assms have
    "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" "abss (state x) âˆˆ set_pmf (abst (action cfg))"
    unfolding abst_def by auto
  with cont_cfg_defined[of cfg "abss (state x)"] have
    "âˆ€y. y ~ state x âˆ§ y âˆˆ set_pmf (action cfg) âŸ¶ y = t"
    unfolding t_def by auto
  with * assms(4) have "state x' = t" "state x = t" by fastforce+
  with * show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma absc_distr_self:
  "MDP.MC.T (absc cfg) = distr (MDP.MC.T cfg) MDP.MC.S (smap absc)" if "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  using â€¹cfg âˆˆ _â€º
proof (coinduction arbitrary: cfg rule: MDP.MC.T_coinduct)
  case prob
  show ?case by (rule MDP.MC.T.prob_space_distr, simp)
next
  case sets
  show ?case by auto
next
  case prems: (cont cfg)
  define t  where "t  â‰¡ Î» y. THE x. y = absc x âˆ§ x âˆˆ K_cfg cfg"
  define M' where "M' â‰¡ Î» cfg. distr (MDP.MC.T (t cfg)) MDP.MC.S (smap absc)"
  show ?case
  proof (rule exI[where x = M'], safe, goal_cases)
    case A: (1 y)
    from A prems obtain x' where "y = absc x'" "x' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg" by (auto simp: K_cfg_map_absc)
    with K_cfg_bisim_unique[OF prems _ _ absc_bisim_abss] have
      "y = absc (t y)" "x' = t y"
      unfolding t_def by (auto intro: theI2)
    moreover have "x' âˆˆ valid_cfg" using â€¹x' âˆˆ _â€º prems by auto
    ultimately show ?case unfolding M'_def by auto
  next
    case 5
    show ?case unfolding M'_def
      apply (subst distr_distr)
        prefer 3
        apply (subst MDP.MC.T_eq_bind)
        apply (subst distr_bind)
           prefer 4
           apply (subst distr_distr)
             prefer 3
             apply (subst K_cfg_map_absc)
              apply (rule prems)
             apply (subst map_pmf_rep_eq)
             apply (subst bind_distr)
               prefer 4
               apply (rule bind_measure_pmf_cong)
                 prefer 3
      subgoal premises A for x
      proof -
        have "t (absc x) = x" unfolding t_def
        proof (rule the_equality, goal_cases)
          case 1 with A show ?case by simp
        next
          case (2 x')
          with K_cfg_bisim_unique[OF prems _ A absc_bisim_abss] show ?case by simp
        qed
        then show ?thesis by (auto simp: comp_def)
      qed
      by (fastforce
          simp:  space_subprob_algebra MC_syntax.in_S
          intro: bind_measure_pmf_cong MDP.MC.T.subprob_space_distr MDP.MC.T.prob_space_distr
          )+
  qed (auto simp: M'_def intro: MDP.MC.T.prob_space_distr)
qed

lemma R_G_trace_space_distr_eq:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss s = state cfg"
  shows "MDP.MC.T cfg = distr (MDP.MC.T (repcs s cfg)) MDP.MC.S (smap absc)"
using assms
proof (coinduction arbitrary: cfg s rule: MDP.MC.T_coinduct)
  case prob
  show ?case by (rule MDP.MC.T.prob_space_distr, simp) 
next
  case sets
  show ?case by auto
next
  case prems: (cont cfg s)
  let ?Î¼ = "rept s (action cfg)"
  define repc' where "repc' â‰¡ Î» cfg'. repcs (THE s. s âˆˆ ?Î¼ âˆ§ abss s = state cfg') cfg'"
  define M' where "M' â‰¡ Î» cfg. distr (MDP.MC.T (repc' cfg)) MDP.MC.S (smap absc)"
  show ?case
  proof (intro exI[where x = M'], safe, goal_cases)
    case A: (1 cfg')
    with K_cfg_rept_action[OF prems] have
      "abss (THE s. s âˆˆ ?Î¼ âˆ§ abss s = state cfg') = state cfg'"
    by auto
    moreover from A prems have "cfg' âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" by auto
    ultimately show ?case unfolding M'_def repc'_def by best
  next
    case 4
    show ?case unfolding M'_def by (rule MDP.MC.T.prob_space_distr, simp)
  next
    case 5
    have *: "smap absc âˆ˜ (##) (repc' cfg') = (##) cfg' âˆ˜ smap absc"
    if "cfg' âˆˆ set_pmf (K_cfg cfg)" for cfg'
    proof -
      from K_cfg_rept_action[OF prems that] have
        "abss (THE s. s âˆˆ ?Î¼ âˆ§ abss s = state cfg') = state cfg'"
      .
      with prems that have *:
        "absc (repc' cfg') = cfg'"
      unfolding repc'_def by (subst absc_repcs_id, auto)
      then show "(smap absc âˆ˜ (##) (repc' cfg')) = ((##) cfg' âˆ˜ smap absc)" by auto
    qed
    from prems show ?case unfolding M'_def
      apply (subst distr_distr)
        apply simp+
      apply (subst MDP.MC.T_eq_bind)
      apply (subst distr_bind)
         prefer 2
         apply simp
        apply (rule MDP.MC.distr_Stream_subprob)
       apply simp
      apply (subst distr_distr)
        apply simp+
      apply (subst K_cfg_map_repcs[OF prems])
      apply (subst map_pmf_rep_eq)
      apply (subst bind_distr)
    by (fastforce simp: *[unfolded repc'_def] repc'_def space_subprob_algebra MC_syntax.in_S
                  intro: bind_measure_pmf_cong MDP.MC.T.subprob_space_distr)+
  qed (simp add: M'_def)+
qed

lemma repc_inj_on_K_cfg:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on s" "s âˆˆ ğ’®"
  shows "inj_on repc (set_pmf (K_cfg cfg))"
  using assms
  by (intro inj_on_inverseI[where g = absc], subst absc_repc_id)
     (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfgD R_G.valid_cfgI R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S)

lemma smap_absc_iff:
  assumes "â‹€ x y. x âˆˆ X âŸ¹ smap abss x = smap abss y âŸ¹ y âˆˆ X"
  shows "(smap state xs âˆˆ X) = (smap (Î»z. abss (state z)) xs âˆˆ smap abss ` X)"
proof (safe, goal_cases)
  case 1
  then show ?case unfolding image_def
    by clarify (inst_existentials "smap state xs", auto simp: stream.map_comp)
next
  case prems: (2 xs')
  have
    "smap (Î»z. abss (state z)) xs = smap abss (smap state xs)"
  by (auto simp: comp_def stream.map_comp)
  with prems have "smap abss (smap state xs) = smap abss xs'" by simp
  with prems(2) assms show ?case by auto
qed

lemma valid_abss_reps[simp]:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
  shows "abss (reps (state cfg)) = state cfg"
using assms by (subst ğ’®_abss_reps) (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S)

lemma in_space_UNIV: "x âˆˆ space (count_space UNIV)"
  by simp

lemma S_reps_ğ’®_aux:
  "reps (l, R) âˆˆ S âŸ¹ (l, R) âˆˆ ğ’®"
  using ccompatible_inv unfolding reps_def ccompatible_def ğ’®_def S_def
  by (cases "R âˆˆ â„›"; auto simp: non_empty)

(* XXX Move *)
lemma S_reps_ğ’®[intro]:
  "reps s âˆˆ S âŸ¹ s âˆˆ ğ’®"
  using S_reps_ğ’®_aux by (metis surj_pair)

lemma absc_valid_cfg_eq:
  "absc ` valid_cfg = R_G.valid_cfg"
  apply safe
  subgoal
    by auto
  subgoal for cfg
    using absc_repcs_id[where s = "reps (state cfg)"]
    by - (frule repcs_valid[where s = "reps (state cfg)"]; force intro: imageI)
  done

lemma action_repcs:
  "action (repcs (l, u) cfg) = rept (l, u) (action cfg)"
  by (simp add: repcs_def)

subsection â€¹Equalities Between Measures of Trace Spacesâ€º

(* TODO: Clean *)
lemma path_measure_eq_absc1_new:
  fixes cfg s
  defines "cfg' â‰¡ absc cfg"
  assumes valid: "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  assumes X[measurable]: "X âˆˆ R_G.St" and Y[measurable]: "Y âˆˆ MDP.St"
  assumes P: "AE x in (R_G.T cfg'). P x" and Q: "AE x in (MDP.T cfg). Q x"
  assumes P'[measurable]: "Measurable.pred R_G.St P"
      and Q'[measurable]: "Measurable.pred MDP.St Q"
  assumes X_Y_closed: "â‹€ x y. P x âŸ¹ smap abss y = x âŸ¹ x âˆˆ X âŸ¹ y âˆˆ Y âˆ§ Q y"
  assumes Y_X_closed: "â‹€ x y. Q y âŸ¹ smap abss y = x âŸ¹ y âˆˆ Y âŸ¹ x âˆˆ X âˆ§ P x"
  shows
    "emeasure (R_G.T cfg') X = emeasure (MDP.T cfg) Y"
proof -
  have *: "stream_all2 (Î»s. (=) (absc s)) x y = stream_all2 (=) (smap absc x) y" for x y
    by simp
  have *: "stream_all2 (Î»s t. t = absc s) x y = stream_all2 (=) y (smap absc x)" for x y
    using stream.rel_conversep[of "Î»s t. t = absc s"]
    by (simp add: conversep_iff[abs_def])

  from P have "emeasure (R_G.T cfg') X = emeasure (R_G.T cfg') {x âˆˆ X. P x}"
    by (auto intro: emeasure_eq_AE)
  moreover from Q have "emeasure (MDP.T cfg) Y = emeasure (MDP.T cfg) {y âˆˆ Y. Q y}"
    by (auto intro: emeasure_eq_AE)
  moreover show ?thesis
   apply (simp only: calculation)
    unfolding R_G.T_def MDP.T_def
    apply (simp add: emeasure_distr)
    apply (rule sym)
    apply (rule T_eq_rel_half[where f = absc and S = valid_cfg])
         apply (rule HOL.refl)
    apply measurable
      apply (simp add: space_stream_space)
    subgoal
      unfolding rel_set_strong_def stream.rel_eq
      apply (intro allI impI)
      apply (drule stream.rel_mono_strong[where Ra = "Î»s t. t = absc s"])
       apply (simp; fail)
      subgoal for x y
      using Y_X_closed[of "smap state x" "smap state (smap absc x)" for x y]
      using X_Y_closed[of "smap state (smap absc x)" "smap state x" for x y]
      by (auto simp: * stream.rel_eq stream.map_comp state_absc)+
    done
    subgoal
      apply (auto intro!: rel_funI)
      apply (subst K_cfg_map_absc)
       defer
       apply (subst pmf.rel_map(2))
       apply (rule rel_pmf_reflI)
      by auto
    subgoal
      using valid unfolding cfg'_def by simp
    done
qed

(* TODO: Clean duplication *)
lemma path_measure_eq_repcs1_new:
  fixes cfg s
  defines "cfg' â‰¡ repcs s cfg"
  assumes s: "abss s = state cfg"
  assumes valid: "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
  assumes X[measurable]: "X âˆˆ R_G.St" and Y[measurable]: "Y âˆˆ MDP.St"
  assumes P: "AE x in (R_G.T cfg). P x" and Q: "AE x in (MDP.T cfg'). Q x"
  assumes P'[measurable]: "Measurable.pred R_G.St P"
      and Q'[measurable]: "Measurable.pred MDP.St Q"
  assumes X_Y_closed: "â‹€ x y. P x âŸ¹ smap abss y = x âŸ¹ x âˆˆ X âŸ¹ y âˆˆ Y âˆ§ Q y"
  assumes Y_X_closed: "â‹€ x y. Q y âŸ¹ smap abss y = x âŸ¹ y âˆˆ Y âŸ¹ x âˆˆ X âˆ§ P x"
  shows
    "emeasure (R_G.T cfg) X = emeasure (MDP.T cfg') Y"
proof -
  have *: "stream_all2 (Î»s t. t = absc s) x y = stream_all2 (=) y (smap absc x)" for x y
    using stream.rel_conversep[of "Î»s t. t = absc s"]
    by (simp add: conversep_iff[abs_def])
  from P X have
    "emeasure (R_G.T cfg) X = emeasure (R_G.T cfg) {x âˆˆ X. P x}"
    by (auto intro: emeasure_eq_AE)
  moreover from Q Y have
    "emeasure (MDP.T cfg') Y = emeasure (MDP.T cfg') {y âˆˆ Y. Q y}"
    by (auto intro: emeasure_eq_AE)
  moreover show ?thesis
    apply (simp only: calculation)
    unfolding R_G.T_def MDP.T_def
    apply (simp add: emeasure_distr)
    apply (rule sym)
    apply (rule T_eq_rel_half[where f = absc and S = valid_cfg])
         apply (rule HOL.refl)
        apply measurable
      apply (simp add: space_stream_space)
    subgoal
      unfolding rel_set_strong_def stream.rel_eq
      apply (intro allI impI)
      apply (drule stream.rel_mono_strong[where Ra = "Î»s t. t = absc s"])
       apply (simp; fail)
      subgoal for x y
        using Y_X_closed[of "smap state x" "smap state (smap absc x)" for x y]
        using X_Y_closed[of "smap state (smap absc x)" "smap state x" for x y]
        by (auto simp: * stream.rel_eq stream.map_comp state_absc)+
      done
    subgoal
      apply (auto intro!: rel_funI)
      apply (subst K_cfg_map_absc)
       defer
       apply (subst pmf.rel_map(2))
       apply (rule rel_pmf_reflI)
      by auto
    subgoal
      using valid unfolding cfg'_def by (auto simp: s absc_repcs_id)
    done
qed

lemma region_compatible_suntil1:
  assumes "(holds (Î»x. Ï† (reps x)) suntil holds (Î»x. Ïˆ (reps x))) (smap abss x)"
      and "pred_stream (Î» s. Ï† (reps (abss s)) âŸ¶ Ï† s) x"
      and "pred_stream (Î» s. Ïˆ (reps (abss s)) âŸ¶ Ïˆ s) x"
  shows "(holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ) x" using assms
proof (induction "smap abss x" arbitrary: x rule: suntil.induct)
  case base
  then show ?case by (auto intro: suntil.base simp: stream.pred_set)
next
  case step
  have
    "pred_stream (Î»s. Ï† (reps (abss s)) âŸ¶ Ï† s) (stl x)"
    "pred_stream (Î»s. Ïˆ (reps (abss s)) âŸ¶ Ïˆ s) (stl x)"
    using step.prems apply (cases x; auto)
    using step.prems apply (cases x; auto)
    done
  with step.hyps(3)[of "stl x"] have "(holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ) (stl x)" by auto
  with step.prems step.hyps(1-2) show ?case by (auto intro: suntil.step simp: stream.pred_set)
qed

lemma region_compatible_suntil2:
  assumes "(holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ) x"
      and "pred_stream (Î» s. Ï† s âŸ¶ Ï† (reps (abss s))) x"
      and "pred_stream (Î» s. Ïˆ s âŸ¶ Ïˆ (reps (abss s))) x"
  shows "(holds (Î»x. Ï† (reps x)) suntil holds (Î»x. Ïˆ (reps x))) (smap abss x)" using assms
proof (induction x rule: suntil.induct)
  case (base x)
  then show ?case by (auto intro: suntil.base simp: stream.pred_set)
next
  case (step x)
  have
    "pred_stream (Î»s. Ï† s âŸ¶ Ï† (reps (abss s))) (stl x)"
    "pred_stream (Î»s. Ïˆ s âŸ¶ Ïˆ (reps (abss s))) (stl x)"
    using step.prems apply (cases x; auto)
    using step.prems apply (cases x; auto)
    done
  with step show ?case by (auto intro: suntil.step simp: stream.pred_set)
qed

lemma region_compatible_suntil:
  assumes "pred_stream (Î» s. Ï† (reps (abss s)) âŸ· Ï† s) x"
      and "pred_stream (Î» s. Ïˆ (reps (abss s)) âŸ· Ïˆ s) x"
  shows "(holds (Î»x. Ï† (reps x)) suntil holds (Î»x. Ïˆ (reps x))) (smap abss x)
     âŸ· (holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ) x" using assms
using assms region_compatible_suntil1 region_compatible_suntil2 unfolding stream.pred_set by blast

lemma reps_abss_S:
  assumes "reps (abss s) âˆˆ S"
  shows "s âˆˆ S"
by (simp add: S_reps_ğ’® ğ’®_abss_S assms)

lemma measurable_sset[measurable (raw)]:
  assumes f[measurable]: "f âˆˆ N â†’â‡©M stream_space M" and P[measurable]: "Measurable.pred M P"
  shows "Measurable.pred N (Î»x. âˆ€sâˆˆsset (f x). P s)"
proof -
  have *: "(Î»x. âˆ€sâˆˆsset (f x). P s) = (Î»x. âˆ€i. P (f x !! i))"
    by (simp add: sset_range)
  show ?thesis
    unfolding * by measurable
qed

lemma path_measure_eq_repcs''_new:
  notes in_space_UNIV[measurable]
  fixes cfg Ï† Ïˆ s
  defines "cfg' â‰¡ repcs s cfg"
  defines "Ï†' â‰¡ absp Ï†" and "Ïˆ' â‰¡ absp Ïˆ"
  assumes s: "abss s = state cfg"
  assumes valid: "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
  assumes valid': "cfg' âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  assumes equiv_Ï†: "â‹€ x. pred_stream (Î» s. s âˆˆ S) x
                    âŸ¹ pred_stream (Î» s. Ï† (reps (abss s)) âŸ· Ï† s) (state cfg' ## x)"
    and equiv_Ïˆ: "â‹€ x. pred_stream (Î» s. s âˆˆ S) x
                    âŸ¹ pred_stream (Î» s. Ïˆ (reps (abss s)) âŸ· Ïˆ s) (state cfg' ## x)"
  shows
    "emeasure (R_G.T cfg)  {xâˆˆspace R_G.St. (holds Ï†' suntil holds Ïˆ') (state cfg  ## x)} =
     emeasure (MDP.T cfg') {xâˆˆspace MDP.St. (holds Ï†  suntil holds Ïˆ)  (state cfg' ## x)}"
  unfolding cfg'_def
  apply (rule path_measure_eq_repcs1_new[where P = "pred_stream (Î» s. s âˆˆ ğ’®)" and Q = "pred_stream (Î» s. s âˆˆ S)"])
           apply fact
          apply fact
         apply measurable
  subgoal
    unfolding R_G.T_def
    apply (subst AE_distr_iff)
      apply (auto; fail)
     apply (auto simp: stream.pred_set; fail)
    apply (rule AE_mp[OF MDP.MC.AE_T_enabled AE_I2])
    using R_G.pred_stream_cfg_on[OF valid] by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
  subgoal
    unfolding MDP.T_def
    apply (subst AE_distr_iff)
      apply (auto; fail)
     apply (auto simp: stream.pred_set; fail)
    apply (rule AE_mp[OF MDP.MC.AE_T_enabled AE_I2])
    using MDP.pred_stream_cfg_on[OF valid', unfolded cfg'_def] by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
     apply measurable
  subgoal premises prems for ys xs
    apply safe
      apply measurable
    unfolding Ï†'_def Ïˆ'_def absp_def
     apply (subst region_compatible_suntil[symmetric])
    subgoal
    proof -
      from prems have "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S) xs" using ğ’®_abss_S by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
      with equiv_Ï† show ?thesis by (simp add: cfg'_def)
    qed
    subgoal
    proof -
      from prems have "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S) xs" using ğ’®_abss_S by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
      with equiv_Ïˆ show ?thesis by (simp add: cfg'_def)
    qed
    using valid prems
     apply (auto simp: s comp_def Ï†'_def Ïˆ'_def absp_def dest: R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S)
    apply (auto simp: stream.pred_set intro: ğ’®_abss_S dest: R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S)
    done
  subgoal premises prems for ys xs
    apply safe
      using prems apply (auto simp: stream.pred_set ğ’®_abss_S; measurable; fail)
    using prems unfolding Ï†'_def Ïˆ'_def absp_def comp_def apply (simp add: stream.map_comp)
     apply (subst (asm) region_compatible_suntil[symmetric])
    subgoal
    proof -
      from prems have "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S) xs" using ğ’®_abss_S by auto
      with equiv_Ï† show ?thesis using valid by (simp add: cfg'_def repc_def)
    qed
    subgoal
    proof -
      from prems have "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S) xs" using ğ’®_abss_S by auto
      with equiv_Ïˆ show ?thesis using valid  by (simp add: cfg'_def)
    qed
    using valid prems by (auto simp: s S_abss_ğ’® stream.pred_set dest: R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S)
  done

end (* Probabilistic Timed Automaton Regions *)

end (* Theory *)

Theory PTA_Reachability

theory PTA_Reachability
  imports PTA
begin

section â€¹Classifying Regions for Divergenceâ€º

subsection â€¹Pairwiseâ€º

coinductive pairwise :: "('a â‡’ 'a â‡’ bool) â‡’ 'a stream â‡’ bool" for P where
  "P a b âŸ¹ pairwise P (b ## xs) âŸ¹ pairwise P (a ## b ## xs)"

lemma pairwise_Suc:
  "pairwise P xs âŸ¹ P (xs !! i) (xs !! (Suc i))"
  by (induction i arbitrary: xs) (force elim: pairwise.cases)+

lemma Suc_pairwise:
  "âˆ€ i. P (xs !! i) (xs !! (Suc i)) âŸ¹ pairwise P xs"
  apply (coinduction arbitrary: xs)
  apply (subst stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (rewrite in "stl _" stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (intro exI conjI, rule HOL.refl)
   apply (erule allE[where x = 0]; simp; fail)
  by simp (metis snth.simps(2))

lemma pairwise_iff:
  "pairwise P xs âŸ· (âˆ€ i. P (xs !! i) (xs !! (Suc i)))"
using pairwise_Suc Suc_pairwise by blast

lemma pairwise_stlD:
  "pairwise P xs âŸ¹ pairwise P (stl xs)"
by (auto elim: pairwise.cases)

lemma pairwise_pairD:
  "pairwise P xs âŸ¹ P (shd xs) (shd (stl xs))"
by (auto elim: pairwise.cases)

lemma pairwise_mp:
  assumes "pairwise P xs" and lift: "â‹€ x y. x âˆˆ sset xs âŸ¹ y âˆˆ sset xs âŸ¹ P x y âŸ¹ Q x y"
  shows "pairwise Q xs" using assms
 apply (coinduction arbitrary: xs)
 subgoal for xs
 apply (subst stream.collapse[symmetric])
 apply (rewrite in "stl _" stream.collapse[symmetric])
 apply (intro exI conjI)
  apply (rule HOL.refl)
 by (auto intro: stl_sset dest: pairwise_pairD pairwise_stlD)
done

lemma pairwise_sdropD:
  "pairwise P (sdrop i xs)" if "pairwise P xs"
  using that
proof (coinduction arbitrary: i xs)
  case (pairwise i xs)
  then show ?case
    apply (inst_existentials "shd (sdrop i xs)" "shd (stl (sdrop i xs))" "stl (stl (sdrop i xs))")
    subgoal
      by (auto dest: pairwise_Suc) (metis sdrop_simps(1) sdrop_stl stream.collapse)
    subgoal
      by (inst_existentials "i - 1" "stl xs") (auto dest: pairwise_Suc pairwise_stlD)
    by (metis sdrop_simps(2) stream.collapse)
qed


subsection â€¹Regionsâ€º

(* XXX Move. Rename? *)
lemma gt_GreaterD:
  assumes "u âˆˆ region X I r" "valid_region X k I r" "c âˆˆ X" "u c > k c"
  shows "I c = Greater (k c)"
proof -
  from assms have "intv_elem c u (I c)" "valid_intv (k c) (I c)" by auto
  with assms(4) show ?thesis by (cases "I c") auto
qed

lemma const_ConstD:
  assumes "u âˆˆ region X I r" "valid_region X k I r" "c âˆˆ X" "u c = d" "d â‰¤ k c"
  shows "I c = Const d"
proof -
  from assms have "intv_elem c u (I c)" "valid_intv (k c) (I c)" by auto
  with assms(4,5) show ?thesis by (cases "I c") auto
qed

lemma not_Greater_bounded:
  assumes "I x â‰  Greater (k x)" "x âˆˆ X" "valid_region X k I r" "u âˆˆ region X I r"
  shows "u x â‰¤ k x"
proof -
  from assms have "intv_elem x u (I x)" "valid_intv (k x) (I x)" by auto
  with assms(1) show "u x â‰¤ k x" by (cases "I x") auto
qed

lemma Greater_closed:
  fixes t :: "real"
  assumes "u âˆˆ region X I r" "valid_region X k I r" "c âˆˆ X" "I c = Greater (k c)" "t > k c"
  shows "u(c := t) âˆˆ region X I r"
  using assms
  apply (intro region.intros)
     apply (auto; fail)
    apply standard
  subgoal for x
    by (cases "x = c"; cases "I x"; force intro!: intv_elem.intros)
  by auto

lemma Greater_unbounded_aux:
  assumes "finite X" "valid_region X k I r" "c âˆˆ X" "I c = Greater (k c)"
  shows "âˆƒ u âˆˆ region X I r. u c > t"
using assms Greater_closed[OF _ assms(2-4)] 
proof -
  let ?R = "region X I r"
  let ?t = "if t > k c then t + 1 else k c + 1"
  have t: "?t > k c" by auto
  from region_not_empty[OF assms(1,2)] obtain u where u: "u âˆˆ ?R" by auto
  from Greater_closed[OF this assms(2-4) t] have "u(c:=?t) âˆˆ ?R" by auto
  with t show ?thesis by (inst_existentials "u(c:=?t)") auto
qed


subsection â€¹Unbounded and Zero Regionsâ€º

definition "unbounded x R â‰¡ âˆ€ t. âˆƒ u âˆˆ R. u x > t"

definition "zero x R â‰¡ âˆ€ u âˆˆ R. u x = 0"

lemma Greater_unbounded:
  assumes "finite X" "valid_region X k I r" "c âˆˆ X" "I c = Greater (k c)"
  shows "unbounded c (region X I r)"
using Greater_unbounded_aux[OF assms] unfolding unbounded_def by blast

lemma unbounded_Greater:
  assumes "valid_region X k I r" "c âˆˆ X" "unbounded c (region X I r)"
  shows "I c = Greater (k c)"
using assms unfolding unbounded_def by (auto intro: gt_GreaterD)

lemma Const_zero:
  assumes "c âˆˆ X" "I c = Const 0"
  shows "zero c (region X I r)"
using assms unfolding zero_def by force

lemma zero_Const:
  assumes "finite X" "valid_region X k I r" "c âˆˆ X" "zero c (region X I r)"
  shows "I c = Const 0"
proof -
  from assms obtain u where "u âˆˆ region X I r" by atomize_elim (auto intro: region_not_empty)
  with assms show ?thesis unfolding zero_def by (auto intro: const_ConstD)
qed

lemma zero_all:
  assumes "finite X" "valid_region X k I r" "c âˆˆ X" "u âˆˆ region X I r" "u c = 0"
  shows "zero c (region X I r)"
proof -
  from assms have "intv_elem c u (I c)" "valid_intv (k c) (I c)" by auto
  then have "I c = Const 0" using assms(5) by cases auto
  with assms have "u' c = 0" if "u' âˆˆ region X I r" for u' using that by force
  then show ?thesis unfolding zero_def by blast
qed


section â€¹Reachabilityâ€º

subsection â€¹Definitionsâ€º

locale Probabilistic_Timed_Automaton_Regions_Reachability =
  Probabilistic_Timed_Automaton_Regions k v n not_in_X A
    for k v n not_in_X and A :: "('c, t, 's) pta" +
  fixes Ï† Ïˆ :: "('s * ('c, t) cval) â‡’ bool" fixes s
  assumes Ï†: "â‹€ x y. x âˆˆ S âŸ¹ x ~ y âŸ¹ Ï† x âŸ· Ï† y"
  assumes Ïˆ: "â‹€ x y. x âˆˆ S âŸ¹ x ~ y âŸ¹ Ïˆ x âŸ· Ïˆ y"
  assumes s[intro, simp]: "s âˆˆ S"
begin

definition "Ï†' â‰¡ absp Ï†"
definition "Ïˆ' â‰¡ absp Ïˆ"
definition "s' â‰¡ abss s"

lemma s_s'_cfg_on[intro]:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on s"
  shows "absc cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on s'"
proof -
  from assms s have "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" unfolding MDP.valid_cfg_def by auto
  then have "absc cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (state (absc cfg))" by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfgD)
  with assms show ?thesis unfolding s'_def by (auto simp: state_absc)
qed

lemma s'_ğ’®[simp, intro]:
  "s' âˆˆ ğ’®"
  unfolding s'_def using s by auto

lemma s'_s_cfg_on[intro]:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on s'"
  shows "repcs s cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on s"
proof -
  from assms s have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" unfolding R_G.valid_cfg_def by auto
  with assms have "repcs s cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" by (auto simp: s'_def intro: R_G.valid_cfgD)
  then show ?thesis by (auto dest: MDP.valid_cfgD)
qed

lemma (in Probabilistic_Timed_Automaton_Regions) compatible_stream:
  assumes Ï†: "â‹€ x y. x âˆˆ S âŸ¹ x ~ y âŸ¹ Ï† x âŸ· Ï† y"
  assumes "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S) xs"
      and [intro]: "x âˆˆ S"
    shows "pred_stream (Î»s. Ï† (reps (abss s)) = Ï† s) (x ## xs)"
unfolding stream.pred_set proof clarify
  fix l u
  assume A: "(l, u) âˆˆ sset (x ## xs)"
  from assms have "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S) (x ## xs)" by auto
  with A have "(l, u) âˆˆ S" by (fastforce simp: stream.pred_set)
  then have "abss (l, u) âˆˆ ğ’®" by auto
  then have "reps (abss (l, u)) ~ (l, u)" by simp
  with Ï† â€¹(l, u) âˆˆ Sâ€º show "Ï† (reps (abss (l, u))) = Ï† (l, u)" by blast
qed

lemma Ï†_stream':
  "pred_stream (Î»s. Ï† (reps (abss s)) = Ï† s) (x ## xs)" if "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S) xs" "x âˆˆ S"
  using compatible_stream[of Ï†, OF Ï† that] .

lemma Ïˆ_stream':
  "pred_stream (Î»s. Ïˆ (reps (abss s)) = Ïˆ s) (x ## xs)" if "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S) xs" "x âˆˆ S"
  using compatible_stream[of Ïˆ, OF Ïˆ that] .

lemmas Ï†_stream = compatible_stream[of Ï†, OF Ï†]
lemmas Ïˆ_stream = compatible_stream[of Ïˆ, OF Ïˆ]

subsection â€¹Easier Result on All Configurationsâ€º

(* TODO: Rename *)
lemma suntil_reps:
  assumes
    "âˆ€sâˆˆsset (smap abss y). s âˆˆ ğ’®"
    "(holds Ï†' suntil holds Ïˆ') (s' ## smap abss y)"
  shows "(holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ) (s ## y)"
  using assms
  by (subst region_compatible_suntil[symmetric]; (intro Ï†_stream Ïˆ_stream)?)
     (auto simp: Ï†'_def Ïˆ'_def absp_def stream.pred_set ğ’®_abss_S s'_def comp_def)

(* TODO: Rename *)
lemma suntil_abss:
  assumes
    "âˆ€sâˆˆsset y. s âˆˆ S"
    "(holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ) (s ## y)"
  shows
    "(holds Ï†' suntil holds Ïˆ') (s' ## smap abss y)"
  using assms
  by (subst (asm) region_compatible_suntil[symmetric]; (intro Ï†_stream Ïˆ_stream)?)
     (auto simp: Ï†'_def Ïˆ'_def absp_def stream.pred_set s'_def comp_def)

(* TODO: Generalize to CTL formulae *)
theorem P_sup_sunitl_eq:
  notes [measurable] = in_space_UNIV and [iff] = pred_stream_iff
  shows
    "(MDP.P_sup s  (Î»x. (holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ)   (s  ## x)))
   = (R_G.P_sup s' (Î»x. (holds Ï†' suntil holds Ïˆ') (s' ## x)))"
  unfolding MDP.P_sup_def R_G.P_sup_def
proof (rule SUP_eq, goal_cases)
  case prems: (1 cfg)
  let ?cfg' = "absc cfg"
  from prems have "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" by (auto intro: MDP.valid_cfgI)
  then have "?cfg' âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfgI)
  from â€¹cfg âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º have alw_S: "almost_everywhere (MDP.T cfg) (pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S))"
    by (rule MDP.alw_S)
  from â€¹?cfg'âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º have alw_ğ’®: "almost_everywhere (R_G.T ?cfg') (pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ ğ’®))"
    by (rule R_G.alw_S)
  have "emeasure (MDP.T cfg) {x âˆˆ space MDP.St. (holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ) (s ## x)}
       = emeasure (R_G.T ?cfg') {x âˆˆ space R_G.St. (holds Ï†' suntil holds Ïˆ') (s' ## x)}"
    apply (rule path_measure_eq_absc1_new[symmetric, where P = "pred_stream (Î» s. s âˆˆ ğ’®)"
          and Q = "pred_stream (Î» s. s âˆˆ S)"]
        )
    using prems alw_S alw_ğ’® apply (auto intro: MDP.valid_cfgI simp: )[7]
    by (auto simp: S_abss_ğ’® intro: ğ’®_abss_S intro!: suntil_abss suntil_reps, measurable)
