  with prems show ?case by (inst_existentials ?cfg') auto
next
  case prems: (2 cfg)
  let ?cfg' = "repcs s cfg"
  have "s = state ?cfg'" by simp
  from prems have "s' = state cfg" by auto
  have "pred_stream (Î»s. Ï† (reps (abss s)) = Ï† s) (state (repcs s cfg) ## x)"
    if "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S) x" for x
    using prems that by (intro Ï†_stream) auto
  moreover
  have "pred_stream (Î»s. Ïˆ (reps (abss s)) = Ïˆ s) (state (repcs s cfg) ## x)"
    if "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S) x" for x
    using prems that by (intro Ïˆ_stream) auto
  ultimately
  have "emeasure (R_G.T cfg) {x âˆˆ space R_G.St. (holds Ï†' suntil holds Ïˆ') (s' ## x)}
    = emeasure (MDP.T (repcs s cfg)) {x âˆˆ space MDP.St. (holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ) (s ## x)}"
    apply (rewrite in "s ## _" â€¹s = _â€º)
    apply (subst â€¹s' = _â€º)
    unfolding Ï†'_def Ïˆ'_def s'_def
    apply (rule path_measure_eq_repcs''_new)
    using prems by (auto 4 3 simp: s'_def intro: R_G.valid_cfgI MDP.valid_cfgI)
  with prems show ?case by (inst_existentials ?cfg') auto
qed

end (* PTA Reachability Problem *)


subsection â€¹Divergent Adversariesâ€º

context Probabilistic_Timed_Automaton
begin

  definition "elapsed u u' â‰¡ Max ({u' c - u c | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³} âˆª {0})"

  definition "eq_elapsed u u' â‰¡ elapsed u u' > 0 âŸ¶ (âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u' c - u c = elapsed u u')"

  fun dur :: "('c, t) cval stream â‡’ nat â‡’ t" where
    "dur _ 0 = 0" |
    "dur (x ## y ## xs) (Suc i) = elapsed x y + dur (y ## xs) i"

  definition "divergent Ï‰ â‰¡ âˆ€ t. âˆƒ n. dur Ï‰ n > t"

  definition "div_cfg cfg â‰¡ AE Ï‰ in MDP.MC.T cfg. divergent (smap (snd o state) Ï‰)"

  definition "â„›_div Ï‰ â‰¡
    âˆ€x âˆˆ ğ’³. (âˆ€ i. (âˆƒ j â‰¥ i. zero x (Ï‰ !! j)) âˆ§ (âˆƒ j â‰¥ i. Â¬ zero x (Ï‰ !! j)))
      âˆ¨ (âˆƒ i. âˆ€ j â‰¥ i. unbounded x (Ï‰ !! j))"

  definition "R_G_div_cfg cfg â‰¡ AE Ï‰ in MDP.MC.T cfg. â„›_div (smap (snd o state) Ï‰)"

end

context Probabilistic_Timed_Automaton_Regions
begin

definition "cfg_on_div st â‰¡ MDP.cfg_on st âˆ© {cfg. div_cfg cfg}"

definition "R_G_cfg_on_div st â‰¡ R_G.cfg_on st âˆ© {cfg. R_G_div_cfg cfg}"

lemma measurable_â„›_div[measurable]: "Measurable.pred MDP.MC.S â„›_div"
  unfolding â„›_div_def
  by (intro
        pred_intros_finite[OF beta_interp.finite]
        pred_intros_logic pred_intros_countable
        measurable_count_space_const measurable_compose[OF measurable_snth]
     ) measurable

lemma elapsed_ge0[simp]: "elapsed x y â‰¥ 0"
  unfolding elapsed_def using finite(1) by auto

lemma dur_pos:
  "dur xs i â‰¥ 0"
 apply (induction i arbitrary: xs)
 apply (auto; fail)
 subgoal for i xs
   apply (subst stream.collapse[symmetric])
   apply (rewrite at "stl xs" stream.collapse[symmetric])
   apply (subst dur.simps)
 by simp
done

lemma dur_mono:
  "i â‰¤ j âŸ¹ dur xs i â‰¤ dur xs j"
proof (induction i arbitrary: xs j)
  case 0 show ?case by (auto intro: dur_pos)
next
  case (Suc i xs j)
  obtain x y ys where xs: "xs = x ## y ## ys" using stream.collapse by metis
  from Suc obtain j' where j': "j = Suc j'" by (cases j) auto
  with xs have "dur xs j = elapsed x y + dur (y ## ys) j'" by auto
  also from Suc j' have "â€¦ â‰¥ elapsed x y + dur (y ## ys) i" by auto
  also have "elapsed x y + dur (y ## ys) i = dur xs (Suc i)" by (simp add: xs)
  finally show ?case .
qed

lemma dur_monoD:
  assumes "dur xs i < dur xs j"
  shows "i < j" using assms
 by - (rule ccontr; auto 4 4 dest: leI dur_mono[where xs = xs])

lemma elapsed_0D:
  assumes "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "elapsed u u' â‰¤ 0"
  shows "u' c - u c â‰¤ 0"
proof -
  from assms have "u' c - u c âˆˆ {u' c - u c | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³} âˆª {0}" by auto
  with finite(1) have "u' c - u c â‰¤ Max ({u' c - u c | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³} âˆª {0})" by auto
  with assms(2) show ?thesis unfolding elapsed_def by auto
qed

lemma elapsed_ge:
  assumes "eq_elapsed u u'" "c âˆˆ ğ’³"
  shows "elapsed u u' â‰¥ u' c - u c"
  using assms unfolding eq_elapsed_def by (auto intro: elapsed_ge0 order.trans[OF elapsed_0D])

lemma elapsed_eq:
  assumes "eq_elapsed u u'" "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "u' c - u c â‰¥ 0"
  shows "elapsed u u' = u' c - u c"
  using elapsed_ge[OF assms(1,2)] assms unfolding eq_elapsed_def by auto

lemma dur_shift:
  "dur Ï‰ (i + j) = dur Ï‰ i + dur (sdrop i Ï‰) j"
 apply (induction i arbitrary: Ï‰)
  apply simp
 subgoal for i Ï‰
  apply simp
  apply (subst stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (rewrite at "stl Ï‰" stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (subst dur.simps)
  apply (rewrite in "dur Ï‰" stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (rewrite in "dur (_ ## âŒ‘) (Suc _)" stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (subst dur.simps)
  apply simp
 done
done

lemma dur_zero:
  assumes
    "âˆ€ i. xs !! i âˆˆ Ï‰ !! i" "âˆ€ j â‰¤ i. zero x (Ï‰ !! j)" "x âˆˆ ğ’³"
    "âˆ€ i. eq_elapsed (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i)"
  shows "dur xs i = 0" using assms
proof (induction i arbitrary: xs Ï‰)
  case 0
  then show ?case by simp
next
  case (Suc i xs Ï‰)
  let ?x = "xs !! 0"
  let ?y = "xs !! 1"
  let ?ys = "stl (stl xs)"
  have xs: "xs = ?x ## ?y ## ?ys" by auto
  from Suc.prems have
    "âˆ€ i. (?y ## ?ys) !! i âˆˆ stl Ï‰ !! i" "âˆ€ j â‰¤ i. zero x (stl Ï‰ !! j)"
    "âˆ€ i. eq_elapsed (stl xs !! i) (stl xs !! Suc i)"
    by (metis snth.simps(2) | auto)+
  from Suc.IH[OF this(1,2) â€¹x âˆˆ _â€º] this(3) have [simp]: "dur (stl xs) i = 0" by auto
  from Suc.prems(1,2) have "?y x = 0" "?x x = 0" unfolding zero_def by force+
  then have *: "?y x - ?x x = 0" by simp
  have "dur xs (Suc i) = elapsed ?x ?y"
    apply (subst xs)
    apply (subst dur.simps)
    by simp
  also have "â€¦ = 0"
    apply (subst elapsed_eq[OF _ â€¹x âˆˆ _â€º])
    unfolding One_nat_def using Suc.prems(4) apply blast
    using * by auto
  finally show ?case .
qed

lemma dur_zero_tail:
  assumes "âˆ€ i. xs !! i âˆˆ Ï‰ !! i" "âˆ€ k â‰¥ i. k â‰¤ j âŸ¶ zero x (Ï‰ !! k)" "x âˆˆ ğ’³" "j â‰¥ i"
          "âˆ€ i. eq_elapsed (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i)"
  shows "dur xs j = dur xs i"
proof -
  from â€¹j â‰¥ iâ€º dur_shift[of xs i "j - i"] have
    "dur xs j = dur xs i + dur (sdrop i xs) (j - i)"
  by simp
  also have "â€¦ = dur xs i"
    using assms
    by (rewrite in "dur (sdrop _ _) _" dur_zero[where Ï‰ = "sdrop i Ï‰"])
       (auto dest: prop_nth_sdrop_pair[of eq_elapsed] prop_nth_sdrop prop_nth_sdrop_pair[of "(âˆˆ)"])
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

lemma elapsed_ge_pos:
  fixes u :: "('c, t) cval"
  assumes "eq_elapsed u u'" "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "u âˆˆ V" "u' âˆˆ V"
  shows "elapsed u u' â‰¤ u' c"
proof (cases "elapsed u u' = 0")
  case True
  with assms show ?thesis by (auto simp: V_def)
next
  case False
  from â€¹u âˆˆ Vâ€º â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³ â€º have "u c â‰¥ 0" by (auto simp: V_def)
  from False assms have "elapsed u u' = u' c - u c"
    unfolding eq_elapsed_def by (auto simp add: less_le)
  also from â€¹u c â‰¥ 0â€º have "â€¦ â‰¤ u' c" by simp
  finally show ?thesis .
qed

lemma dur_Suc:
  "dur xs (Suc i) - dur xs i = elapsed (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i)"
 apply (induction i arbitrary: xs)
  apply simp
  apply (subst stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (rewrite in "stl _" stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (subst dur.simps)
  apply simp
 apply simp
 subgoal for i xs
  apply (subst stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (rewrite in "stl _" stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (subst dur.simps)
  apply simp
  apply (rewrite in "dur xs (Suc _)" stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (rewrite at "stl xs" in "_ ## stl xs" stream.collapse[symmetric])
  apply (subst dur.simps)
  apply simp
 done
done

inductive trans where
  succ: "t â‰¥ 0 âŸ¹ u' = u âŠ• t âŸ¹ trans u u'" |
  reset: "set l âŠ† ğ’³ âŸ¹ u' = clock_set l 0 u âŸ¹ trans u u'" |
  id: "u = u' âŸ¹ trans u u'"

abbreviation "stream_trans â‰¡ pairwise trans"

lemma K_cfg_trans:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on (l, R)" "cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg" "state cfg' = (l', R')"
  shows "trans R R'"
using assms
 apply (simp add: set_K_cfg)
 apply (drule MDP.cfg_onD_action)
 apply (cases rule: K.cases)
    apply (auto intro: trans.intros)
using admissible_targets_clocks(2) by (blast intro: trans.intros(2))

lemma enabled_stream_trans:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" "MDP.MC.enabled cfg xs"
  shows "stream_trans (smap (snd o state) xs)"
  using assms
proof (coinduction arbitrary: cfg xs)
  case prems: (pairwise cfg xs)
  let ?xs = "stl (stl xs)" let ?x = "shd xs" let ?y = "shd (stl xs)"
  from MDP.pred_stream_cfg_on[OF prems] have *:
    "pred_stream (Î»cfg. state cfg âˆˆ S âˆ§ cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on (state cfg)) xs" .
  obtain l R l' R' where eq: "state ?x = (l, R)" "state ?y = (l', R')" by force
  moreover from * have "?x âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on (state ?x)" "?x âˆˆ valid_cfg"
    by (auto intro: MDP.valid_cfgI simp: stream.pred_set)
  moreover from prems(2) have "?y âˆˆ K_cfg ?x" by (auto elim: MDP.MC.enabled.cases)
  ultimately have "trans R R'"
    by (intro K_cfg_trans[where cfg = ?x and cfg' = ?y and l = l and l' = l']) metis+
  with â€¹?x âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º prems(2) show ?case
    apply (inst_existentials R R' "smap (snd o state) ?xs")
      apply (simp add: eq; fail)+
    apply (rule disjI1, inst_existentials ?x "stl xs")
    by (auto simp: eq elim: MDP.MC.enabled.cases)
qed

lemma stream_trans_trans:
  assumes "stream_trans xs"
  shows "trans (xs !! i) (stl xs !! i)"
using pairwise_Suc assms by auto

lemma trans_eq_elapsed:
  assumes "trans u u'" "u âˆˆ V"
  shows "eq_elapsed u u'"
using assms
proof cases
  case (succ t)
  with finite(1) show ?thesis by (auto simp: cval_add_def elapsed_def max_def eq_elapsed_def)
next
  case prems: (reset l)
  then have "u' c - u c â‰¤ 0" if "c âˆˆ ğ’³" for c
  using that â€¹u âˆˆ Vâ€º by (cases "c âˆˆ set l") (auto simp: V_def)
  then have "elapsed u u' = 0" unfolding elapsed_def using finite(1)
   apply simp
   apply (subst Max_insert2)
  by auto
  then show ?thesis by (auto simp: eq_elapsed_def)
next
  case id
  then show ?thesis
    using finite(1) by (auto simp: Max_gr_iff elapsed_def eq_elapsed_def)
qed

lemma pairwise_trans_eq_elapsed:
  assumes "stream_trans xs" "pred_stream (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) xs"
  shows "pairwise eq_elapsed xs"
using trans_eq_elapsed assms by (auto intro: pairwise_mp simp: stream.pred_set)

lemma not_reset_dur:
  assumes "âˆ€k>i. k â‰¤ j âŸ¶ Â¬ zero c ([xs !! k]â‡©â„›)" "j â‰¥ i" "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "stream_trans xs"
    "âˆ€ i. eq_elapsed (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i)" "âˆ€ i. xs !! i âˆˆ V"
  shows "dur xs j - dur xs i = (xs !! j) c - (xs !! i) c"
  using assms
proof (induction j)
  case 0 then show ?case by simp
next
  case (Suc j)
  from stream_trans_trans[OF Suc.prems(4)] have trans: "trans (xs !! j) (xs !! Suc j)" by auto
  from Suc.prems have *:
    "Â¬ zero c ([xs !! Suc j]â‡©â„›)" "eq_elapsed (xs !! j) (xs !! Suc j)" if "Suc j > i"
    using that by auto
  from Suc.prems(6) have "xs !! j âˆˆ V" "xs !! Suc j âˆˆ V" by blast+
  then have regions: "[xs !! j]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" "[xs !! Suc j]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" by auto
  from trans have "(xs !! Suc j) c - (xs !! j) c â‰¥ 0" if "Suc j > i"
  proof (cases)
    case succ
    with regions show ?thesis by (auto simp: cval_add_def)
  next
    case prems: (reset l)
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "c âˆˆ set l")
      case False
      with prems show ?thesis by auto
    next
      case True
      with prems have "(xs !! Suc j) c = 0" by auto
      moreover from assms have "xs !! Suc j âˆˆ [xs !! Suc j]â‡©â„›" by blast
      ultimately have
        "zero c ([xs !! Suc j]â‡©â„›)"
        using zero_all[OF finite(1) _ â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º] regions(2) by (auto simp: â„›_def)
      with * that show ?thesis by auto
    qed
  next
    case id then show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  with * â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º elapsed_eq have
    *: "elapsed (xs !! j) (xs !! Suc j) = (xs !! Suc j) c - (xs !! j) c"
    if "Suc j > i"
    using that by blast
  show ?case
  proof (cases "i = Suc j")
    case False
    with Suc have
      "dur xs (Suc j) - dur xs i = dur xs (Suc j) - dur xs j + (xs !! j) c - (xs !! i) c"
      by auto
    also have "â€¦ = elapsed (xs !! j) (xs !! Suc j) + (xs !! j) c - (xs !! i) c"
      by (simp add: dur_Suc)
    also have
      "â€¦ = (xs !! Suc j) c - (xs !! j) c  + (xs !! j) c - (xs !! i) c"
      using * False Suc.prems by auto
    also have "â€¦ = (xs !! Suc j) c - (xs !! i) c" by simp
    finally show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case True
    then show ?thesis by simp
  qed
qed

lemma not_reset_dur':
  assumes "âˆ€jâ‰¥i. Â¬ zero c ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)" "j â‰¥ i" "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "stream_trans xs"
          "âˆ€ i. eq_elapsed (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i)" "âˆ€ j. xs !! j âˆˆ V"
  shows "dur xs j - dur xs i = (xs !! j) c - (xs !! i) c"
using assms not_reset_dur by auto

lemma not_reset_unbounded:
  assumes "âˆ€jâ‰¥i. Â¬ zero c ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)" "j â‰¥ i" "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "stream_trans xs"
          "âˆ€ i. eq_elapsed (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i)" "âˆ€ j. xs !! j âˆˆ V"
          "unbounded c ([xs !! i]â‡©â„›)"
  shows "unbounded c ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)"
proof -
  let ?u = "xs !! i" let ?u' = "xs !! j" let ?R = "[xs !! i]â‡©â„›"
  from assms have "?u âˆˆ ?R" by auto
  from assms(6) have "?R âˆˆ â„›" by auto
  then obtain I r where "?R = region ğ’³ I r" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r" unfolding â„›_def by auto
  with assms(3,7) unbounded_Greater â€¹?u âˆˆ ?Râ€º have "?u c > k c" by force
  also from not_reset_dur'[OF assms(1-6)] dur_mono[OF â€¹j â‰¥ iâ€º, of xs] have "?u' c â‰¥ ?u c" by auto
  finally have "?u' c > k c" by auto
  let ?R' = "[xs !! j]â‡©â„›"
  from assms have "?u' âˆˆ ?R'" by auto
  from assms(6) have "?R' âˆˆ â„›" by auto
  then obtain I r where "?R' = region ğ’³ I r" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r" unfolding â„›_def by auto
  moreover with â€¹?u' c > _â€º â€¹?u' âˆˆ _â€º gt_GreaterD â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have "I c = Greater (k c)" by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis using Greater_unbounded[OF finite(1) _ â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º] by auto
qed

lemma gt_unboundedD:
  assumes "u âˆˆ R"
    and "R âˆˆ â„›"
    and "c âˆˆ ğ’³"
    and "real (k c) < u c"
  shows "unbounded c R"
proof -
  from assms obtain I r where "R = region ğ’³ I r" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r"
    unfolding â„›_def by auto
  with Greater_unbounded[of ğ’³ k I r c] gt_GreaterD[of u ğ’³ I r k c] assms finite(1) show ?thesis
    by auto
qed

definition trans' :: "('c, t) cval â‡’ ('c, t) cval â‡’ bool" where
  "trans' u u' â‰¡
    ((âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u c > k c âˆ§ u' c > k c âˆ§ u â‰  u') âŸ¶ u' = u âŠ• 0.5) âˆ§
    ((âˆƒ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u c = 0 âˆ§ u' c > 0 âˆ§ (âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. âˆ„d. d â‰¤ k c âˆ§ u' c = real d))
    âŸ¶ u' = delayedR ([u']â‡©â„›) u)"

(* XXX Move *)
lemma zeroI:
  assumes "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "u âˆˆ V" "u c = 0"
  shows "zero c ([u]â‡©â„›)"
proof -
  from assms have "u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" by auto
  then obtain I r where "[u]â‡©â„› = region ğ’³ I r" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r" unfolding â„›_def by auto
  with zero_all[OF finite(1) this(2) â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º] â€¹u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›â€º â€¹u c = 0â€º show ?thesis by auto
qed

(* XXX Move, rename *)
lemma zeroD:
  "u x = 0" if "zero x ([u]â‡©â„›)" "u âˆˆ V"
  using that by (metis regions_part_ex(1) zero_def)

lemma not_zeroD:
  assumes "Â¬ zero x ([u]â‡©â„›)" "u âˆˆ V" "x âˆˆ ğ’³"
  shows "u x > 0"
proof -
  from zeroI assms have "u x â‰  0" by auto
  moreover from assms have "u x â‰¥ 0" unfolding V_def by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed

(* XXX Move *)
lemma not_const_intv:
  assumes "u âˆˆ V" "âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. âˆ„d. d â‰¤ k c âˆ§ u c = real d"
  shows "âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. âˆ€u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›. âˆ„d. d â‰¤ k c âˆ§ u c = real d"
proof -
  from assms have "u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" "[u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" by auto
  then obtain I r where I: "[u]â‡©â„› = region ğ’³ I r" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r" unfolding â„›_def by auto
  have "âˆ„d. d â‰¤ k c âˆ§ u' c = real d" if "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "u' âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" for c u'
  proof safe
    fix d assume A: "d â‰¤ k c" "u' c = real d"
    from I that have "intv_elem c u' (I c)" "valid_intv (k c) (I c)" by auto
    then show False
      using A I â€¹u âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›â€º â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º assms(2) by (cases; fastforce)
  qed
  then show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma K_cfg_trans':
  assumes "repcs (l, u) cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on (l, u)" "cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg (repcs (l, u) cfg)"
          "state cfg' = (l', u')" "(l, u) âˆˆ S" "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss (l, u) = state cfg"
  shows "trans' u u'"
using assms
 apply (simp add: set_K_cfg)
 apply (drule MDP.cfg_onD_action)
 apply (cases rule: K.cases)
 apply assumption
proof goal_cases
  case prems: (1 l u t)
  from assms â€¹_ = (l, u)â€º have "repcs (l, u) cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" by (auto intro: MDP.valid_cfgI)
  then have "absc (repcs (l, u) cfg) âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" by auto
  from prems have *: "rept (l, u) (action cfg) = return_pmf (l, u âŠ• t)" unfolding repcs_def by auto
  from â€¹abss _ = _â€º â€¹_ = (l, u)â€º â€¹cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º have
    "action cfg âˆˆ ğ’¦ (abss (l, u))"
  by (auto dest: R_G_I)
  from abst_rept_id[OF this] * have "action cfg = abst (return_pmf (l, u âŠ• t))" by auto
  with prems have **: "action cfg = return_pmf (l, [u âŠ• t]â‡©â„›)" unfolding abst_def by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u c > k c")
    case True
    from prems have "u âŠ• t âˆˆ [u]â‡©â„›" by (auto intro: upper_right_closed[OF True])
    with prems have "[u âŠ• t]â‡©â„› = [u]â‡©â„›" by (auto dest: alpha_interp.region_unique_spec)
    with ** have "action cfg = return_pmf (l, [u]â‡©â„›)" by simp
    with True have "rept (l, u) (action cfg) = return_pmf (l, u âŠ• 0.5)" 
    unfolding rept_def using prems by auto
    with * have "u âŠ• t = u âŠ• 0.5" by auto
    moreover from prems have "u' = u âŠ• t" by auto
    moreover from prems True have "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u' c > k c" by (auto simp: cval_add_def)
    ultimately show ?thesis using True â€¹_ = (l, u)â€º unfolding trans'_def by auto
  next
    case F: False
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "âˆƒcâˆˆğ’³. u c = 0 âˆ§ 0 < u' c âˆ§ (âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. âˆ„d. d â‰¤ k c âˆ§ u' c = real d)")
      case True
      from prems have "u' âˆˆ [u']â‡©â„›" by auto
      from prems have "[u âŠ• t]â‡©â„› âˆˆ Succ â„› ([u]â‡©â„›)" by auto
      from True obtain c where "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "u c = 0" "u' c > 0" by auto
      with zeroI prems have "zero c ([u]â‡©â„›)" by auto
      moreover from â€¹u' âˆˆ _â€º â€¹u' c > 0â€º have "Â¬ zero c ([u']â‡©â„›)" unfolding zero_def by fastforce
      ultimately have "[u âŠ• t]â‡©â„› â‰  [u]â‡©â„›" using prems by auto
      moreover from True not_const_intv prems have
        "âˆ€ u âˆˆ [u âŠ• t]â‡©â„›. âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. âˆ„d. d â‰¤ k c âˆ§ u c = real d"
      by auto
      ultimately have "âˆƒR'. (l, u) âˆˆ S âˆ§
                     action cfg = return_pmf (l, R') âˆ§
                     R' âˆˆ Succ â„› ([u]â‡©â„›) âˆ§ [u]â‡©â„› â‰  R' âˆ§ (âˆ€uâˆˆR'. âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. âˆ„d. d â‰¤ k c âˆ§ u c = real d)"
       apply -
       apply (rule exI[where x = "[u âŠ• t]â‡©â„›"])
       apply safe
      using prems ** by auto
      then have
        "rept (l, u) (action cfg)
       = return_pmf (l, delayedR (SOME R'. action cfg = return_pmf (l, R')) u)" 
      unfolding rept_def by auto
      with * ** prems have "u' = delayedR ([u âŠ• t]â‡©â„›) u" by auto
      with F True prems show ?thesis unfolding trans'_def by auto
    next
      case False
      with F â€¹_ = (l, u)â€º show ?thesis unfolding trans'_def by auto
    qed
  qed
next
  case prems: (2 _ _ Ï„ Î¼)
  then obtain X where X: "u' = ([X := 0]u)" "(X, l') âˆˆ set_pmf Î¼" by auto
  from â€¹_ âˆˆ Sâ€º have "u âˆˆ V" by auto
  let ?r = "SOME r. set r = X"
  show ?case
  proof (cases "X = {}")
    case True
    with X have "u = u'" by auto
    with non_empty show ?thesis unfolding trans'_def by auto
  next
    case False
    then obtain x where "x âˆˆ X" by auto
    moreover have "X âŠ† ğ’³" using admissible_targets_clocks(1)[OF prems(10) X(2)] by auto
    ultimately have "x âˆˆ ğ’³" by auto
    from â€¹X âŠ† ğ’³â€º finite(1) obtain r where "set r = X" using finite_list finite_subset by blast
    then have r: "set ?r = X" by (rule someI)
    with â€¹x âˆˆ Xâ€º X have "u' x = 0" by auto
    from X r â€¹u âˆˆ Vâ€º â€¹X âŠ† ğ’³â€º have "u' x â‰¤ u x" for x
      by (cases "x âˆˆ X"; auto simp: V_def)
    have False if "u' x > 0 âˆ§ u x = 0" for x
      using â€¹u' _ â‰¤ _â€º[of x] that by auto
    with â€¹u' x = 0â€º show ?thesis using â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º unfolding trans'_def by auto
  qed
next
  case 3
  with non_empty show ?case unfolding trans'_def by auto
qed

coinductive enabled_repcs where
  "enabled_repcs (shd xs) (stl xs) âŸ¹ shd xs = repcs st' cfg' âŸ¹ st' âˆˆ rept st (action cfg)
  âŸ¹ abss st' = state cfg'
  âŸ¹ cfg' âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg
  âŸ¹ enabled_repcs (repcs st cfg) xs"

(* XXX Move *)
lemma K_cfg_rept_in:
assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
    and "abss st = state cfg"
    and "cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg"
  shows "(THE s'. s' âˆˆ set_pmf (rept st (action cfg)) âˆ§ abss s' = state cfg')
         âˆˆ set_pmf (rept st (action cfg))"
proof -
  from assms(1,2) have "action cfg âˆˆ ğ’¦ (abss st)" by (auto simp: R_G_I)
  from â€¹cfg' âˆˆ _â€º have
    "cfg' = cont cfg (state cfg')" "state cfg' âˆˆ action cfg"
  by (auto simp: set_K_cfg)
  with abst_rept_id[OF â€¹action _ âˆˆ _â€º] pmf.set_map have
    "state cfg' âˆˆ abss ` set_pmf (rept st (action cfg))" unfolding abst_def  by metis
  then obtain st' where
    "st' âˆˆ rept st (action cfg)" "abss st' = state cfg'"
  unfolding abst_def by auto
  with K_cfg_rept_aux[OF assms(1,2) this(1)] show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma enabled_repcsI:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss st = state cfg" "MDP.MC.enabled (repcs st cfg) xs"
  shows "enabled_repcs (repcs st cfg) xs" using assms
proof (coinduction arbitrary: cfg xs st)
  case prems: (enabled_repcs cfg xs st)
  let ?x = "shd xs" and ?y = "shd (stl xs)"
  let ?st = "THE s'. s' âˆˆ set_pmf (rept st (action cfg)) âˆ§ abss s' = state (absc ?x)"
  from prems(3) have "?x âˆˆ K_cfg (repcs st cfg)" by cases
  with K_cfg_map_repcs[OF prems(1,2)] obtain cfg' where
    "cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg" "?x = repcs (THE s'. s' âˆˆ rept st (action cfg) âˆ§ abss s' = state cfg') cfg'"
    by auto
  let ?st = "THE s'. s' âˆˆ rept st (action cfg) âˆ§ abss s' = state cfg'"
  from K_cfg_rept_action[OF prems(1,2) â€¹cfg' âˆˆ _â€º] have "abss ?st = state cfg'" .
  moreover from K_cfg_rept_in[OF prems(1,2) â€¹cfg' âˆˆ _â€º] have "?st âˆˆ rept st (action cfg)" .
  moreover have "cfg' âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" using â€¹cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfgâ€º prems(1) by blast 
  moreover from absc_repcs_id[OF this â€¹abss ?st = state cfg'â€º] â€¹?x = _â€º have "absc ?x = cfg'"
    by auto
  moreover from prems(3) have "MDP.MC.enabled (shd xs) (stl xs)" by cases
  ultimately show ?case
    using â€¹?x = _â€º by (inst_existentials xs ?st "absc ?x" st cfg) fastforce+
qed

lemma repcs_eq_rept:
  "rept st (action cfg) = rept st'' (action cfg'')" if "repcs st cfg = repcs st'' cfg''"
   by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) action_cfg_corec old.prod.case repcs_def that)

lemma enabled_stream_trans':
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "abss st = state cfg" "MDP.MC.enabled (repcs st cfg) xs"
  shows "pairwise trans' (smap (snd o state) xs)"
using assms
proof (coinduction arbitrary: cfg xs st)
  case prems: (pairwise cfg xs)
  let ?xs = "stl xs"
  from prems have A: "enabled_repcs (repcs st cfg) xs" by (auto intro: enabled_repcsI)
  then obtain st' cfg' where
    "enabled_repcs (shd xs) (stl xs)" "shd xs = repcs st' cfg'" "st' âˆˆ rept st (action cfg)"
    "abss st' = state cfg'" "cfg' âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
   apply atomize_elim
   apply (cases rule: enabled_repcs.cases)
   apply assumption
   subgoal for st' cfg' st'' cfg''
     by (inst_existentials st' cfg') (auto dest: repcs_eq_rept)
  done
  then obtain st'' cfg'' where
    "enabled_repcs (shd ?xs) (stl ?xs)"
    "shd ?xs = repcs st'' cfg''" "st'' âˆˆ rept st' (action cfg')" "abss st'' = state cfg''"
    by atomize_elim (subst (asm)enabled_repcs.simps, fastforce dest: repcs_eq_rept)
  let ?x = "shd xs" let ?y = "shd (stl xs)"
  let ?cfg = "repcs st cfg"
  from prems have "?cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" by auto
  from MDP.pred_stream_cfg_on[OF â€¹?cfg âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º prems(3)] have *:
    "pred_stream (Î»cfg. state cfg âˆˆ S âˆ§ cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on (state cfg)) xs" .
  obtain l u l' u' where eq: "st' = (l, u)" "st'' = (l', u')"
    by force
  moreover from * have
    "?x âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on (state ?x)" "?x âˆˆ valid_cfg"
    by (auto intro: MDP.valid_cfgI simp: stream.pred_set)
  moreover from prems(3) have "?y âˆˆ K_cfg ?x" by (auto elim: MDP.MC.enabled.cases)
  ultimately have "trans' u u'"
    using â€¹?x = _â€º â€¹?y = _â€º â€¹cfg' âˆˆ _â€º â€¹abss st' = _â€º
    by (intro K_cfg_trans') (auto dest: MDP.valid_cfg_state_in_S)
  with â€¹?x âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º â€¹cfg' âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º prems(3) â€¹abss _ = state cfg'â€º show ?case
    apply (inst_existentials u u' "smap (snd o state) (stl ?xs)")
    apply (simp add: eq â€¹?x = _â€º â€¹?y = _â€º; fail)+
    by ((intro disjI1 exI)?; auto simp: â€¹?x = _â€º â€¹?y = _â€º eq elim: MDP.MC.enabled.cases)
qed

lemma divergent_â„›_divergent:
  assumes in_S: "pred_stream (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) xs"
     and  div:  "divergent xs"
     and trans: "stream_trans xs"
  shows "â„›_div (smap (Î» u. [u]â‡©â„›) xs)" (is "â„›_div ?Ï‰")
unfolding â„›_div_def proof (safe, simp_all)
  fix x i
  assume x: "x âˆˆ ğ’³" and bounded: "âˆ€i. âˆƒjâ‰¥i. Â¬ unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)"
  from in_S have xs_Ï‰: "âˆ€i. xs !! i âˆˆ ?Ï‰ !! i" by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
  from trans in_S have elapsed:
    "âˆ€ i. eq_elapsed (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i)"
    by (fastforce intro: pairwise_trans_eq_elapsed pairwise_Suc[where P = eq_elapsed])
  { assume A: "âˆ€j â‰¥ i. Â¬ zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)"
    let ?t = "dur xs i + k x"
    from div obtain j where j: "dur xs j > dur xs i + k x" unfolding divergent_def by auto
    then have "k x < dur xs j - dur xs i" by auto
    also with not_reset_dur'[OF A less_imp_le[OF dur_monoD], of xs] â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º assms elapsed have
      "â€¦ = (xs !! j) x - (xs !! i) x"
      by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
    also have "â€¦ â‰¤ (xs !! j) x"
      using assms(1) â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º unfolding V_def by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
    finally have "unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)"
      using assms â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º by (intro gt_unboundedD) (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
    moreover from dur_monoD[of xs i j] j A have "âˆ€j' â‰¥ j. Â¬ zero x ([xs !! j']â‡©â„›)" by auto
    ultimately have "âˆ€iâ‰¥j. unbounded x ([xs !! i]â‡©â„›)"
      using elapsed assms x by (auto intro: not_reset_unbounded simp: stream.pred_set)
    with bounded have False by auto
  }
  then show "âˆƒjâ‰¥i. zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)" by auto
  { assume A: "âˆ€j â‰¥ i. zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)"
    from div obtain j where j: "dur xs j > dur xs i" unfolding divergent_def by auto
    then have "j â‰¥ i" by (auto dest: dur_monoD)
    from A have "âˆ€j â‰¥ i. zero x (?Ï‰ !! j)" by auto
    with dur_zero_tail[OF xs_Ï‰ _ x â€¹i â‰¤ jâ€º elapsed] j have False by simp
  }
  then show "âˆƒjâ‰¥i. Â¬ zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)" by auto
qed

lemma (in -)
  fixes f :: "nat â‡’ real"
  assumes "âˆ€ i. f i â‰¥ 0" "âˆ€ i. âˆƒ j â‰¥ i. f j > d" "d > 0"
  shows "âˆƒ n. (âˆ‘ i â‰¤ n. f i) > t"
  oops

(* TODO: Reduce this proof to a more general theorem *)
lemma dur_ev_exceedsI:
  assumes "âˆ€ i. âˆƒ j â‰¥ i. dur xs j - dur xs i â‰¥ d" and "d > 0"
  obtains i where "dur xs i > t"
proof -
  have base: "âˆƒ i. dur xs i > t" if "t < d" for t
  proof -
    from assms obtain j where "dur xs j - dur xs 0 â‰¥ d" by fastforce
    with dur_pos[of xs 0] have "dur xs j â‰¥ d" by simp
    with â€¹d > 0â€º â€¹t < dâ€º show ?thesis by - (rule exI[where x = j]; auto)
  qed
  have base2: "âˆƒ i. dur xs i > t" if "t â‰¤ d" for t
  proof (cases "t = d")
    case False
    with â€¹t â‰¤ dâ€º base show ?thesis by simp
  next
    case True
    from base â€¹d > 0â€º obtain i where "dur xs i > 0" by auto
    moreover from assms obtain j where "dur xs j - dur xs i â‰¥ d" by auto
    ultimately have "dur xs j > d" by auto
    with â€¹t = dâ€º show ?thesis by auto
  qed
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "t â‰¥ 0")
    case False
    with dur_pos have "dur xs 0 > t" by auto
    then show ?thesis by (fastforce intro: that)
  next
    case True
    let ?m = "nat âŒˆt / dâŒ‰"
    from True have "âˆƒ i. dur xs i > ?m * d"
    proof (induction ?m arbitrary: t)
      case 0
      with base[OF â€¹0 < dâ€º] show ?case by simp
    next
      case (Suc n t)
      let ?t = "t - d"
      show ?case
      proof (cases "t â‰¥ d")
        case True
        have "?t / d = t / d - 1"
        (* Generated by sledgehammer *)
        (* Alternative: by (smt assms(2) diff_divide_distrib divide_self_if) *)
        proof -
          have "t / d + - 1 * ((t + - 1 * d) / d) + - 1 * (d / d) = 0"
            by (simp add: diff_divide_distrib)
          then have "t / d + - 1 * ((t + - 1 * d) / d) = 1"
            using assms(2) by fastforce
          then show ?thesis
            by algebra
        qed
        then have "âŒˆ?t / dâŒ‰ = âŒˆt / dâŒ‰ - 1" by simp
        with â€¹Suc n = _â€º have "n = nat âŒˆ?t / dâŒ‰" by simp
        with Suc â€¹t â‰¥ dâ€º obtain i where "nat âŒˆ?t / dâŒ‰ * d < dur xs i" by fastforce
        from assms obtain j where "dur xs j - dur xs i â‰¥ d" "j â‰¥ i" by auto
        with â€¹dur xs i > _â€º have "nat âŒˆ?t / dâŒ‰ * d + d < dur xs j" by simp
        with True have "dur xs j > nat âŒˆt / dâŒ‰ * d"
        by (metis Suc.hyps(2) â€¹n = nat âŒˆ(t - d) / dâŒ‰â€º add.commute distrib_left mult.commute 
                  mult.right_neutral of_nat_Suc) 
        then show ?thesis by blast
      next
        case False
        with â€¹t â‰¥ 0â€º â€¹d > 0â€º have "nat âŒˆt / dâŒ‰ â‰¤ 1" by simp
        then have "nat âŒˆt / dâŒ‰ * d â‰¤ d"
        by (metis One_nat_def â€¹Suc n = _â€º Suc_leI add.right_neutral le_antisym mult.commute
                  mult.right_neutral of_nat_0 of_nat_Suc order_refl zero_less_Suc) 
        with base2 show ?thesis by auto
      qed
    qed
    then obtain i where "dur xs i > ?m * d" by atomize_elim
    moreover from â€¹t â‰¥ 0â€º â€¹d > 0â€º have "?m * d â‰¥ t"
      using pos_divide_le_eq real_nat_ceiling_ge by blast
    ultimately show ?thesis using that[of i] by simp
  qed
qed

lemma not_reset_mono:
  assumes "stream_trans xs" "shd xs c1 â‰¥ shd xs c2" "stream_all (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) xs" "c2 âˆˆ ğ’³"
  shows "(holds (Î» u. u c1 â‰¥ u c2) until holds (Î» u. u c1 = 0)) xs" using assms
proof (coinduction arbitrary: xs)
  case prems: (UNTIL xs)
  let ?xs = "stl xs"
  let ?x = "shd xs"
  let ?y = "shd ?xs"
  show ?case
  proof (cases "?x c1 = 0")
    case False
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "?y c1 = 0")
      case False
      from prems have "trans ?x ?y" by (intro pairwise_pairD[of trans])
      then have "?y c1 â‰¥ ?y c2"
      proof cases
        case A: (reset t)
        show ?thesis
        proof (cases "c1 âˆˆ set t")
          case True
          with A False show ?thesis by auto
        next
          case False
          from prems have "?x c2 â‰¥ 0" by (auto simp: V_def)
          with A have "?y c2 â‰¤ ?x c2" by (cases "c2 âˆˆ set t") auto
          with A False â€¹?x c1 â‰¥ ?x c2â€º show ?thesis by auto
        qed
      qed (use prems in â€¹auto simp: cval_add_defâ€º)
      moreover from prems have "stream_trans ?xs" "stream_all (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) ?xs"
        by (auto intro: pairwise_stlD stl_sset)
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using prems by auto
    qed (use prems in â€¹auto intro: UNTIL.baseâ€º)
  qed auto
qed

lemma â„›_divergent_divergent_aux:
  fixes xs :: "('c, t) cval stream"
  assumes "stream_trans xs" "stream_all (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) xs"
          "(xs !! i) c1 = 0" "âˆƒ k > i. k â‰¤ j âˆ§ (xs !! k) c2 = 0"
          "âˆ€ k > i. k â‰¤ j âŸ¶ (xs !! k) c1 â‰  0"
          "c1 âˆˆ ğ’³" "c2 âˆˆ ğ’³"
  shows "(xs !! j) c1 â‰¥ (xs !! j) c2"
proof -
  from assms obtain k where k: "k > i" "k â‰¤ j" "(xs !! k) c2 = 0" by auto
  with assms(5) â€¹k â‰¤ jâ€º have "(xs !! k) c1 â‰  0" by auto
  moreover from assms(2) â€¹c1 âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have "(xs !! k) c1 â‰¥ 0" by (auto simp: V_def)
  ultimately have "(xs !! k) c1 > 0" by auto
  with â€¹(xs !! k) c2 = 0â€º have "shd (sdrop k xs) c1 â‰¥ shd (sdrop k xs) c2" by auto
  from not_reset_mono[OF _ this] assms have
    "(holds (Î»u. u c2 â‰¤ u c1) until holds (Î»u. u c1 = 0)) (sdrop k xs)"
  by (auto intro: sset_sdrop pairwise_sdropD)
  from assms(5) k(2) â€¹k > iâ€º have "âˆ€ m â‰¤ j - k. (sdrop k xs !! m) c1 â‰  0" by simp
  with holds_untilD[OF â€¹(_ until _) _â€º, of "j - k"] have
    "(sdrop k xs !! (j - k)) c2 â‰¤ (sdrop k xs !! (j - k)) c1" .
  then show "(xs !! j) c2 â‰¤ (xs !! j) c1" using k(1,2) by simp
qed

lemma unbounded_all:
  assumes "R âˆˆ â„›" "u âˆˆ R" "unbounded x R" "x âˆˆ ğ’³"
  shows "u x > k x"
proof -
  from assms obtain I r where R: "R = region ğ’³ I r" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r" unfolding â„›_def by auto
  with unbounded_Greater â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º assms(3) have "I x = Greater (k x)" by simp
  with â€¹u âˆˆ Râ€º R â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º show ?thesis by force
qed

lemma trans_not_delay_mono:
  "u' c â‰¤ u c" if "trans u u'" "u âˆˆ V" "x âˆˆ ğ’³" "u' x = 0" "c âˆˆ ğ’³"
  using â€¹trans u u'â€º
proof (cases)
  case (reset l)
  with that show ?thesis by (cases "c âˆˆ set l") (auto simp: V_def)
qed (use that in â€¹auto simp: cval_add_def V_def add_nonneg_eq_0_iffâ€º)

lemma dur_reset:
  assumes "pairwise eq_elapsed xs" "pred_stream (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) xs" "zero x ([xs !! Suc i]â‡©â„›)" "x âˆˆ ğ’³"
  shows "dur xs (Suc i) - dur xs i = 0"
proof -
  from assms(2) have in_V: "xs !! Suc i âˆˆ V"
    unfolding stream.pred_set by auto (metis snth.simps(2) snth_sset)
  with elapsed_ge_pos[of "xs !! i" "xs !! Suc i" x] pairwise_Suc[OF assms(1)] assms(2-) have
    "elapsed (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i) â‰¤ (xs !! Suc i) x"
    unfolding stream.pred_set by auto
  with in_V assms(3) have "elapsed (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i) â‰¤ 0" by (auto simp: zeroD)
  with elapsed_ge0[of "xs !! i" "xs !! Suc i"] have "elapsed (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i) = 0"
    by linarith
  then show ?thesis by (subst dur_Suc)
qed

lemma resets_mono_0':
  assumes "pairwise eq_elapsed xs" "stream_all (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) xs" "stream_trans xs"
          "âˆ€ j â‰¤ i. zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)" "x âˆˆ ğ’³" "c âˆˆ ğ’³"
  shows "(xs !! i) c = (xs !! 0) c âˆ¨ (xs !! i) c = 0"
using assms proof (induction i)
  case 0
  then show ?case by auto
next        
  case (Suc i)
  from Suc.prems have *: "(xs !! Suc i) x = 0" "(xs !! i) x = 0"
    by (blast intro: zeroD snth_sset, force intro: zeroD snth_sset)
  from pairwise_Suc[OF Suc.prems(3)] have "trans (xs !! i) (xs !! Suc i)" .
  then show ?case
  proof cases
    case prems: (succ t)
    with * have "t = 0" unfolding cval_add_def by auto
    with prems have "(xs !! Suc i) c = (xs !! i) c" unfolding cval_add_def by auto
    with Suc show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case prems: (reset l)
    then have "(xs !! Suc i) c = 0 âˆ¨ (xs !! Suc i) c = (xs !! i) c" by (cases "c âˆˆ set l") auto
    with Suc show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case id
    with Suc show ?thesis by auto
  qed
qed

lemma resets_mono':
  assumes "pairwise eq_elapsed xs" "pred_stream (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) xs" "stream_trans xs"
          "âˆ€ k â‰¥ i. k â‰¤ j âŸ¶ zero x ([xs !! k]â‡©â„›)" "x âˆˆ ğ’³" "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "i â‰¤ j"
  shows "(xs !! j) c = (xs !! i) c âˆ¨ (xs !! j) c = 0" using assms
proof -
  from assms have 1: "stream_all (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) (sdrop i xs)"
    using sset_sdrop unfolding stream.pred_set by force
  from assms have 2: "pairwise eq_elapsed (sdrop i xs)" by (intro pairwise_sdropD)
  from assms have 3: "stream_trans (sdrop i xs)" by (intro pairwise_sdropD)
  from assms have 4:
    "âˆ€kâ‰¤j - i. zero x ([sdrop i xs !! k]â‡©â„›)"
  by (simp add: le_diff_conv2 assms(6))
  from resets_mono_0'[OF 2 1 3 4 assms(5,6)] â€¹i â‰¤ jâ€º show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma resets_mono:
  assumes "pairwise eq_elapsed xs" "pred_stream (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) xs" "stream_trans xs"
          "âˆ€ k â‰¥ i. k â‰¤ j âŸ¶ zero x ([xs !! k]â‡©â„›)" "x âˆˆ ğ’³" "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "i â‰¤ j"
  shows "(xs !! j) c â‰¤ (xs !! i) c" using assms
  using assms by (auto simp: V_def dest: resets_mono'[where c = c] simp: stream.pred_set)

lemma â„›_divergent_divergent_aux2:
  fixes M :: "(nat â‡’ bool) set"
  assumes "âˆ€ i. âˆ€ P âˆˆ M. âˆƒ j â‰¥ i. P j" "M â‰  {}" "finite M"
  shows "âˆ€i.âˆƒjâ‰¥i.âˆƒk>j.âˆƒ P âˆˆ M. P j âˆ§ P k âˆ§ (âˆ€ m < k. j < m âŸ¶ Â¬ P m)
       âˆ§ (âˆ€ Q âˆˆ M. âˆƒ m â‰¤ k. j < m âˆ§ Q m)"
proof
  fix i
  let ?j1 = "Max {LEAST m. m > i âˆ§ P m | P. P âˆˆ M}"
  from â€¹M â‰  {}â€º obtain P where "P âˆˆ M" by auto
  let ?m = "LEAST m. m > i âˆ§ P m"
  from assms(1) â€¹P âˆˆ Mâ€º obtain j where "j â‰¥ Suc i" "P j" by auto
  then have "j > i" "P j" by auto
  with â€¹P âˆˆ Mâ€º have "?m > i âˆ§ P ?m" by - (rule LeastI; auto)
  moreover with â€¹finite Mâ€º â€¹P âˆˆ Mâ€º have "?j1 â‰¥ ?m" by - (rule Max_ge; auto)
  ultimately have "?j1 â‰¥ i" by simp
  moreover have "âˆƒ m > i. m â‰¤ ?j1 âˆ§ P m" if "P âˆˆ M" for P
  proof -
    let ?m = "LEAST m. m > i âˆ§ P m"
    from assms(1) â€¹P âˆˆ Mâ€º obtain j where "j â‰¥ Suc i" "P j" by auto
    then have "j > i" "P j" by auto
    with â€¹P âˆˆ Mâ€º have "?m > i âˆ§ P ?m" by - (rule LeastI; auto)
    moreover with â€¹finite Mâ€º â€¹P âˆˆ Mâ€º have "?j1 â‰¥ ?m" by - (rule Max_ge; auto)
    ultimately show ?thesis by auto
  qed
  ultimately obtain j1 where j1: "j1 â‰¥ i" "âˆ€ P âˆˆ M. âˆƒ m > i. j1 â‰¥ m âˆ§ P m" by auto
  define k where "k Q = (LEAST k. k > j1 âˆ§ Q k)" for Q
  let ?k = "Max {k Q | Q. Q âˆˆ M}"
  let ?P = "SOME P. P âˆˆ M âˆ§ k P = ?k"
  let ?j = "Max {j. i â‰¤ j âˆ§ j â‰¤ j1 âˆ§ ?P j}"
  have "?k âˆˆ {k Q | Q. Q âˆˆ M}" using assms by - (rule Max_in; auto)
  then obtain P where P: "k P = ?k" "P âˆˆ M" by auto
  have "?k â‰¥ k Q" if "Q âˆˆ M" for Q using assms that by - (rule Max_ge; auto)
  have *: "?P âˆˆ M âˆ§ k ?P = ?k" using P by - (rule someI[where x = P]; auto)
  with j1 have "âˆƒ m > i. j1 â‰¥ m âˆ§ ?P m" by auto
  with â€¹finite _â€º have "?j âˆˆ {j. i â‰¤ j âˆ§ j â‰¤ j1 âˆ§ ?P j}" by - (rule Max_in; auto)
  have k: "k Q > j1 âˆ§ Q (k Q)" if "Q âˆˆ M" for Q
  proof -
    from assms(1) â€¹Q âˆˆ Mâ€º obtain m where "m â‰¥ Suc j1" "Q m" by auto
    then have "m > j1" "Q m" by auto
    then show "k Q > j1 âˆ§ Q (k Q)" unfolding k_def by - (rule LeastI; blast)
  qed
  with * â€¹?j âˆˆ _â€º have "?P ?k" "?j < ?k" by fastforce+
  have "Â¬ ?P m" if "?j < m" "m < ?k" for m
  proof (rule ccontr, simp)
    assume "?P m"
    have "m > j1"
    proof (rule ccontr)
      assume "Â¬ j1 < m"
      with â€¹?j < mâ€º â€¹?j âˆˆ _â€º have "i â‰¤ m" "m â‰¤ j1" by auto
      with â€¹?P mâ€º â€¹finite _â€º have "?j â‰¥ m" by - (rule Max_ge; auto)
      with â€¹?j < mâ€º show False by simp
    qed
    with â€¹?P mâ€º â€¹finite _â€º have "k ?P â‰¤ m" unfolding k_def by (auto intro: Least_le)
    with * â€¹m < ?kâ€º show False by auto
  qed
  moreover have "âˆƒ m â‰¤ ?k. ?j < m âˆ§ Q m" if "Q âˆˆ M" for Q
  proof -
    from k[OF â€¹Q âˆˆ Mâ€º] have "k Q > j1 âˆ§ Q (k Q)" .
    moreover with â€¹finite _â€º â€¹Q âˆˆ Mâ€º have "k Q â‰¤ ?k" by - (rule Max_ge; auto)
    moreover with â€¹?j âˆˆ _â€º â€¹k Q > _ âˆ§ _â€º have "?j < k Q" by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis by auto
  qed
  ultimately show
    "âˆƒjâ‰¥i.âˆƒk>j.âˆƒ P âˆˆ M. P j âˆ§ P k âˆ§ (âˆ€ m < k. j < m âŸ¶ Â¬ P m)
       âˆ§ (âˆ€ Q âˆˆ M. âˆƒ m â‰¤ k. j < m âˆ§ Q m)"
    using â€¹?j < ?kâ€º â€¹?j âˆˆ _â€º â€¹?P ?kâ€º * by (inst_existentials ?j ?k ?P; blast)
qed

lemma â„›_divergent_divergent:
  assumes in_S: "pred_stream (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) xs"
    and div: "â„›_div (smap (Î» u. [u]â‡©â„›) xs)"
    and trans: "stream_trans xs"
    and trans': "pairwise trans' xs"
    and unbounded_not_const:
    "âˆ€u. (âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. real (k c) < u c) âŸ¶ Â¬ ev (alw (Î»xs. shd xs = u)) xs"
  shows "divergent xs"
  unfolding divergent_def proof
  fix t
  from pairwise_trans_eq_elapsed[OF trans in_S] have eq_elapsed: "pairwise eq_elapsed xs" .
  define X1 where "X1 = {x. x âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ (âˆƒi. âˆ€ j â‰¥ i. unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›))}"
  let ?i = "Max {(SOME i. âˆ€ j â‰¥ i. unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)) | x. x âˆˆ ğ’³}"
  from finite(1) non_empty have
    "?i âˆˆ {(SOME i. âˆ€ j â‰¥ i. unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)) | x. x âˆˆ ğ’³}"
    by (intro Max_in) auto
  have "unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)" if "x âˆˆ X1" "j â‰¥ ?i" for x j
  proof -
    have "X1 âŠ† ğ’³" unfolding X1_def by auto
    with finite(1) non_empty â€¹x âˆˆ X1â€º have *:
      "?i â‰¥ (SOME i. âˆ€ j â‰¥ i. unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›))" (is "?i â‰¥ ?k")
      by (intro Max_ge) auto
    from â€¹x âˆˆ X1â€º have "âˆƒ k. âˆ€ j â‰¥ k. unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)" by (auto simp: X1_def)
    then have "âˆ€ j â‰¥ ?k. unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)" by (rule someI_ex)
    moreover from â€¹j â‰¥ ?iâ€º â€¹?i â‰¥ _â€º have "j â‰¥ ?k" by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis by blast
  qed
  then obtain i where unbounded: "âˆ€ x âˆˆ X1. âˆ€ j â‰¥ i. unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)"
    using finite by auto
  show "âˆƒ n. t < dur xs n"
  proof (cases "âˆ€ x âˆˆ ğ’³. (âˆƒi. âˆ€ j â‰¥ i. unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›))")
    case True
    then have "X1 = ğ’³" unfolding X1_def by auto
    have "âˆƒkâ‰¥j. 0.5 â‰¤ dur xs k - dur xs j" for j
    proof -
      let ?u = "xs !! max i j"
      from in_S have "?u âˆˆ [?u]â‡©â„›" "[?u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›"
        by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
      moreover from unbounded â€¹X1 = ğ’³â€º have
        "âˆ€ x âˆˆ ğ’³. unbounded x ([?u]â‡©â„›)"
        by force
      ultimately have "âˆ€ x âˆˆ ğ’³. ?u x > k x"
        by (auto intro: unbounded_all)
      with unbounded_not_const have "Â¬ ev (alw (HLD {?u})) xs"
        unfolding HLD_iff by simp
      then obtain r where
        "r â‰¥ max i j" "xs !! r â‰  xs !! Suc r"
        apply atomize_elim
        apply (simp add: not_ev_iff not_alw_iff)
        apply (drule alw_sdrop[where n = "max i j"])
        apply (drule alwD)
        apply (subst (asm) (3) stream.collapse[symmetric])
        apply simp
        apply (drule ev_neq_start_implies_ev_neq[simplified comp_def])
        using stream.collapse[of "sdrop (max i j) xs"] by (auto 4 3 elim: ev_sdropD)
      let ?k = "Suc r"
      from in_S have "xs !! ?k âˆˆ V" using snth_sset unfolding stream.pred_set by blast
      with in_S have *:
        "xs !! r âˆˆ [xs !! r]â‡©â„›" "[xs !! r]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›"
        "xs !! ?k âˆˆ [xs !! ?k]â‡©â„›" "[xs !! ?k]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›"
        by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
      from â€¹r â‰¥ _â€º have "r â‰¥ i" "?k â‰¥ i" by auto
      with unbounded â€¹X1 = ğ’³â€º have
        "âˆ€ x âˆˆ ğ’³. unbounded x ([xs !! r]â‡©â„›)" "âˆ€ x âˆˆ ğ’³. unbounded x ([xs !! ?k]â‡©â„›)"
        by (auto simp del: snth.simps(2))
      with in_S have "âˆ€ x âˆˆ ğ’³. (xs !! r) x > k x" "âˆ€ x âˆˆ ğ’³. (xs !! ?k) x > k x"
        using * by (auto intro: unbounded_all)
      moreover from trans' have "trans' (xs !! r) (xs !! ?k)"
        using pairwise_Suc by auto
      ultimately have "(xs !! ?k) = (xs !! r) âŠ• 0.5"
        unfolding trans'_def using â€¹xs !! r â‰  _â€º by auto
      moreover from pairwise_Suc[OF eq_elapsed] have "eq_elapsed (xs !! r) (xs !! ?k)"
        by auto
      ultimately have 
        "dur xs ?k - dur xs r = 0.5"
        using non_empty by (auto simp: cval_add_def dur_Suc elapsed_eq)
      with dur_mono[of j r xs] â€¹r â‰¥ max i jâ€º have "dur xs ?k - dur xs j â‰¥ 0.5"
        by auto
      with â€¹r â‰¥ max i jâ€º show ?thesis by - (rule exI[where x = ?k]; auto)
    qed
    then show ?thesis by - (rule dur_ev_exceedsI[where d = "0.5"]; auto)
  next
    case False
    define X2 where "X2 = ğ’³ - X1"
    from False have "X2 â‰  {}" unfolding X1_def X2_def by fastforce
    have inf_resets:
      "âˆ€i. (âˆƒjâ‰¥i. zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)) âˆ§ (âˆƒjâ‰¥i. Â¬ zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›))" if "x âˆˆ X2" for x
      using that div unfolding X1_def X2_def â„›_div_def by fastforce
    have "âˆƒ j â‰¥ i. âˆƒ k > j. âˆƒ x âˆˆ X2. zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›) âˆ§ zero x ([xs !! k]â‡©â„›)
          âˆ§ (âˆ€ m. j < m âˆ§ m < k âŸ¶ Â¬ zero x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›))
          âˆ§ (âˆ€ x âˆˆ X2. âˆƒ m. j < m âˆ§ m â‰¤ k âˆ§ zero x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›))
          âˆ§ (âˆ€ x âˆˆ X1. âˆ€ m â‰¥ j. unbounded x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›))" for i
    proof -
      from unbounded obtain i' where i': "âˆ€ x âˆˆ X1. âˆ€ m â‰¥ i'. unbounded x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)" by auto
      then obtain i' where i':
        "i' â‰¥ i" "âˆ€ x âˆˆ X1. âˆ€ m â‰¥ i'. unbounded x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)"
        by (cases "i' â‰¥ i"; auto)
      from finite(1) have "finite X2" unfolding X2_def by auto
      with â€¹X2 â‰  {}â€º â„›_divergent_divergent_aux2[where M = "{Î» i. zero x ([xs !! i]â‡©â„›) | x. x âˆˆ X2}"]
        inf_resets
      have "âˆƒjâ‰¥i'. âˆƒk>j. âˆƒPâˆˆ{Î»i. zero x ([xs !! i]â‡©â„›) |x. x âˆˆ X2}. P j âˆ§ P k
        âˆ§ (âˆ€m<k. j < m âŸ¶ Â¬ P m) âˆ§ (âˆ€Qâˆˆ{Î»i. zero x ([xs !! i]â‡©â„›) |x. x âˆˆ X2}. âˆƒmâ‰¤k. j < m âˆ§ Q m)"
        by force
      then obtain j k x where
        "j â‰¥ i'" "k > j" "x âˆˆ X2" "zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)" "zero x ([xs !! k]â‡©â„›)"
        "âˆ€m. j < m âˆ§ m < k âŸ¶ Â¬ zero x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)"
        "âˆ€Qâˆˆ{Î»i. zero x ([xs !! i]â‡©â„›) |x. x âˆˆ X2}. âˆƒmâ‰¤k. j < m âˆ§ Q m"
        by auto
      moreover from this(7) have "âˆ€xâˆˆX2. âˆƒm â‰¤ k. j < m âˆ§ zero x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)" by auto
      ultimately show ?thesis using i'
        by (inst_existentials j k x) auto
    qed
    moreover have "âˆƒ j' â‰¥ j. dur xs j' - dur xs i â‰¥ 0.5"
      if  x: "x âˆˆ X2" "i < j" "zero x ([xs !! i]â‡©â„›)" "zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)"
        and not_reset: "âˆ€ m. i < m âˆ§ m < j âŸ¶ Â¬ zero x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)"
        and X2: "âˆ€ x âˆˆ X2. âˆƒ m. i < m âˆ§ m â‰¤ j âˆ§ zero x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)"
        and X1: "âˆ€ x âˆˆ X1. âˆ€ m â‰¥ i. unbounded x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)"
      for x i j
    proof -
      have "âˆƒj'>j. Â¬ zero x ([xs !! j']â‡©â„›)"
      proof -
        from inf_resets[OF x(1)] obtain j' where "j' â‰¥ Suc j" "Â¬ zero x ([xs !! j']â‡©â„›)" by auto
        then show ?thesis by - (rule exI[where x = j']; auto)
      qed
      from inf_resets[OF x(1)] obtain j' where "j' â‰¥ Suc j" "Â¬ zero x ([xs !! j']â‡©â„›)" by auto
      with nat_eventually_critical_path[OF x(4) this(2)]
      obtain j' where j':
        "j' > j" "Â¬ zero x ([xs !! j']â‡©â„›)" "âˆ€ m â‰¥ j. m < j' âŸ¶ zero x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)"
        by auto
      from â€¹x âˆˆ X2â€º have "x âˆˆ ğ’³" unfolding X2_def by simp
      with â€¹i < jâ€º not_reset not_reset_dur â€¹stream_trans _â€º in_S pairwise_Suc[OF eq_elapsed] have
        "dur xs (j - 1) - dur xs i = (xs !! (j - 1)) x - (xs !! i) x" (is "?d1 = ?d2")
        by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
      moreover from â€¹zero x ([xs !! i]â‡©â„›)â€º in_S have "(xs !! i) x = 0"
        by (auto intro: zeroD simp: stream.pred_set)
      ultimately have
        "dur xs (j - 1) - dur xs i = (xs !! (j - 1)) x" (is "?d1 = ?d2")
        by simp
      show ?thesis
      proof (cases "?d1 â‰¥ 0.5")
        case True
          (* XXX Fix SMT *)
        with dur_mono[of "j - 1" j xs] have
          "5 / 10 â‰¤ dur xs j - dur xs i"
          by simp
        then show ?thesis by blast
      next
        case False
        have j_c_bound: "(xs !! j) c â‰¤ ?d2" if "c âˆˆ X2" for c
        proof (cases "(xs !! j) c = 0")
          case True
          from in_S â€¹j > _â€º True â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º show ?thesis by (auto simp: V_def stream.pred_set)
        next
          case False
          from X2 â€¹c âˆˆ X2â€º in_S have "âˆƒk>i. k â‰¤ j âˆ§ (xs !! k) c = 0"
            by (force simp: zeroD stream.pred_set)
          with False have
            "âˆƒk>i. k â‰¤ j - Suc 0 âˆ§ (xs !! k) c = 0"
            by (metis Suc_le_eq Suc_pred linorder_neqE_nat not_less not_less_zero)
          moreover from that have "c âˆˆ ğ’³" by (auto simp: X2_def)
          moreover from not_reset in_S â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have
            "âˆ€k>i. k â‰¤ j - 1 âŸ¶ (xs !! k) x â‰  0"
            by (auto simp: zeroI stream.pred_set)
          ultimately have
            "(xs !! (j - 1)) c â‰¤ ?d2"
            using trans in_S â€¹_ x = 0â€º â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º
            by (auto intro: â„›_divergent_divergent_aux that simp: stream.pred_set)
          moreover from
            trans_not_delay_mono[OF pairwise_Suc[OF trans], of "j - 1"]
            â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º â€¹j > _â€º in_S x(4)
          have "(xs !! j) c â‰¤ (xs !! (j - 1)) c" by (auto simp: zeroD stream.pred_set)
          ultimately show ?thesis by auto
        qed
        moreover from False â€¹?d1 = ?d2â€º have "?d2 < 1" by auto
        moreover from in_S have "(xs !! j) c â‰¥ 0" if "c âˆˆ ğ’³" for c
          using that by (auto simp: V_def stream.pred_set)
        ultimately have frac_bound: "frac ((xs !! j) c) â‰¤ ?d2" if "c âˆˆ X2" for c
          using that frac_le_1I by (force simp: X2_def)

        let ?u = "(xs !! j)"
        from in_S have "[xs !! j]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
        then obtain I r where region:
          "[xs !! j]â‡©â„› = region ğ’³ I r" "valid_region ğ’³ k I r"
          unfolding â„›_def by auto
        let ?S = "{frac (?u c) | c. c âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ isIntv (I c)}"
        have ğ’³_X2: "c âˆˆ X2" if "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "isIntv (I c)" for c
        proof -
          from X1 â€¹j > iâ€º have "âˆ€xâˆˆX1. unbounded x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)" by auto
          with unbounded_Greater[OF region(2) â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º] region(1) that(2) have "c âˆ‰ X1" by auto
          with â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º show "c âˆˆ X2" unfolding X2_def by auto
        qed
        have frac_bound: "frac ((xs !! j) c) â‰¤ ?d2" if "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "isIntv (I c)" for c
          using frac_bound[OF ğ’³_X2] that .
        have "dur xs (j' - 1) = dur xs j" using j' â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º in_S eq_elapsed
          by (subst dur_zero_tail[where Ï‰ = "smap (Î» u. [u]â‡©â„›) xs"])
            (auto dest: pairwise_Suc simp: stream.pred_set)
        moreover from dur_reset[OF eq_elapsed in_S, of x "j - 1"] â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º x(4) â€¹j > _â€º have
          "dur xs j = dur xs (j - 1)"
          by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
        ultimately have "dur xs (j' - 1) = dur xs (j - 1)" by auto
        moreover have "dur xs j' - dur xs (j' - 1) â‰¥ (1 - ?d2) / 2"
        proof -
          from â€¹j' > _â€º have "j' > 0" by auto
          with pairwise_Suc[OF trans', of "j' - 1"] have
            "trans' (xs !! (j' - 1)) (xs !! j')"
            by auto
          moreover from j' have
            "(xs !! (j' - 1)) x = 0" "(xs !! j') x > 0"
            using in_S â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º by (force intro: zeroD dest: not_zeroD simp: stream.pred_set)+
          moreover note delayedR_aux = calculation
          obtain t where
            "(xs !! j') = (xs !! (j' - 1)) âŠ• t" "t â‰¥ (1 - ?d2) / 2" "t â‰¥ 0"
          proof -
            from in_S have "[xs !! j']â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
            then obtain I' r' where region':
              "[xs !! j']â‡©â„› = region ğ’³ I' r'" "valid_region ğ’³ k I' r'"
              unfolding â„›_def by auto            
            let ?S' = "{frac ((xs !! (j' - 1)) c) |c. c âˆˆ ğ’³ âˆ§ Regions.isIntv (I' c)}"

            from finite(1) have "?d2 â‰¥ Max (?S' âˆª {0})"
              apply -
              apply (rule Max.boundedI)
                apply fastforce
               apply fastforce
              apply safe
              subgoal premises prems for _ c d
              proof -
                from j' have "(xs !! (j' - 1)) c = ?u c âˆ¨ (xs !! (j' - 1)) c = 0"
                  by (intro resets_mono'[OF eq_elapsed in_S trans _ â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º]; auto)
                then show ?thesis
                proof (standard, goal_cases)
                  case A: 1
                  show ?thesis
                  proof (cases "c âˆˆ X1")
                    case True
                    with X1 â€¹j' > jâ€º â€¹j > iâ€º have "unbounded c ([xs !! j']â‡©â„›)" by auto
                    with region' â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have "I' c = Greater (k c)"
                      by (auto intro: unbounded_Greater)
                    with prems show ?thesis by auto
                  next
                    case False
                    with â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have "c âˆˆ X2" unfolding X2_def by auto
                    with j_c_bound have mono: "(xs !! j) c â‰¤ (xs !! (j - 1)) x" .
                    from in_S â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have "(xs !! (j' - 1)) c â‰¥ 0"
                      unfolding V_def stream.pred_set by auto
                    then have
                      "frac ((xs !! (j' - 1)) c) â‰¤ (xs !! (j' - 1)) c"
                      using frac_le_self by auto
                    with A mono show ?thesis by auto
                  qed
                next
                  case prems: 2
                    (* XXX *)
                  have "frac (0 :: real) = (0 :: real)" by auto
                  then have "frac (0 :: real) â‰¤ (0 :: real)" by linarith
                  moreover from in_S â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have "(xs !! (j - 1)) x â‰¥ 0"
                    unfolding V_def stream.pred_set by auto
                  ultimately show ?thesis using prems by auto
                qed
              qed
              using in_S â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º by (auto simp: V_def stream.pred_set)
            then have le: "(1 - ?d2) / 2 â‰¤ (1 - Max (?S' âˆª {0})) / 2" by simp

            let ?u = "xs !! j'"
            let ?u' = "xs !! (j' - 1)"
            from in_S have *: "?u' âˆˆ V" "[?u']â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›" "?u âˆˆ V" "[?u]â‡©â„› âˆˆ â„›"
              by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
            from pairwise_Suc[OF trans, of "j' - 1"] â€¹j' > jâ€º have
              "trans (xs !! (j' - 1)) (xs !! j')"
              by auto
            then have Succ:
              "[xs !! j']â‡©â„› âˆˆ Succ â„› ([xs !! (j' - 1)]â‡©â„›) âˆ§ (âˆƒ tâ‰¥ 0. ?u = ?u' âŠ• t)"
            proof cases
              case prems: (succ t)
              from * have "?u' âˆˆ [?u']â‡©â„›" by auto
              with prems * show ?thesis by auto
            next
              case (reset l)
              with â€¹?u' âˆˆ Vâ€º have "?u x â‰¤ ?u' x" by (cases "x âˆˆ set l") (auto simp: V_def)
              from j' have "zero x ([?u']â‡©â„›)" by auto
              with â€¹?u' âˆˆ Vâ€º have "?u' x = 0" unfolding zero_def by auto
              with â€¹?u x â‰¤ _â€º â€¹?u x > 0â€º show ?thesis by auto
            next
              case id
              with * Succ_refl[of â„› ğ’³ k, folded â„›_def, OF _ finite(1)] show ?thesis
                unfolding cval_add_def by auto
            qed
            then obtain t where t: "?u = xs !! (j' - 1) âŠ• t" "t â‰¥ 0" by auto
            note Succ = Succ[THEN conjunct1]

            show ?thesis
            proof (cases "âˆƒ c âˆˆ X2. âˆƒ d :: nat. ?u c = d")
              case True
              from True obtain c and d :: nat where c:
                "c âˆˆ ğ’³" "c âˆˆ X2" "?u c = d"
                by (auto simp: X2_def)
              have "?u x > 0" by fact
              from pairwise_Suc[OF eq_elapsed, of "j' - 1"] â€¹j' > jâ€º have
                "eq_elapsed (xs !! (j' - 1)) ?u"
                by auto
              moreover from
                elapsed_eq[OF this â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º] â€¹(xs !! (j' - 1)) x = 0â€º â€¹(xs !! j') x > 0â€º
              have "elapsed (xs !! (j' - 1)) (xs !! j') > 0"
                by auto
              ultimately have
                "?u c - (xs !! (j' - 1)) c > 0"
                using â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º unfolding eq_elapsed_def by auto
              moreover from in_S have "xs !! (j' - 1) âˆˆ V" by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
              ultimately have "?u c > 0" using â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º unfolding V_def by auto
              from region' in_S â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have "intv_elem c ?u (I' c)"
                by (force simp: stream.pred_set)
              with â€¹?u c = dâ€º â€¹?u c > 0â€º have "?u c â‰¥ 1" by auto
              moreover have "(xs !! (j' - 1)) c â‰¤ 0.5"
              proof -
                have "(xs !! (j' - 1)) c â‰¤ (xs !! j) c"
                  (* XXX This proof is duplicated at least once above *)
                  using j'(1,3)
                  by (auto intro: resets_mono[OF eq_elapsed in_S trans _ â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º])
                also have "â€¦ â‰¤ ?d2" using j_c_bound[OF â€¹c âˆˆ X2â€º] .
                also from â€¹?d1 = ?d2â€º â€¹Â¬ 5 / 10 â‰¤ _â€º have "â€¦ â‰¤ 0.5" by simp
                finally show ?thesis .
              qed
              moreover have "?d2 â‰¥ 0" using in_S â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º by (auto simp: V_def stream.pred_set)
              ultimately have "?u c - (xs !! (j' - 1)) c â‰¥ (1 - ?d2) / 2" by auto
              with t have "t â‰¥ (1 - ?d2) / 2" unfolding cval_add_def by auto
              with t show ?thesis by (auto intro: that)
            next
              case F: False
              have not_const: "Â¬ isConst (I' c)" if "c âˆˆ ğ’³" for c
              proof (rule ccontr, simp)
                assume A: "isConst (I' c)"
                show False
                proof (cases "c âˆˆ X1")
                  case True
                  with X1 â€¹j' > jâ€º â€¹j > _â€º have "unbounded c ([xs !! j']â‡©â„›)" by auto
                  with unbounded_Greater â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º region' have "isGreater (I' c)" by force
                  with A show False by auto
                next
                  case False
                  with â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have "c âˆˆ X2" unfolding X2_def by auto
                  from region' in_S â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º have "intv_elem c ?u (I' c)"
                    unfolding stream.pred_set  by force
                  with â€¹c âˆˆ X2â€º A False F show False by auto
                qed
              qed
              have "âˆ„x. x â‰¤ k c âˆ§ (xs !! j') c = real x" if "c âˆˆ ğ’³" for c
              proof (cases "c âˆˆ X2"; safe)
                fix d
                assume "c âˆˆ X2" "(xs !! j') c = real d"
                with F show False by auto
              next
                fix d
                assume "c âˆ‰ X2" 
                with that have "c âˆˆ X1" unfolding X2_def by auto
                with X1 â€¹j' > jâ€º â€¹j > iâ€º have "unbounded c ([?u]â‡©â„›)" by auto
                from unbounded_all[OF _ _ this] â€¹c âˆˆ ğ’³â€º in_S have "?u c > k c"
                  by (force simp: stream.pred_set)
                moreover assume "?u c = real d" "d â‰¤ k c"
                ultimately show False by auto
              qed
              with delayedR_aux have
                "(xs !! j') = delayedR ([xs !! j']â‡©â„›) (xs !! (j' - 1))"
                using â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º unfolding trans'_def by auto
              from not_const region'(1)  in_S Succ(1) have
                "âˆƒtâ‰¥0. delayedR ([xs !! j']â‡©â„›) (xs !! (j' - 1)) = xs !! (j' - 1) âŠ• t âˆ§
                      (1 - Max (?S' âˆª {0})) / 2 â‰¤ t"
                apply simp
                apply (rule delayedR_correct(2)[OF _ _ region'(2), simplified])
                by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
              with le â€¹_ = delayedR _ _â€º show ?thesis by (auto intro: that)
            qed
          qed
          moreover from pairwise_Suc[OF eq_elapsed, of "j' - 1"] â€¹j' > 0â€º have
            "eq_elapsed (xs !! (j' - 1)) (xs !! j')"
            by auto
          ultimately show "dur xs j' - dur xs (j' - 1) â‰¥ (1 - ?d2) / 2" 
            using â€¹j' > 0â€º dur_Suc[of _ "j' - 1"] â€¹x âˆˆ ğ’³â€º by (auto simp: cval_add_def elapsed_eq)
        qed
        moreover from dur_mono[of i "j - 1" xs] â€¹i < jâ€º have "dur xs i â‰¤ dur xs (j - 1)" by simp
        ultimately have "dur xs j' - dur xs i â‰¥ 0.5" unfolding â€¹?d1 = ?d2â€º[symmetric] by auto
        then show ?thesis using â€¹j < j'â€º by - (rule exI[where x = j']; auto)
      qed
    qed
    moreover
    have "âˆƒ j' â‰¥ i. dur xs j' - dur xs i â‰¥ 0.5" for i
    proof -
      from calculation(1)[of i] obtain j k x where
        "jâ‰¥i" "k>j" "xâˆˆX2" "zero x ([xs !! j]â‡©â„›)"
        "zero x ([xs !! k]â‡©â„›)"
        "âˆ€m. j < m âˆ§ m < k âŸ¶ Â¬ zero x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)"
        "âˆ€xâˆˆX2. âˆƒm>j. m â‰¤ k âˆ§ zero x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)"
        "âˆ€xâˆˆX1. âˆ€mâ‰¥j. unbounded x ([xs !! m]â‡©â„›)"
        by auto
      from calculation(2)[OF this(3,2,4-8)] obtain j' where
        "j'â‰¥k" "5 / 10 â‰¤ dur xs j' - dur xs j"
        by auto
      with dur_mono[of i j xs] â€¹j â‰¥ iâ€º â€¹k > jâ€º show ?thesis by (intro exI[where x = j']; auto)
    qed
    then show ?thesis by - (rule dur_ev_exceedsI[where d = "0.5"]; auto)
  qed
qed

lemma cfg_on_div_absc:
  notes in_space_UNIV[measurable]
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on_div st" "st âˆˆ S"
  shows "absc cfg âˆˆ R_G_cfg_on_div (abss st)"
proof -
  from assms have *: "cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on st" "state cfg = st" "div_cfg cfg"
    unfolding cfg_on_div_def by auto
  with assms have "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" by (auto intro: MDP.valid_cfgI)
  have "almost_everywhere (MDP.MC.T cfg) (MDP.MC.enabled cfg)"
    by (rule MDP.MC.AE_T_enabled)
  moreover from * have "AE x in MDP.MC.T cfg. divergent (smap (snd âˆ˜ state) x)"
    by (simp add: div_cfg_def)
  ultimately have "AE x in MDP.MC.T cfg. â„›_div (smap (snd âˆ˜ state) (smap absc x))"
  proof eventually_elim
    case (elim Ï‰)
    let ?xs = "smap (snd o state) Ï‰"
    from MDP.pred_stream_cfg_on[OF â€¹_ âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º â€¹MDP.MC.enabled _ _â€º] have *:
      "pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ S) (smap state Ï‰)"
      by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
    have "[snd (state x)]â‡©â„› = snd (abss (state x))" if "x âˆˆ sset Ï‰" for x
    proof -
      from * that have "state x âˆˆ S" by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
      then have "snd (abss (state x)) = [snd (state x)]â‡©â„›" by (metis abss_S snd_conv surj_pair)
      then show ?thesis ..
    qed
    then have "smap (Î»z. [snd (state z)]â‡©â„›) Ï‰ = (smap (Î»z. snd (abss (state z))) Ï‰)" by auto
    from * have  "pred_stream (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) ?xs"
      apply (simp add: map_def stream.pred_set)
      apply (subst (asm) surjective_pairing)
      using S_V by blast
    moreover have "stream_trans ?xs"
      by (rule enabled_stream_trans â€¹_ âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º â€¹MDP.MC.enabled _ _â€º)+
    ultimately show ?case using â€¹divergent _â€º â€¹smap _ Ï‰ = _â€º
      by - (drule divergent_â„›_divergent, auto simp add: stream.map_comp state_absc)
  qed
  with â€¹cfg âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º have "R_G_div_cfg (absc cfg)" unfolding R_G_div_cfg_def
    by (subst absc_distr_self) (auto intro: MDP.valid_cfgI simp: AE_distr_iff)
  with R_G.valid_cfgD â€¹cfg âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º * show ?thesis unfolding R_G_cfg_on_div_def by auto force
qed

definition
  "alternating cfg = (AE Ï‰ in MDP.MC.T cfg.
      alw (ev (HLD {cfg. âˆ€cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg. fst (state cfg') = fst (state cfg)})) Ï‰)"

lemma K_cfg_same_loc_iff:
  "(âˆ€cfg'âˆˆ K_cfg cfg. fst (state cfg') = fst (state cfg))
  âŸ· (âˆ€cfg'âˆˆ K_cfg (absc cfg). fst (state cfg') = fst (state (absc cfg)))"
  if "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  using that by (auto simp: state_absc fst_abss K_cfg_map_absc)

lemma (in -) stream_all2_flip:
  "stream_all2 (Î»a b. R b a) xs ys = stream_all2 R ys xs"
  by (standard; coinduction arbitrary: xs ys; auto dest: sym)

(* TODO: Lots of duplication here, e.g. with path_measure_eq_repcs1_new *)
lemma AE_alw_ev_same_loc_iff:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
  shows "alternating cfg âŸ· alternating (absc cfg)"
  unfolding alternating_def
  apply (simp add: MDP.MC.T.AE_iff_emeasure_eq_1)
  subgoal
  proof -
    show ?thesis (is "(?x = 1) = (?y = 1)")
    proof -
      have *: "stream_all2 (Î»s t. t = absc s) x y = stream_all2 (=) y (smap absc x)" for x y
        by (subst stream_all2_flip) simp
      have "?x = ?y"
        apply (rule T_eq_rel_half[where f = absc and S = valid_cfg, OF HOL.refl, rotated 2])
        subgoal
          apply (simp add: space_stream_space rel_set_strong_def)
          apply (intro allI impI)
          apply (frule stream.rel_mono_strong[where Ra = "Î»s t. t = absc s"])
          by (auto simp: * stream.rel_eq stream_all2_refl alw_holds_pred_stream_iff[symmetric]
              K_cfg_same_loc_iff HLD_def elim!: alw_ev_cong)
        subgoal
          by (rule rel_funI) (auto intro!: rel_pmf_reflI simp: pmf.rel_map(2) K_cfg_map_absc)
        using â€¹cfg âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º by simp+
      then show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  qed
  done

lemma AE_alw_ev_same_loc_iff':
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (abss st)" "st âˆˆ S"
  shows "alternating cfg âŸ· alternating (repcs st cfg)"
proof -
  from assms have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
    by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfgI)
  with assms show ?thesis
    by (subst AE_alw_ev_same_loc_iff) (auto simp: absc_repcs_id)
qed

lemma (in -) cval_add_non_id:
  False if "b âŠ• d = b" "d > 0" for d :: real
proof -
  from that(1) have "(b âŠ• d) x = b x"
    by (rule fun_cong)
  with â€¹d > 0â€º show False
    unfolding cval_add_def by simp
qed

lemma repcs_unbounded_AE_non_loop_end_strong:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (abss st)" "st âˆˆ S"
    and "alternating cfg"
  shows "AE Ï‰ in MDP.MC.T (repcs st cfg).
      (âˆ€ u :: ('c â‡’ real). (âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u c > real (k c)) âŸ¶
      Â¬ (ev (alw (Î» xs. shd xs = u))) (smap (snd o state) Ï‰))" (is "AE Ï‰ in ?M. ?P Ï‰")
proof -
  from assms have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
    by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfgI)
  with assms(1) have "repcs st cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
    by auto
  from R_G.valid_cfgD[OF â€¹cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º] have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (state cfg)" .
  let ?U = "Î» u. â‹ƒ l âˆˆ L. {Î¼ âˆˆ K (l, u). Î¼ â‰  return_pmf (l, u) âˆ§ (âˆ€ x âˆˆ Î¼. fst x = l)}"
  let ?r = "Î» u. Sup ({0} âˆª (Î» Î¼. measure_pmf Î¼ {x. snd x = u}) ` ?U u)"
  have lt_1: "?r u < 1" for u
  proof -
    have *: "emeasure (measure_pmf Î¼) {x. snd x = u} < 1"
      if "Î¼ â‰  return_pmf (l, u)" "âˆ€xâˆˆset_pmf Î¼. fst x = l" for Î¼ and l :: 's
    proof (rule ccontr)
      assume "Â¬ emeasure (measure_pmf Î¼) {x. snd x = u} < 1"
      then have "1 = emeasure (measure_pmf Î¼) {x. snd x = u}"
        using measure_pmf.emeasure_ge_1_iff by force
      also from that(2) have "â€¦ â‰¤ emeasure (measure_pmf Î¼) {(l, u)}"
        by (subst emeasure_Int_set_pmf[symmetric]) (auto intro!: emeasure_mono)
      finally show False
        by (simp add: measure_pmf.emeasure_ge_1_iff measure_pmf_eq_1_iff that(1))
    qed
    let ?S =
      "{map_pmf (Î» (X, l). (l, ([X := 0]u))) Î¼ | Î¼ l g. (l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A}"
    have "(Î» Î¼. measure_pmf Î¼ {x. snd x = u}) ` ?U u
      âŠ† {0, 1} âˆª (Î» Î¼. measure_pmf Î¼ {x. snd x = u}) ` ?S"
      by (force elim!: K.cases)
    moreover have "finite ?S"
    proof -
      have "?S âŠ† (Î» (l, g, Î¼). map_pmf (Î» (X, l). (l, ([X := 0]u))) Î¼) ` trans_of A"
        by force
      also from finite(3) have "finite â€¦" ..
      finally show ?thesis .
    qed
    ultimately have "finite ((Î» Î¼. measure_pmf Î¼ {x. snd x = u}) ` ?U u)"
      by (auto intro: finite_subset)
    then show ?thesis
      by (fastforce intro: * finite_imp_Sup_less)
  qed
  { fix l :: 's and u :: "'c â‡’ real" and cfg :: "('s Ã— ('c â‡’ real) set) cfg"
    assume unbounded: "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u c > k c" and "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (abss (l, u))" "abss (l, u) âˆˆ ğ’®"
      and same_loc: "âˆ€ cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg. fst (state cfg') = l"
    then have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" "repcs (l, u) cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
      by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfgI)
    then have cfg_on: "repcs (l, u) cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on (l, u)"
      by (auto dest: MDP.valid_cfgD)
    from â€¹cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on _â€º have "action cfg âˆˆ ğ’¦ (abss (l, u))"
      by (rule R_G.cfg_onD_action)
        (* TODO: Pull out? *)
    have K_cfg_rept: "state ` K_cfg (repcs (l, u) cfg) = rept (l, u) (action cfg)"
      unfolding K_cfg_def by (force simp: action_repcs)
    have "l âˆˆ L"
      using MDP.valid_cfg_state_in_S â€¹repcs (l, u) cfg âˆˆ MDP.valid_cfgâ€º by fastforce
    moreover have "rept (l, u) (action cfg) â‰  return_pmf (l, u)"
    proof (rule ccontr, simp)
      assume "rept (l, u) (action cfg) = return_pmf (l, u)"
      then have "action cfg = return_pmf (abss (l, u))"
        using abst_rept_id[OF â€¹action cfg âˆˆ _â€º]
        by (simp add: abst_def)
      moreover have "(l, u) âˆˆ S"
        using â€¹_ âˆˆ ğ’®â€º by (auto dest: ğ’®_abss_S)
      moreover have "abss (l, u) = (l, [u]â‡©â„›)"
        by (metis abss_S calculation(2))
      ultimately show False
        using â€¹rept (l, u) _ = _â€º unbounded unfolding rept_def by (auto dest: cval_add_non_id)
    qed
    moreover have "rept (l, u) (action cfg) âˆˆ K (l, u)"
    proof -
      have "action (repcs (l, u) cfg) âˆˆ K (l, u)"
        using cfg_on by blast
      then show ?thesis
        by (simp add: repcs_def)
    qed
    moreover have "âˆ€xâˆˆset_pmf (rept (l, u) (action cfg)). fst x = l"
      using same_loc K_cfg_same_loc_iff[of "repcs (l, u) cfg"]
        â€¹repcs (l, u) _ âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º â€¹cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º â€¹cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on _â€º
      by (simp add: absc_repcs_id fst_abss K_cfg_rept[symmetric])
    ultimately have "rept (l, u) (action cfg) âˆˆ ?U u"
      by blast
    then have "measure_pmf (rept (l, u) (action cfg)) {x. snd x = u} â‰¤ ?r u"
      by (fastforce intro: Sup_upper)
    moreover have "rept (l, u) (action cfg) = action (repcs (l, u) cfg)"
      by (simp add: repcs_def)
    ultimately have "measure_pmf (action (repcs (l, u) cfg)) {x. snd x = u} â‰¤ ?r u"
      by auto
  }
  note * = this
  let ?S = "{cfg. âˆƒ cfg' s. cfg' âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg âˆ§ cfg = repcs s cfg' âˆ§ abss s = state cfg'}"
  have start: "repcs st cfg âˆˆ ?S"
    using â€¹cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º assms unfolding R_G_cfg_on_div_def
    by clarsimp (inst_existentials cfg "fst st" "snd st", auto)
  have step: "y âˆˆ ?S" if "y âˆˆ K_cfg x" "x âˆˆ ?S" for x y
    using that apply safe
    subgoal for cfg' l u
      apply (inst_existentials "absc y" "state y")
      subgoal
        by blast
      subgoal
        by (metis
            K_cfg_valid_cfgD R_G.valid_cfgD R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S absc_repcs_id cont_absc_1
            cont_repcs1 repcs_valid
            )
      subgoal
        by (simp add: state_absc)
      done
    done
  have **: "x âˆˆ ?S" if "(repcs st cfg, x) âˆˆ MDP.MC.acc" for x
  proof -
    from MDP.MC.acc_relfunD[OF that] obtain n where "((Î» a b. b âˆˆ K_cfg a) ^^ n) (repcs st cfg) x" .
    then show ?thesis
    proof (induction n arbitrary: x) (* XXX Extract induction rule *)
      case 0
      with start show ?case
        by simp
    next
      case (Suc n)
      from this(2)[simplified] show ?case
        apply (rule relcomppE)
        apply (erule step)
        apply (erule Suc.IH)
        done
    qed
  qed
  have ***: "almost_everywhere (MDP.MC.T (repcs st cfg)) (alw (HLD ?S))"
    by (rule AE_mp[OF MDP.MC.AE_T_reachable]) (fastforce dest: ** simp: HLD_iff elim: alw_mono)

  from â€¹alternating cfgâ€º assms have "alternating (repcs st cfg)"
    by (simp add: AE_alw_ev_same_loc_iff'[of _ st])
  then have alw_ev_same2: "almost_everywhere (MDP.MC.T (repcs st cfg))
     (alw (Î»Ï‰. HLD (state -` snd -` {u}) Ï‰ âŸ¶
      ev (HLD {cfg. âˆ€cfg'âˆˆset_pmf (K_cfg cfg). fst (state cfg') = fst (state cfg)}) Ï‰))"
    for u unfolding alternating_def by (auto elim: alw_mono)

  let ?X = "{cfg :: ('s Ã— ('c â‡’ real)) cfg. âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. snd (state cfg) c > k c}"
  let ?Y = "{cfg. âˆ€ cfg' âˆˆ K_cfg cfg. fst (state cfg') = fst (state cfg)}"

  have "(AE Ï‰ in ?M. ?P Ï‰) âŸ·
    (AE Ï‰ in ?M. âˆ€ u :: ('c â‡’ real).
      (âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u c > k c) âˆ§ u âˆˆ snd ` state ` (MDP.MC.acc `` {repcs st cfg}) âŸ¶
      Â¬ (ev (alw (Î» xs. shd xs = u))) (smap (snd o state) Ï‰))" (is "?L âŸ· ?R")
  proof
    assume ?L
    then show ?R
      by eventually_elim auto
  next
    assume ?R
    with MDP.MC.AE_T_reachable[of "repcs st cfg"] show ?L
    proof (eventually_elim, intro allI impI notI, goal_cases)
      case (1 Ï‰ u)
      then show ?case
        by - (intro alw_HLD_smap alw_disjoint_ccontr[where
              S = "(snd o state) ` MDP.MC.acc `` {repcs st cfg}"
              and R = "{u}" and Ï‰ = "smap (snd o state) Ï‰"
              ]; auto simp: HLD_iff)
    qed
  qed

  also have "â€¦ âŸ·
      (âˆ€ u :: ('c â‡’ real).
        (âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. u c > k c) âˆ§ u âˆˆ snd ` state ` (MDP.MC.acc `` {repcs st cfg}) âŸ¶
        (AE Ï‰ in ?M. Â¬ (ev (alw (Î» xs. shd xs = u))) (smap (snd o state) Ï‰)))"
    using MDP.MC.countable_reachable[of "repcs st cfg"]
    by - (rule AE_all_imp_countable,
        auto intro: countable_subset[where B = "snd ` state ` MDP.MC.acc `` {repcs st cfg}"])
  also show ?thesis
    unfolding calculation
    apply clarsimp
    subgoal for l u x
      apply (rule
          MDP.non_loop_tail_strong[simplified, of snd "snd (state x)" ?Y ?S "?r (snd (state x))"]
          )
      subgoal
        apply safe
        subgoal premises prems for cfg l1 u1 _ cfg' l2 u2
        proof -
          have [simp]: "l2 = l1" "u2 = u1"
            subgoal
              by (metis MDP.cfg_onD_state Pair_inject prems(4) state_repcs)
            subgoal
              by (metis MDP.cfg_onD_state prems(4) snd_conv state_repcs)
            done
          with prems have [simp]: "u2 = u"
            by (metis â€¹(l, u) = state xâ€º â€¹snd (l1, u1) = snd (state x)â€º â€¹u2 = u1â€º snd_conv)
          have [simp]: "snd -` {snd (state x)} = {y. snd y = snd (state x)}"
            by (simp add: vimage_def)
          from prems show ?thesis
            apply simp
            apply (erule *[simplified])
            subgoal
              using prems(1) prems(2)[symmetric] prems(3-) by (auto simp: R_G.valid_cfg_def)
            subgoal
              using prems(1) prems(2)[symmetric] prems(3-) by (auto simp: R_G.valid_cfg_def)
            subgoal
              using K_cfg_same_loc_iff[of "repcs (l1, snd (state x)) cfg'"]
              by (simp add: absc_repcs_id) (metis fst_abss fst_conv repcs_valid)
            done
        qed
        done
      subgoal
        by (auto intro: lt_1[simplified])
        apply (rule MDP.valid_cfgD[OF â€¹repcs st cfg âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º]; fail)
      subgoal
        using *** unfolding alw_holds_pred_stream_iff[symmetric] HLD_def .
      subgoal
        by (rule alw_ev_same2)
      done
    done
qed

lemma cfg_on_div_repcs_strong:
  notes in_space_UNIV[measurable]
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G_cfg_on_div (abss st)" "st âˆˆ S" and "alternating cfg"
  shows "repcs st cfg âˆˆ cfg_on_div st"
proof -
  let ?st = "abss st"
  let ?cfg = "repcs st cfg"
  from assms have *:
    "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on ?st" "state cfg = ?st" "R_G_div_cfg cfg"
    unfolding R_G_cfg_on_div_def by auto
  with assms have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfgI)
  with â€¹st âˆˆ Sâ€º â€¹_ = ?stâ€º have "?cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" by auto
  from *(1) â€¹st âˆˆ Sâ€º â€¹alternating cfgâ€º have
    "AE Ï‰ in MDP.MC.T ?cfg. âˆ€u. (âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. real (k c) < u c) âŸ¶
                          Â¬ ev (alw (Î»xs. shd xs = u)) (smap (snd âˆ˜ state) Ï‰)"
    by (rule repcs_unbounded_AE_non_loop_end_strong)
  â€• â€¹Move to lower levelâ€º
  moreover from *(2,3) have "AE Ï‰ in MDP.MC.T ?cfg. â„›_div (smap (snd âˆ˜ state) (smap absc Ï‰))"
    unfolding R_G_div_cfg_def
    by (subst (asm) R_G_trace_space_distr_eq[OF â€¹cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º]; simp add: AE_distr_iff)
  ultimately have "div_cfg ?cfg"
    unfolding div_cfg_def using MDP.MC.AE_T_enabled[of ?cfg]
  proof eventually_elim
    case prems: (elim Ï‰)
      let ?xs = "smap (snd o state) Ï‰"
      from MDP.pred_stream_cfg_on[OF â€¹_ âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º â€¹MDP.MC.enabled _ _â€º] have *:
        "pred_stream (Î» x. x âˆˆ S) (smap state Ï‰)"
        by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
      have "[snd (state x)]â‡©â„› = snd (abss (state x))" if "x âˆˆ sset Ï‰" for x
      proof -
        from * that have "state x âˆˆ S" by (auto simp: stream.pred_set)
        then have "snd (abss (state x)) = [snd (state x)]â‡©â„›" by (metis abss_S snd_conv surj_pair)
        then show ?thesis ..
      qed
      then have "smap (Î»z. [snd (state z)]â‡©â„›) Ï‰ = (smap (Î»z. snd (abss (state z))) Ï‰)" by auto
      from * have  "pred_stream (Î» u. u âˆˆ V) ?xs"
        by (simp add: map_def stream.pred_set, subst (asm) surjective_pairing, blast)
      moreover have "stream_trans ?xs"
        by (rule enabled_stream_trans â€¹_ âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º â€¹MDP.MC.enabled _ _â€º)+
      moreover have "pairwise trans' ?xs"
        using â€¹_ âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º â€¹state cfg = _â€º[symmetric] â€¹MDP.MC.enabled _ _â€º
        by (rule enabled_stream_trans')
      moreover from prems(1) have
        "âˆ€u. (âˆ€câˆˆğ’³. real (k c) < u c) âŸ¶ Â¬ ev (alw (Î»xs. snd (shd xs) = u)) (smap state Ï‰)"
        by simp
      ultimately show ?case using â€¹â„›_div _â€º
        by (simp add: stream.map_comp state_absc â€¹smap _ Ï‰ = _â€º â„›_divergent_divergent)
    qed
  with MDP.valid_cfgD â€¹cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º * show ?thesis unfolding cfg_on_div_def by auto force
qed

lemma repcs_unbounded_AE_non_loop_end:
  assumes "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (abss st)" "st âˆˆ S"
  shows "AE Ï‰ in MDP.MC.T (repcs st cfg).
      (âˆ€ s :: ('s Ã— ('c â‡’ real)). (âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. snd s c > k c) âŸ¶
      Â¬ (ev (alw (Î» xs. shd xs = s))) (smap state Ï‰))" (is "AE Ï‰ in ?M. ?P Ï‰")
proof -
  from assms have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
    by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfgI)
  with assms(1) have "repcs st cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
    by auto
  from R_G.valid_cfgD[OF â€¹cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º] have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (state cfg)" .
  let ?K = "Î» x. {Î¼ âˆˆ K x. Î¼ â‰  return_pmf x}"
  let ?r = "Î» x. Sup ((Î» Î¼. measure_pmf Î¼ {x}) ` ?K x)"
  have lt_1: "?r x < 1" if "Î¼ âˆˆ ?K x" for Î¼ x
  proof -
    have *: "emeasure (measure_pmf Î¼) {x} < 1" if "Î¼ â‰  return_pmf x" for Î¼
    proof (rule ccontr)
      assume "Â¬ emeasure (measure_pmf Î¼) {x} < 1"
      then have "emeasure (measure_pmf Î¼) {x} = 1"
        using measure_pmf.emeasure_ge_1_iff by force
      with that show False
        by (simp add: measure_pmf_eq_1_iff)
    qed
    let ?S =
      "{map_pmf (Î» (X, l). (l, ([X := 0]u))) Î¼ | Î¼ l u g.
          x = (l, u) âˆ§ (l, g, Î¼) âˆˆ trans_of A}"
    have "(Î» Î¼. measure_pmf Î¼ {x}) ` ?K x
      âŠ† {0, 1} âˆª (Î» Î¼. measure_pmf Î¼ {x}) ` ?S"
      by (force elim!: K.cases)
    moreover have "finite ?S"
    proof -
      have "?S âŠ† (Î» (l, g, Î¼). map_pmf (Î» (X, l). (l, ([X := 0](snd x)))) Î¼) ` trans_of A"
        by force
      also from finite(3) have "finite â€¦" ..
      finally show ?thesis .
    qed
    ultimately have "finite ((Î» Î¼. measure_pmf Î¼ {x}) ` ?K x)"
      by (auto intro: finite_subset)
    then show ?thesis
      using that by (auto intro: * finite_imp_Sup_less)
  qed
  { fix s :: "'s Ã— ('c â‡’ real)" and cfg :: "('s Ã— ('c â‡’ real) set) cfg"
    assume unbounded: "âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. snd s c > k c" and "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on (abss s)" "abss s âˆˆ ğ’®"
    then have "repcs s cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
      by (auto intro: R_G.valid_cfgI)
    then have cfg_on: "repcs s cfg âˆˆ MDP.cfg_on s"
      by (auto dest: MDP.valid_cfgD)
    from â€¹cfg âˆˆ _â€º have "action cfg âˆˆ ğ’¦ (abss s)"
      by (rule R_G.cfg_onD_action)
    have "rept s (action cfg) â‰  return_pmf s"
    proof (rule ccontr, simp)
      assume "rept s (action cfg) = return_pmf s"
      then have "action cfg = return_pmf (abss s)"
        using abst_rept_id[OF â€¹action cfg âˆˆ _â€º]
        by (simp add: abst_def)
      moreover have "(fst s, snd s) âˆˆ S"
        using â€¹_ âˆˆ ğ’®â€º by (auto dest: ğ’®_abss_S)
      moreover have "abss s = (fst s, [snd s]â‡©â„›)"
        by (metis abss_S calculation(2) prod.collapse)
      ultimately show False
        using â€¹rept s _ = _â€º unbounded unfolding rept_def by (cases s) (auto dest: cval_add_non_id)
    qed
    moreover have "rept s (action cfg) âˆˆ K s"
    proof -
      have "action (repcs s cfg) âˆˆ K s"
        using cfg_on by blast
      then show ?thesis
        by (simp add: repcs_def)
    qed
    ultimately have "rept s (action cfg) âˆˆ ?K s"
      by blast
    then have "measure_pmf (rept s (action cfg)) {s} â‰¤ ?r s"
      by (auto intro: Sup_upper)
    moreover have "rept s (action cfg) = action (repcs s cfg)"
      by (simp add: repcs_def)
    ultimately have "measure_pmf (action (repcs s cfg)) {s} â‰¤ ?r s"
      by auto
    note this â€¹rept s (action cfg) âˆˆ ?K sâ€º
  }
  note * = this
  let ?S = "{cfg. âˆƒ cfg' s. cfg' âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg âˆ§ cfg = repcs s cfg' âˆ§ abss s = state cfg'}"
  have start: "repcs st cfg âˆˆ ?S"
    using â€¹cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º assms unfolding R_G_cfg_on_div_def
    by clarsimp (inst_existentials cfg "fst st" "snd st", auto)
  have step: "y âˆˆ ?S" if "y âˆˆ K_cfg x" "x âˆˆ ?S" for x y
