    using that apply safe
    subgoal for cfg' l u
      apply (inst_existentials "absc y" "state y")
      subgoal
        by blast
      subgoal
        by (metis
            K_cfg_valid_cfgD R_G.valid_cfgD R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S absc_repcs_id cont_absc_1
            cont_repcs1 repcs_valid
            )
      subgoal
        by (simp add: state_absc)
      done
    done
  have **: "x âˆˆ ?S" if "(repcs st cfg, x) âˆˆ MDP.MC.acc" for x
  proof -
    from MDP.MC.acc_relfunD[OF that] obtain n where "((Î» a b. b âˆˆ K_cfg a) ^^ n) (repcs st cfg) x" .
    then show ?thesis
    proof (induction n arbitrary: x) (* XXX Extract induction rule *)
      case 0
      with start show ?case
        by simp
    next
      case (Suc n)
      from this(2)[simplified] show ?case
        by (elim relcomppE step Suc.IH)
    qed
  qed
  have ***: "almost_everywhere (MDP.MC.T (repcs st cfg)) (alw (HLD ?S))"
    by (rule AE_mp[OF MDP.MC.AE_T_reachable]) (fastforce dest: ** simp: HLD_iff elim: alw_mono)

  have "(AE Ï‰ in ?M. ?P Ï‰) âŸ·
    (AE Ï‰ in ?M. âˆ€ s :: ('s Ã— ('c â‡’ real)).
      (âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. snd s c > k c) âˆ§ s âˆˆ state ` (MDP.MC.acc `` {repcs st cfg}) âŸ¶
      Â¬ (ev (alw (Î» xs. shd xs = s))) (smap state Ï‰))" (is "?L âŸ· ?R")
  proof
    assume ?L
    then show ?R
      by eventually_elim auto
  next
    assume ?R
    with MDP.MC.AE_T_reachable[of "repcs st cfg"] show ?L
    proof (eventually_elim, intro allI impI notI, goal_cases)
      case (1 Ï‰ s)
      from this(1,2,5,6) show ?case
        by (intro alw_HLD_smap alw_disjoint_ccontr[where
              S = "state ` MDP.MC.acc `` {repcs st cfg}" and R = "{s}" and Ï‰ = "smap state Ï‰"
              ]; simp add: HLD_iff; blast)
    qed
  qed

  also have "â€¦ âŸ·
      (âˆ€ s :: ('s Ã— ('c â‡’ real)).
        (âˆ€ c âˆˆ ğ’³. snd s c > k c) âˆ§ s âˆˆ state ` (MDP.MC.acc `` {repcs st cfg}) âŸ¶
        (AE Ï‰ in ?M. Â¬ (ev (alw (Î» xs. shd xs = s))) (smap state Ï‰)))"
    using MDP.MC.countable_reachable[of "repcs st cfg"]
    by - (rule AE_all_imp_countable,
        auto intro: countable_subset[where B = "state ` MDP.MC.acc `` {repcs st cfg}"])
  also show ?thesis
    unfolding calculation
    apply clarsimp
    subgoal for l u x
      apply (rule MDP.non_loop_tail'[simplified, of "state x" ?S "?r (state x)"])
      subgoal
        apply safe
        subgoal premises prems for cfg cfg' l' u'
        proof -
          from prems have "state x = (l', u')"
            by (metis MDP.cfg_onD_state state_repcs)
          with â€¹_ = state xâ€º have [simp]: "l = l'" "u = u'"
            by auto
          show ?thesis
            unfolding â€¹state x = _â€º using prems(1,3-) by (auto simp: R_G.valid_cfg_def intro: *)
        qed
        done
      subgoal
        apply (drule **)
        apply clarsimp
        apply (rule lt_1)
        apply (rule *)
        apply (auto dest: R_G.valid_cfg_state_in_S R_G.valid_cfgD)
        done
       apply (rule MDP.valid_cfgD[OF â€¹repcs st cfg âˆˆ valid_cfgâ€º]; fail)
      using *** unfolding alw_holds_pred_stream_iff[symmetric] HLD_def .
    done
qed

end (* PTA Regions *)


subsection â€¹Main Resultâ€º text_raw â€¹ \label{thm:minmax} â€º

context Probabilistic_Timed_Automaton_Regions_Reachability
begin

lemma R_G_cfg_on_valid:
  "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg" if "cfg âˆˆ R_G_cfg_on_div s'"
  using that unfolding R_G_cfg_on_div_def R_G.valid_cfg_def by auto

lemma cfg_on_valid:
  "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg" if "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on_div s"
  using that unfolding cfg_on_div_def MDP.valid_cfg_def by auto

abbreviation "path_measure P cfg â‰¡ emeasure (MDP.T cfg) {xâˆˆspace MDP.St. P x}"
abbreviation "R_G_path_measure P cfg â‰¡ emeasure (R_G.T cfg) {xâˆˆspace R_G.St. P x}"
abbreviation "progressive st â‰¡ cfg_on_div st âˆ© {cfg. alternating cfg}"
abbreviation "R_G_progressive st â‰¡ R_G_cfg_on_div st âˆ© {cfg. alternating cfg}"

text â€¹Summary of our results on divergent configurations:â€º
lemma absc_valid_cfg_eq:
  "absc ` progressive s = R_G_progressive s'"
  apply safe
  subgoal
    unfolding s'_def by (rule cfg_on_div_absc) auto
  subgoal
    by (simp add: AE_alw_ev_same_loc_iff cfg_on_valid)
  subgoal for cfg
    unfolding s'_def
    by (frule cfg_on_div_repcs_strong)
       (auto 4 4
          simp: s'_def R_G_cfg_on_div_def AE_alw_ev_same_loc_iff'[symmetric]
          intro: R_G_cfg_on_valid absc_repcs_id[symmetric]
       )
  done

text â€¹Main theorem:â€º
theorem Min_Max_reachability:
  notes in_space_UNIV[measurable] and [iff] = pred_stream_iff
  shows
  "(â¨†cfgâˆˆ progressive s.      path_measure     (Î» x. (holds Ï†  suntil holds Ïˆ)  (s  ## x)) cfg)
 = (â¨†cfgâˆˆ R_G_progressive s'. R_G_path_measure (Î» x. (holds Ï†' suntil holds Ïˆ') (s' ## x)) cfg)
 âˆ§ (â¨…cfgâˆˆ progressive s.      path_measure     (Î» x. (holds Ï†  suntil holds Ïˆ)  (s  ## x)) cfg)
 = (â¨…cfgâˆˆ R_G_progressive s'. R_G_path_measure (Î» x. (holds Ï†' suntil holds Ïˆ') (s' ## x)) cfg)"
proof (rule SUP_eq_and_INF_eq; rule bexI[rotated]; erule IntE)
  fix cfg assume cfg_div: "cfg âˆˆ R_G_cfg_on_div s'" and "cfg âˆˆ Collect alternating"
  then have "alternating cfg"
    by auto
  let ?cfg' = "repcs s cfg"
  from â€¹alternating cfgâ€º cfg_div have "alternating ?cfg'"
    by (simp add: R_G_cfg_on_div_def s'_def AE_alw_ev_same_loc_iff'[of _ s])
  with cfg_div â€¹alternating cfgâ€º show "?cfg' âˆˆ cfg_on_div s âˆ© Collect alternating"
    by (auto intro: cfg_on_div_repcs_strong simp: s'_def)
  show "emeasure (R_G.T cfg)   {x âˆˆ space R_G.St. (holds Ï†' suntil holds Ïˆ') (s' ## x)}
      = emeasure (MDP.T ?cfg') {x âˆˆ space MDP.St. (holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ)   (s ## x)}"
     (is "?a = ?b")
  proof -
    from cfg_div have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
      by (rule R_G_cfg_on_valid)
    from cfg_div have "cfg âˆˆ R_G.cfg_on s'"
      unfolding R_G_cfg_on_div_def by auto
    then have "state cfg = s'"
      by auto
    have "?a = ?b"
      apply (rule
          path_measure_eq_repcs''_new[
            of s cfg Ï† Ïˆ, folded Ï†'_def Ïˆ'_def, unfolded â€¹_ = s'â€º state_repcs
            ]
          )
      subgoal
        unfolding s'_def ..
      subgoal
        by fact
      subgoal
        using â€¹?cfg' âˆˆ cfg_on_div s âˆ© _â€º by (blast intro: cfg_on_valid)
      subgoal premises prems for xs
        using prems s by (intro Ï†_stream)
      subgoal premises prems
        using prems s by (intro Ïˆ_stream)
      done
    then show ?thesis
      by simp
  qed
next
  fix cfg assume cfg_div: "cfg âˆˆ cfg_on_div s" and "cfg âˆˆ Collect alternating"
  with absc_valid_cfg_eq show "absc cfg âˆˆ R_G_cfg_on_div s' âˆ© Collect alternating"
    by auto
  show "emeasure (MDP.T cfg)        {x âˆˆ space MDP.St. (holds Ï† suntil holds Ïˆ)   (s ## x)}
      = emeasure (R_G.T (absc cfg)) {x âˆˆ space R_G.St. (holds Ï†' suntil holds Ïˆ') (s' ## x)}"
    (is "?a = ?b")
  proof -
    have "absc cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfg"
      using R_G_cfg_on_valid â€¹absc cfg âˆˆ R_G_cfg_on_div s' âˆ© _â€º by blast
    from cfg_div have "cfg âˆˆ valid_cfg"
      by (simp add: cfg_on_valid)
    with â€¹absc cfg âˆˆ R_G.valid_cfgâ€º have "?b = ?a"
      by (intro MDP.alw_S R_G.alw_S path_measure_eq_absc1_new
            [where P = "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ ğ’®)" and Q = "pred_stream (Î»s. s âˆˆ S)"]
         )
         (auto simp: S_abss_ğ’® intro: ğ’®_abss_S intro!: suntil_abss suntil_reps, measurable)
    then show "?a = ?b"
      by simp
  qed
qed

end (* PTA Reachability Problem *)

end (* Theory *)
